64b1(1): mtshan nyid kyis tshogs bsags pa la mnyam rjes res 'jog gis lam bskal chen du mar bgrod dgos pa nyid/ sngags su mnyam rjes dbyer med kyi lam la zhugs pas myur du bgrod pas 'phags/ 'bras
64b2(1): bu'ang mtshan nyid dus ring po zhig tu phyis 'byung bar 'dod/ sngags su gzhi 'bras dbyer med da lta lhun grub tu 'dod pas 'phags/ sa'ang mtshan nyid du spang gnyen rim can gyis dbye bas bcu gcig tu 'dod
64b3(1): la/ sngags su bcu gnyis ma chags pad+ma can gyi sa dang / bcu gsum rdo rje 'dzin pa la sogs kyis 'phags/ dus kyang mtshan nyid pas bskal chen grangs med gsum sogs 'gor la/ sngags su dam tshig ma
64b4(1): nyams pas tshe gcig sogs kyi 'grub pas 'phags/ longs spyod kyang mtshan nyid la 'dod yon spangs te sgrub/ sngags la grogs su byed pas 'phags/ rnal 'byor kyang mtshan nyid pas mnyam rjes tha dad du 'byed
64b5(1): la/ sngags su dbyer med bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rnal 'byor lam du byed pas 'phags/ bdag gzhan gyi don sgrub pa'ang mtshan nyid pas gnas skabs cung zad phan pa tsam las cher mi 'grub/ sngags kyis las
64b6(1): gang yang rung bas tshar gcod dang rjes 'dzin gyi sgo mang pos rang dang gzhan gyi don la spyod pas 'phags/ dgongs pa'ang mtshan nyid la rgyu'i theg pa tsam las ma shes pa nyid/ sngags la 'bras bu gsang chen nges
65a1(1): par byed pas 'phags/ bya sla bas ngal dub kyi skyon spangs pa dang / tshegs chung ngus don chen po 'grub pa'i phyir yang mtshan nyid las 'phags la/ tshogs bsags pa yang mtshan nyid la/ sbyin
65a2(1): sogs par phyin drug gi spyod pas bskal pa grangs med pa rnams su rgya cher bsags dgos pa nyid/ sngags su nyung ngu tsam yang sngags kyi byin rlab kyis nam mkha'i mdzod du spel nas sbyin pa byar yod pa'i phyir
65a3(1): rgya che zhing yul thams cad sangs rgyas zhing du shes pa dang / longs spyod thams cad tshogs su 'gyur ba dang / nyon mongs rnams rang bzhin gyis ma spangs par dag pas bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs myur
65a4(1): du 'dums shing rdzogs pas 'phags so// gzhan yang mtshan nyid du sku snang la sgyu ma'i rang bzhin dang / lus bya ba tha mal gyi sgo nas dge ba la 'jug pa las med/ sngags su sku'i gsang ba snod bcud du snang
65a5(1): ba thams cad lha dang gzhal yas khang / lus dkyil 'khor du rdzogs pas lha'i phyag rgya 'du 'phro las ma 'das pas 'phags/ mtshan nyid du gsung brag cha ltar stong pa dang / ngag smra ba'i 'jug pa bcad de dge
65a6(1): ba la 'jug pa tsam las med/ sngags su gsung gi gsang ba sgra dbyangs mi shigs pa'i nA da chen po'i rang bzhin shes pas chos kyi char 'bebs pa dang / ngag gsung gi dkyil 'khor du gdod nas gnas pas
65b1(1): sgra tshig grag pa thams cad sngags kyi rang gdangs su shar bas ci smras thams cad nus pa thogs pa med pas don sgrub pa'i phyir 'phags/ mtshan nyid pas thugs dran rtog thams cad rang bzhin med pas rgyas
65b2(1): 'debs pa dang / yid tha mal gyi rnam rtog 'du 'phro bkag nas zhi lhag gi ting nge 'dzin sgrub la/ sngags su thugs kyi gsang ba chos nyid mchog tu mi 'gyur ba'i bde ba chen po dang rnam pa kun gyi mchog dang ldan
65b3(1): pa'i dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid zung du 'jug pa'i rang bzhin du shar bas/ yid kyis dran rtog thams cad chos nyid kyi rol pa 'gag pa med par shar bas ting nge 'dzin chu bo rgyun gyi rnal 'byor
65b4(1): mnyam rjes gnyis med rnam par mi rtog pa'i dkyil 'khor du lhun gyis grub pa'i phyir 'phags so// de tsam gyis mtshon pas khyad par gzhan yang bsam gyis mi khyab par shes par bya ste/ mdor na/ dgongs pa
65b5(1): lung ston las/ shin tu grangs med bskal pa ru// sangs rgyas rnams kyis gang mkhyen pa// sngags pa rnams kyis dus gcig tu// tshe gcig rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob// ces gsungs pas sdud par bya'o// gnyis
65b6(1): pa ngo bo ni/ ston pas gsungs pa'i theg chen gyi sde snod gang zhig rgyu 'bras dbyer med lhun grub tu blta bas kun 'byung bden pa'i rang bzhin lam bden dang sdug bsngal bden pa'i rang bzhin 'gog bden du
66a1(1): snang bas byed las gzhi'i gnas lugs la spang blang med par nyams su blang bas 'bras bu myur du 'grub par byed pa zhig go/ gsum pa nges tshig ni/ ma na yid dang tra ya skyob pa la 'jug pa yi ge
66a2(1): phyis bsnan gyi dbang gis man+ta zhes pa/ gsang ba 'dus pa las/ dbang po dang ni yul rnams kyi// rkyen gyis gang dang gang byung yid// yid de man ces bya bar bshad// tra ni skyob par byed pa'i don// ces dang //
66a3(1): snga 'gyur thig le kun gsal chen po las kyang / sngags gsum dag gi nges tshig ni// shes skyon phyir na der brjod pa'o// zhes bshad pa ltar yid shes pa de myur du skyob pa'i phyir na sngags so// de yang bde bas
66a4(1): skyob pa ni ma hA mA yA las/ 'dod pa'i longs spyod lnga po la// ci bde bar ni spyad pas 'grub// ces pa dang / myur bas skyob pa ni/ grangs med pa gsum gyis tshogs sogs la ma ltos par thabs la mkhas
66a5(1): pas tshe gcig sogs kyi 'bras bu mngon du byed nus pas na myur ba dang 'bras bu'i theg par bzhag pa yin te/ dpal kha sbyor thig le las/ bskal pa bye ba du ma ru// bsgrub par dka' ba'i sangs rgyas
66a6(1): kyang // tshe 'di nyid la ster bas na// 'bras bu'i theg pa zhes bya'o// zhes pa dang / sangs rgyas mnyam sbyor las/ bskal pa bye ba grangs med kyis// sangs rgyas kun dngos mi thob pa// gsang sngags tshe 'di'i
66b1(1): cho ga yis// tshe 'di nyid la thob par 'gyur// ces gsungs pa bzhin no// yang na/ e waM gyis mtshon pa'i rnam kun mchog ldan gyi stong gzugs phyag rgya chen po zhu ba des drangs pas 'dod chags chen po'i thig
66b2(1): le'i 'gros las shar ba'i lhan cig skyes pa'i bde ba dang stong pa ngo bo gcig tu gyur pa'i zung 'jug ye shes mi 'gyur ba'i bde ba chen po de ni sangs rgyas kun gyi sdom pa yin la/ des spang bya 'gyur ba de 'pho
66b3(1): ba'i bag chags dang mtshan rtog sdom par byed pa'i yid bde myur gyi sgo nas skyob pas kyang sngags te/ dus kyi 'khor lo las/ dbyangs dang gsal byed kyi tshogs ni mi 'gyur ba ma yin te mi 'gyur ba'i sgras ni
66b4(1): mchog tu mi 'gyur ba bde ba'i ye shes rdo rje sems dpa'o// de bzhin du yid skyob par gyur pa nyid kyi spyir sngags kyang mchog tu mi 'gyur ba'i ye shes su brjod do// zhes pa dang / rdo rje rtse mo las/ sngags
66b5(1): rnams kun gyi mtshan nyid ni// sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs yin te// chos kyi snying po sgrub byed pas// chos kyi dbyings dang yang dag ldan// zhes so// de rgyas par ston pa'i bka'i tshogs la rig pa 'dzin pa'i sde
66b6(1): snod dam rdo rje theg pa'i sde snod ces btags te/ pi To ka zhes pa gang bu dang bre bo che la 'jug pas don gyis 'di ltar phung po khams dang skye mched kyi chos nas sku dang ye shes kyi bar gyi shes bya'i tshul rnams
67a1(1): gnas lugs ltar gtan la phab cing zhib par bstan pa'i phyir shin tu rgyas pa'i sde snod dang / sde snod 'og ma gsum gyi brjod bya thams cad 'dir 'dus shing rdzogs pas sde snod thams cad kyi ma
67a2(1): mo'ang yin te/ sgyu 'phrul rgyas pa las/ mnyam nyid don rtogs rang rig rgyal po ni// rgya mtsho chen por chu klung kun 'bar ltar// bla med don rtogs thabs chen 'di dag tu// rnam thar theg pa bsam yas ma
67a3(1): lus 'dus// zhes so// de la rig pa 'dzin pa ni/ gang zhe na 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa gnyis las dang po ni/ ril bu mig sman dngos grub dang // sa 'og ral gri dngos grub dang // mkha'
67a4(1): la 'phur dang mi snang dang // shi ba med dang nad 'joms so// zhes las chen brgyad grub pa rig pa 'dzin pa chung ngu dang / 'bring ni 'dod pa'i rig pa 'dzin pa phal pa dang / chen po ni tshe dang longs spyod
67a5(1): la sogs pa bskal pa drug gam dpag tu med par 'dod pa dang / gzugs kyi rig pa 'dzin pa gsum dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa mthong lam nas bzung slob pa'i sar gnas pa zung 'jug gi sems can
67a6(1): nam dri ma med pa'i ye shes kyi sku ste rig pa 'dzin pa dang / de nyid 'ja' lus yin mod kyi khams gsum pa'i gzugs can ma yin cing de la yon tan gyi khyad par bdun dang ldan te/ ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa
67b1(1): dang / mngon shes lnga dang ldan pa dang / zhing sna tshogs su 'gro ba'i don spyod pa dang / 'dod cing 'chums pa med pa dang / 'dod pa mtha' yas pa la bde ba chen por longs spyod pa dang / tshe tshad las brgal ba
67b2(1): dang / yid kyis lus su gnas pa'o// de yang phung po'i za ma tog ma nyams pa ni/ ye shes kyi sku tsam dang / las sam ting nge 'dzin gyis nyams pa de'i tshe rig pa 'dzin pa'i ye shes kyi sku zhes bya ste de la ma hA yo
67b3(1): gar rnam smin/ tshe dbang / phyag chen/ lhun grub ste lnga dang / mnyam sbyor du bdun du dbye bar mdzad la/ de dag rnams kyis bslab par bya ba'i gzhir gyur pas sam theg pa 'di la zhugs pas thun mong dang
67b4(1): mchog gi grub pa de lta bu thob par 'gyur ba'i phyir rig pa 'dzin pa'i sde snod de/ dpung bzang gi rgyud kyi 'grel pa las/ rig 'dzin gyi sde snod ces bya ba ni rig sngags 'chang rnams kyis bslang ba'i gzhi dang /
67b5(1): lta ba'i rlung gi grub pa'i mtha' 'di nyid kyis ston to// zhes bshad pa ltar ro// de nyid rdo rje theg pa yin te/ rdo rje mi phyed pa dang mi shigs pa'i don du bshad na gang tha dad du mi phyed pa ni 'khor 'das gnyis
67b6(1): snang tshul la tha dad kyang gnas lugs su sems nyid las nam yang g.yos pa med pas na/ tha dad med pa'i rang bzhin ni// rdo rje zhes su brjod pa yin// zhes pa dang / mi shigs pa ni mtshan mar gyur pa'i chos
68a1(1): gang gis kyang mi shigs pa ni chos nyid kyi ngo bo yin pas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thugs te/ de nyid rdo rje dang mtshungs pa'i phyir sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thugs rdo rje zhes brjod pa ni sngags kyi
68a2(1): / ngo bor gnas pa gong du smos pa bzhin dang / de 'thob byed kyi rten nam bgrod byed du gyur pa'i phyir theg pa'i sgras smos pas brjod bya dang rjod byed kyi tshul te/ 'dus pa'i 'grel pa las/ rdo rje'i theg pa zhes bya
68a3(1): ba ni theg pa chen po ma lus pa bsdus pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug yin la/ de rnams bsdus pa ni thabs dang shes rab yin zhing de dag kyang bsdus pa ro gcig pa de ni byang chub kyi sems yin te/ de yang rdo rje
68a4(1): sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin yin la de nyid ni rdo rje yin no// rdo rje yang yin la theg pa yang yin pas na rdo rje theg pa ste sngags kyi theg pa zhes bya ba'i don to// bla med ces bya ba ni/ theg pa thams cad kyi mchog
68a5(1): nyid du gyur pa'i phyir ro// zhes bshad pa dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyis dri ma med pa'i 'od las/ rdo rje zhes pa ni mi phyed pa'i ye shes bsam du med pa'i thugs rdo rje'o// de gang la yod pa de ni rdo rje
68a6(1): can te/ zhes dang / rdo rje ni mi phyed pa dang mi chod pa chen po yin la de nyid theg pa yin pa ni rdo rje theg pa ste sngags kyi tshul dang / pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'bras bu dang rgyu'i bdag nyid gcig du 'dres par gyur
68b1(1): pa'o// zhes dang / rdo rje theg pa ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi theg pa ste/ mu stegs dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa rnams kyis mi phyed pa'i phyir rdo rje theg pa ste/ thar par 'dis
68b2(1): 'gro ba'i phyir rdo rje theg pa'o// zhes sogs rgya cher gsungs so// yang na tan+ta'i sgra las sems skyob pa la 'jug ste/ tsi tan sems dang tra ya skyob pa la 'jug pa'i phyir/ dka' 'grel ye shes ldan las/ de
68b3(1): sems rnam par rtog pa las skyob par byed pas na rgyud do// rgyud kyi tshogs sam rigs su gyur pas na rgyud sde'o// zhes 'byung ba ltar dang // yang na pi wang gi rgyud ltar rgyud chags su gnas pa la 'jug ste
68b4(1): sems can nas sangs rgyas kyi bar du sems kyi chos nyid rang bzhin rnam dag de gzhi lam 'bras gsum gyis bsdus pas rgyun ma chad par 'brel par gnas pa'i phyir rgyud de/ gsang ba 'dus pa las/ rgyud ni
68b5(1): rgyun chags zhes bya ste// rgyud de rnam pa gsum du 'gyur// gzhi dang de yi rang bzhin dang // mi 'phrog pa yis rab dbye bas// rang bzhin rnam pa rgyu yin te// gzhi ni thabs zhes bya ba yin// de bzhin mi 'phrog
68b6(1): 'bras bu de// gsum gyis rgyud kyi don bsdus pa'o// zhes pa dang / snying po'i rgyud phyi ma las/ rgyud ni rgyun chags la bshad de// thabs dang rgyu las 'bras bu'o// zhes so// de nyid thabs kyi rkyen gyis zin pa
69a1(1): dang ma zin pa la ltos nas gzhi lam 'bras gsum du snang ste/ gang rtogs par bya ba gzhi'am rgyu'i rgyud/ gang gis rtogs shing bgrod pa thabs sam lam gyi rgyud/ gang du mthar phyin pa 'bras bu'i
69a2(1): rgyud dang gsum ste de yang brjod bya la ltos nas gzhi dang 'bras bu'i rgyud dang rjod byed la ltos nas thabs sam lam gyi rgyud de sngags rnams dang de'i cho ga la sogs pas 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das
69a3(1): pa'i dgos pa ma lus par 'grub par byed pa ste/ rdo rje rtse mo las/ 'bral dang ma tshang med phyir dang // phun sum tshogs pas rgyud ces bya// zhes so// de la gzhi'i rgyud gang zhe na/ thog ma med pa'i dus rnams
69a4(1): nas brgyud de 'ongs pa/ sems kyi rang bzhin 'od gsal ba gang yin pa dang / sems dang sems las byung ba rnams dang / snod dang bcud kyi rang bzhin dang / rtsa dang / rlung dang / khams dang / chos kyi
69a5(1): dbyings gang yin pa rnams spyir btang ste gtso bo ni/ gzhi 'ching grol med pa'i gnas lugs rang rig pa byang chub kyi sems bden pa dbyer med blo'i spyod yul dang bral ba rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal bar ye
69a6(1): nas gnas pa gang yin pa ste zhing dang / sku dang / ye shes la sogs pa 'bras bu'i chos mthun pa'i khyad par can rang bzhin bde ba chen po rgyun 'chad pa med pa chos nyid kyi sa thob pa ste khyad par gyi chos bzhi
69b1(1): dang ldan pa de nyid rtogs ma rtogs kyi dbang gis 'khor 'das gnyis kyi gzhi'am rgyur 'gyur mod kyi/ 'on kyang rang bzhin la 'gyur ba med par rgyun chags pas na rgyu'i rgyud ces bya ste/ de nyid sangs rgyas kyi
69b2(1): ngo bo yin pa'i cha nas bde gshegs snying po dang / stong chas chos sku'i yon tan dang / snang chas gzugs sku'i yon tan 'char rung du gnas pas rang bzhin gnas rigs dang / 'khor 'das gnyis kyi 'byung gzhi
69b3(1): yin pas kun gzhi'i ye shes dang / kri ya'i bdag gi de kho na nyid dang / u pa dang yo gas don dam mtshan ma med pa'i byin rlab kun rdzob rdo rje dbyings kyi lhar blta ba dang / ma hA yo ga'i bden gnyis dbyer
69b4(1): med lhag pa'i chos sku chen po dang / a nu yo ga'i dbyings dang ye shes gnyis su med pa'i sras rtsa ba byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor dang / a ti yo ga'i ngo bo rang bzhin thugs rje gsum la sogs pa'i tha snyad
69b5(1): gang la'ang 'jug pa'i gzhi ste bye brag lus can rnams kyi snying ga chos kyi 'khor lo'i dbus su rgyu'i rgyud kyi rten dngas ma lnga ldan gyi dbus su chos sku byang chub sems nyid thig le mi shigs pa'i rang bzhin
69b6(1): du bzhugs par bshad cing 'byung lnga sems dang bcas pa'i dngas ma drug yang gnyis gnyis ro gcig tu 'jug pas shin tu phra ba'i sgo gsum rdo rje mi shigs pa gsum gyi rang bzhin du ye nas gnas shing rnam pa
70a1(1): kun tu mi g.yo ba ste/ rdo rje phreng ba las/ lus can snying la gang gnas pa// rang byung zag med ye shes gzugs// mi shigs thig le bde chen po// nam mkha' lta bur kun khyab pa// mi gnas chos
70a2(1): sku'i rang bzhin yin// zhes pa dang / dpal dus kyi 'khor lo las/ bum pa'i chu ni len par byed pa na yang nam mkha' 'gro ba min pa ji lta bar/ mkha' khyab mkha' yi rdo rje can ni yul dang rnam par bral ba
70a3(1): lus kyi dbus su de bzhin no// zhes pa la sogs pas rgyas par gsungs pa de nyid grol gzhi lhun grub kyi chos nyid ye shes rang la gnas pa 'bras rgyud nyer len gyi rgyur nges pa ste/ man ngag snye ma las/ dngos
70a4(1): po rnams kyis stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo ni rang bzhin dang rnam pa zhes don gzhan ma yin te/ rang gi ngo bo zhes pa'i don to// de rgyu ste/ nye bar len pa'i byed pa po'i rdo rje 'dzin pa ste/ gang 'di rnams kyi thog ma med
70a5(1): pa'i dus nas dri mas ma gos pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis grub pa'i sangs rgyas nyid de kho na ni dri ma med pa thob pa'i mtshan nyid can sangs rgyas nyid kyi glu'o// zhes gsungs pa'i phyir dang / sbrang gzhi 'bras chud nyer
70a6(1): len de la sgrib byed kyi dri ma 'khor ba ltar snang ba'i chos rnams ni gzung yul bden par med bzhin du 'dzin byed log pa'i rnam shes kyi de dang der btags nas bzhag pa'i phyir sbyang bya yin la/ des bsgribs
70b1(1): pas 'dam rdzabs kyi khrod kyi nor bu bzhin gnas pa ste/ klu sgrub kyis/ sa yi nang na gnas pa'i chu// dri ma med par yang dag gnas// nyon mongs nang nas ye shes kyang / de bzhin dri ma med par gnas// zhes
70b2(1): bshad pa ltar ro// gnyis pa lam gyi rgyud ni/ gzhi rgyud la sgrib byed kyi dri ma de nyid sbyong byed kyi thabs su gyur pa la bya ste gzhi shes par byed pa dang mar 'brel/ 'bras bu thob par byed pa dang yang 'brel pas
70b3(1): gzhi 'bras par gyi bya byed 'brel pa can du gnas pa'i phyir na lam gyi rgyud do// ngo bo'i sgo nas dbye na/ dbang bskur ba dang / dam tshig rnams dang / sdom pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / las dang dngos grub kyi
70b4(1): sbyor ba rnams so// de la dbang bskur ba ni/ bum pa dang / gsang ba dang / shes rab ye shes dang / de kho na nyid dang / 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / slob ma'i dbang dang / phyir mi ldog
70b5(1): pa dang / tha mal gyis dbang dang / mchog gi dbang dang / 'jug pa'i cho ga dang / dngos gzhi dang / rjes su gnang ba dang / lung bstan pa dang / gzengs bstod pa dang / yon dbul ba dang bcas pa rnams te/
70b6(1): rdo rje las rim las/ dbang phyug 'jug dang bzod gsol dang // khrus dgab dri dang lus dbul dang // bgegs bskrad lhar rlob dam tshig sbyin// de nyid dbab dang chu nan dang / bsgrag dang rin chen dor ba
71a1(1): dang // lha dbab pa dang nan tan dang // mig dbye dkyil 'khor legs mthong bstan// tshogs mchod yon dang rnam bco brgyad// 'di yis yan lag rdzogs par 'gyur// ces pa lta bu'o// dam
71a2(1): tshig la yang ngo bo'i sgo nas dbye na/ bsrung ba'i dam tshig dang / bsgrub pa'i dam tshig gnyis las/ dang po ni/ rtsa ba'i ltung ba dang yan lag gi ltung ba gnyis so// de yang rim pas ltung ba bcu bzhi dang / sbom po
71a3(1): brgyad rnams so// ji skad du/ slob dpon smad par mi bya zhing // bde gshegs bka' las 'da' mi bya// spun la smad par mi bya zhing // sems can rnams la byams mi spang // byang chub sems ni dor mi
71a4(1): bya// rang gzhan chos la smad mi bya// ma smin pa la gsang mi bsgrag/ phung po rnam pa smad mi bya// dag pa'i chos la som nyi spangs// gdug pa can la byams pa spangs// ming sogs bral la der mi rtog/ dad ldan
71a5(1): sems ni sum mi dbyung // dam tshig spong dang bud med smod// rtsa ba'i ltung ba zhes brjod do// zhes bshad pa la sogs pa rnams dang // gzhan yang ting nge 'dzin dang / spyod lam dang / bza' ba dang / mi 'bral
71a6(1): ba'i yo byad sogs sgrub pa'i dam tshig dang / rigs lnga so so'i brtul bzhugs te ting nge 'dzin gyi dam tshig dang / las dang po pa dang / cung zad brtan pa thob pa dang / brtan pa cher thob pa'i dam tshig dang / sku
71b1(1): gsung thugs rdo rje'i dam tshig dang / bum dbang dang / gsang dbang dang / sher dbang gi dam tshig dang / gzhan yang bsnyen pa'i dam tshig dang / 'jig rten pa so so'i bsgrub pa'i/ las so so'i/ 'jig rten
71b2(1): las 'das pa'i bsgrub pa'i/ sgrub pa chen po'i dam tshig la sogs pa rnams dang 'di las thun mong ma yin pa gzhan rnams kyang shes par bya'o// sdom pa ni/ sngags kyi tshul khrims de 'thob par byed pa'i cho ga
71b3(1): ni rig pa 'dzin pa'i sde snod 'dir bshad pa'i dbang bskur ba'o// thob pa'i dus ni dbang so so'i dngos gzhi rdzogs pa na'o// ngo bo ni byin gyis brlabs pa'i sems kyi rgyun gyi khyad par nyes pa rnams bzlog
71b4(1): par byed pa yon tan kyi rten mthu brtas pa'o// dbye na/ thun mong dang thun mong ma yin pa gnyis las/ dang po ni/ bya ba sogs phyi rgyud kyi sdom pa dang / gnyis pa ni/ bla na med pa'i rgyud 'dir bde bas byin
71b5(1): gyis brlob pa ste/ bum pa dang / gsang ba dang / shes rab ye shes kyi sdom pa rnams te/ 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa gnyis gnyis su rtogs par bya la/ gtong ba'i dus ni spyir rtsa ba'i ltung ba
71b6(1): byung ba dang / bye brag sngags kyi theg pa spang ba de'i tshe na'o// gso ba'i cho ga ni sdig pa yongs su sbyangs nas slar yang dbang bskur gyi cho gas blang ba yin no// ting nge 'dzin kyang / mtshan ma dang bcas pa dang
72a1(1): mtshan ma med pa gnyis so// de la bya ba'i rgyud du de kho na nyid bzhi la sogs pa dang / bla med du kun brtags bskyed rim gyi rnal 'byor dang / yongs grub rdzogs rim gyi rnal 'byor gnyis su byung
72a2(1): ba'i dang po la'ang / ngo bo dang / yan lag dang / dbye ba dang / gnas skabs dang / dngos btags kyi khyad par ro// dang po ni/ snang ba ris med la snying rje chen po'i 'phen pa dang ting nge 'dzin gyi gzhung de dang
72a3(1): mtshungs ldan du gyur pa'i lha sku'i rnam pa can srid pa gsum dang chos mthun du bsgoms pas sku gsum gyi smin byed du 'gro ba gang zhig bskyed rim gyi ngo bor gnas pa yin te/ yan lag ni/ thun mtshams sam
72a4(1): mchod pa dang bstod pa la sogs pa dang rnal 'byor chen po brgyad la sogs pa rnams so// dbye ba ni/ dang po sbyor ba dang / dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog dang / las rgyal mchog dang / bsnyen pa dang / nyer sgrub
72a5(1): dang / sgrub pa dang / sgrub pa chen po dang / rnal 'byor dang / rjes su rnal 'byor dang / shin tu rnal 'byor dang / rnal 'byor chen po rnams so// gnas skabs su sbyor na/ las dang po pa dang / ye shes phebs pa
72a6(1): dang / ye shes la dbang ba dang / ye shes la ches dbang ba'o// bskyed rim dngos ni yan lag bdun dang ldan pa nyid yin la gzhan rnams ni btags pa pa'o// gnyis pa la'ang ngo bo/ dbye ba/ rang bzhin dang
72b1(1): gsum las/ dang po ni/ rlung yid sems gsum dbu mar thim pas bde stong gi ye shes mngon du gyur pa gang zhig rdzogs rim gyi ngo bor nges pa yin te/ dbye na/ dngos dang / btags pa dang / mtshan ma can
72b2(1): dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / khyab byed dang / khyab bya'i rim pa rnams so// de la dang po ni/ zhu ba'i bde ba lhan skyes chen po dang / sgyu ma'i sku dang / rang bzhin lhan skyes dang / zung 'jug gi sku dang / rlung d+hA
72b3(1): tir thim pa'i mthar thob pa kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i snang ba gsum dang / dga' ba gsum dang / de rnams dngos su thob pa'i lam gang yin pa de rnams la rdzogs pa'i rim pa
72b4(1): dngos zhes bya la/ gzhan du rtsa dang / rlung dang / phra mo dang / thig le'i rnal 'byor dang / phyag rgya'i rim pa rlung dbu mar 'jug pa dang / gnas pa dang / thim par byed pa'i las can rnams ni rdzogs rim dngos
72b5(1): ma yin kyang de 'thob byed yin pas rdzogs rim du btags pa yin la/ mtshan ma can gyi rdzogs rim la'ang dngos btags gnyis las/ snga ma ni/ sems dang sems las byung ba'i mtshan nyid can gyi snang ba
72b6(1): gsum ni 'od gsal bar gnas yongs su ma gyur pa ste so so'i skye bo thams cad dang gzhan la yang yod do// phyi ma ni/ sgra don can gyi rtog pa dang mtshungs ldan du gyur pa gang yin pa ste don gyi 'od gsal
73a1(1): ma thob pa'i bar dag tu ci rigs par yod do// mtshan ma med pa'i rdzogs rim la yang dngos dang btags pa gnyis las/ dang po ni/ 'phags rgyud kyi rtogs pa dang / phyi ma ni so skye'i gnas
73a2(1): skabs su'ang yod do// khyab byed kyi rdzogs pa'i rim pa ni/ so sor sdud pa dang / bsam gtan dang / srog rtsol dang / 'dzin pa dang / rjes su dran pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / dga' ba bzhi dang / snang ba dang /
73a3(1): snang ba mched pa dang / snang ba nye bar thob pa dang / 'od gsal ba dang / snang phyogs dang / stong phyogs dang / bde ba'i phyogs dang / phyogs dang bral ba rnams te gang rdzogs pa'i rim pa de thams cad la khyab
73a4(1): pa'i phyir ro// khyab bya'i rdzogs rim ni/ lus ngag sems gsum rnam par dben pa dang / bdag byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa dang / 'od gsal ba dang / zung 'jug dang / rdzogs pa'i rim par spyod pa'i ting nge
73a5(1): 'dzin dang / bdag byin gyis brlab pa'i sgo dang / sna tshogs rdo rje dang / nor bu 'gengs pa dang / dza lan+d+ha ra dang / bsam mi khyab dang / rang bzhin gyis brlab pa dang / dkyil 'khor 'khor lo dang / rgyud kyi
73a6(1): rim pa dang / sngags dang / ye shes dang / gsang ba'i rim pa dang / dbyibs dang / chos dang / rtsa rlung thig le'i rim pa dang / me dang / las dang / ye shes dang / dam tshig dang / phyag rgya chen po ste bzhi dang /
73b1(1): snying ga'i thig le dang / nor bu dang / sprul pa dang / mi shigs pa'i rnal 'byor la sogs dbye ba'i sgo nas dpag tu med par yod la de dag gi gnad gang la bsnun pa'i yul lus chags gnas 'jig pa'i tshul
73b2(1): la ji ltar gnad du bsnun zhe na/ yul dang / dus dang / lus dang / rlung dang / dmigs pa'i gnad rnams so// de rnams kyis yon tan mngon du byed cing dri ma rnams sbyong bar byed pa yin kyang da dung rgyu rkyen la
73b3(1): ltos dgos pa'i phyir 'du byas pa'i mtshan nyid can no// de dag rnams kyis ye shes phebs pa ni tshogs lam chung ngu ste dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / ye shes la ches dbang bas yang dag pa'i spong ba ste tshogs kyi
73b4(1): lam 'bring po dang / de nyid spyod pas mthar phyin cing lta stangs rnams la thogs pa med pa dang / sangs rgyas rnams mngon du gyur pa dang / skye ba gcig gis thogs pa ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa can tshogs lam chen
73b5(1): po yin no// rdzogs rim dngos kyis sems dben pa thob pa zhu ba de'i mthar zug pa dbang po lnga'i rang bzhin drod dang / rtse mo zhes bya la/ ye shes kyi sku ni nam mkha' mdzod thob pa stobs lnga dang ldan pa bzod
73b6(1): pa dang chos mchog ste 'dir rtsa rlung thig le'i 'gros rnams thim pa'i ye shes yon tan gyi gzhir gyur pas gong ma'i lam dang mthun pa bcu gnyis su dbye ba yod la/ de'i tshe ye shes kyi sku la sangs rgyas zhes
74a1(1): btags so// don dam pa so so rang gi rig pa thams cad stong pa 'od gsal ba ni byang chub kyi yan lag mthong ba'i lam ste 'di la dga' ba'i rang bzhin bden pa bcu drug dang ldan no// slob
74a2(1): pa'i zung 'jug ni sa lhag ma dgu dang / sa bcu tsam dang / rgyun mtha'i ye shes dag las rnam grol lam dang / khyad par gyi lam ni sa bcu gnyis sam bcu gsum ste yan lag bdun dang ldan pa'i ye shes gong
74a3(1): ma'i gzhir gyur pa ste 'di rnams ni bsgom pa'i lam 'phags lam yan lag brgyad do// rgyud kyi sbyor ba ni/ las dang dngos grub kyi rgyud do// dang po ni/ bsam gtan gyi las dang / sbyin sreg gi las dang /
74a4(1): 'khrul 'khor gyi las dang / sbyor ba'i las phal pa dang / gzhan yang las chen bcu gnyis la sogs pa rnams so// dngos grub kyi rgyud la'ang gnyis te/ dang po ni/ rdzas kyi rig pa 'dzin pa dang / lus dang /
74a5(1): longs spyod dang / 'dod pa dang / gzugs kyi rig pa 'dzin pa dang / gzugs med par 'gro ba'o// ngang pa dang / mkha' lding dang / khyung mchog la sogs bzhon pa dang / rdo rje dang / 'khor lo dang / pad+ma la
74a6(1): sogs pa dang / rin po che bdun dang / 'jig rten pa rnams kyi mtshon cha dang / yi ge dang ming gi sngags kyi rig pa 'dzin pa la sogs pa dang / gzhan yang lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po la sogs
74b1(1): pa bsgrubs pas gzhan la brten pa'i 'jig rten pa'i dngos grub mtha' yas pa rnams dang / de las che longs tsam bsdus pas ril bu sogs las chen po brgyad rnams dang / 'dod pa'i rig 'dzin dang /
74b2(1): gzugs kyi rig 'dzin rnams so// de la spyod pa ni/ spros bcas dang / spros med dang / shin tu spros med do// yang na/ a ba d+ha ti dang / kun bzang dang / phyogs las rnam par rgyal ba ste gsum mo// gsum pa
74b3(1): 'bras bu'i rgyud ni/ de ltar gzhi rgyud sgrib byed kyi dri ma de lam bsgom stobs kyis dag pa las gzhi la ji ltar yod pa'i yon tan mngon du gyur pa ni 'bras bu ste/ snying po'i 'grel pa khog gzhung las// grub pa
74b4(1): mthar phyin 'bras bur brjod// ces pas bla na med pa mchog gi 'bras bu don du gnyer ba rnams bsam pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir 'bras bu dang / nam yang rgyun mi 'chad pas na rgyud do// dbye na dngos dang
74b5(1): brtags pa gnyis las/ dngos ni mi slob pa'i zung 'jug rdo rje 'chang chen po sgyu ma'i sku dang / slob pa'i zung 'jug gi sems can 'bras bu dngos min kyang der btags pa ste khams gsum pa ma yin pa'i phyir dang
74b6(1): yon tan brgyad tshan gnyis la dbang 'byor pa'o// mi slob pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sa'i yon tan byang chub kyi phyogs rnams dang / tshad med pa dang / dbang bcu dang / stobs bcu dang / shes pa bcu dang / ma
75a1(1): 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / nyon mongs med pa dang / mkhyen pa dang / thugs rje chen po dang / zad par dang / zil gnon dang / rnam thar la sogs rgyu'i sde snod las ji ltar bshad
75a2(1): pa rnams dang / sngags su bshad pa'i zung 'jug gi yon tan khyad par ba yang / ji skad du/ rtag pa dang ni mi gdung dang // bsil ba dang ni gcig pa dang // bde ba dang ni dri med dang // dga' ba dang ni yid drangs
75a3(1): pa// zhes ro myong brgyad dang / sku yi dbang phyug dang ni gsung gi dbang phyug dang // de bzhin du ni thugs kyi dbang phyug dang // rdzu 'phrul kun 'gro gnas kyi dbang phyug dang // ci 'dod byed dang yon tan brgyad
75a4(1): pa'o// zhes dbang phyug pa brgyad dang / longs spyod rdzogs dang kha sbyor bde chen rang bzhin med// snying rjes yongs gang rgyun mi 'chad dang 'gog pa med// ces kha sbyor bdun dang / gzugs phra reg pa yang ba dang //
75a5(1): khyab pa yang dag thob pa nyid// rab tu gsal ba nyid bstan pa// dbang phyug nyid dang 'dod dgur bsgyur// zhes yon tan brgyad la sogs pa dang / gzhan yang / rang bzhin med pa la sogs pas zab pa rnams
75a6(1): dang / bsod nams dang ye shes la sogs pa rgya che ba rnams dang / yul thams cad la sogs par khyab pa rnams dang / rgyun mi 'chad pa la sogs kyis rtag pa rnams dang / kha sbyor chen po la sogs pas bde ba
75b1(1): rnams kyi bdag nyid chos dang longs spyod rdzogs pa dang / sprul pa dang / bde ba chen po la sogs pa sku'i bye brag rnams so// de dag rnams kyis brjod bya rgyud gsum gyi rnam par gzhag pa spyir nges par byas nas//
75b2(1): de dag rjod byed sde snod kyi sgo nas bye brag tu dbye na/ dgos pa'i dbang gis rgyud sde gnyis dang / bzhi dang / lnga dang / bdun du dbye ba sogs mang zhing / dang po ni bya ba dang / rnal 'byor gnyis so// de la'ang
75b3(1): gnyis gnyis te/ bya ba dang / spyod pa dang / rnal 'byor dang / rnal 'byor bla na med pa'o// de ltar yang / rdo rje snying po bkod pa'i rgyud las/ bde bar gshegs pas dgongs pa'i rgyud// rnam pa bzhi ru yang dag
75b4(1): bshad// bya spyod rnal 'byor bla med do// zhes gsungs pa bzhin/ dbye tshul mi 'dra ba du ma yod kyang / yongs su grags pa rgyud sde bzhir dbye ba de dag gi dgos pa yang / dbang po tha ma dang / 'bring dang / rab
75b5(1): dang / ches rab tu gyur pa rnams la ltos nas lam de dang des rim gyis 'bras bu'i bar bkri ba'i thabs su bstan pa ste/ gur las/ dman pa rnams la bya ba'i rgyud// bya min rnal 'byor de lhag la// sems can
75b6(1): mchog la rnal 'byor rgyud// rnal 'byor bla med de ltag la'o// zhes pa dang / dus bzhir ltos nas kyang rgyud sde bzhi bstan par gsungs pa yod de/ ji skad du/ rdzogs ldan dang por bya ba'i rgyud// gsum ldan
76a1(1): gnyis par spyod pa'i rgyud// gnyis ldan gsum par rnal 'byor rgyud// rtsod ldan bzhi par bla med do// dus bzhi la ni dgongs nas kyang // rgyud ni rnam pa bzhir bshad do// zhes 'byung ba ltar
76a2(1): ro// de yang 'dod chags rigs bzhi'i gdul bya rnams 'dul ba'i phyir rgyud sde bzhir bstan par gsungs pa'ang de la don gyis 'dus pas logs su mi spro la/ dbye ba'i dgos pa gzhan dang gzhan yang mang du
76a3(1): / yod mod kyi spros pas chog go/ re zhig rgyud sde bzhir grangs nges pa de dag gi dang po gsum ni dka' thub rig byed kyi theg pa'am lus ngag phyi'i bya ba gtso bor ston pa dang / phyi'i bya ba dang nang gi sems gnyis
76a4(1): mnyam pa dang / nang gi sems gtso bor ston cing phyi'i bya ba'ang mi 'dor ba rim pa bzhin ston pas phyi rgyud sde gsum du bzhag pa ste/ bya ba dang / spyod pa dang / rnal 'byor gsum mo// de dag kyang dgyes rdor
76a5(1): don bsdus kyi 'grel pa las/ de kho na nyid bsgom pa'i nus pa chung na mtshan ma can gyi spyod pa la mngon par dga' ba rnams la phyi'i spyod pa de dag shas cher ston pa bya ba'i rgyud/ ces pa dang / gang zhig bya ba'i
76a6(1): khyad par la'ang mos shing thabs shes rab kyi spyod pa rgya chen po la'ang sbyor ba'i nang gi bdag nyid can gyi tshul yang mi 'dor bar spro ba de dag la ni bya ba dang rnal 'byor gyi rgyud cha gnyis las mthun pa'i gnyi
76b1(1): ga'i rgyud/ ces sogs dang / rnam snang mngon byang gi 'grel pa las/ 'phags pa de nyid bsdus pa la sogs pa nang gi sbyor ba gtso bor gyur pa yin mod kyi/ phyi'i spyod pa rnams kyang med ma yin no// zhes bshad
76b2(1): pas so// de'i phyir kr-i yA zhes pa bya ba'i don te lus ngag gi bya ba gtso bor ston pa'i phyir dang / lta ba don dam par mtha' bzhi spros pa dang bral ba'i dag par bdag gi de kho na nyid rtogs pa'i yon tan las//
76b3(1): kun rdzob yongs su dag pa lha'i mtshan nyid du blta bas dngos grub gzhan la re zhing rtsol ba'i thabs su gyur pa ste/ sangs rgyas gsang ba'i lam rim du// gnyis med mnyam par ma shes pas// don dam dag pa
76b4(1): chos nyid tsam// ye shes yon tan kun rdzob lha// res bsgom bya ba las kyis// zhes bshad pa bzhin bsgom pa kun rdzob dag pa'i lha rigs gsum gyi rnal 'byor te/ stong pa'i lha/ yi ge'i lha/ sgra'i lha//
76b5(1): gzugs kyi lha/ phyag rgya'i lha/ mtshan ma'i lha ste drug gis bdag lha ru gsal ba'am mi gsal ba gang rung gis ye shes pa rje bo dang / bdag 'bangs kyi rnam pas dngos grub don du gnyer ba ste/ rang shar las/
76b6(1): lha dang rnal 'byor dag pa gnyis// rje dang 'bangs kyi tshul du blta// zhes so// spyod pa khrus dang / gtsang sbra dang / sbyang bar gnas pa la sogs dka' thub kyis lha mnyes par byed pa dang / brtul zhugs dang
77a1(1): rjes su mthun pa la gnas pas bzlas brjod kyi de nyid sgra dang / sems dang / gzhi la sems gzhol ba dang / bsam gtan gyi de nyid ni/ ji skad du/ gsang sngags mer gnas dngos grub
77a2(1): ster// sgrar gnas rnal 'byor ster bar byed// sgra mthas thar pa sbyin par byed// ces bshad pa ltar gsum mo// de dag lam du byas pa'i 'bras bu gnas skabs su 'dod pa'i lha dang skal pa mnyam pa'i rig
77a3(1): 'dzin mkha' spyod 'grub cing rten de la sngags kyi spyod pa spyad pa'i nye rgyu la brten nas mthar zug 'dir bshad pa'i rigs gsum rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sa mngon du byed pa ste/ gal po las/ mi tshe bdun na sangs
77a4(1): / rgyas so// rigs gsum mgon pos 'gro ba 'dul// zhes gsungs so// de dag ston pa'i sde snod kyang / dpung bzang gi rgyud dang / sgrol ma 'byung ba dang / dam tshig gsum rgyal dang / 'byung po 'dul byed la
77a5(1): sogs pa rnams so// rigs kyi sgo nas dbyen drug tu 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i/ pad+ma'i/ rdo rje'i/ nor bu'i/ rgyas pa'i/ 'jig rten pa'i rigs te drug go/ de dag re re la'ang rigs kyi gtso bo dang /
77a6(1): bdag po dang / yum dang / gtsug tor dang / khro bo dang / khro mo dang / pho nya dang / pho nya mo dang / bka' nyan po dang / bka' nyan mo rnams su dbye ba yod la/ de rnams kyang bsdu na gsang sngags dang rig sngags
77b1(1): gnyis su 'du'o// gnyis pa ni/ u pa ya ste lta ba rnal 'byor dang spyod pa bya ba ltar spyod pas na cha mnyam gyi rgyud dang / gnyi ga'i rgyud du brjod pa de gnyis kyi mtshams sbyor du gyur pa ste/ rang shar las/ u pa
77b2(1): ya ni 'di ltar te// lta ba yo gar blta ba la// spyod pa kr-i yAr spyod pa'o// de phyir gnyis ka'i rgyud du grags// zhes so// lha spyod de dag gzhir bzhag nas bsgom pa mtshan bcas dang / yi ge dang / phyag rgya dang /
77b3(1): gzugs kyi lha rnams nges pa'i sgo nas sgom zhing rtse gcig pa'i sbyor bas ting nge 'dzin brtan par gyur pa ste/ rnam snang mngon byang las/ yi ge dang ni yi ge sbyar// de bzhin gzhi las gzhir gyur nyid// shin tu
77b4(1): bsdams pas yid las ni// bzlas brjod 'bum phrag gcig bya'o// zhes pa dang / mtshan med kyi rnal 'byor don dam pa'i ngang la sems 'jog pa sogs la goms par gyur pas 'bras bu rig pa 'dzin pa'i
77b5(1): lus 'grub pa sogs gnas skabs dang / rten des sngags kyi spyod pa spyad pas mthar zug mi tshe lnga 'am/ 'gor na bskal pa gsum mam gcig gis rigs bzhi rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sa mngon du byed de/ gal po
77b6(1): las/ rigs bzhi rdo rje 'chang sar gnas// zhes so// de dag ston pa'i sde snod rnam par snang mdzad mngon par byang chub pa dang / phyag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba la sogs pa rnams so// gsum pa ni/ yo ga zhes
78a1(1): pa rnal 'byor te/ slob dpon kun dga' snying pos/ rnal 'byor gyi rgyud 'di ni bsgom pa gtso bor ston pa yin pas/ ci dga' ba'i bzlas pa bstan pa'i phyir/ zhes dang / de kho na nyid snang ba'i
78a2(1): don bsdus las kyang / rgyud 'di ni ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa gtso bor ston pas na rnal 'byor gyi rgyud ces bya'o// zhes gsungs pa ltar/ lta ba don dam par chos thams cad spros pa dang bral ba'i rang bzhin 'od
78a3(1): gsal ba stong pa nyid du rtogs pa'i ye shes kyi byin rlabs kun rdzob rdo rje dbyings kyi lhar blta bas rtog pa bzang ngan gyi rtsol bas 'bras bu sgrub par 'dod pa ste/ lam rim las/ lhun grub mnyam pa ma rtogs
78a4(1): pas// chos sku rnam dag ye shes kyi// byin rlabs rdo rje dbyings sbrul lha// blang dor byed pa las kyi sa// zhes pa ltar bsgom pa phyag rgya bzhi dang 'brel ba'i rim pa mngon byang lnga dang / rnal 'byor bzhi'i rim
78a5(1): pas bdag ltar bsgom pa 'khor bcas thabs kyi rnal 'byor dang / sems kyi de kho na nyid mngon par rtogs pa so so rang rig pa'i ye shes mnyam par 'jog pa sogs kyi nang gi ting nge 'dzin la gtso bor byed
78a6(1): pa dang / spyod pa gtsang sgra sogs phyi ltar grogs su brten pas 'bras bu mkha' spyod rig pa 'dzin pa sogs gnas skabs dang / mthar thug mi tshe gsum mam bcu drug gis phyag rgya chen po grub nas rim gyis
78b1(1): rigs lnga stug po bkod pa'i sar mngon par byang chub pa lnga'i sgo nas ye shes lnga'i ngo bor 'tshang rgya ba ste/ kun byed rgyal po las/ yo ga stug po bkod 'dod pas// mi tshe gsum na grol bar 'dod// ces
78b2(1): so// de ston par byed pa'i sde snod ni/ de kho na nyid 'dus pa dang / dpal mchog dang po la sogs pa rnams so// rigs kyi sgo nas dbye na/ rtsa ba'i rigs dang / sangs rgyas dang / rdo rje dang / rin chen dang /
78b3(1): chos dang / las kyi rigs te lnga dang / de re re la'ang rigs chung lnga lnga/ de yang / snying po dang / phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags dang / rigs sngags bzhi bzhir phye bas brgyad du 'gyur la/ bsdu na zabs shes
78b4(1): gnyis su 'du ste/ de kho na nyid 'dus par yab dang / shes phyin tshul brgya lnga bcu pa la yum gyi sgras smos pa bzhin no// gnyis pa dbang bsgyur thabs kyi theg pa'am rnal 'byor bla na med pa ni/ rgyud sde 'og ma
78b5(1): gsum du blang dor dang spang gnyen sogs gtsang sme'i 'du shes kyis bkris pa dang / thabs shes ya bral bas/ bde ba chen po'i gnas lugs la rmongs pa sogs kyis mtshan nyid kyi theg pa dang tshul mthun pa
78b6(1): nyid shas che ba'i phyir phyi rgyud sde gsum mam rgyud sde 'og mar bzhag pa yin la/ khyad par can gyi lam 'di ni nye ba'i lam dang thabs kyi rgyud kyang yin te/ rnal 'byor bla na med pa'i lam 'di nyid la zhugs
79a1(1): nas theg pa gzhan sngon mi dgos par 'di nyid kho nas 'bras bu la sbyor ba'i phyir dang / theg pa gzhan du dug gsum spang byar byed la 'dir ni dmigs med lta ba'i gzer btab pas 'dod
79a2(1): chags bde stong / zhe sdang gsal stong / gti mug rig stong gi ngo bor dug gsum ma spangs lam du khyer bas tshe gcig gis zung 'jug gi go 'phang khyad par can 'grub pa'i thabs rmad du byung ba ste de'i phyir phyi/
79a3(1): rgyud sde gsum la ring lam zhes pa spyir sngags lam yin pas myur lam du grub mod kyi/ 'on kyang de dag mthar gyis bla na med pa'i lam 'dir 'jug dgos pas theg pa 'di nyid la ltos nas ring ba'i lam
79a4(1): zhes bshad pa yin no// gzhan yang thabs rang byung gi ye shes dang shes rab stong pa nyid zung du 'jug pa'i mtshon byed lha yab yum 'khril sbyor dang / sha lnga bdud rtsi lnga sogs la longs spyod pa'i thabs kyi rnal
79a5(1): 'byor khyad par can sogs du mas 'phags pa ste/ gsang ba 'dus pa las/ thabs dang shes rab snyoms 'jug pa// rnal 'byor zhes ni bshad pa yin// gang gi dngos med shes rab ste// thabs ni dngos po'i
79a6(1): mtshan nyid do// zhes so// dbye na/ thabs pha yi rgyud dang / shes rab ma yi rgyud dang / zung 'jug gnyis med kyi rgyud dang gsum mo// rigs kyi sgo nas dbye na/ pha rgyud la mi bskyod pa'i/ rnam snang gi/ rin
79b1(1): 'byung gi/ 'od dpag med kyi/ don grub kyi/ rdo rje 'chang gi rigs te drug dang / de bzhin du ma rgyud phyogs su'ang / rdo rje sems dpa'i/ rnam snang gi/ rdo rje nyi ma'i/ pad+ma gar dbang gi/ rta mchog gi/ he ru ka'i
79b2(1): rigs te drug tu dbye ba bsdoms pas rgyud kyi rab tu dbye ba bcu gnyis su 'gyur la/ de las kyang dbye na rigs mtha' yas par gsungs pas rgyud kyang de snyed du 'gyur te/ bsdu na thabs shes gnyis dang de
79b3(1): yang bskyed rdzogs gnyis su ma 'dus pa med la/ de dag kyang rdzogs pa chen por don gyis 'dus so// de las nang pa bskyed rdzogs gsum bye brag tu bshad pa la/ dang po ma hA yo ga ste rnal 'byor chen po'i gzhi
79b4(1): rgyud kyi gnas lugs de nyid rtogs bya'i lta bar gtan la 'bebs par byed pa la rtog ge dang rig pa ltar snang gis gtan la mi pheb cing kun khyab tshad ma gsum gyis gtan la phab cing rang rig mngon sum
79b5(1): gyis rtogs dgos pa'i phyir ro// gtan la 'bebs byed kyi gtan tshigs kyang / rtogs pa bzhi'i/ dag pa gsum gyi/ mnyam pa bzhi'i/ bdag nyid chen po'i gtan tshigs dang bzhi las/ dang po ni/ snying po'i
79b6(1): rgyud las/ rgyu gcig pa dang yig 'bru'i tshul// byin gyis brlabs dang mngon sum pa// rab tu rtogs pa rnam bzhi yis// thams cad mngon rdzogs rgyal po che// zhes pas/ rgyu gcig pa'i gtan tshigs kyis
80a1(1): chos thams cad rang byung skye med du gtan la phab/ yig 'bru'i tshul gyi gtan tshigs kyis chos thams cad rol pa 'gag med du gtan la phab/ byin gyis brlabs kyi gtan tshigs kyis
80a2(1): chos thams cad ngo bo dbyer med du gtan la phab/ mngon sum pa'i gtan tshigs kyis chos thams cad mtshan nyid blo bral du gtan la phab pa ni rtogs pa bzhi'i gtan tshigs so/ gnyis pa ni/ snod bcud rgyud
80a3(1): rnams dag rtogs shing // zhes pas/ dag pa gsum gyi gtan tshigs kyis phyi nang snod bcud phung khams skye mched thams cad dag pa chen por gtan la phab/ gsum pa ni/ mnyam gnyis lhag pa'i mnyam gnyis
80a4(1): kyi// dkyil 'khor kun tu bzang po'i zhing // zhes pas/ mnyam pa bzhi'i gtan tshigs kyis kun rdzob dang don dam gyi bden pas bsdus pa'i chos thams cad mnyam pa chen por gtan la phab/ bzhi pa ni/ rang
80a5(1): byung ye shes gnas med snang // zhes pas/ bdag nyid chen po'i gtan tshigs kyis chos thams cad sems nyid rang byung gi ye shes chen po gcig gi bdag nyid du ye nas gnas par gtan la phab pa ste 'jal
80a6(1): byed kyi gtan tshigs de rnams kyis rang bzhin rgyu'i rgyud kyi gnas lugs mngon sum du rtogs pa ni rnal 'byor chen po'i grub pa'i mtha' thun mong min pa ste/ rgya mtsho las/ rgya mtsho drangs pa'i gzugs brnyan
80b1(1): ltar// sgra brnyan yid la byed min par// rang rig mngon sum dmigs bral ba// rang gsal gsum bral mi bskul bar// nges par gdeng du gang byed pa// thos bsam bsgom pa'i lha mthar phyin// zhes dang //
80b2(1): rngam glog las/ mngon sum rig par thag chod na// rnal 'byor sa la sleb pa yin// zhes so// de ltar lta ba'i don nges pa gzhir bzhag nas lam thabs kyi rim pa dang / grol ba'i rim pa gnyis las dang po
80b3(1): la'ang / grol lam thabs su rnam par bstan/ zhes pas/ 'ching byed kyi las la spyad pas grol ba'i 'bras bu thob pa ste/ gtso bor thabs kyi khyad par brtul bzhugs kyi spyod pa rmad du byung ba'i 'bras bu myur du
80b4(1): 'grub par byed pas dug gsum ma spangs thog brdzas kyi spyod pa'i brtul bzhugs gang zhig/ lta ba'i gdeng dang ldan pas spyad na mi 'ching bar ma zad grol ba'i 'bras bu myur du thob la/ de ltar ma yin pa zhig
80b5(1): gis spyad na grol ba mi thob par ma zad ngan song du ltung ba'i nyen chen po dang ldan pas ma k+Shi ka'i sbyor ba bzhin khe nyen che zhing de lta bu'i thabs lam de la gnyis te/ gdams ngag steng dang 'og gi sgo// zhes
80b6(1): pas/ snga ma rim gyis ltar bsgom pa rang lus steng sgo 'khor lo drug la brten nas 'bar 'dzag gi sbyor bas bde ba chen po'i ye shes nyams su myong ba bshad rgyud rgya mtsho nas bstan pa dang / phyi ma cig car ltar
81a1(1): gzhan lus 'og sgo mkha' gsang gnyis la brten nas bsnyen pa dang / nye bar bsnyen pa dang / sgrub pa dang / sgrub pa chen po'i sbyor ba bzhis skad cig la bde stong gi ye shes btsan zabs su skye
81a2(1): paba'i sa lam tshig chod du rdzogs pa'i thabs lam cig car ba ste bshad rgyud thal ba nas bstan pa bzhin no// gnyis pa grol lam la/ gtso bor shes rab gsum gyis gtan la phab cing rtogs pas rang rgyud kyi
81a3(1): 'ching ba rang sangs su song nas chos nyid kyi klong du grol bar 'gyur ba/ thabs lam lta bu'i myur khyad med kyang ji zhig na 'bras bur sbyor ba la khyad med cing khe nyen chung ba rin po chen ko stu b+ha'i dpe bzhin
81a4(1): no// de la'ang dbang po'i rim pas cig car dang rim gyis gnyis su 'byed pa'i dang po ni/ dbang dus su grol ba in+d+ra b+hu ti lta bu'o// gnyis pa ni/ snying po'i rgyud las/ shes 'jug mtshan nyid 'byor ba'i
81a5(1): gzung // 'bras bu smin byed rgyu dang rkyen// nus mthu can du gang gyur pa// rig 'dzin rgyal ba'i zhing du grags// zhes so// de la gsum ste/ rgyu shes pa'i mtshan nyid lta ba/ rkyen 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid ting nge
81a6(1): 'dzin dang / lam 'gyur gyi 'bras bu rig 'dzin no// dang po ni gong du smos zin la/ gnyis pa ting nge 'dzin la mos bsgom dang / nges rdzogs gnyis las/ dang po ni/ don spyi'i rnam pa tsam de dang de mos pa
81b1(1): lam byed kyis bsgom pa'o// gnyis pa ni/ rim pa gnyis po'i ting nge 'dzin nyams lnga mthar phyin kyi bar du slob pa ste/ bi ma la'i phyag rgya bsam gtan gyi 'grel pa las/ g.yo thob goms brtan mthar phyin
81b2(1): lnga// bsam gtan nyams kyi skye tshul yin// zhes pa ltar bsgom bya'i lam ni/ snying po'i rgyud las/ srid pa rim par smin tshul gyis// 'jug pa'i yan lag lnga ru bzhag/ gang dag dngos kun rang rig phyir// shi
81b3(1): ba don dam bden pa ste// skye ba bar ma kun rdzob yin// skye ba'i rim gsum gnyis med don// zhes pas/ 'chi bar skye gsum gyi srid pa cig car du sbyong ba'i lam rdzogs par ston pa la/ 'chi ba 'od gsal
81b4(1): dang rjes su mthun pa'i lam stong pa chen po dang / bar do dang rjes su mthun pa'i lam snying rjes chen po dang / skye ba'i rim pa gsum dang rjes su mthun pa'i lam phyag rgya gcig pa dang / phyag rgya spros bcas dang /
81b5(1): tshom bu tshogs bsgrub ste lnga'o// de'ang rags pa bskyed rim dang / phra ba rdzogs rim gyis sbyor tshul gnyis las/ dang po ni/ lus can rnams 'chi 'pho ba'i tshe phyi nang gi zim rim rnams rdzogs pa'i mthar 'chi
81b6(1): srid chos sku'i 'od gsal 'char la/ de nyid lam du khyer ba'i phyir snang grag gis bsdus pa'i chos thams cad chos sku spros bral de bzhin nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa dang / 'od gsal de nyid ngos ma zim par
82a1(1): bar do'i yid lus sgyu ma lta bu'i gnas skabs kyi bag chags sbyong byed dmigs pa med pa'i kun snang gi ting nge 'dzin gyi ngo bo snying rje chen po mkha' khyab du bsgom zhing / gzhi de las bar dor ma
82a2(1): grol bar ma'i mngal du skye ba bzung ba nas btsas pa'i bar gyi bag chags sbyong byed phyag rgya gcig pa la phra rags gnyis te gang du skye bar 'gyur ba'i gnas la sred pa skyes pa'i rkyen gyis der 'jug ma rag gi
82a3(1): bar srid kyi gnas skabs sbyong byed phra ba rgyu'i ting nge 'dzin gyi ngo bo yig 'bru gsal brtan gyi tshad brgyad dang ldan pa la bslab pa dang / de nyid pha ma'i khu rdul gyi bar du zhugs nas phyi rol dbang po yul la sad
82a4(1): kyi gnas skabs sbyong byed rags pa lha sku la bslab pa mngon byang bzhi dang / tshogs gsum sogs kyis bskyed pa skye gnas rigs bzhi'i tshul dang mthun pa la bslab pa dang / btsas nas nar son pa'i bar gyi
82a5(1): bag chags sbyong byed phyag rgya spros bcas la bslab pa'ang bzhi ste/ lam rim las/ 'khor lo tshom bu grangs zhal phyag/ ces bshad pa ltar/ dkyil 'khor spro ba dang / tshom bu spro ba dang / grangs spro ba dang / zhal
82a6(1): phyag spro ba ste bzhi la rim bzhin zhi ba dang khro bo'i dkyil 'khor rgyas 'bring bsdus pa dang / tshom bu gcig gsum lnga pa dang grangs la'ang / zhi ba la stong dang nyi khri bzhi stong dang / bsam yas lhun grub rnams
82b1(1): dang / khro bo la'ang / stong bzhi brgya lnga bcu dang / bdun khri drug stong brgyad brgya lnga bcu dang / bsam yas lhun grub la bslab pa rnams dang / zhal phyag yang rgyas 'bring bsdus gsum gyi tshul lo// nar son nas
82b2(1): rgan po'i bar gyi bag chags sbyong byed tshom bu tshogs kyi sgrub pa la/ phun sum tshogs pa lngas sgrub pa'i gzhi bzung ba dang / bsnyen sgrub yan lag bzhis bzhung bsrang ba dang / 'bras bu rig 'dzin 'grub pa'i
82b3(1): dus bstan pa dang gsum gyi chings su yan lag dang dbye ba mtha' yas par 'gyur ro// de ltar zag bcas kyi lam lnga po des mar 'khor ba dang rnam pa mthun pas de dang de'i bag chags sbyong zhing dag/ yar
82b4(1): sangs rgyas sku gsum dang de'i mdzad spyod kyi rigs kyi nus pa gsos thebs pas 'bras bur rdzogs par byed/ bar du lam 'og mas gong ma sgom rung gi gzhi bting bas smin byed du 'gro ba'i thabs
82b5(1): / gnyis pa phra ba rdzogs rim gyis skyong tshul kyang / de dang rnam pa mthun pa'i bsam gtan la tsher ma mi 'byung ba'i gnas su lus gnad dang ldan pas rig pa ma bcos par so ma'i ngang du 'jog pa rig pa spyi
82b6(1): blugs dang / thos bsam gyi lta ba dran par byas nas de'i ngang la 'jog pa ni mthong ba'i rjes la 'jog pa ste 'jog thabs gnyis po gang rung gis rnam par mi rtog pa'i ting nge 'dzin la bslab pa nyin mo'i rnal
83a1(1): 'byor dang / mtshan mo gnyid stug gi 'od gsal dang sbrel ba'i nyin mtshan kha sbyor du nyams su blangs pas nyams lnga mthar phyin pa la bslab pa dang po/ stong nyid 'od gsal gyi ngang du sems
83a2(1): 'gag pa de'i ngang las stong gzugs kyi rnam par 'char ba de dang mtshan mo 'od gsal gyi snang ba gang shar 'dzin med kyis rgyas 'debs pa gnyis pa/ snang ba ris med la snying rje chen po'i 'phen pa ting nge
83a3(1): 'dzin gyis zhu ba de dang mtshungs ldan du gyur pa'i lha sku phyag rgya gcig pas gang shar gyi snang ba la rgyas 'debs pa gsum pa/ lha snang de la ches cher 'phel bas snang ba thams cad zung 'jug gi lha sku gtso 'khor
83a4(1): dang tshom bu ma 'dres yongs su rdzogs pa la goms su 'jug pa bzhi pa/ tshom bu gang rung la brten pa spros bcas bskyed rim dang phyogs mthun nam/ spros med rnal 'byor pa pho mo gtso bo yab yum tshogs pa la
83a5(1): brten pa dang / shin tu spros med yab mi 'gyur ba'i bde ba chen po dang / yum rnam kun mchog ldan gyi stong pa nyid kha sbyor zung 'jug tu bsgom pa lnga pa'o// de dag gi dus su spyod pa yang / thabs lam
83a6(1): brtul zhugs kyi spyod pa dang / grol lam bag yod kyi spyod pa gnyis las phyi ma la/ dad brtson gyi spyod pa dang / shes rab dang mthun pa'i/ snying rje dang mthun pa'i/ phyogs gcig pa'i/ spros bcas kyi/ tshogs
83b1(1): kyi/ rdzu 'phrul gyi/ cig car ba'i spyod pa dang bdun du phyes nas bshad do// de dag gis blo rab 'bring tha ma'i dbye bas/ zla ba drug/ lo gcig zla ba gnyis/ lo gcig zla ba bzhi rnams kyis zag pa med pa'i
83b2(1): mthong lam la sbyong bar byed de/ lam rim las/ zhag ni sum cu phrag drug gam// bcu gnyis bcu bzhi bcu drug gis// dbang bsgyur rigs kyi dam pa 'grub// ces gsungs pa yin la/ gsum pa lam 'gyur/
83b3(1): gyi 'bras bu rig 'dzin ni/ de ltar bsgoms pas zag pa med pa'i mthong sgom mthar lam gsum gyis bsdus pa'i rig 'dzin bzhi mngon du byed pa ste mthong lam la blo'i nus stobs che chung gis rnam smin gyi
83b4(1): lus dngas ma'i lus su ma gyur pa rnam smin rig 'dzin dang / dngas ma'i lus su gyur pa lam mchog yongs su rdzogs pa tshe dbang rig 'dzin gnyis dang / sa lhag ma dgu sgom lam phyag rgya chen po'i rig 'dzin/
83b5(1): gyis bsdus shing / de'ang gnyis pa nas lnga pa'i bar la rdo rje'i rig 'dzin dang / drug pa dang bdun pa gnyis la 'khor lo rig 'dzin dang / brgyad pa rin po che'i rig 'dzin dang / dgu pa pad+ma'i rig 'dzin dang /
83b6(1): bcu pa ral gri'i rig 'dzin du mdzad spyod kyi sgo nas dbye bar yod la/ sa bcu'i rnam grol lam tshud chad phyag chen du bsdus shing / sa bcu'i khyad par lam mam mthar lam lhun grub rig 'dzin ni sku lnga
84a1(1): lhun 'grub rdo rje 'chang gi cha lugs 'dzin pa drug pa'i rgyal tshab mdzad pa gsang ba'i bdag po bzhin no// de yang rgyu'i theg pa'i 'phags pa rnams dang / rnal 'byor chen po 'di nyid kyi rig pa
84a2(1): 'dzin pa rnams sa'i mu tshod mtshungs kyang dgongs pa la khyad par che ste/ rgyu'i theg pa'i sa dang po dang rnam smin rig 'dzin gnyis dgongs pa mnyam la/ rgyu'i sa brgyad pa dang tshe dbang rig 'dzin/ bcu pa dang
84a3(1): phyag chen rig 'dzin/ mi slob pa'i sa kun tu 'od dang lhun grub rig 'dzin gnyis dgongs pa mnyam pa'i phyir te/ lam chung las/ de yang dang po dang po dang // skal mnyam gnyis pa'i rigs can
84a4(1): dang // brgyad pa'i sems dpar skal pa mnyam// gsum dang bcu dag skal mnyam mo// dgongs spyod rgya mtshos khyad par 'phags// zhes bshad pa bzhin no// des lam gong mar sbyor ba'i mthar/ chos sku dang //
84a5(1): longs spyod dang / sprul pa dang / mngon byang dang / rdo rje'i sku ste lnga dang / skye med don gyi gsung sogs gsung lnga dang // chos dbyings ye shes sogs thugs lnga dang // rnam par dag pa'i zhing khams sogs yon
84a6(1): tan lnga dang / lhun grub sogs phrin las lnga ste 'bras bu'i chos nyer lnga'i bdag nyid chen po'i go 'phang mngon du byed pa yin no// de dag ston pa'i sde snod la rgyud sde dang sgrub sde gnyis las/ dang po ni/ rdo rje
84b1(1): sems dpa' sgyu 'phrul dra ba sogs sgyu 'phrul sde brgyad rnams dang / gnyis pa sgrub sde brgyad spyi bye brag rnams dang / gzhan yang 'dus pa dang / gshin rjes gshed dmar nag 'jigs gsum sogs dang / zla
84b2(1): gsang thig le sogs pa rgyud dang / bde mchog dang dus kyi 'khor lo sogs ma rgyud rnams kyang 'dir sdud par shes par bya'o// gnyis pa rdzogs pa a nu yo ga ste/ rjes su rnal 'byor ni/ bskyed pa rnal 'byor
84b3(1): chen po dang / yongs su rdzogs pa shin tu rnal 'byor gyi theg pa dag gi mtshams sbyor du gyur pa yin la/ 'di nyid kyi rtogs bya'i lta ba/ dbyings dang ye shes zung du 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid can dkyil 'khor rnam
84b4(1): pa gsum dbyer med pa'i rtsa ba byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor du chos thams cad ye gdod ma nas sangs rgyas pa nyid de/ spyi mdo dgongs pa 'dus pa las/ thams cad bdag nyid der gcig pas// ye nas
84b5(1): sangs rgyas bde chen nyid// skye 'gag med pa'i snying po yin// bya byed med pa'i dkyil 'khor gsum// ye nas grub zin lhun gyis grub// ces so// de la dkyil 'khor rnam pa gsum ni/ snang srid 'khor 'das
84b6(1): kyi chos thams cad sems kyi rang rtsal du 'du zhing sems nyid skye med spros pa'i mtha' thams cad dang bral ba yum kun tu bzang mo'i mkha' klong rnam par dag pa ni ye ji bzhin pa'i dkyil 'khor dang / de
85a1(1): nyid thams cad nas thams cad du ma 'gags par rang snang ris med kun khyab tu shar ba ni kun tu bzang po rang byung gi ye shes rang bzhin lhun grub kyi dkyil 'khor dang / de gnyis kyang ngo bo tha
85a2(1): mi dad par zung 'jug tu gnas pa ni dbyings dang ye shes gnyis su med pa'i sras bde ba chen po rtsa ba byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor ro// rtogs bya'i gzhi de dang rtogs byed kyi lam gnyi ga rnal 'byor
85a3(1): gsum du bsdus nas bshad de/ spyi mdo dgongs 'dus las/ grogs po dag/ de bas na bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rnam pa gang zhe na/ 'di ltar bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i chos thams cad kyi rnam pa ni/ rnal 'byor
85a4(1): rnam pa gsum gyis yongs su 'brel pa ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ bya ba'i rnal 'byor dang / bya ba byed pa'i rnal 'byor dang / bya ba med pa'i rnal 'byor ro// zhes pa dang / yang rgyu'i rnal 'byor dang / rkyen gyi rnal
85a5(1): 'byor dang / 'bras bu'i rnal 'byor gsum du rtsa rgyud kun 'dus rig par gsungs shing / rtsa bshad kyi rgyud de gnyis kyi dgongs don gcig tu bsdus nas bstan pa ni/ don bsdus las/ kun bzang thugs
85a6(1): rjes 'gro don du/ theg pa gsum snang 'dul mdzad pa'i// don dam nges pa'i theg pa las// gsang sgo mchod pa'i mdo rgyud don// rnam pa gsum du shes bya ste// bya ba rgyu dang byed pa rkyen// bya bral 'bras bu'i
85b1(1): rnal 'byor dag/ ji snyed chos kyi rtsa bar bshad// ces gsungs pas/ bya ba rgyu'i rnal 'byor dang / byed pa rkyen gyi rnal 'byor dang / bya bral 'bras bu'i rnal 'byor te gsum las/ dang po ni/ chos thams cad kyi
85b2(1): gnas lugs dkyil 'khor rnam pa gsum gyi rang bzhin du ma 'dres yongs su rdzogs par gnas pa nyid yin te/ de nyid las/ phyi nang bye brag ji snyed pa'i// chos rnams thams cad byang chub sems// ji bzhin dang
85b3(1): du ye gnas pas/ shes par bya ba rgyud don yin// zhes so// gnyis pa ni/ lam gyi rtsol ba dang bcas pa'i byed pas srid pa las brgal te zhi ba gnas skabs kyi 'bras bu la 'jug par byed pa nyan rang byang sems
85b4(1): kyi theg pa gsum ste/ snga ma las/ rtsol bcas spyod pas 'dren 'jug pa'i// theg pa de ni bya byed rkyen// zhes so// gsum pa ni/ sems kyi chos nyid gdod ma nas rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pas 'bras bu gzhan
85b5(1): nas btsal ba'i rtsol sgrub kyi re dogs dang bral ba sngags phyi nang gi theg pa ste/ de nyid las/ gzhan du 'bras bu re rtsol med// bsgrub bya nyid la lam gnas pas// thabs chen theg 'di bya bral lo// zhes so// de
85b6(1): ltar rnal 'byor phyi ma gnyis po de la thun mong spyi'i lam zhes bya zhing / de'i nang nas kyang khyad par 'di'i lam la dbye na/ de nyid las/ ngo bo thabs dang shes rab ste// zhes pa/ thabs kyi nges pa'i lam dang / shes
86a1(1): rab rnam par grol ba'i lam gnyis su grangs nges pa las/ dang po ni/ mchog tu mi 'gyur ba'i bde ba chen po lhan cig skyes pa zhu ba de'i ye shes sgrub pa'i thabs gang zhig/ 'khor lo bzhi'i
86a2(1): sgom thabs kyis lhan skyes ye shes rim gyis 'dren pa'i thabs steng sgo'i man ngag dang / mkha' gsang gi snyoms 'jug la brten nas lhan skyes kyi ye shes cig car du 'dren pa'i thabs 'og sgo'i man ngag gnyis te/
86a3(1): de las/ rol pa'i ka ra la sogs pa// man ngag thabs kyis de 'jug dang // zhes so// gnyis pa ni/ gong gi de'i 'phros su/ thos bsam bsgom pa'i tshul 'gro ba'i// der ni 'jug pa rnam gsum ste// rtogs
86a4(1): dpyod don dang yi ge yid// ces pas/ dang po rtog dpyod kyi rjes su 'jug pa lta ba gtan la phab pa ni/ lam gyi sngon du 'gro dgos te/ de yang chos can shes bya'i don la/ shes byed rig pa'i gtan tshigs rnams
86a5(1): kyis so sor brtag pas chos thams cad kyi gnas lugs chos nyid ye ji bzhin pa dkyil 'khor gsum gyi rang bzhin smra bsam brjod bral du gtan la phebs pa ni 'di nyid kyi grub mtha'o// gnyis pa don gyi rjes
86a6(1): su 'jug pa ni/ mtshan med rnam par mi rtog pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa ste/ bsgom bya chos nyid ji bzhin pa'i ngang la/ sgom byed kyi blo yi de bzhin par bzhag pa yin te/ dgongs 'dus las// ji bzhin pa yi/
86b1(1): / chos nyid la// de bzhin pa yi blo bzhag na// brjod pa med pa'i ngang nyid las// ma yengs rgyun du dran pa'o// gsum pa yi ge'i rjes su 'jug pa ni/ mtshan bcas lha'i ting 'dzin bsgom pa ste/ sa bon nam brten
86b2(1): dang brten pa so so'i bskyed sngags brjod pa tsam gyis chu la nya ldang ba ltar snod bcud thams cad lha'i gzhal yas khang dang dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lor gsal la ma 'dres par bsgoms pa gtso bor byed pa'i
86b3(1): nyams len lam 'di nyid kyi thun mong ma yin pa'i khyad par ro// de ltar bsgrubs pas grub pa 'bras bu'i tshul la'ang / blo stobs che ba rnams rtogs goms thams cad tshig chod du byed pas mthar phyin pas sa lam
86b4(1): rim bgrod kyi rtsol pa dang bral zhing / blo 'bring tha gnyis kyis ni/ sa bcu pa'i slob lam bzhi rim gyis sam thod rgal gang rung gis bgrod nas mi slob pa'i lam mthar thug gi 'bras bu la sbyor bar byed de/ de
86b5(1): yang / dang po 'gyur ba ma nges pa'i sa dang / brten pa gzhi'i sa gnyis ni tshogs lam 'dun pa sems dpa'i rnal 'byor gyis bsdus shing mos spyod kyi lha sku/ 'dis thun mong gi dngos grub spyan dang mngon shes la
86b6(1): sogs pa grub/ gsum pa gal chen sbyong ba dang / bzhi pa bslab pa rgyun gyi sa dang / bsod nams rten gyi sa gsum ni/ sbyor lam rigs chen 'byed pa'i rnal 'byor te rlung sems kyi lha sku 'grub cing der tshogs
87a1(1): kyis spyod pa'i nye rgyu la brten pas 'gyur ba de rags pa bcoms te zag pa thams cad zad nas/ brten pas khyad par du 'gro ba'i sa ni mthong lam dbugs chen 'byin pa'i rnal 'byor te bde
87a2(1): stong 'od gsal gyi lha sku 'grub/ mthong lam 'od gsal las langs pa'i rjes la dmigs pa 'bras bu skye ba'i sa sgom lam lung chen thob pa'i rnal 'byor te ye shes dang dag pa'i slob pa'i zung 'jug gi lha sku
87a3(1): rgyun mi 'chad pa 'grub/ de nas gnas pa mi 'gyur ba dang / bdal ba chos nyid kyi sa dang / rdzogs pa ci chibs kyi sa gsum po mthar lam rtsal chen rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor gyis bsdus pa ste de'i mthar mi slob
87a4(1): pa'i lam rgyun mtha'i bar chad med lam la brten nas 'dod chags chen po'i lam gyis 'bras bu'i dbang bskur bas snang gsum 'pho ba'i bag chags phra ba'ang sbyangs te mi slob pa'i zung 'jug 'bras bu'i chos
87a5(1): nyer lnga po dbyer med lhun grub kyi ngo bo sku bzhi ye shes lnga'i bdag nyid dpal kun tu bzang po'i gong 'phang la mnga' dbang 'byor pas rtag khyab lhun gyis grub pa'i phrin las kyis gdul bya'i don mdzad pa ste/
87a6(1): don bsdus las/ 'bras bu nyid ni rdzogs sangs rgyas// sku gsung thugs dang yon tan las// nyi shu rtsa lngas bsdus mtha' yas// lhun rdzogs rnam kun mkhyen pa'o// zhes gsungs so// gsum pa theg pa kun gyi
87b1(1): yang rtser gyur cing bgrod bya thams cad kyi mthar zug pa rdzogs pa chen po a ti yo ga ni/ 'og ma las khyad par du 'phags tshul dang / de dag gi dbye ba 'chad pa'o// dang po ni/ dbyings rang bzhin gyis rnam par
87b2(1): dag pa sems nyid 'od gsal ba'i rang bzhin lhun grub rang gnas chen por gdod ma nyid nas gnas pa'i rang byung gi ye shes 'gyur ba med pa la rdzogs pa chen po'i gzhir 'dod pa gang zhig/ theg pa'i rgyal po
87b3(1): 'di nyid kyis gzhal na rim pa 'og ma brgyad po'i theg pa rnams kyis don la yod ma myong ba'i sems rtog glo bur ba 'ba' zhig gis 'gyur ba med pa la blos bzo 'chos shing bsgyur/ spang du med pa la gnyen pos
87b4(1): bcos nas spangs/ bsal du med pa la bsal 'dod kyis blos skyon du dmigs/ thob tu med pa la gzhan nas thob byar yod pa'i re dogs kyi dbyen bcug/ rtsol sgrub dang bral bar 'bad rtsol gyis ma rig pa chen
87b5(1): pos rang gnas kyi ye shes la bsgribs pas rnal ma'i de kho na nyid la reg pa'i skabs med pa ste/ 'di ltar theg pa 'og ma'i nyan rang gis rtogs pa'i bdag med ni shes pa dang rdul rdzas la don dam du 'dod la//
87b6(1): rnam rig smra bas rang shes rang gsal nyid kyi rnam shes la don dam yongs grub tu 'dod pa dag ni 'jig rten pa'i sems dang sems byung las 'das pa med cing / dbu mas bden pa gnyis kyis gzhal ba'i skye
88a1(1): med/ 'gag med/ yod med/ med min la sogs gtan tshigs chen po bzhi la sogs pas dpyad pa'i 'gog bden dang / mtha' bral dang / spros bral sogs kyi mtshungs dpe nam mkha' lta bu'i
88a2(1): stong par 'dzin pa dang / sngags 'og ma'i bya bas dag pa gsum gyi lha gtsang sgra sogs dka' thub kyis mnyes pa'i dngos grub 'grub par 'dod pa dang / nye ba'i rnal 'byor gyis lta spyod gong 'og ya cha bas
88a3(1): mtshan 'dzin dang / rnal 'byor gyis don dam pa'i byin rlabs lhar bltas nas phyag rgya bzhi'i rnal 'byor la dmigs pa dang / rnal 'byor chen pos bskyed rim dang / rdzogs rim rtsa thig rlung gsum la gnad du
88a4(1): gtsun pas ye shes skye ba 'dod cing / rjes su rnal 'byor gyis dbyings ye shes bskyed bya skyed byed lha'i dkyil 'khor du blta ba sogs mdor na a nu man chad kyi rim pa de dag thams cad blos reg pa'i grub
88a5(1): mtha' kho na ste/ de dag thams cad kyang blo ngor 'di ni med do// stong ngo // bden no// snyam pa'i snyam byed dang / yid byed dang / rtog dpyod kyis yul yul can la chos nyid yin par brlams pa las gnyug ma'i
88a6(1): gnas lugs ji bzhin mthong ba ni med de/ ji skad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i mdo las/ rgyal pos long ba du ma bsags te glang chen bstan te/ mtshan nyid so sor smos shig/ ces bsgos pas/ de
88b1(1): dag rnams kyis glang po che'i sna la reg pa rnams ni lcags kyu 'dra'o// zhes zer/ mig la reg pa rnams ni phor pa 'dra'o// rna ba la reg pa rnams ni zhib ma 'dra'o// rgyab la reg pa rnams ni khyogs dang
88b2(1): 'dra'o// mjug ma la reg pa rnams ni thig gu 'dra'o// zhes zer ro// de rnams kyis glang po che gzhan la smras pa ma yin yang / thams cad du rtogs pa ni ma yin no// de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin yang / stong
88b3(1): pa nyid dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / 'od gsal ba la sogs tha dad par smras kyang thams cad du rtogs pa ni ma yin no// zhes gsungs pa ltar ro// lam de dag gis rdzogs pa chen po'i don la bsgribs shing rdzogs pa
88b4(1): chen po'i lam la gnas bzhin par de dag gi rtog pa skyes na gol bar bshad de/ kun byed rgyal po las/ nges pa thob pa'i theg pa drug/ rdzogs pa chen po'i gol sar bstan/ de yang ji lta bu zhe na/ byang chub sems
88b5(1): dpa' mdo sde ni/ kun tu 'od kyi sa 'dod pa// bden pa gnyis kyi rtog dpyod kyis// chos nyid stong pa nam mkhar 'dod// a ti yo ga'i bde chen ni// rtogs dpyod 'das pa'i byang chub sems// rtogs dpyod
88b6(1): 'das la mdo sdes bsgribs// rdzogs chen rtog dang dpyod pa ni// mdo sde dag tu gol bar bshad// kri ya rdo rje 'dzin 'dod pa// dag pa rnam gsum sgor zhugs nas// gzung 'dzin dag pa'i yul la gnas// a
89a1(1): ti yo ga'i bde chen ni// gzung 'dzin 'das pa'i byang chub sems// gzung 'dzin 'das la kr-I yas bsgribs// rdzogs chen gzung dang 'dzin byed pa// kr-i ya dag tu gol bar bshad// u pa ya yi
89a2(1): lta spyod ni// kr-I ya spyod cing yo ga bsgrub// lta spyod 'brel pa'i don med pas// gnyis su med pa'i don ma rtogs// a ti yo ga'i bde chen ni// gnyis su med pa'i byang chub sems// gnyis su med la u pas
89a3(1): bsgribs// rdzogs chen gnyis su byed pa ni// u pa ya ru gol bar bshad// yo ga stug po bkod 'dod pa// mtshan ma yod med sgor zhugs nas// phyag rgya bzhi la gtsor byed de// blang dor med la 'jug ma
89a4(1): nus// a ti yo ga'i bde chen ni// blang dor med pa'i byang chub sems// blang dor med la yo gas bsgribs// rdzogs chen blang dang dor byed pa// yo ga dag tu gol bar bshad// ma hA rdo rje 'chang 'dod pa// thabs
89a5(1): dang shes rab sgor zhugs nas// rang rgyud dag pa'i dkyil 'khor la// bsnyen sgrub rnam bzhi sgrub par byed// a ti yo ga'i bde chen ni/ rtsol sgrub 'das pa'i byang chub sems// rtsol sgrub 'das la ma hAs
89a6(1): bsgribs// rdzogs chen rtsol sgrub byed pa ni// ma hA yo gar gol bar bshad// a nu dbyer med pa 'dod pa// dbyings dang ye shes sgor zhugs nas// 'di ltar snang ba'i chos rnams la// rgyu ni dag pa'i dbyings lta
89b1(1): ba// 'bras bu ye shes dkyil 'khor blta// a ti yo ga'i bde chen ni// rgyu 'bras 'das pa'i byang chub sems// rgyu 'bras 'das la a nus bsgribs// rdzogs chen rgyu 'bras gnyis blta na// a nu yo gar gol bar
89b2(1): bshad// ces gsungs pas/ de dag rnams ni sems kyis byas shing bcos pas sems ni tshogs brgyad kun tu rtog pa dor bya'i dri ma yin la/ 'di ltar rang bzhin rdzogs pa chen po ni sems las 'das pa'i sems
89b3(1): nyid rig pa rang byung gi ye shes 'od gsal 'dus ma byas par gshis kyi yon tan thams cad lhun grub tu bzhugs pa las bskyed bya skyed byed kyi rgyu 'bras dang gzhan gyi rkyen la sogs pa'i khams la rang bzhin gyis
89b4(1): grol bas ltos mi dgos pa nam mkha' lta bu'i mtshan nyid gnas lugs 'pho 'gyur med par grub pa'i gnad kyis thog ma'i mgon po kun tu bzang po nyid kyang byas pa med par rang byung gi ye shes rang ngo rtogs
89b5(1): pa'i cha nas sangs rgyas pa las thos bsam dang 'du byas pa'i tshogs bsags sogs rkyen gzhan gyis ma byung bar bstan pa ste/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi yul la 'jug pa ye shes snang ba rgyan gyi mdo las/ sangs rgyas
89b6(1): rnams kyis ni chos 'ga' yang ma gzigs/ ma gsan/ ma dgongs/ rnam par mi mkhyen/ kun tu mi mkhyen to// sangs rgyas rnams kyis ni ma gsungs/ ma brjod do// sangs rgyas rnams kyis ni mi gsung mi
90a1(1): brjod do// sangs rgyas rnams ni gsung bar mi 'gyur brjod par mi 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas rnams ni mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi mdzad do// sangs rgyas rnams kyis ni chos gang yang
90a2(1): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang ma rgyas so// sangs rgyas rnams ni nyon mongs pa ma spangs so// sangs rgyas rnams kyis ni rnam par byang ba mngon sum du ma mdzad do// sangs rgyas rnams kyis ni chos gang yang ma
90a3(1): gzigs/ ma gsan/ ma myangs/ ma mnams/ ma rig/ mi mkhyen to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jam dpal chos thams cad ni gzod ma nas yongs su dag pa'i phyir ro// zhes dang / mgon po byams pas/ ji ltar sngon
90a4(1): bzhin phyis de bzhin// 'gyur ba med pa'i chos nyid do// zhes dang / 'dus ma byas shing lhun gyis grub// gzhan gyi rkyen gyis rtogs min pa// zhes pa la sogs gsungs pa ltar chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin dang //
90a5(1): gnas lugs sam/ gshis lugs sam/ chos nyid gang yin pa de ni 'dus ma byas pa/ rgyu rkyen gyis ma bskyed pa/ gzhan la rag ma lus shing / rkyen gzhan gyi mi rtogs pa/ blos bsgrubs pa'i mtha' la mi gnas pa
90a6(1): zhig ste/ 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa theg pa chen po'i mdo'i 'od srung gis zhus pa las/ gang 'dus ma byas pa de ni 'phags pa rnams kyi rigs so// 'phags pa rnams kyi rigs gang yin pa de la bslab
90b1(1): pa yang med bslab pa las 'das pa yang med do// gang bslab pa yang med bslab pa las 'das pa yang med pa de la rgyu ba yang med mi rgyu ba yang med/ rab tu rgyu ba yang med/ gang la rgyu ba yang med/ mi rgyu ba yang
90b2(1): med/ rab tu rgyu ba yang med pa de la sems kyang med/ sems las byung ba'i chos rnams kyang med do// gang la sems kyang med/ sems las byung ba'i chos rnams kyang med pa de la las kyang med/ las kyi rnam par
90b3(1): smin pa yang med do// gang la las kyang med/ las kyi rnam par smin pa yang med pa de la bde ba yang med/ sdug bsngal ba yang med do// gang la bde ba yang med/ sdug bsngal ba yang med pa de ni 'phags pa rnams
90b4(1): kyi rigs te/ 'phags pa rnams kyi rigs gang yin pa de la ni las kyang med/ las mngon par 'du byed pa yang med do// zhes dang / dgongs pa nges par 'grel pa theg pa chen po'i mdo sde las/ 'phags pa rnams
90b5(1): kyis 'phags pa'i shes pa dang / 'phags pa'i mthong bas brjod du med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa gang yin pa ste/ brjod du med pa'i de nyid mngon par rdzogs par rtogs par bya ba'i phyir 'dus ma
90b6(1): byas zhes ming du btags so// zhes dang / rtsa ba shes rab las// rang bzhin rgyu dang rkyen las ni// 'byung bar rigs pa ma yin no// rgyu dang rkyen las byung ba ni// rang bzhin byas pa can du 'gyur// rang bzhin
91a1(1): byas pa can zhes byar// ji lta bur na rung bar 'gyur// rang bzhin dag ni bcos med dang // gzhan la ltos pa med pa yin// ces sogs rgya cher gsungs pa 'dis rang bzhin gshis kyi gnas
91a2(1): lugs rdzogs pa chen po'i grub pa'i mtha' rgyu rkyen las 'das pa'i 'dus ma byas kyi ye shes mngon par rtogs pa'i sgra dbyangs mngon sum du sgrogs par mdzad cing / de nyid mtha' bral du gtan la phab pa'i
91a3(1): tshul yang / gang dag rang bzhin gzhan dngos dang // dngos dang dngos med nyi blta ba// de dag sangs rgyas bstan pa la// de nyid mthong ba ma yin no// zhes de dang / dpal na ro pas de kho na nyid sgrub
91a4(1): pa'i thabs shes bya ba rdzogs pa chen po'i lam gyi rim pa las kyang / sangs rgyas sems can rang bzhin gcig/ sems kyi ye shes gsang ba 'di// snying po'i don las rmad du byung // rang byung che ba bdag nyid
91a5(1): / sku// rang rig bde ba rdzogs pa che// thugs rje snang ba sprul pa'i sku// ngo bo ma grub gsang ba'i sems// snang dang mi snang dbyer med do// zhes pa dang / de nyid la lam gyi dmigs pa 'og ma ltar mi gnas pa'i
91a6(1): tshul yang / snga ma las/ rdzogs pa'i ye shes snying po la// rim pa'i lam med mthar phyin pa// zhes so// 'o na rim pa 'og ma de dag bstan pa la dgos pa ci zhe na/ gdul bya'i blo rim la ltos pa'ang 'og mas blo
91b1(1): sbyangs nas rim gyis lam 'dir 'jug pa'i thabs sam lam stegs su 'gyur ba la dgongs pa ste/ bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa thams cad kyi snying po'am brjod bya'i mthar thug pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu
91b2(1): phyin pa'i ye shes gnyug ma'i de bzhin nyid gcig pu yin la/ de nyid rang rig mngon sum gyis rdzogs par gtan la phebs pa ni rdzogs pa chen po'i lam las gzhan du med cing / sdom pa gsum dang / phar
91b3(1): phyin drug dang / bskyed pa'i rim pa dang / rdzogs pa'i rim pa de dag thams cad kyang rdzogs pa chen po rtogs pa'i thabs dang de nyid gang du bgrod pa'i ngal stegs tsam du bstan pa ste/ gsang snying las/ sa
91b4(1): rnams khyad par bkod pa yang // gsang ba'i snying por 'gro ba'i lam// zhes dang / in+d+ra b+hu ti'i dbang gi 'khor lo'i man ngag las/ rang bzhin gyis ni 'od gsal zhing // rdzogs pa chen po'i mthar thug
91b5(1): pa// man ngag kun gyi mchog gi mchog/ de sgrub thabs su gsungs par zad// ces dang / zhi ba lhas kyang / yan lag de kun thams cad ni// thub pas shes rab don du gsungs// zhes bshad pas so// de ltar
91b6(1): yin pa de'i phyir rdzogs pa chen po'i rang bzhin 'di nyid bde bar gshegs pas bka' 'khor lo bar par spros pa'i mtshan ma mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i gnas lugs rgyas par bstan
92a1(1): mod kyi/ gshis kyi bzhugs tshul ma bstan/ 'khor lo tha mar gshis kyi bzhugs tshul bstan kyang de mngon du byed pa'i lam mtshan nyid pa ma bstan/ de'i phyir 'khor lo bar pa'i dgongs pa
92a2(1): 'phags mchog klus bkral ba'i rig tshogs kyi dgongs pa ma 'gyur ba dang / de'i chos dbyings bstod pa sogs dang / tha ma'i dgongs pa rgyal tshab byams pa dang 'phags mchog thogs med sku mched sogs
92a3(1): kyis bkral ba bcas shing rta chen po rnam gnyis kyi dgongs pa mthar zug 'gal bar mi 'du bar rdzogs pa chen po nyid du don gyis gnas te gang gi phyir zhe na/ rang bzhin chos nyid zab mo'i gnas lugs de
92a4(1): las gzhan slob dpon de dag mi bzhed cing / de las gzhan du rdzogs pa chen po'ang ma grub pa'i phyir ro// 'on kyang de nyid mngon du byed pa'i lam sngags kho na khyad par du 'phags mod kyi/ de lta na'ang sngags
92a5(1): 'og ma'i mtshan bcas dang mtshan med kyi rim pa tsam po dang / bla med mchog tu grags pa dus kyi 'khor lo'i sbyor ba yan lag drug dang / gzhan yang rim pa lnga pa sogs kyis rtsa thig rlung gsum gyi byed pa
92a6(1): bcings pas 'od gsal rtags bcu dang stong gzugs re khA nag po'i nang du srid pa gsum gyi gzugs brnyan mthong bar bshad pa tsam ste de'ang shes nyams 'phel 'grib can te ji ltar bsgoms kyang 'byung ba
92b1(1): 'od du dengs pa'i rdo rje'i sku sgrub mi nus pa'i phyir de dag skal dman rnams 'dir drang ba'i don tsam las nges pa'i don la ma reg ste/ na ro pas/ nges pa'i thabs cig snying po'i don// phyag rgya rim bzhi sbyor ba
92b2(1): drug/ bsam pa'i theg pa sna tshogs pa// drang ba nyid gyur nges pa min// ngo bo nyid la mtho dman med// mos 'jug bsam pa'i rtog par zad// ces gsungs pa bzhin no// der ma zad lam 'og ma'i bskyed
92b3(1): rim bsgom pa ni rdzogs rim gyi smin byed tsam dang / de bsgoms pas las brgya dang ye rgya'i khyad par gyis 'dod pa'i rig 'dzin dang gzugs kyi rig 'dzin gang rung gi rten des mkha' spyod 'grub par tsam
92b4(1): las med la/ rdzogs rim rtsa thig rlung gsum gtsun pas ye shes skye bar 'dod pa yang rtsol bcas kyi rkyen khar ma 'das la/ dbang gsum pa'i bde stong gi ye shes kyang dbang po gnyis sbyor gyi dga' ba'i rjes
92b5(1): su skye bar 'dod pa gang zhig/ khams gsum las ma grol ba'i phyir 'pho med kyi bde ba chen po mchog tu mi 'gyur ba'i ye shes ni de rtogs par ma bstan cing snga ma de dag bde ba'i bsam gtan tsam du bshad pa
92b6(1): ste/ dpal na ro pas de kho na nyid sgrub pa las/ nges par spros bral rang byung sems// chags pa'i lam gyis shes mi 'gyur// rang byung 'od gsal snying po 'di// mtshan ma med pa'i rang bzhin pas// shes
93a1(1): rab thabs kyi chags pa bral// thig le 'dod rtsol spro bsdu med// shes rab thabs la snyoms 'jug pa// bde ba'i bsam gtan chen po yin// sgyu ma'i ro la ma chags par// chags med ye shes
93a2(1): rdzogs pa'i lam// zhes gsungs pa ltar ro// de ltar grub pa nyid kyis rang bzhin yongs su dag pa'i shes rab rdzogs pa chen po'i gnas lugs gang zhig ma rtogs par ni blo'i yul du dmigs pa'i sdom gsum
93a3(1): dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang bskyed rdzogs sogs lam bden gyi rnam pa de dang des nyon mongs pa'i tshogs nyan rang gis spang / byang sems kyis 'geg gsangs sngags kyis lam du sbyar ba sogs ci rigs
93a4(1): pa'i thabs rnams dran bsam rang rgyud pa'i rtog dpyod kyis bsgrubs pa'i dge rtsa 'du byas pa las ma 'das shing / dbu ma rgyan las/ ngo bo 'dus byas ma yin pa// 'ga' yang gang na yod ma yin/ zhes pa ltar
93a5(1): ro// gnas lugs kyi de nyid rtogs pa'i skabs thob pa nyid nas kyang 'og ma ltar dkar nag dge sdig gi spang blang la sogs spyod pa'i mtha' la zhen na ye shes kyi tshogs dam pa'i gegs dang gol sa chen por
93a6(1): bshad de/ dkon brtsegs las/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi dgongs pa'i rnam grangs 'di la 'jug par bya'o// dge ba'am mi dge ba'i chos rnams la mngon par zhen par mi bya ste/ mi dge ba'i chos rnams
93b1(1): la mngon par zhen pas/ mi dge ba'i chos rnams la mngon par zhen par 'gyur ro// dge ba'i chos rnam la mngon par zhen pas sdug bsngal dang / yid mi bde ba'i chos rnams mngon par 'byung bar 'gyur ba
93b2(1): 'di dag ni sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden par btags pas de bzhin gshegs pas mi dge ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs su bstan to// dge ba dang mi dge ba la mngon par zhen pa med pa dang / sred pa 'gog pa
93b3(1): 'di dag ni kun 'byung ba spang zhing 'phags pa'i bden pa gnyis po rtogs par bya ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pas dge ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs su bstan to// zhes so// yang de nyid las/ de la dge ba yang stong
93b4(1): la/ mi dge ba yang stong / dge ba yang rnam par dben la/ mi dge ba yang rnam par dben/ dge ba yang mi dge ba dang mi 'dre la/ mi dge ba yang dge ba dang mi 'dre zhing / dge ba dang mi dge bar mngon par
93b5(1): zhen pa'i rgyu dang rkyen med do// zhes dang / theg pa chen po'i sde snod ye shes dam pa'i mdo las/ byang chub sems dpa' ye shes tog gis gsol pa/ bsod dmas kyi tshogs gang lags/ bka' stsal pa/ sbyin pa
93b6(1): la sogs dkar po'i chos mtshan ma dang bcas pa'o// ye shes kyi tshogs gang lags/ shes rab la sogs mtshan ma med pa'o// gsol ba/ de gnyis ji ltar gsog par bgyi// bka' stsal pa/ bsod nams kyi
94a1(1): tshogs ni 'khor ba'i bsod nams kyi tshogs zhes bya la dper na ba lang gi rmig rjes kyi chu dang mtshungs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ myur du brlags pa/ zad pa/ 'bri ba/ lha ma'i bde ba myong nas slar
94a2(1): ngan song du 'khor bar byed pa yin no// ye shes kyi tshogs ni mya ngan las 'das pa'i tshogs zhes bya ste/ dper na rgya mtsho chen po'i chu lta bu/ mi brlag pa/ mi 'dzad pa/ mi bslu ba/ mya ngan las 'das pa thob
94a3(1): par byed pa'o// ye shes tog ye shes kyi tshogs kho na bsag par bya'o// zhes gsungs pa dang / der ma zad sngags phyi nang gi de nyid bcu yang rnal ma'i don la sgrib byed kyi mtshan mar gyur pa ste/ kun byed las/
94a4(1): lta ba bsgom med dam tshig bsrung du med// sa la sbyang med lam la bgrod du med// phrin las rtsol med dbang la skur du med// sgo gsum rtsol med dkyil 'khor bskyed du med// rgyu 'bras gnyis med nam
94a5(1): mkha' lta bu'o// zhes dang / 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyis kyang // de la dkyil 'khor sbyin sreg dang // gtor ma bzlas pa bgrang phreng dang // skyil mo krung dang stangs stabs sogs// spros bral rnam par bslu ba
94a6(1): ste// bya ba ma yin dgag pa'ang min// zhes dang / bya ba rnams la rnal 'byor pa// lam chen dag tu yongs 'dzin pa// ri dwags smig rgyu stegs pa ltar// rtag tu snang yang mi zin no// zhes dang / kye rdo rje las//
94b1(1): bsgom med sgom pa po yang med// lha med sngags kyang yod ma yin// zhes dang / thig le mnyam gnas kyi rgyud las/ bde ba chen po'i ngang gnas na// dam tshig med cing sdom pa'ang med// bya dang byed dang rtsol
94b2(1): ba med// nam mkha' lta bur 'grub par 'gyur// zhes dang / mkha' 'gro ma gsang mdzod las kyang / 'di ltar snang ba'i dngos po rnams// sgyu ma lha dang lha mor gnas// bsdom bya med cing sdom byed med// rtsa
94b3(1): dang rlung dang thig le med// stong pa nyid kyis 'grub par 'gyur// zhes dang / khrus dang gtsang sbra 'dir mi dgos// dka' thub dka' spyad 'dir mi dgos// zhes dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul la 'jug
94b4(1): pa ye shes snang ba rgyan gyi mdo las/ kun dga' bo de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pas chos rnams rnam par byang ba'o// zhes bstan kyang gang yang rnam par byang ba med do// gang gis yang rnam par byang ba med
94b5(1): do// gang gis kyang rnams par byang ba med de// gang la yang rnam par byang ba med do// kun dga' bo chos kyi phyag rgya de ni chos thams cad kyi phyag rgya ste/ phyag rgya med pa yin no// ma byas pa'i phyag rgya yin
94b6(1): no// dbyer med pa'i phyag rgya yin no// kun dga' bo gang dag phyag rgya des btab pa de dang de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yin// rigs btsun pa yin/ mi yi seng ge yin/ spyod pa gcig
95a1(1): pa yin/ bag tsha ba med pa yin/ sgra sgrogs pa yin/ gzhan mu stegs can dag skrag par byed pa yin/ bdud kyi sde 'dul bar byed pa yin/ gzhan mu stegs can dag ri sul gyi phrag tu 'jug par
95a2(1): byed pa yin/ dmigs pa can dag skrag par byed pa yin/ lhag pa'i nga rgyal can dag 'bigs par byed pa yin/ rdeg par byed pa yin/ sangs rgyas kyi sras bdud sun 'byin pa dag mngon par dga' bar byed
95a3(1): pa yin/ chos nyid kyang rnam par 'byed par byed pa yin/ phyogs bcur chos kyi rgyal mtshan yang sgreng bar byed pa yin/ de dag ni chos kyi rnga rdung bar byed pa yin/ chos kyi bcud 'thung bar byed pa yin/ zhes pa
95a4(1): sogs kyis rgya cher bstan la/ de la blo rgya chung ba dag gis bya ba dang spyod pa'i rgyud sogs rdo rje theg pa ma yin nam/ de dag las ni las dang bya bas 'grub par bstan la/ gzhan yang theg pa chen po'i mdo sde
95a5(1): rnams las/ sbyin pa sogs bsod nams kyi tshogs thams cad mkhyen pa'i rgyu'i gtso bor gsungs pa dang 'gal lo zhe na/ de dag ni bde bar gshegs pas dgongs te gsungs pa/ byis pa blo dman pa dang
95a6(1): spros pa la dga' ba dang shin tu zab mo'i gnas la 'jigs pa rnams nye bar bzung ba'i phyir gsungs pa yin te/ ji skad du de kho na nyid 'jug pa las// stong nyid lta bas grol 'gyur te// sgom pa lhag ma de
95b1(1): don yin// lus ngag yid kyi spyod pa kun// theg pa dman la bstan pa yin// zhes 'byung ba dang / slob dpon klu sgrub kyis kyang / de nyid tshol la thog mar ni// thams cad yod ces smra bar bya// don rnams
95b2(1): rtogs shing chags med pa// phyis ni rnam par dben don nyid// ces dang / gzhan yang rdo rje gtsug tor las kyang // de kho nyid la mnyam gnas na// dam tshig med cing sngags spyad med// rdo rje dril bu gzung mi
