126b4(1): pad+ma la gnas pa// deng 'dir sangs rgyas zhing du rab tu bzhugs pa bcom ldan 'das su rnal 'byor rnams kyis rig par bya// zhes gsungs shing / dbang rnon gyi gdul byas 'di nyid kho nas rgyud don rdzogs
126b5(1): par rtogs par bshad pa'i phyir sdud pa pos sbyar ba'i tshig kho nar mtha' gcig tu 'dod pa mi legs shing 'di skad bdag gis thos pa zhes 'khor gyi tshig ltar ma smos pas rgyud ma yin par yang mi 'grub
126b6(1): dpal gsang ba grub pa'i rgyud las// 'di yi sdud par byed pa po// gzhan dag yod pa ma yin te// bdag nyid 'ba' zhig smra bar byed// rgyud mdzad pa ni thugs rdo rje// zhes dang / dgyes rdor las// 'chad pa
127a1(1): po nga chos kyang nga// zhes pa la sogs gsungs pa'i phyir sdud pa po yang ston pa nyid las gzhan du ma gyur te/ gsang ba grub pa las/ rgyun 'chad pa de thugs rdo rje// 'chad pa po de sdud pa'ang
127a2(1): de// zhes gsungs pas so// gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thugs kyi gsang ba 'dzin pa dang bka'i bsdu ba po byang chub sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje ni ston 'khor gang du bshad kyang mi 'gal
127a3(1): te/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi thugs rdo rje las gzhan du ma gyur pa'i phyir ro// de bas na rdzogs pa chen po sogs rgyud rnams phal mo che gsang ba'i bdag po dang / rdo rje chos dang / rdo rje snying po dang / 'jam dpal
127a4(1): dang / spyan ras gzigs dang / sprul pa'i sku dga' rab rdo rje la sogs pa rnams dang / mkha' 'gro ma pUn nye bar zhi ba la sogs/ mkha' 'gro dang / mkha' 'gro ma'i tshogs dang / gzhan yang gdul bya lha dang /
127a5(1): klu dang / gnod sbyin la sogs rigs can ma nges pa'i tshogs kyis bsdu bar mdzad la/ mtha' dag pa'i rgyud rnams gsang ba'i bdag po kho nas bsdus par yang rung ste bde bar gshegs pas gsang sngags kyi
127a6(1): bstan pa gtad cing ma 'ongs pa na 'jig rten du gsang sngags sgrogs par dbang bskur ba dang / sangs rgyas rnams kyi rdo rje'i snyan gcig tu bsdus par gsungs pa dang rgyud sde rnams glegs bam la 'god par
127b1(1): rjes su gnang ba sogs drug pa'i rgyal tshab chen po yin pa'i phyir te/ gsang snying las/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la// gsang ba 'di las gzhan mi mnga'// sgo dang skur pa zhi ba'i phyir// gsang ba'i snying
127b2(1): po de kho na// nyid de nges pa'i dbyings nas phyung // zhes bstan pa gtad pa dang / ye shes thig le'i rgyud las/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus su gsang ba'i rgyud skal ba dang ldan pa rnams la sus 'chad par byed/ bka'
127b3(1): stsal pa/ phyag na rdo rje mgon pos bshad par byed/ ces pa dang / in+d+ra b+hU ti'i bde mchog rtsa rgyud kyi 'grel pa las/ rgyud rnams ma lus sems dpa' chen po'i tshogs// bye ba phrag ni dgu bcu rtsa drug
127b4(1): sogs// 'dus te rje btsun gsang ba'i bdag po la// gsol ba btab tshe 'di skad bdag thos zhes// rab tu gsungs pa gser gyi glegs bam la// bai DUr+ya ni zhun mas yi ger bkod// ces gsungs pa'i phyir
127b5(1): ro// bye brag rgyud rnams zhu ba po gang yin pa de nyid bsdu ba po yang yin te/ dus 'khor zla ba bzang po/ brtag gnyis rdo rje snying po/ sdom 'byung phyag rdor/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro phag mo bsdus pa bzhin no// de dang
127b6(1): dus mtshungs par rgyu'i theg chen gyi mdo sde rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa' gtso bo gtso bor dag dang gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun lnga brgya dag gis bsdus par bshad cing / 'jig rten du
128a1(1): mchog gi sbrul sku mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu nyan thos dgra bcom pa gtso bo rnams dang so skye ci rigs pa dag gis theg dman gyi sde snod gsum kyang ji snyed pa bsdu ba byas so// gnyis pa
128a2(1): bstan pa de nyid 'jig rten du ji ltar byung ba'i tshul la gnyis te/ rig 'dzin brda'i brgyud pa dang / gang zag snyan khung gi brgyud pa'o// dang po la'ang gnyis te/ rig 'dzin mi ma yin pa dang / mi dang mi ma yin
128a3(1): pa gnyis ka las byung ba'o// dang po ni/ rgyal sras sems dpa'i 'khor de dag gi nang nas ston pa nyid kyis sprul pa rigs gsum du snang bar mdzad pa des gdul bya lha klu gnod sbyin gsum la brda'i sgo nas
128a4(1): bshad cing bstan pa ste/ 'jam dpal gyis gtso bor zab mo phyogs kyis gdul bya'i don mdzad pas lta ba'i phyogs ston/ spyan ras gzigs kyis snying rje'i phyogs kyis gdul bya'i don mdzad pas sgrub
128a5(1): pa'i phyogs ston/ phyag na rdo rjes thabs la mkhas pas drag shul phyogs kyis 'gro ba'i don mdzad pas spyod pa'i phyogs ston/ de yang 'jam dpal gyis lha'i gnas su lha grags ldan mchog skyong la bshad/ des
128a6(1): lha tshangs pa rin chen 'od 'bar la bshad/ des skye dgu'i bdag po tshangs pa dang / tshangs pa kun sgrol dang / tshangs pa gtsug phud 'dzin dang / dbang po brgya byin sogs lha'i rig pa 'dzin pa tshom bu 'bum sde
128b1(1): la bshad/ spyan ras gzigs kyis klu'i gnas su klu rgyal mgrin pa nag po la bshad/ de nas klu mo kha 'dul ma dang / klu mo 'dul tshang ma dang / klu yid 'ong dga' ba dang / 'jog po sogs klu'i rig 'dzin
128b2(1): tshom bu 'bum sde la bshad/ phyag na rdo rjes gnod sbyin gyi gnas su gnod sbyin kun tu bzang po la bshad/ de nas gnod sbyin lag na rdo rje dang / gnod sbyin skar mda' gdongs sogs gnod sbyin gyi rig
128b3(1): 'dzin tshom bu 'bum sde la bshad cing / de dag rnams kyis so so'i 'khor kyi tshogs la'ang bshad pas tshom bu dang bcas pas rdo rje 'chang gi sa brnyes par gyur to// rdzogs pa chen po'i skor ni sum cu rtsa gsum
128b4(1): gyi lha de ba bzang skyong gi bu lhag sems can la rmi ltas khyad par can bzhi byung ba dang mthun par phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad dang rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyis rdo rje sems dpa'
128b5(1): byin gyis brlabs pa la brten nas/ rdo rje sems dpas lha'i bu lhag sems can la rgyal thabs spyi blugs kyi dbang bskur zhing rdzogs pa chen po'i man ngag rnams gnang nas lha yul du dar bar gyur to// de
128b6(1): yang ye shes zhabs kyi grol thig tu/ de nas bzung ste don mchog 'di// skal bar ldan pa 'ga' zhig la// zhal nas zhal dang snyan nas snyan// brgyud de nges pa'i don bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs pa ltar
129a1(1): ro// gnyis pa ni/ dgongs pa lung ston pa'i mdo las/ 'dren pa'i theg pa gsum po dag/ bcom ldan nges par gsungs lags na// rgyu 'bras lhun grub tu spyod cing // sangs rgyas gzhan nas mi
129a2(1): 'tshol ba'i// nges pa'i theg pa cis ma gsungs// zhes zhus pa'i lan du/ rgyu la mos par rgyu'i chos kyi// 'khor lo rab tu bkor byas nas// rdo rje theg pa'i nye lam zhig/ ma 'ongs dus nas 'byung bar
129a3(1): 'gyur// zhes gsungs pa bzhin/ ston pa mchog gi sbrul sku mya ngan las 'das nas lo nyi shu rtsa brgyad 'das pa na lha grags ldan chos skyong / klu rgyal 'jog po/ gnod sprin skar mda' gdong / srin po blo
129a4(1): gros thabs ldan/ mi'i rig 'dzin li tsa bi dri ma med par grags pa ste/ dam pa'i rigs can dra ma lnga pos 'jig rten na mgon po yongs su mya ngan las 'das par rang gi mngon par shes pas shes nas nang du
129a5(1): yang dag par 'jog pa las langs te lang+ka'i yul gyi ri ma la ya'i rtse mor rdzu 'phrul gyis bya bas 'dus te/ kye ma ho// kye ma 'jig rten blong // ston pa sgron ma'i 'od nub che// 'jig rten mun pa gang gis
129a6(1): bsal// zhes pa la sogs pa'i gdung tshig nyi shu rtsa gsum bton cing zag chad par dus so// gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten na gsang sngags kyi sgra yongs su grags pa phyis 'byung bar lung bstan
129b1(1): pa bzhin dus la bab pa de'i tshe gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes sangs rgyas kyis gsang sngags ston par dbang bskur ba brnyes pa'i phyir der mngon sum du snang bar mdzad nas rigs can lnga dang gzhan
129b2(1): yang rig pa 'dzin pa'i dge 'dun phal mo che la sngon ston pas 'og min la sogs par gsang sngags kyi theg pa bstan pa rnams slar yang bzlas te ston par mdzad la/ de rnams srin po blo gros thabs ldan gyis
129b3(1): gser gyi glegs bam la bai DUr+ya zhun mas yi ger bris te dgongs pa'i rtsal bdun gyis nam mkha' la mi mngon par rgyas btab ste sbas so// tshul 'di ni in+d+ra b+hU ti'i bde mchog rtsa rgyud kyi 'grel pa'i lung gong
129b4(1): du drangs pa bzhin no// ri ma la ya yod pa'i lang+ka'i yul de yang dzam+bu'i gling gi gling g.yog rnga yab kyi lang+ga de ni ma yin te bcom ldan 'das lang+ga'i bdag po sgra sgrogs kyi bu mgrin bcus spyan drangs te blo gros
129b5(1): chen pos zhus pa las shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo lang kar gshegs pa gsungs pa'i gnas dzam+bu gling gi shar lho mtshams kyi rgya mtshos bcad pa'i gling phran zhig yin la/ gling de dang gzhan yang / zangs gling
129b6(1): dang / nas gling dang / d+ha na shrI'i gling dang / pa yi gu'i gling sogs gling phran de dag rnams su snga phyi ci rigs par bstan pa dar bar yod cing / bye brag lang+ga'i yul de sngon srin po sgra sgrogs kyis bzung ba'i phyir
130a1(1): de ltar grags la phyis srin po'i yul stongs nas de dpon seng ges bzung bas deng sang sing+ga la'i gling du 'bod pa yin cing yul der slob dpon chen po kah+ma pa byon nas bi shwa rA bI zhes pa'i srin
130a2(1): mo chen mo 'khor lnga brgya'i tshogs dang bcas pa btul ba dang / sngags kyi bstan pa spel pa sogs mdzad/ phyis su theg chen gyi slob dpon lang+ga rgyal ba bzang po 'khrungs la/ slob dpon tsan+d+ra go mis kyang yul
130a3(1): der byon/ shAn+ti pa dang phan chen nags kyi rin chen yang byan nas sngags kyi bstan pa spel ba sogs mdzad cing sngon ma'i rgyal por ma Nas mgrin bcu 'joms pa'i dus dzam+bu'i gling dang de gnyis kyi bar rgya
130a4(1): mtsho chen po la rdo'i zam pa btsugs nas phyin pas da ltar rgya mtsho'i nang du rdo'i phung po chen po mngon sum du snang zhing skabs 'gar rdo'i phung po la gzings thogs pas byol nas 'gro dgos pa dang der srin po
130a5(1): mgrin bcu bsad pa'i khrag gis spags pa yin zer ba'i rdo dmar po kho nas sa gzhi khyab pa la snga dro tsam 'gro dgos pa yod cing de'i dbus su su ma naHku Ta ste yid bzang brtsegs pa zhes pa'i ri sul gcig
130a6(1): yan chad brag ri'i phreng bas bskor bas skye bo phal gyis bgrod par mi nus pa zhig yod la/ der pa Na chen dpon slob kyang byon nas lo drug bzhugs nas rgya gar du byon pa yin no// der yod pa'i ri bo de
130b1(1): yang thun mong du ming de ltar grags kyang don du drag shul yod pa'am ma la ya'i ri yin cing mtshan nyid thams cad kyang tshang ba ste/ ji skad du/ rtse na rtsal gyi rgyal po gnas// ngos la brag dkar khyi tshugs
130b2(1): pa// seng ge gnam du 'phyong 'dras brgyan// rtsi sman rtsa brgyad rtsa bar 'khrungs// 'du ba'i nad kyis yongs mi tshugs// spyi bor ka lan+ta ka ni// mi gnyis gcig pur gnas pa yi// mdzod ldan de yis tshangs
130b3(1): bcas pa// skal ldan rnams kyis bgrod par sla// skal med rnams kyis yongs mi thar// zhes bshad pas so// gling gzhan las bsngags par 'os pa'i yon tan gzhan gyis kyang 'phags par yod de ri de'i rtsa
130b4(1): bapa dang nye ba'i byang dngos su gu Na wer zhes pa'i mchod rten chen po sogs de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring bsrel bzhugs pa'i mtshon rten mang po dang / de'i nub phyogs su bud+d+ha sha ra Na zhes de bzhin gshegs pa
130b5(1): zhag bdun du mnyam par bzhag pa la bzhugs pa'i shing sdong dang / dza lI muk+ti ka ta lI ma Ni ka/ ra Ne ba ne kuny+dza ra g+ha ri g+ha ri pad+ma nI na rI/ b+ha la de sha sing+ga la/ chu rnams mu tig khyim rnams nor bus gang ba/
130b6(1): nags rnams glang po khyim rnams bud med pad+ma can gyis gang ba'i yul sing+ga la/ zhes ched du brjod par grags pa dang / byang shar du kaN+Da la zhes pa'i phug nags 'thug po zhig na brag phug 'dug pa der shrI pA du
131a1(1): ka ste sangs rgyas kyi zhabs rjes shin tu che ba zhig yod cing der zhabs rjes kyi dus ston byed pa na dge slong stong phrag bcu gnyis re tshogs pa sogs sngon nas da lta'i bar du theg pa che chung gi
131a2(1): bstan pa shin tu dar ba yod do// zhes pa ni 'phros don no// gnyis pa bstan pa de mi yul du bab pa'i gang zag snyan khung gi brgyud par ji ltar byon pa ni/ spyir thun mong gi bka'i bsdu ba gnyis pa'i 'jug tsam
131a3(1): du nyi 'og gi rgyal po pad+ma chen po'i dus su o Di bi sha'i yul gyi rgyal po tsan+ta rak+Shi ta'i khyim du 'phags pa 'jam dpal dge slong gi gzugs kyis byon te theg pa chen po ci rigs par bshad cing glegs bam zhig
131a4(1): kyang bzhag go/ de 'ga' zhig gis 'phags pa brgyad stong pa yin par 'dod la/ gsang sngags pa rnams de kho na nyid bsdus pa yin zhes zer/ 'di ston pa mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu theg pa chen po mi yul
131a5(1): du byung ba'i thog ma yin/ de tsam zhig nas sngags kyang bya ba dang spyod pa'i rgyud rnams cung zad re byung bar mngon mod kyi yongs su grags par ni ma yin no// de nas bka' bsdu gsum pa'i 'og tu rgyal po ka
131a6(1): niSh+ka'i bu'i dus su theg chen smra ba'i slob dpon lnga brgya byon zhing thams cad kyang gsang ba'i bdag po sogs las lung len cing rdzu 'phrul thob pa sha stag ste de rnams nub phyogs kyi rgyal po lak+Sha a shwas spyan
131b1(1): drangs te a b+hu zhes pa'i ri'i rtse mor gtsug lag khang byas te bzhugs su gsol/ rang gi 'khor blo rno ba lnga brgya yang rab tu byung nas slob dpon lnga brgya po de dag las theg chen gyi chos mnyam du bcug/ der
131b2(1): rgyal pos sde snod rnams yi ger 'dri bar bsams te ci tsam zhes dris so// spyir tshad gzung bar mi nus kyi// 'dir yod pa ni 'bum phrag brgya'o// rgyal pos mang mod kyi bri bar bya'o// zhes thams cad yi ge
131b3(1): bris te de rnams nyid la phul lo// 'di skabs nas brtsams theg pa chen po shin tu dar bar gyur la bya spyod kyi rgyu rnams kyang gsang nas nyams su len pa ches mang bar byung zhing slob dpon de rnams kyis yul
131b4(1): so so nas sngags rgyud de dag rnam grangs du ma blangs shing spel bar mdzad/ bla med kyi rgyud sde ni phyis kyi bar du skal pa mchog dang ldan pa re gnyis la thod rgal du lhag pa'i lha sogs kyis bstan zhing rang nyid
131b5(1): gcig pus nyams su blangs pas dngos grub thob pa las rjes su gdams pa bzhag pa dang / brgyud pa rim can du 'dom pa sogs cung zad kyang med pas mngon mtshan du dar ba lta ci/ mtshan tsam yang thams
131b6(1): cad kyis mi shes so// gang gi tshe gsang ba'i bdag pos ri ma la yar rigs can lnga la gsang sngags kyi chos 'khor bskor ba de'i tshe sa ho ra'i rgyal po dza gsang sngags phyi rgyud kyi sgrub par bzhugs pa la rmi ltas
132a1(1): ngo mtshar ba bdun byung ste/ de yang / sku gsung thugs rtags thim pa dang / rin chen glegs bam bab pa dang / chos kyi bgro ba byed pa dang / kun gyis dam par bsgrags pa dang / mchod pa chen po
132a2(1): byas pa dang / rin chen char du 'bab pa dang / sangs rgyas sa la lung bstan pa'o// zhes so// de la rgyal po dza ni ston pas mdo rgyud thams cad nas lung bstan pa ste/ bde mchog sdom 'byung gi rgyud phyi ma las//
132a3(1): nga ni 'di nas mi snang nas// lo grangs brgya dang bcu gnyis na// lha gnas gsum du grags pa yi// bstan pa'i snying po dam pa bzhin/ 'dzam gling shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi// rgyal po dza zhes bya ba la// bsod
132a4(1): nams chen po'i mthus snang bas// gsang ba'i bdag pos snang bar 'gyur// zhes pa dang / de dang mtshungs par spyi mdo dgongs 'dus las kyang 'byung ngo // de yang rgyal po dza zhes pa 'ga' zhig gis ston pa
132a5(1): dngos kyi dbang bskur thob pa'i in+d+ra b+hU ti chen po la byed pa dang / kha cig gis de nyid kyi sras yin par yang byed/ 'ga' zhig gis in+d+ra b+hu ti bar pa la 'dod pa sogs mi 'dra bar byur ba 'phags chen gyi rnam
132a6(1): 'phrul so skyes bsam par mi nus pas de ltar yin du'ang rung la/ 'on kyang dus dang bstun nas slob dpon ku ku rA dza dang dus mtshungs su bshad pas de ltar na/ in+d+ra b+hU ti bar pa la byed dgos pa 'dra zhing /
132b1(1): grub thob chen po lwa ba pa'i zhabs dang rgyal po 'di gnyis gcig gam tha dad gang ltar dus gcig cing / rol pa'i rdo rje dang / mtsho skyes dang / dza lan+d+ha ri pa rnams dang yang 'ol spyi tsam du dus mtshungs
132b2(1): so// gang ltar rgyal po de nyid rgyud sde 'og ma'i rnal 'byor bsgom zhing bzhugs pa'i tshe sngar gyi rmi ltas dang mthun par dngos su rgyal po'i khang par sangs rgyas mnyam sbyor la sogs pa gsang sngags kyi sde snod
132b3(1): chen po rnams kyi glegs bam dang gsang ba'i bdag po'i sku khru gang ba zhig bab par gyur to// de nas gsol ba btab pas rdor sems zhal mthong gi le'u rtogs nas de dang phyag na rdo rje'i sku la brten nas zla ba
132b4(1): bdun bsgrubs pas rdo rje sems dpa'i zhal mthong zhing ye shes kyi dbang bskur ba thob pas glegs bam gyi brda' dang don ma lus pa mkhyen par gyur to// de dang dus mnyam par a nu yo ga'i sde snod rnams
132b5(1): kyang sing+ga la'i gling du bab par gyur te/ kun bzang ye shes gsal bar ston pa'i thabs kyi lam mchog 'dus pa'i rgyud kyi le'u lnga par/ ma hA yo ga'i rgyud rnams ni rgyal po dza'i khang steng du 'bab par 'gyur la/
132b6(1): a nu yo ga'i rgyud rnams ni sing+ga la'i nags tshal du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// zhes lung bstan pas kyang ngo // de nas rgyal pos rgyud don ma lus pa mkhyen par gyur kyang dge ba'i bshes kyi rkyen la ma ltos par
133a1(1): gdul bya rnams rgyud la rang dgar 'jug pa dgag pa'i phyir ma rtogs pa ltar mdzad nas glegs bam rnams za hor gyi yul tsam na mkhyen pa che bar grags pa slob dpon u pa rA dza la bstan pas
133a2(1): brda dang don ma mjal/ de nas slob dpon ku ku rA dza la bstan pas des rdo rje sems dpa' sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i rdor sems zhal mthong gi le'u rtogs te bsgrubs pas rdo rje sems dpa' zhal bstan nas da ste rgyud
133a3(1): kyi don rnams gsang bdag gis ston par 'gyur ro// zhes lung bstan/ da dung bsgrubs pas gsang bdag dngos su byon nas don gyi bstan pa dang / theg pa thams cad rdzogs pa'i dbang bskur nas tshig gi
133a4(1): bstan pa li tsa bI dri ma med pa la zhus shig ces lung byin pa ltar slob dpon gyis gsang bdag gis bka' ltar rgyud sde chen po bco brgyad du phyes nas rgyal po dza la bstan par bshad de/ shes phyin tshul brgya lnga
133a5(1): bcu pa'i 'grel pa slob dpon ye shes bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa las/ sngon sangs rgyas mi yul na lo brgyad cu bzhugs pa'i tshe na/ sarba bud+d+ha sa ma yo ga dang / gu h+ya sa mA dza la sogs pas 'dul zhing theg pa
133a6(1): de dag gi snod du gyur pa 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi yul na med pas rgyal chen bzhi dang sum cu rtsa gsum dang / dga' ldan la sogs pa'i gnas na lha rnams dang skal ba bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' la sogs
133b1(1): pa snod du gyur nas de'i tshe mdo sde de na bzhugs so// slad kyi sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu za hor rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa ngo mtshar du chos la dad pa dag cig 'dug pa theg pa de'i 'dul skal du
133b2(1): gyur cing snod du gyur nas sarba bud+d+ha sa ma yo ga la sogs pa sde snod chen po bco brgyad phyag na rdo rje'i byin gyis rlabs kyis za hor gyi yul du gshegs pa dang / za hor gyi rgyal po in+d+ra b+hU tis mdo sde dag bltas na
133b3(1): brda ma 'phrod nas sngon gyi las kyi dbang gis na mngon par shes pa thob pas bltas na yul gyi dbus su yul ma la pa na A tsar+ya ku ku rA dza nyin zhing khyi stong tsam la chos 'chad/ mtshan zhing ni khyi de dag la dam tshig
133b4(1): gi longs spyod mdzad pa khyi'i slob dpon mdzad pa zhig bzhugs pa de theg pa'i snod du gyur la/ bdag gi 'dul skal du gyur pa yang 'dra nas rgyal pos pho nya btang ste slob dpon gshegs su gsol ba dang / slob
133b5(1): dpon de yang sngon gyi las kyi dbang gis na mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan nas/ rgyal po de bdag gi 'dul skal du 'bab bam mi 'bab mdo sde de dag gi snod du bdag gyur ram ma gyur brtags na/ bdag
133b6(1): gis 'dul skal du yang bab/ bdag kyang mdo sde'i snod du yang gyur/ rgyal po'i the tshom yang sel bar 'gyur mod kyi/ 'on kyang mdo sde dag sngar ma bltas na brgya la rgyal po'i the tshom dag ma sel
134a1(1): bar gyur na shin tu mi legs pas pho nya la slar spring ba/ mdo sde dag kho bos sngar bltas 'tshal gyis tshur skur zhig ces springs pa dang / de nas mdo sde dag pas gshegs te bltas na mgo mjug
134a2(1): gar blta ba'i cha ma mchis na de nyid du lus brdabs te mgon med do// skyabs med do// zhes bos pa dang dpal rdo rje sems dpa' mngon par gshegs te khyod ci 'dod ces dris pa dang / bdag mdo sde zab mo
134a3(1): 'di bltas pa tsam gyis shes par 'dod ces gsol ba dang / de bzhin gnang ngo zhes gsungs nas de nas sarba bud+d+ha sa ma yo ga la sogs pa'i glengs bam rnams ma phye bar de dag gi don yid la mngon sum du
134a4(1): gsal bar gyur to// de nas slob dpon de za hor gyi yul du gshegs nas rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa rnams la d+harma de dag bshad de/ rdo rje sems dpas lung bstan nas rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa rnams rdo
134a5(1): rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor ltar sgom du stsal te dbus su rgyal po nyid/ btsun mo dam pa bzhi yum gyi sar bkod/ blon po bzhi rigs bzhi'i sar bkod/ sras mo rnams nang gi lha mo'i sar bkod/ btsun mo
134a6(1): phal ba rnams phyi'i lha mo'i sar bkod/ blon po phal ba rnams sgo srung bzhi dang / bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' ltar bkod pa dang / rgyal pos bsams pa bdag cag 'khor dang bcas pa rig
134b1(1): 'dzin gyi gnas su grub pa'i phyir dang dam pa'i chos 'di mi nub par bya ba'i phyir sras shakra pu ti rgyal tshab tu dbang bskur nas/ A tsar+ya ku ku pas lung dang man ngag bstan pa rgyal bu de la bstan te bzhag nas
134b2(1): bsgoms pa dang / rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa stongs la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rigs 'dzin du grub bo// de'i sras sha kra bu tis kyang de bzhin du bsgoms pa dang / 'khor sgom pa bdun brgya dang yang
134b3(1): rig 'dzin gyi gnas grub bo// yang rgyal bu shakra bu tis sras ni chung ste sras mo go ba de byi la dpal dam pa'i nang nas tshul brgya lnga bcu pa bkod de bshams nas in+d+ra b+hU ti'i lung de sras mo yul dang sa 'dzin du
134b4(1): stsal de la bstan pa las sras mo de yang 'khor dang bcas pa brgya dang yang rig 'dzin gyi gnas grub bo// de nas sras mo des/ rgyal bu la lung man ngag bzhag pa las 'phel ba ni deng du 'di lags te/ zhes
134b5(1): bshad cing / dad pa mtshung par mnyam sbyor 'grel pa las kyang / sprul pa'i sku 'das phyi ma'i dus kyi tshe// rgyal ba'i bka' gsang 'dzam gling gnas su shar// rgyal po'i khab tu spyan drangs mchod byas te// dga' zhing
134b6(1): gus bstod legs bltas brda' ma 'jal// thugs rje'i 'brel shugs gsang sngags 'dzin par grags// dam pa bzung ste glegs bam gzigs par zhus// stu 'phrul thig le stong pa'i dkyil
135a1(1): 'khor gzhung // grub thob lhag pa'i lha yis lung bstan mdzad// rdo rje theg pa'i gzhung lugs sna tshogs mtha'// dam pa rnams kyis gdams pa ji bzhin pa// mi 'gal legs par bsdus shing rab
135a2(1): bkrol te// 'grel dang bsdus don sgrub thabs mang du bstan// zhes gsungs pa'i phyir lugs de gnyi ga 'gal ba med kyang rgyal po rang nyid kyis rtogs pa'i phyogs legs par mngon te nyid kyi mdzad pa'i lam
135a3(1): rnam bkod du/ shar phyogs in+d+ra'i lung pa na// rgya lung rdo rje brtsegs pa ru// rigs can in+d+ra b+hU ti ngas// gsang ba'i bdag pos mngon bstan pas// sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i bsgrub pa yang // tshom bu lnga bcu stong dang
135a4(1): bcas// phyag na rdo rje mngon grub ste// spang len brtul zhugs spyod pa'i dbang // dge bar bskur nas sdig pa med// de nas sa la reg par byas// zhes pa dang / sangs rgyas gsang ba'i lam rim las/ 'grel pa
135a5(1): snang ba mngon brtags pas// thugs kyi sgrub pa mngon rtogs te// de nyid sgo nas de nyid grub// brtan pa'i dngos grub de nas thob// don dam bcud kyis de nas rgyas// 'dod pa'i bsam pa de ru 'grub// lhag
135a6(1): pa'i lha dang de ru mjal// zhes pa la sogs pas rang nyid kyis rtogs par bshad pa'i phyir ro// de la slob dpon ku ku rA dza khyi'i rgyal po zhes par grags shing lo rgyus 'ga' zhig tu ku ta rA dza zhes kyang 'byung ste/
135b1(1): nyin mo khyi'i rnam pa can gyi dpa' bo dang rnal 'byor ma stong phrag re la chos ston cing mtshan mo de dag dang lhan cig tu dur khrod kyis gnas rnams su gshegs nas tshogs kyi 'khor lo la sogs pa dam tshig gi kun
135b2(1): tu spyod pa la gnas shing de ltar lo bcu gnyis su spyad pas mthar phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub brnyes pa yin la/ yang kha cig gis slob dpon 'dis spyod pa la gnas pa'i tshe/ u rgyan du byon nas slar yang rgyud sde
135b3(1): chen po bco brgyad kyi nang nas sangs rgyas mnyam sbyor la sogs pa'i nang rgud sde lnga rgya cher bshad cing mthar gyis zla gsang thig le la brten nas mchog gi dngos grub brnyes pa yin no zhes kyang zer/ slob dpon
135b4(1): 'dis mnyam sbyor la rtsal du bton cing gsang don rnam par dgod pa drug dang / dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi rjes su 'jug pa'i cho ga lnga pa sogs bstan bcos du ma mdzad do// de ltar ma hA yo ga la rgyud sde dang
135b5(1): sgrub sde gnyis su yod pa las snga ma tan+da chen po sde bco brgyad ni sku gsung thugs yon tan phrin las lnga'i gzhi dang rtsa bar gyur pa'i rgyud sde chen po lnga dang / sgrub pa'i yan lag tu 'gro ba'i rgyud sde lnga dang / spyod pa'i
135b6(1): yan lag tu 'gro ba'i rgyud sde lnga dang / ma tshang ba kha skong ba'i phyi ma'i rgyud gnyis dang / thams cad kyi bsdus don lta bu'i rgyud sde gcig dang bco brgyad do// de thams cad rgyal pos ku ku rA dza la bshad/ des
136a1(1): sras shakra pu tri'am in+d+ra b+hu ti chung ba la bshad/ des seng ha rA dza la bshad/ des sha kra pu ti 'am u pa rA dza la bshad/ des sras mo go ma de bI la bshad cing so so'i tshom bu dang bcas pa tshogs
136a2(1): sgrub kyi lam gyis rdo rje 'chang gi sa la gshegs so// de ltar yang lam rim las// de nas rdo rje gdan steng gi/ 'dzam gling shar gyi phyogs mtshams su// pho brang dam pa rin chen nang // bkra shis dam pa'i khang
136a3(1): bu ru// ku ku rA dzen+da b+hU ti// sed+ha u pa rA dza dang // sras mo go ma de bi sogs// sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i dbang thob nas// tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor mngon bsgrubs te// rdo rje 'chang sar mngon du gshegs// zhes
136a4(1): so// rgyal po 'dis sgyu 'phrul lam rnam bkod dang / rim pa gnyis pa la sogs pa mdzad cing bla med kyi bstan bcos gzhan yang bde mchog rtsa rgyud kyi 'grel pa dang / ye shes grub pa dang / lhan cig skyes
136a5(1): grub sogs mchog tu gsang ba'i don slong nges pa mang po mdzad/ 'phags yul gyi grub chen rnams la khyab gdal du gyur pa'i rgyud dang / gdams ngag ci rigs pa thams cad las phal mo che rgyal po'i rigs kyi
136a6(1): slob dpon 'di nyid las byung ba shas che zhing / bde ba chen po dang 'od gsal gyi gdams pa'i bka' rnams rgyal po 'dis grub thob byis pa'i zhabs sam dza lan+ta ri pa la gnang / des nag po spyod pa slob ma'i
136b1(1): tshogs dang bcas pa la brgyud nas/ til+li pa dang na ro pa slob ma'i tshogs dang bcas pa thams cad brgyud pa'i srol ka 'di nyid las byung ba yin no// de bzhin du las kyi phyag rgya'i bka' bab sa'i khungs kyang de
136b2(1): nyid do// sras mo go ma de bIs rgyal po ku ku rA dza/ des slob dpon sgeg pa rdo rje dang / sangs rgyas gsang ba gsum la bshad de/ de la slob dpon sgeg pa rdo rje ni yul ShaM Sha ra 'khrungs/ u rgyan gyi gnas su rab
136b3(1): tu byung zhing sde snod gsum la sbyangs/ khyad par thogs med lugs kyi grub mtha' la mkhas shing thun mong gi rig pa'i gnas thams cad kyang mkhyen/ u rgyan gyi gling phran ma d+hi ma zhes bya bar 'phags pa 'jam
136b4(1): dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i sgrub pa mdzad pas grub par nye ba na 'jam dpal gyi bris sku'i zhal las 'od zer byung ste gling de yun ring du snang bar byas pas nyi ma dang 'dra ba zhes bya bar mtshan
136b5(1): gsol/ dus gzhan zhig tu lta ba log pa'i sgrub pa po zhig la nang pa'i pan+di ta'i dbang po lnga bsgrub rdzas la dgos pa byung nas slob dpon bkrong du 'ongs pa na glang po che dang / rta dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dang /
136b6(1): ma he dang / rma bya sogs sna tshogs pa'i gzugs su snang bar mdzad pas slob dpon gang yin ma shes par phyir log pas sna tshogs gzugs can zhes mtshan du grags shing sku tshe'i smad la o rgyan gyi yul du 'gro
137a1(1): ba'i don rgya cher mdzad/ slob dpon chen po 'di spyir rgyud sde thams cad dang khyad par sgyu 'phrul dra ba la mkhas shing grub pa brnyes pa yin/ na lan+dar yang lo bcu bzhugs shing sngags kyi bstan pa
137a2(1): bskyangs/ mtshan yang dag par brjod pa bla med rgyud du bkral ba'i TI ka mdzad pa dang / dgyes pa rdo rje'i rdzogs rim thig le chen po'i rim pa dang / 'dus pa la rgyud kyis bshad pa bla ma'i man ngag gi bshad
137a3(1): pa dang / lhan skyes sgrub thabs sogs rgyud gzhan dang / gsang ba snying po'i 'grel pa sbar khab dang / thugs thig dang / rim pa drug pa dang / dam tshig gsal bkra dang / phra rgyas sogs sgyu 'phrul phyogs la'ang
137a4(1): bstan bcos mang du mdzad cing rgya cher bshad/ mthar gyis rdo rje'i sku brnyes pa yin no// 'di rab tu byung ba'i mtshan dpal ldan byang chub mchog gi bskal ba dang ldan pa zhes bya ba dang / gsang mtshan sgeg pa'i
137a5(1): rdo rje dang / bstan bcos rnams su sgeg pa'i rdo rje nyi ma dang 'dra ba sna tshogs gzugs can zhes 'byung ba yin no// 'di la slob dpon ye shes zhabs kyis kyang / sgyu 'phrul dra ba dang / mnyam sbyor dang / gsang
137a6(1): ba 'dus pa dang / zla gsang thig le ste tan+t+ra sde bco brgyad kyi gtso bo nang rgyud sde lngar grags pa rnams gsan cing bsgoms pas ye shes la dbang thob pa yin te/ zhal gyi lung las/ des nas yon tan kun
137b1(1): 'byung u rgyan yul du bgrod/ 'jo sgeg rdo rje zhes byar mtshan gsol rab tu grags// de las mang thos rnam par dpyad cing de nyid du// zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs pa'i phyir ro// gang gi tshe sgeg pa'i zhabs
137b2(1): kyis u rgyan du sngags kyi bstan pa skyong ba de'i tshe gdol pa'i bu zhig gis Ar+ya de ba mjal/ byin gyis brlabs pas chos rdol shes su byung / 'phags pa klu sgrub yab sras kyi sngags gzhung rnams ci rigs par
137b3(1): bshad pa'i ma tang+gi pa dang / kong+ka na ru bsrung ba'i zhabs kyis kyang zla grags las dngos su mnyan nas/ sgron gsal gyi glegs bam thog mar rnyed cing / de bzhin du paN+Di ta sgra gcan 'dzin gyis kyang klu byang
137b4(1): mjal zer te 'dus pa 'phags skor thog mar byung ba'i skabs ka yin/ slob dpon sangs rgyas gsang ba ni yul dbus su 'khrungs shing na lan+dar rab tu byung / 'di dang slob dpon sangs rgyas zhi ba gnyis ka ye
137b5(1): shes zhabs kyi sku tshe'i stod kyi slob ma yin/ wA ra nA si'i gnas shin tu 'phags pa 'jam dpal bsgrubs pas nam zhig na bris skur bzhad cing / dngos grub kyi rdzas pa dmar po'i mar khu yang khol/ me tog
137b6(1): rnying pa rnams kyang kha 'bus pas dngos grub kyi ltas su mkhyen kyang thog mar me tog 'bul lam mar khu gsol snyam pa'i the tshom gyi ngang du cung zad lus pas gnod sbyin mo zhig gis gegs byas te slob dpon gyi
138a1(1): 'gram par thal lcag bsnun pas cung zad brgya la/ de sangs tsan bris sku rdul gyis gos/ me tog rnying / mar khu bo ba yang gzigs/ 'on kyang rdul phyis me tog dbu la phul/ mar khu gang yod
138a2(1): gsol bas sku lus nad thams cad dang bral zhing shin tu stobs dang ldan pa dang blo shin tu rno zhing mngon par shes pa la dbang sgyur ba byung / de skabs shes oM rgyan du byon nas slob dpon sgeg pa'i rdo rje dang
138a3(1): mjal zhing / rnal 'byor rgyud dang bla med nang rgyud sde lnga gsan cing khyad par sgyu 'phrul la mkhas/ dus gzhan zhig tu sangs rgyas zhi ba dang mnyam du ri bo ta lar 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs mjal bar byon
138a4(1): pas ri'i rtsa bar 'phags ma sgrol ma klu'i tshogs la chos ston pa dang / sked par khro gnyer can mas lha ma yin dang gnod sbyin gyi tshogs la chos ston pa dang / rtse mor 'phags pa mngon sum du bzhugs pa yang
138a5(1): rang rang gi snang ba dang mthun par mjal/ der sangs rgyas gsang bas zhabs sa la mi reg pa sogs dngos grub kyang brnyes/ 'phags ma sgrol mas ri kha ba can gyi gangs ti ser song la sgrub pa gyis zhes lung
138a6(1): bstan/ tshur slebs nas bA ra nA sI la sogs par lo mang po'i bar du chos bshad pas slar yang 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyis sngar sgrol mas lung bstan pa ltar bskul bas/ ri ti ser byon nas sgrub pa mdzad
138b1(1): pas rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po lan grangs du mar gzigs shing 'jam dpal dbyangs dang mi dang mi lag pa bzhin du gyur/ mi ma yin pa rnams kyang bran du khol/ slob dpon 'dis gsang ba snying po
138b2(1): la 'grel pa rnam dbye 'grel dang / rdo rje las rim dang / dkyil 'khor chos don dang / dam pa rgyan dang / dra chen dra chung dang / lam rim che chung gnyis dang / zhi ba dang khro bo'i mngon par rtogs pa'i rim pa
138b3(1): dang / rnal 'byor rgyud la'ang rdo rje dbyings kyi sgrub thabs yo ga la 'jug pa dang / rnam snang mngon byang gi bsdus 'grel dang / bsam gtan phyi ma'i rgyas 'grel sogs shin tu mang bar mdzad cing bod la'ang
138b4(1): bka' drin che ba'i tshul 'og tu 'chad par 'gyur la/ mthar sku lus mi snang bar gyur skad/ yang rgyal po ku ku rA dzas/ ro langs bde ba'i dngos grub dang / drang srong b+ha Shi ta gnyis la bshad/ snga mas badz+ra ha s+ya
138b5(1): la bshad/ slob dpon 'dis gsang ba 'dus pa la'ang 'grel pa dgongs pa thams cad nye bar len pa dang / bde ba chen po'i sgrub thabs sogs mdzad nas rtsal du bton cing bshad pas 'phags yul du
138b6(1): 'dus pa la bkal srol mi 'dra ba lugs nyi shu rtsa bzhi yod par 'dod pa las bod du drug byung ba'i bzhi pa 'dus pa rdo rje bzhad pa'i skor gyi srol ka byung sa de yin/ 'dis na lan+da'i nub sgo srung ba ngag gi dbang
139a1(1): phyug grags pa la 'khor lo sdom pa'i dbang bskur ba mdzad cing rgyud kyang bshad/ gdams pa dang rjes su gdams pa rnams kyang bstsal/ man ngag bsgoms pas ngag gi dbang phyug chen po sogs
139a2(1): grub pa thob cing sku lus de nyid kyis zung 'jug gi sku phyag rgya chen po'i rig 'dzin du gyur pa yin no// slob dpon de dang drang srong b+ha Shi ta gnyis kas za hor rgyal po pra hasti la bshad/ 'di ni nub phyogs su rgyal
139a3(1): rigs su sku 'khrungs tsi ta ba ri'i yul gyi slob dpon zhi ba 'od dang ma ru'i yul gyi 'dul 'dzin chen po bsod nams grags pa las rab tu byung zhing mtshan shAkya 'od du grags/ sde snod gsum ka la mkhas par
139a4(1): sbyangs shing slob dpon rdo rje bzhad pa sogs sngags kyi rdo rje 'dzin pa yang ches mang bar brten cing rgyud sde thams cad thugs su chud pa dang mchog gi dngos grub brnyes pa yin zhes grags/ sngags su zhugs
139a5(1): pa'i mtshan pra b+hA ha sti zhes 'byung / slob dpon 'di'i slob ma shAkya bshes gnyen gyis rnal 'byor rgyud de kho na nyid bsdus pa'i 'grel pa ko sa la'i rgyan zhes bya ba'ang brtsams/ 'di gnyis kas kha cher byon nas
139a6(1): 'gro don rgya chen po mdzad de/ snga ma las slob dpon sangs rgyas gsang ba dang slob dpon chen po pad+ma sam+b+ha ba gnyis kyis gsan zhing slob dpon pad+mas rgyal po dza nyid la'ang gsan no// de yang slob dpon chen
139b1(1): po 'di ni 'jam dpal sgyu 'phrul dra ba las/ dpal ldan sangs rgyas pad+ma skyes// kun mkhyen ye shes mdzod 'dzin pa// rgyal po sgyu 'phrul sna tshogs 'chang // che ba sangs rgyas rig sngags 'chang // zhes lung gis
139b2(1): bstan pa yin la/ don du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung rdo rje'i bdag nyid sangs rgyas 'od dpag tu med pa'i sprul pa'i sku ste d+ha na ko sa'i mtsho'i dbus su pad+ma'i sdong po las mngal gyi dri mas ma
139b3(1): gos par brdzus te 'khrungs so// de la gter ma'i phyogs phal che bar rdzus skyes kho na grags che la/ bka' ma phur pa'i rnam bshad sogs su mngal skyes kyi phyogs kyang gsungs shing / de dang mthun par
139b4(1): 'phags pa'i yul gyi gtam du'ang grags mod/ rnam 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyab pa la dbang 'byor pa'i phyir gang ltar yin kyang rung la/ brdzus skyes ltar na hu rmu dzu dang / si ko d+ha ra dang / d+ha na ko sa dang / rug
139b5(1): / sogs gling phran re yin cing o Di yA na'i yul dngos ma yin kyang de rnams su 'gro don ci rigs par mdzad do// zhes 'byung la/ u rgyan gyi yul nyid du'ang shar dang lho dang byang gsum du rgya mtsho chen po re yod
139b6(1): pas/ de dag gang du 'khrungs pa'i tshul gsal ka 'phags yul pa'i gtam rgyud du ma byung / gang ltar o Di yA na'i 'phral skad du sra do zhes pa rgya gar pa rnams sri ga d+ha ra me tog phreng ba 'dzin zhes pa o rgyan gyi

146b1(1): mdzad mkhan de yin/ des dur ha ri la gdams/ des rdo rje gdan pa che ba la gdams/ des rdo rje gdan pa bar ba la gdams/ de nas slob dpon a b+h+yA ka ra slob ma'i tshogs dang bcas pa las byung ba yin

146b6(1): sgra gcan 'dzin bzang po las rab tu byung / pha rol phyin pa nas bzung gsang sngags phyi nang gi bar gyi thos pas rgyud sbyangs/ dbang bskur ba nod cing gdams pa dang rjes su gdams pa mtha' dag gnang /
147a1(1): khyad par dpal he ru ka'i dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur ba'i tshe me tog khro bo hUM mdzad la phog/ yun ring du bsgoms pas rim pa gnyis kyi ting nge 'dzin khyad par can skyes shing / zla ba drug tu sgrub
147a2(1): pa byas pas dngos grub thob par dgongs te las rgya gdol ba'i bu mo ut+pal sngon po'i kha dog lta bu rdo rje'i rigs kyi phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid tshang ba zhig dgos pas phyogs gzhan zhig nas btsal ba rnyed nas pha ma
147a3(1): la bslangs pas de rnams na re/ bram ze'i slob dpon khyod smyo ba yin nam/ nged gdol ba'i rigs yin pas khyod nyid dang nged rnams la'ang chad pa mi 'ong ngam zer/ nga la sgrub pa'i rten du dgos pas tha mal gyi
147a4(1): rigs nyams pa sogs kyi chad pa mi 'ong byas pas 'o na bu mo'i lus dang mnyam pa'i gser dngul dgos zer/ der slob dpon gyi skad cig la sa 'og gi gter phyung ste de rnams la byin/ de nas slob dpon

147a6(1): ka sogs dkyil 'khor thams cad kyang mngon sum du mthong / sgrub pa chen po'i lam gyis phyag rgya chen po mchog gi dngos grub thob bo// sgyu 'phrul lam rim las// zhag ni sum cu phrag drug dang // bcu gnyis
147b1(1): bcu bzhi bcu drug gis// dbang sgyur rigs kyi dam pa 'grub// ces bshad pa'i snga ma'o// slob dpon 'dis bskyed rdzogs gsum dang sngags rgyud gzhan gyis kyang 'gro ba mang po'i don mdzad la/ yang dag
147b2(1): ru lu gser phreng dang sangs rgyas mnyam sbyor gyi man ngag yan lag bzhi'i don snang bar byed pa dang / khrag 'thung chen po'i sgrub thabs yang dag par grub pa sogs rim pa gnyis kyi bstan bcos kyang mang du

148a1(1): ro langs thal mdog la sogs pa las sngags phyi nang gi dbang bskur ba dang / gdams ngag thun mong dang thun mong ma yin pa thams cad kyang thob/ slob dpon rol pa'i rdo rje las dgra
148a2(1): gdong 'jigs gsum sogs kyang gsan no zer/ gang ltar thun mong gi grub pa rnams nyams 'og tu chud cing zung 'jug gi go 'phang thob par nye ba na spyod pa la gshegs pas mu stegs kyi kha 'dzin mchog tu che

148a4(1): bkas te zam pa'i g.yas g.yon nas lhung ngo // der rgyal po'i 'khor rnams kyi bzod par gsol zhing gsol ba btab pas slar gsos te nang pa'i bstan pa la bkod do// de yang ji skad du/ 'jig rten lha la

148b1(1): srog snying phul/ ri ma la ya nas las bzhi tshang ba'i gser gyi glegs bam bai DUr+yas bris pa bton/ gzigs pa'i mod la thugs su chud de mu stegs 'dul ba'i sngags rgod las la sbyar bas mu stegs kyi rgyal

149a1(1): ma'i slob dpon pa lin A tsar+ya yin/ 'phags pa klu sgrub min zer yang ba liM A tsar+ya'i mtshan la klu sgrub snying po zer ba srid kyang 'phags pa mi zer/ de'i phyir slob dpon 'phags pas mdzad pa'i

149a3(1): la'i rgyud brgyad dang / lha mo nag mo'i rgyud dang / ku ru kul+le'i rtog pa sogs rgud kyi rnam grangs gzhan yang mang du spyan drangs/ ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro ma rnams las zhal gyis gdams pa thob/ sgrub thabs mi

149b6(1): cing bar chad kyi mtshan ma rnams bcom/ ma mo bcu gnyis dang sa bdag mo bzhi sogs dam 'og tu bcug/ slar slob dpon pra b+ha ha sti la'ang kI la ya'i rgyud tshar bco brgyad gsan par grags shing phrin las
150a1(1): phur pa'i bka' rnams ma lus pa'i bdag nyid du gyur// de rnams slob dpon so sos rang gi nyams su blangs shing skal ba dang ldan pa'i gdul bya gzhan la'ang rgya cher bshad do// gnyis pa gter

150a5(1): ma dang dregs pa'i tshogs rnams la bden pa'i tshig dang mthun pa'i rdzas kyis bkrol/ gzhan don du dgongs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi mthus mkha' 'gro ma las kyi dbang mo che mngon sum du byon nas sgrom bu rnams
150a6(1): blangs te/ che mchog gi bse sgrom bi ma la yang dag gi dngul sgrosgom hUM kA ra/ gshin rje'i lcags sgrom 'jam dpal bshes gnyen/ rta mgrin gyi zangs sgom nA ga rdzu na/ phur pa'i g.yu sgom pad+ma 'byung gnas//
150b1(1): / mo'i bse sgrom d+ha na saM skr-i ta/ mchod bstod kyi mchod sgrom ram bu gu h+ya/ drag sngags kyi gzi sgom zhi ba'i snying po rnams las so sor gtad de rang rang gi don la mkhas shing sngags kyi dngos grub brnyes par gyur
150b2(1): pa yin te/ rin po che sna brgyad kyi sgrom bu las bde gshegs 'dus pa tshom bu gcig tu 'dus pa'i rgyud dang man ngag gi dka' rnams byung ba slob dpon pad+ma la babs pa yin no// gnyis pa rdzogs pa a nu yo
150b3(1): ga'i skor rnams gsang ba'i bdag pos rgyal po dza'am lung bstan rdo rje la dbang bskur zhing bstan pa thams cad kyi don thugs su chud pa yin mod/ 'on kyang tshur mthong gi ngor gsang sngags la rang dgar

150b6(1): kyang bstan/ u pa rA dza la shrI d+ha na'i gling du dpal ldan 'bras spungs sam mchod rten dpal yon can du dbang bskur zhing rgyud gtad do// grong khyer skyid pa'i 'byung gnas su rang gi sras gsum la dbang bskur//
151a1(1): de yang sha kra pu tri ni in+d+ra b+ha ti chung bar grags pa de yin/ 'dis grub pa brnyes pa'i tshe slob dpon lA ba par grags pa yin zer/ lhan cig skyes grub kyi 'grel pa las kyang de ltar bshad de/

151a3(1): zhig gis slob dpon lwa ba pa de rgyal po'i sras zhig yin/ yul yang o rgyan gyi nang tshan zhig yin ces gsungs pa ltar na in+d+ra b+hU ti chung pa yin kyang rung ste/ des thog mar sngags kyi slob dpon chen po zhig

152a6(1): phyag mdzad pa dang gdams pa zhus pa'i 'og tu mchog gi dngos grub thob pa yin zhes grags shing / phyag chen thig le'i skor rnams kyang 'di dus su oM rgyan gyi yul du dar ba yin/ phyis oM rgyan gyi yul der rgyal

152b6(1): kyang mdzad/ des slob dpon pra b+ha ha sti la g+ha dza ne'i yul gyi chu klung sin+d+hu'i 'gram du dbang bskur ba dang rgyud bshad/ 'di sngar smos pa bzhin rab tu byung ba'i mtshan shAkya 'od ces grags shing / des slob ma
153a1(1): shAkya 'od chung ba dang / shAkya bshes gnyen dang / shAkya seng ge gsum la bstan/ bar pa 'di rnal 'byor rgyud la shin tu mkhas pas de nyid 'dus pa'i 'grel pa ko sa la'i rgyan ces bya ba yul ko sa

153a3(1): bshos khang dgu thog tu slob dpon d+ha na rak+Shi ta la bshad/ 'dis mdo'i rnam grangs 'chad pa'i bstan bcos mdzad/ des oM rgyan gyi rdo rje'i phug tu slob dpon hUM mdzad la bshad/ 'dis rtsa rgyud la rgya bdun

153b1(1): zhing rgyud gtad/ 'dis slob dpon hUM ka ra la'ang gsan/ rig sngags grub pas rig pa 'dzin pa'i skur gyur/ mdo'i yig sna bco brgyad dang rnal 'byor gyi rim pa theg chen sgron ma sogs mdzad/ des skal pa
153b2(1): mchog dang ldan pa'i thugs sras bzhi la bshad de/ ma ga d+ha ra mdo'i mkhan po d+harma bo d+hi la bshad/ 'dis mdo'i don bsdu ba dang / shes rab sgron ma dang bkol mdo rnams mdzad/ shrI lan+dar mkhan po d+harma rA dza

153b4(1): dpon d+ha na rak+Shi ta las kyang gsan ces grags/ bshad ma zag pa'i brgyud pa de thams cad ni dbang bka' dang / bshad bka' dang / man ngag gi bka' thams cad 'dus pa'i brgyud pa yin no// yang slob

153b6(1): 'dus la sogs pa bsgyur bar brtsams pa na mos pa chung bas ma 'gyur te bal yul du byon/ ba su d+ha ra dang d+harma bo d+hi la bshad/ phyis bru sha'i yul du d+harma bo d+hi dang d+ha na rak+Shi ta'i drung du slob dpon che btsan
154a1(1): skyes kyis bru sha'i skad dang yi ge bskur ro// // gsum pa rdzogs pa chen po a ti yo ga'i skor ni/ gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das gsang ba'i bdag po phyag na rdo rjes ri rab kyi byang phyogs
154a2(1): dur khrod me ri 'bar bar mkha' 'gro dang / mkha' 'gro ma dang / grub pa dang / rig pa 'dzin pa'i tshogs la gsang ba sngags kyi chos ston pa de'i tshe 'phags yul nub phyogs oM rgyan gyi yul d+ha na ko sha'i gling
154a3(1): zhes bya bar ko sha zhes pa'i srog chags lus mi la gdong dred kyi rnam pa sbar mo lcags kyis gtams pa kho nas gang zhing tsan+dan la sogs shing ljon pa mang pos bskor ba'i phyir de skad du grags so// zhes kyang
154a4(1): byung / yul der bde byed brtsegs pa zhes bya ba'i lha khang chen po gcig la lha khang chung ngu stong drug brgya brgyad kyis bskor ba dpal dang 'byor pa phun sum tshogs pa'i gnas su rgyal po u pa rA dza dang btsun mo
154a5(1): snang ba gsal ba'i 'od ldan ma zhes bya ba gnyis la sras mo su d+harma bya ba rab tu byung nas yun ring por ma lon par bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i dge slong ma zhig yul de nas dpag tshad tsam 'das par gser gyi bye
154a6(1): ma bdal ba'i rgya mtsho'i gling zhig tu rtswa'i spyil bu chung ngu zhig la gnas te g.yog mo bde ba'i snying ldan ma bya ba dang lhan cig tu rnal 'byor bsgoms shing gnas pa'i tshe nub gcig dge slong ma'i rmi lam du mi
154b1(1): dkar po dri ma dang bral ba zhig gis shel gyi bum pa oM AHhUM swA ha'i yi ges rgyas btab pa gcig spyi bor lan gsum bzhag pas bum pa de las 'od 'phros pas khams gsum po gsal bar mthong ba zhig
154b2(1): rmis/ de nas mi ring bar dge slong ma la rdzogs pa chen po lha yul du dar bar byed pa rdo rje sems dpa'i sbrul sku lha'i bu sems lhag can rgyal ba'i sras su btsas so// de'i tshe dge slong ma nyid shin tu ngo tsha nas
154b3(1): mi rigs pa chen por mthong ste// pha med bu 'di 'jig rten 'dre bas gzhan na su// 'jig rten bdud dam tshangs pa la sogs sam// rgyal po btsan nam dmu la sogs pa'i rigs/ khams gsum dag na 'dod/
154b4(1): ldan su zhig yin// gal te lha dang lha min sna tshogs gzugs// 'di ltar byung ba'i dpe ni sus mthong med// rgyal khams chos med 'di ni su la srid/ kye ma/ bdag ni khrims gtsang 'gro las rgyal 'dod
154b5(1): pas// 'di ni log sred 'gro bas dpyas 'gyur sdig re che// zhes pa la sogs smre sngags mang du bton nas g.yog mo des 'di ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi sras yin pas de ltar mi rigs so zhes smras kyang ma nyan
154b6(1): par thal dong du bsgyur/ de'i tshe sgra dang 'od la sogs pa'ang byung bar gyur to// gang gi tshe zhag gsum song ba na ci yang ma nyes par 'dug pa mthong nas sprul pa yin pas shes te bkur sti chen po dang bcas
155a1(1): pas spyan drangs pa na bar snang nas lha rnams kyis/ mgon po ston pa bcom ldan 'das// rang bzhin snang mdzad 'jig rten mgon// bdag kyang rab tu skyabs pa dang // nam mkha'i rdo rje deng
155a2(1): bdag gsol// zhes ched du rjod par byed cing mkha' 'gro dang / mkha' 'gro ma dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin la sogs pa'i 'jig rten skyong ba rnams kyis kyang mchod pa'i yo byad du mas rjed par byed
155a3(1): do/ zhag bdun song ba na sras kyis yum la/ kye ma bdag gis pan+di ta rnams la chos kyi gtam slob par 'tshal na yum bdag la ci bder gnang ba stsol cig/ zhes gsungs pa na yum gyis bu khyod ni shin tu
155a4(1): gzhon gyi pan+di ta rnams mkhas shing gzhung pas khyod kyis thub par dka'o// ces kyang bgyi bar gsol ba na/ sngar smos pa'i rgyal po'i mchod gnas su mkhas pa lnga brgya yod pa de dang chos kyi gtam gyis
155a5(1): shig/ de nas sras kyi yul de nyid du byon nas rgyal po dang mjal nas lo rgyus snga ma bzhin bsnyad do// rgyal pos kyang khye'u 'di na gzhon pas pan+di ta rnams dang chos kyi gtam 'ong bar dka' mod kyi/ 'on kyang
155a6(1): lus la skyes bu chen po'i mtshan mang po 'dug pas sprul pa yin kyang srid snyam nas mchod gnas rnams la tshul de bzhin bsnyad pas de rnams gsung ma mthun pa las mkhyen pa che ba gcig gis/ ltas shin tu
155b1(1): bzang ba zhig kyang byung / byis pa de yar thong dang sprul pa yin te 'ong gsungs nas mjal ba na pan+di ta rnams la phyag mdzad cing 'gro gleng dang brgal brtag gi rim pa mang du mdzad pas pan+di ta rnams kyi spobs
155b2(1): pa bcom pas zhabs spyi bor blangs shing bkur sti rgya chen pos mchod nas pra dz+nyA b+ha ba zhes mtshan gsol/ rgyal po'ang shin tu ngo mtshar zhing dga' bas slob dpon chen po dga' rab rdo rje zhes bya bar mtshan
155b3(1): btags/ sngar yum gyis thal dong du bskur yang ma nyes pa la ngo mtshar bas ro langs bde ba'am ro langs thal mdog tu gsol/ de nas byang phyogs ri bo nyi ma rab tu snang byed ces bya ba brag ri shin tu
155b4(1): 'jigs pa yi dwags kyi tshogs mngon sum du rgyu ba zhig gi steng du rtswa'i spyil bur lo sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi bar du ting nge 'dzin la bzhugs pa'i tshe/ sa lan bdun du g.yos shing nam mkha' las mu stegs kyis
155b5(1): bstan pa nyams par byas so zhes pa'i sgra grag pa thos pas mu stegs kyi rgyal pos gshed ma btang nas slob dpon bkrong bar brtsams na nam mkha'i lam nas gshegs pa mthong bas rgyal po 'khor bcas
155b6(1): mchog tu dad nas sangs rgyas pa'i bstan pa la zhugs so// de nas theg pa phyi nang gi sde snod rnams dang / khyad par rang bzhin rdzogs pa chen po shwa lo ka 'bum phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi thugs la bzhugs pa de
156a1(1): rnams rdo rje sems dpas mngon sum du zhal bstan nas rig pa spyi blugs kyi dbang gis mi slob pa'i ye shes mngon du mdzad pa'i tshul bstan/ tshig gi rgyud rnams yi ger 'god pa'i lung byin te ri
156a2(1): ma la ya'i rin chen spungs pa rgyas pa'i rtse mor slob dpon nyid dang / rdo rje dbyings kyi mkha' 'gro ma 'jig rten bde ba'i ro dang ldan pa dang / bde byed ser mo yon tan mtha' yas pa'i mkha' 'gro ma gsum
156a3(1): gyis lo gsum gyi bar du tshig dang yi ge dkar chag du btab// rang byung rang bab kyi yi ge sprul pa'i sku dang bcas pa phyin ci ma log par legs par bkod nas mkha' 'gro ma mngon par 'byung ba'i phug tu
156a4(1): bzhugs su gsol/ dus gzhan zhig tu rdo rje gdan gyi byang shar mtshams dur khrod chen po bsil ba'i tshal zhes bya ba dbus su mchod rten chen po yod cing gdug pa'i mkha' 'gro ma dang sems can rab tu
156a5(1): gdug pa du ma'i gnas su gyur pa zhig tu byon nas mkha' 'gro ma nyi ma'i 'od zer la sogs dpag tu med pa la chos ston cing bzhugs pa na slob dpon 'jam dpal bshes gnyen la 'phags pa 'jam dpal
156a6(1): rnon pos lung bstan te/ kye rigs kyi bu/ 'bras bu tshe gcig la sangs rgyas par 'dod na dur khrod chen po bsil ba'i tshal du song zhig/ ces gsungs pas/ 'jam dpal bshes gnyen gyis dur khrod bsil
156b1(1): ba'i tshal du byon nas slob dpon dga' rab rdo rje mjal zhing lo bdun cu rtsa lnga'i bar du chos nyan cing / gdams pa dang rjes su gdams pa mtha' dag pa bstsal nas chu bo dan tig bya bar slob dpon chen po
156b2(1): zag pa med pa'i dbyings su mya ngan las 'da' bar mdzad do// de'i tshe 'jam dpal bshes gnyis gyis/ kye ma kye hud kye ma blong // zhes pa la sogs gdung tshig lan gsum bton pas nam mkhar 'od phung gi
156b3(1): dkyil nas slob dpon gyis sku mngon sum du snang bar mdzad nas gser gyi za ma tog sen gang ba gcig phyag tu babs pas tshig gsum gnad du brdeg pa'i 'das rjes kyi gdams pa bzhag go/ de nas slob
156b4(1): dpon chen po 'jam dpal bshes gnyen gyis 'bum phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi'i grangs las rdzogs pa chen po sde gsum du phyes te/ sems gnas rnams la sems kyi sde// bya bral rnams la klong gi sde// gnad gtso
156b5(1): ba la man ngag sde gsum dang / de las kyang khyad par du bsdus pa thig le rang gnad du dbab pa 'di las snyan brgyud dang bshad rgyud gnyis su phyes nas snyan brgyud rnams mtshan du btang / bshad rgyud
156b6(1): snying thig gi bka' rnams re zhig gtad pa'i snod ma rnyed nas rdo rje gdan gyi byang shar pha wang rdo rje rgya gram gyis rgyas btab pa'i 'og tu sbas te mi snang bar byas/ slob dpon nyid rdo rje gdan gyi nub phyogs dur
157a1(1): khrod chen po so sa gling du gshegs shing der mi sdug pa'i mkha' 'gro ma rnams dang sems can dpag tu med pa dang spyod pa la gnas pa'i sgrub pa po yang mang du rgyu ba rnams la chos ston cing lo brgya
157a2(1): rtsa dgu'i bar ting nge 'dzin la bzhugs so// slob dpon 'di'i slob ma ni dkyil 'khor chen po'i rdo rje slob dpon sangs rgyas ye shes zhabs yin cing thog mar slob dpon dza lan+ta ri ba dang / oM rgyan gyi slob
157a3(1): dpon sgeg pa rdo rje dang / rnal 'byor ma gu ne ru sogs bla ma mang po bsten nas gsang sngags kyi tshul rnams mang du gsan/ yo byad rnams rmugs 'dzin dang nor rgyun mas sbyor/ lan cig kong ka na'i slob
157a4(1): dpon pA li ta pA da lo dgu'i bar brten cing 'dus pa'i rgyud tshar bco brgyad mnyan kyang de kho na nyid ma rtogs par bla ma la zhus pas de ni kho bos kyang ma rtogs so gsungs/ de nas rdo rje gdan gyi rgyab ku ba'i
157a5(1): tshal zhes bya bar bsnyen sgrub yan lag bzhi spog cho ga dang bcas pas zla ba bcu gnyis/ drag shul spyod pa zla ba drug ste bco brgyad du bsgrubs pas de kho na nyid rtogs par 'dod na 'phags pa 'jam dpal la
157a6(1): dris shig ces lung bstan byung bas 'o na 'jam dpal ri bo rtse lngar bzhugs pas der 'gro dgos dgongs te de phyogs su song song ba na nyi ma phyed tsam na khang pa dkar tsag tsag zhig gi 'gram na 'jam dpal
157b1(1): bshes gnyen khyim btsun rgan po chos gos kyi thong byas pa bud med ngan ngon gcig dang lhan cig zhing rmo bar gzigs pas cung zad ma dad/ de'i 'gram zhig tu khyi mo dkar po ngan ma zhig kyang nyal nas
157b2(1): 'dug/ der zas kyi dus la bab pas bsod snyoms slong ba zhig la/ yur ba nas nya zhig bzung ste khyi mo la byin/ des sprugs pa slob dpon la drangs pa rnam par rtog pas ma blangs pas/ khyim btsun na re//
157b3(1): 'dzam bu gling ba rnam rtog che/ zas bzang po drongs gsungs te gzhan zhig tu song ngo // der bud med des 'bras chan dang zho drangs pa gsol nas 'gro bar brtsams pas/ de ring nyi ma phyis pas grong du ni mi
157b4(1): sleb/ sang nyin song zer ba bzhin bzhugs te gsang 'dus kyi rgyud bklags pas slob dpon rang nyid the tshom za ba'i gnas gar yod kyi thad der bud med des kyang mi dga' ba'i rnam 'gyur re byas pas//
157b5(1): 'dis gzhan sems shes par 'dug dgongs te the tshom bsal bar zhus pas ngas mi shes/ da ci'i khyim btsun de 'dus pa la shin tu mkhas/ phyi ma red na sleb 'ong bas de la the tshom chod zer ba ltar phyi ma red
157b6(1): na khyim btsun chang gis bzi nas gom pa 'khyor bzhin du byung bas der sngags kyi spyod pa can du shes te zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas the tsom gcod par zhus pas dbang bskur dgos gsungs/ gzhan nas thob zhu
158a1(1): pas/ nga'i chos ston pa la nga rang gis dbang bskur dgos gsungs nas khang pa zhig tu song / srod kyi dus su slob dpon nang du bos pa la/ 'jam pa'i rdo rje lha bcu dgu'i dkyil 'khor sprul pa'i
158a2(1): drung na khyim btsun bud med khyi mo dang bcas pa snang ste dbang su la len gsungs pas/ dkyil 'khor la 'tshal lo zhus pas 'o na longs shig gsungs te gsum ka khang pa gzhan zhig tu song dkyil 'khor yang
158a3(1): mi snang bar gyur/ der slob dpon thugs skyo ste/ khyod ni sems can kun gyi yab gcig la sogs gdung ba'i lus kyis gsol ba btab pas slar yang sngar bzhin dkyil 'khor sprul te dbang bskur/ rdzogs pa
158a4(1): chen po sems sde'i man ngag bshad pas rtogs pa nam mkha' dang mnyam par gyur/ 'jam dpal zhal lung zhes rim pa gnyis kyi de kho na nyid bsgom pa 'di nyid slob dpon gis sdud pa po'i tshul mdzad pa yin//
158a5(1): des chos thams cad kyi gting sleb/ thog mar khyis skyugs pa'i zas dang khyim btsun gyi spyod pa sogs la ma dad pa'i rten 'brel gyis sku lus de nyid kyis mchog gi dngos grub ma thob kyang bar dor rdo rje 'chang
158a6(1): gi go 'phang mngon du mdzad pa yin zhes grags/ slar bsrung ba'i zhabs kyis kyang slob dpon 'di las gdams pa zhus pas grub pa thob bo// bstan bcos kyang grol ba'i thig le dang / sgrub thabs kun bzang
158b1(1): sogs shin tu mang bar mdzad/ slob dpon 'di'i rdzogs rim gyi man ngag sngon chad bod du 'gyur ba rnams sems sde kho na'i grub mtha' gtsang sing nge bar gnas shing rgyu mtshan des rjes 'brangs slob ma'i
158b2(1): tshogs dang bcas pa'ang rdzogs pa chen po'i don gyi brgyud par 'gro la/ 'ga' zhig gis slob dpon shrI sing+ga yang 'di nyid kyi mtshan gyi rnam grangs su 'dod pa thos shing lo rgyas kyi bab 'gar brtag na de ltar
158b3(1): yin du rung snyam pa'ang 'dug go/ dus de tsam na rgya nag po'i yul grong khyer sho khyam zhes bya bar khyim bdag dge ba'i yid can dang bud med snang ba gsal ba rab tu mkhyen ma zhes pa gnyis kyi sras slob dpon
158b4(1): si~Msi ha zhes bya ba sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa zhig lo bco lnga lon pa'i tshe slob dpon ha ri b+ha la las sgra tshad sogs thun mong gi rig pa rnams lo gsum du mnyan nas mkhas pa chen por gyur pa'i skabs
158b5(1): shig nub phyogs kyi grong khyer gser gling bya bar 'gro ba'i lam bar du 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs nam mkhar byon nas skal ldan 'bras bu nges par 'dod na rgya gar gyi dur khrod so sa du song zhig/ ces
158b6(1): lung bstan pas slob dpon nyid yid tshim par gyur te da dung 'bras bu bla na med pa de nyid go sla ba'i phyir gsang sngags kyi rgyud gzhan la'ang mkhas par bya snyam du dgongs te ri bo rtse lngar gdol pa'i rigs kyi
159a1(1): slob dpon b+he la kirtir sngags phyi nang gi chos rnams ma lus par gsan cing nyams 'og tu chud par mdzad/ rab tu byung nas dge slong sde snod 'dzin pa mdzad cing lo sum cu'i bar du 'dul
159a2(1): khrims kyi brtul zhugs su gnas/ slar yang 'phags pa'i lung gis sngon bzhin bskul bas rgya gar du bgrod pa'i lam la dka' ba med pa'i rdzu 'phrul zhig bsgrub par bya dgongs te lo gsum du sgrub pa mdzad
159a3(1): pas rig pa 'dzin pa'i skur gyur/ de nas zhabs sa la khru gang tsam gyis ma reg par dur khrod so sa gling du byon nas slob dpon chen po 'jam dpal bshes gnyen mjal zhing bla ma'i bya ba rnams byas/ rjes su
159a4(1): gzung bar gsol ba btab pas bla mas kyang dgyes bzhin du gnang / lo nyer lnga'i bar la gdams pa dang rjes su gdams pa rnams bstsal ba'i 'og tu slob dpon chen po nyid sku 'od phung du yal/ de'i tshe'i shri
159a5(1): saMsi has smre sngags kyi gdung dbyangs bton pas nam mkha' nas slob dpon gyis sku dngos su bstan te rin po che'i za ma tog sen gang ba gcig phyag tu gtad par sgom nyams drug pa zhes bya ba'i 'das rjes bab
159a6(1): pas slob dpon nyid don gyi gdeng dang ldan par gyur to// de'i 'og tu rgya gar nub phyogs gser gyis brgyan pa'i gling du slob dpon mjal dpal bshes gnyen brdzus te skyes pa la 'jam dpal bshes gnyen
159b1(1): phyi mar grags shing / des slob dpon pad+ma 'byung gnas la sngags phyi nang thams cad gsungs shing slob dpon Ar+ya de ba la'ang rdzogs pa chen po bstan pas zag bcas mi snang bar gyur skad/ de nas slob dpon
159b2(1): shrI siM has rdo rje gdan gyi 'og nas sngar sbas pa'i rgyud rnams bton te rgya nag tu byon cing rdzogs pa chen po man ngag gi sde la/ phyi skor/ nang skor/ gsang skor/ gsang ba bla na med pa bzhir phyes nas skor snga ma
159b3(1): gsum spros bcas kyi don du bsdebs nas byang chub shing gi lha khang bya 'dabs su gter du sbas/ gsang ba bla na med pa'i skor mkha' 'gro'i lung bstan pa ltar bkra shis khri sgo'i ka bar smon lam gyis rgyas
159b4(1): btab ste sbas// slob dpon nyi bsil byin zhes pa'i dur khrod chen por gdug pa'i mi ma yin rnams kyi bkur sti dang bcas pas ting nge 'dzin la bzhugs so// de'i tshe 'phags yul nub phyogs glang po'i skang
159b5(1): zhes bya bar yab khyim bdag bde ldan 'khor lo dang yum bdag nyid gsal rigs ma'i sras bi ma la mi tra zhes pa dang / shar phyogs ka ma shrI la'i shar gyi grong khyer du yab gdol pa zhi ba'i lag pa dang / yum
159b6(1): dge ba'i sems can ma gnyis kyi sras ye shes mdo zhes bya ba gnyis shig bzhugs pa la dpal rdo rje sems dpa' mngon sum du byon nas/ kye rigs kyi bu gnyis/ khyed gnyis skye ba lnga brgyar pan+di ta'i lus
160a1(1): blangs shing dam pa'i chos spyad kyang 'bras bu sngar yang ma thob/ de yang mi 'thob pas tshe 'di nyid kyis zag bcas kyi phung po mi snang bar 'tshang rgya bar 'dod na rgya nag po'i byang chub shing drung gi lha
160a2(1): khang du song zhig/ ces lung bstan pas bi ma la mi tras de nyid du lhung bzed blangs te byon pas slob dpon shrI sing+ga mjal zhing lo nyi shu'i bar la snyan brgyud phyi nang gsang gsum gyi gdams pa ma lus par
160a3(1): bskul mod kyi/ 'on kyang de dag gi dpe ni ma gnang ngo // der bi ma la thugs tshims te slar rgya gar du byon nas dz+nyA na su tra la ji ltar gyur pa rnams bsnyad pas khong nyid kyang 'bad rtsol chen pos rgya nag tu byon
160a4(1): nas mkha' 'gros lung bstan pa bzhin dur khrod chen po bsil byin du slob dpon dang mjal/ lo gsum gyi bar bla ma'i bya ba ci rigs pas mnyes par mdzad cing mthar gser gyi man+dal phul nas gdams pa
160a5(1): gnang ba zhus pas lo dgu'i bar du snyan brgyad kyi gdams pa dpe dang bcas pa gnang / de tsam gyis thugs tshims te 'byon par brtsams pa na slob dpon gyis rab tu tshim mam gsungs pas tshim mo zhus pa na//
160a6(1): bla mas gtad pa med do// gsungs pas dz+nyA na su tra rtog pa skyes te da dung rab tu zab pa'i gdams pa gnang bar zhus pas 'di la dbang bskur thob dgos gsung nas phyi spros bcas kyi dbang rdzogs par gnang
160b1(1): nas gsang ba bla na med pa'i man ngag rnams kyang lo gsum gyi bar du gnang / de nas nyams su blang bar zhus pas spros med kyi dbang rdzogs par gnang zhing ri bo ko sa la'i rtse mor 'khor 'das ru shan dbye
160b2(1): ba'i spyod pa mdzad cing rab tu spros med kyi dbang dang / rim pas shin tu spros med kyi dbang yang rdzogs par gnang / de nas lo bcu drug tu nyams su blangs nas bsgoms/ slob dpon ni khyad par gyi spyod pa sna
160b3(1): tshogs pas gnas shing dus gzhan zhig tu li yul gyi rgyal pos spyan drangs nas der bzhud pa'i zhag bdun na sgra dang ltas chen po byung bas ye shes mdos steng gi nam mkha' la slob dpon bzhugs pa mthong bas
160b4(1): sku mya ngan las 'das par shes te smre sngags kyi gdung tshig bton pas/ gzer bu bdun pa'i zhal chems phyag tu bab pa dang / snying thig gsang ba'i man ngag gi dpe rnams bkra shis khro sgo'i ka ba'i nang na yod
160b5(1): pas de longs la dur khrod b+ha sing du song zhig/ ces lung bstan pa'ang thos/ der dz+nyA na sA tras gsang ba'i dpe rnams bton nas rgya gar gyi dur khrod b+ha sing du byon cing der 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las
160b6(1): 'das pa'i mkha' 'gro dang mkha' 'gro ma rnams la gsang ba snying thig gi chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bzhin du bzhugs pa la de'i tshe bi ma la spyod pa la gnas par mkha' 'gro'i lung gis/ kye skal ldan/ sngar bas
161a1(1): zab pa'i snying thig gi gdams pa bzhed na dur khrod chen po b+ha sing gi nags su song zhig/ ces lung bstan pa bzhin du de nyid du byon pas dz+nyA na sU tra dang mjal zhing ches zab pa'i gdams pas
161a2(1): rjes su gzung bar gsol ba btab pas/ slob dpon gyi cho 'phrul sna tshogs pa snang bar mdzad cing spros bcas dang spros med kyi dbang rnams bskur/ ri bo snang byed kyi rtse mor 'khor 'das shan 'byed pa'i spyod
161a3(1): pa dang / shin tu spros med kyi dbang rdzogs par mdzad pas thun mong ma yin pa'i rtogs pa 'khrungs// shangs kyi rtse mo yi ge a dkar po zag la khad pa gcig kyang byung / de nas rab tu spros med kyi dbang rdzogs
161a4(1): par gnang bas sems kyi de nyid rjen par mthong / dbang de dag gi rim pa bzhin rdzogs pa chen po skor bzhi'i gdams pa dpe dang bcas pa ma lus par gnang / lo bcu'i bar la zhun thar bcad cing de'i
161a5(1): 'og tu dz+nyA na sU tra nyid 'od phung du yal bar bi ma las smre sngags dang gdungs dbyangs bton pas slar yang sku mngon sum du snang bar mdzad nas rin po che'i za ma tog rin chen sna lngas rgyas btab pa gcig
161a6(1): bstsal ba phyag tu bab pa las bzhag zab bzhi pa zhes pa'i 'das rjes thob pas tshig la lhag chad med cing don la 'khrul pa med pa'i gdeng thob par gyur to// de nas slob dpon bi ma la shar phyogs ka ma ru'i
161b1(1): grong khyer du rgyal po seng ge bzang po'i bla mchod du lo nyi shur bzhugs shing / de nas nub phyogs su grong khyer b+hiR+Ya zhes par rgyal po d+harma pA la'i mchod gnas kyang mdzad/ de'i 'og tu rab tu snang byed ces pa'i
161b2(1): dur khrod chen por phyogs las rnam par rgyal ba'i brtul zhugs kyi spyod pa spyad cing gdug pa'i tshogs la chos ston cing bzhugs/ gsang ba mchog gi dpe rnams tshar gsum du bris nas/ tshar gcig o rgyan gyi
161b3(1): yul rgya mtsho gser gyi bye ma bdal ba'i gling du sbas/ tshar gcig kha che'i yul gser gling zhes pa'i brag skyibs su sbas/ tshar gcig dur khrod der mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyi mchod pa'i rten du bzhugs so// slob
161b4(1): dpon nyid kyis mthar 'pho ba chen po'i sku grub pas 'phags yul du ci rigs par bzhugs shing bod du byon pa ni 'og tu 'chad par 'gyur ro// // spyir 'phags pa'i yul gyi gsang sngags spyod pa rnams
161b5(1): gsang ba bsrung ba la blo shin tu brtan pas dngos grub ma thob gyi bar gsang sngags spyod pa gzhan gyis mi shes shing gang gi tshe cho 'phrul chen po dang bcas mi snang bar gyur pa'am nus pa khyad par can bstan pa
161b6(1): na/ a la la ho// de ni sngags kyi skrod pa can no// zhes slad kyis shes par 'gyur ba 'ba' zhig yin la/ rgyu des sngags nyams su blangs pa thams cad la tha na dngos grub sna te ma thob pa med cing / de'ang
162a1(1): bya spyod kyi rgyud rnams sngon du dar che ba tsam yin kyang mngon mtshan du spyod pa ni med/ phyis su bla med rnams dar ba nas de dag rim gyis nub pa ltar gyur cing / bla med kyi rgyud rnams sngar nas
162a2(1): gtan med pa ma yin kyang skal ba dang ldan pa re gnyis tsam gyis cung zad re nyams su blangs pas de thams cad kyang mod la mi snang bar gyur pa sha stag byung bas/ brgyud nas rim par 'dom pa dang rjes su
162a3(1): gdams pa bzhag pa ni med do// de nas rgyal po dza'am in+d+ra b+hU ti bar pa'i skabs tsam du grub pa'i slob dpon ches che ba rnams kyis o rgyan gyi gnas d+ha ma s+thi ra sogs gnas rnams nas ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro
162a4(1): ma rnams dang bka' bgros te/ rgyud la la tshad ma dang / la la'i don bsdus pa dang / 'ga' zhig las rtog pa khol bton tsam re spyan drangs shing snod ldan re re tsam la gsang nas bshad pas bla med kyi lam
162a5(1): rnams ches cher dar ba ltar gyur nas grub pa'i skyes bu phyogs thams cad nas mang po zhig dus skabs de byung yang / thun mong du spyod pa ni ga la yin/ sngags kyi glegs bam dang bstan bcos rnams kyang thun
162a6(1): mong gi gzhung ltar yongs khyab tu yod pa ma yin te/ dper na klu sgrub gyi sngags gzhung rnams slob dpon nyid slob ma'i tshogs dang bcas pa 'das nas yun ring por lon pa'i dus phyis shig kong+ka na'i bsrung ba'i
162b1(1): zhabs kyi sgron gsal gyi glegs bam rnyed/ ma taM gi pas 'phags pa lha'i ye shes kyi sku mjal ba sogs las 'phags skor gyi 'dus pa dar ba'i mgo brtsams pa bzhin no// de bzhin du shin tu gsang ba rdzogs
162b2(1): pa chen po'i skor rnams sprul pa'i sku dga' rab rdo rjes bstan nas bzung skal pa mchog dang ldan pa'i slob dpon de dag la zhal nas snyan du tshig brgyad ma gtogs glegs bam bstan pa'ang med de slob dpon
162b3(1): re re'i mtshams su dpe rnams mi snang bar sbas pa'i phyir ro// shin tu zab pa'i man ngag rnams ni 'das rjes zhal chems kyi tshul du bzhag pa kho na yin te thun mong du phyogs tsam yang ma grags pas sngon gyi rgyud
162b4(1): sde sangs rgyas thod pa dang / 'phags skor rnams dang / rdzogs pa chen po la sogs pa rnams brgyud thag nyi mor 'byung ba'i rgyu mtshan yang de yin la/ gsang sngags kyi rgyud sde mtha' dag pa ni rdo rje 'chang nyid
162b5(1): kyi spyod yul las gzhan du ma gyur zhing / de las cha shas tsam zhig mi dang mi ma yin pa'i gnas rnams su byung la/ de las mi yi yul du byung ba ni nyung ngu tsam zhig yin par mngon te de dag kyang phal mo che u rgyan
162b6(1): nas 'phags yul du phebs pa mang zhing / deng sang ni yul de'i mthil d+hA ma s+thi ra ste du ba'i gnas zhes bya bar grong khyer chung ngu zhig yod cing / rgyal po in+d+ra b+hU ti'i pho brang sogs ni shul tsam las med/ yul de
163a1(1): kla klos dbang byed pa las phyi nang gi grub mtha' 'dzin pa ni su yang med/ bud med rnams ni sngon gyi mkha' 'gro ma'i rigs su yod pas lta stangs dang / ci rigs par rig sngags grub pas lus
163a2(1): gzhan du sbyar ba dang / las phran tshegs la dbang byed pa zhing gi mkha' 'gro ma 'ba' zhig yin/ gnas der d+harma gany+dzi sngags kyi rgyud sde bzhugs pa'i pho brang de yang mngon sum gyi spyod yul du med pas ltar snang
163a3(1): du phal pa'i grong du gyur pa yin nam snyam zhing / da dung sngags kyi rgyud sde 'phags yul du ma byung ba yang ci rigs pa yod par grub la/ de yang thun mong gi spyod yul du ma gyur bar mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyis mi
163a4(1): mngon pa'i dbyings su bzung nas gnas so// der ma zad rgya gar na gtan ma grags pa'i rgyud mang po 'gro lding gi gling sogs na yod par mngon sum gyis grub pa la mtshon na mi'i yul gzhan dang gzhan sngags
163a5(1): kyi gdul bya gyur pa rnams su'ang de ltar 'byung ba nges pa'i phyir mtha' gcig tu tshad gzung bar rlom pa ni byis pa nyer spyod kyi blo gros kyi na ba ste/ mdor na bsam bya ma yin par shes par bya dgos pa nyid de/
163a6(1): bde mchog sdom pa 'byung ba'i rgyud las/ rnal 'byor rgyud rnams kyi ni tshad// bye ba phrag ni drug nges te// de bzhin rnal 'byor ma rgyud grags// bye ba phrag ni bcu drug grangs// theg chen las gzhan mdo sde
163b1(1): rnams// dung phyur phrag brgyad gsungs pa yin// de bzhin pha rol phyin pa'i tshul// sa ya dang ni dung phyur lnga// 'di dag thams cad thub dbang po// sku gsum bdag nyid can gyis gsungs// zhes pa lta bus
163b2(1): mtshon pas so// phyis yul dbus su bstan pa dngos gzhi nub pa ltar gyur kyang shar phyogs su mtha' 'khob kyi yul dang yul phran mang po'i spyi'i ming ko ki'i yul du grags pa dang / lho phyogs su DA mi Do dI pa
163b3(1): dang / d+ha na shrI'i gling dang / tsan+d+ra dri ba la sogs dang / byang gi phyogs su gu dzi rA tha sogs ci rigs par theg pa che chung dang gsang sngags kyi bstan pa sngon nas dar ba ma nyams pa dang / gsar du byung ba sogs
163b4(1): da lta'ang bstan pa rnal ma bzhugs pa las gsang sngags pa rnams ni slob dpon chen po pad+ma 'byung gnas zhabs kyi bka' srol 'dzin pa shas che zhing / phal cher zhig ni grub thob chen po go rak+Sha'i rjes 'bras dzo
163b5(1): ki sde tshan bcu gnyis ci rigs pa dang / khyad par na tha pan+da'i nang tshan na De shwa ra'i sde las rdo rje slob dpon chen po shAn+ta gup+ta thugs sras dang bcas pa'i rjes 'brang gi dzo ki kho na shin tu mang ngo // dus phyis
163b6(1): 'phags yul lho phyogs kyi 'bigs byed ri bo'i khongs su b+haM da kyi yul du rgyal srid byed cing rig sngags grub pa'i rgyal po ma la b+ha dra zhes bya ba lho phyogs kyi rgyud phal cher la lung bsgyur ba zhig byung / des zhi ba
164a1(1): sbas pa slob ma'i tshogs dang bcas pa bla mar khur zhing bde bar bshegs pa'i bstan pa rin po che gsar du spel bar byed la/ ma 'ongs pa na lho phyogs kyi rgyud ri b+hin+da'i nang du dam pa'i chos
164a2(1): gsar du dar bar byed par rgyal bas lung bstan pa nyid yin no// zhes 'phags yul ba rnams sgrog par byed la/ rgyun de dag las deng sang gi bar du'ang bstan pa rin po che dar bar yod ces thos
164a3(1): so// // de las ri kha ba can gyi khongs su bstan pa de nyid ji ltar byon cing bskyangs pa'i tshul ni/ ljongs 'dir rgyal ba'i bstan pa dar ba'i rgyud ni slob dpon chen po pad+ma'i zhabs kyis bka' drin kho na
164a4(1): las te/ thog mar chos byar ma btub pa la sgo du ma nas dam pa'i chos byar btub pa'i snod du byin gyis brlabs shing / gdod gtsug lag khang bzhengs/ de nas mdo dang sngags kyi grwa btsugs nas bstan pa
164a5(1): dngos gzhi dar bar mdzad pa'i phyir ro// de yang 'jam dpal rtsa rgyud du/ khyu mchog khyu mchog bzang po dang // sa 'od de bzhin sa 'od bzang // de bzhin pha rol gnon nyid dang // rkang pa'i bgros shes bstan

164b1(1): shAn+ta rak+Shi ta spyan drangs te pho brang klung tshugs zhes bya bar bzhugs su gsol nas zla ba mang por rgyu'i theg pa'i chos mang du bshad pas bod kyi 'byung po rnams khros nas/ pho brang 'phang thang chus khyer/ dmar po ri
164b2(1): la thog brgya pa/ yul khams su mi ngas chen po btang / sad dang ser ba cher byung bas bod rnams chos byas pas lan zer/ chos byar ma btub pas/ A tsar+ya'i zhal nas bod kyi 'dre srin gdug pa can rnams 'dul
164b3(1): ba la da lta sa'i steng tsam na mthu che ba sngags kyi mkhan po pad+ma si b+ha ba zhes bya ba spyan 'dren dgos gsungs te khong nyid re zhig bal por bzhud do// ji zhig nas rgyal pos sba gsal snang slob dpon gnyis spyan
164b4(1): 'dren par brdzangs pa/ slob dpon chen pos mkhyen nas nyid dang A tsar+ya bo d+hi sa twa dang / bal po'i rdo bzo mkhas pa gcig bcas 'byon grabs yod pa dang 'dzom/ de nas bo d+hi sa twa sngon la phebs/ slob dpon

164b6(1): bzhag/ de nas bzung lam gyi mi ma yin thams cad 'dul zhing byon/ 'o yug gi zad kyi chu tshad la nyi tshe ba'i dmyal ba yod par snying rje bya'o gsungs te dgongs pa gtad pas chu khol pa 'jam nyil

166a1(1): sman dang lha bu sman gnyis ting nge 'dzin gyis bkug ste thig sna ba byas/ dus gzhan zhig tu slob dpon gyis/ btsan po khyod kyi yul 'di bzang por bya/ ngam shod kyi bye ma tshal dang ne seng du bya/ gra

166b6(1): rung mod/ dus yun thung ngu tsam la'ang yul thams cad du byon pa dang / de dag tu dngos su chos ston pa dang / gter kha mang po sbas pa dang / yul so sor byon pa dang / sgrub gnas so sor bzhugs pa dang gshegs
167a1(1): pa sogs mdzad pa mtha' yas par de lta bu ston pa'i long med snyam pa dang / dus thung ngu las ma bzhugs par 'dod pa dang / yun ring po bzhugs pa sogs 'gal lo snyam du mi sems te zung 'jug

167a4(1): bod kyi mi la rab byung btub bam mi btum nyams sad pa'i phyir rba khri gzigs rab tu byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs/ mtshan dpal dbyangs sam rba rat+nar yang grags/ de nas rim bzhin rba gsal snang / bai ro tsa na/

167a6(1): dgongs te blo gsal ba sum brgya tsam rab tu byung / ska cog sogs kyis 'dul ba lung sde bzhi bskur te gzhi thams cad yod par smra ba'i lugs kyi bshad pa dang / lag len btsugs shing bstan pa'i gzhi bzhengs//

167b2(1): bkal nas khams su bros phebs pa rma lung an chung gnam rdzong ngam/ dan tig shel gyi yang dgon du bsgoms shing bzhugs pa las/ phyis bla ma rmug gsal 'bar gyis rab tu byung bar zhus pas smar gyis mkhan
167b3(1): po dang g.yos slob dpon mdzad de rab tu byung / mtshan shAkya dge ba rab gsal du btags/ de las dbus gtsang gi mi bcus khams su 'ongs nas tshig gsum rim nod kyis bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i rgyun las deng

167b6(1): sde'i phyogs 'khor lo bar pa sher phyin kyi skor rnams rlung khams pa go chas 'bum thugs la bzung ba sogs rgya gar du gang bzhugs rnams bsgyur bshad nyan gsum gyis dar ba mdzad/ 'khor lo tha ma'i mdo ji
168a1(1): snyed pa rnams kyang ska cog dang bai ro sogs kyis bsgyur cing bshad nyan kyis gtan la phab cing / sde snod gsum po de dag gi dgongs 'grel bstan bcos kyi skor yang phal che ba de skabs bsgyur ba
168a2(1): yin te/ de la brten pa'i bshad sgrub gnyis ga'i srol deng sang gi bar du byung ba yin no/ gsang sngags la bya spyod rnal 'byor gyi rgyud rnams ci rigs par nyan bshad mdzad mod kyi/ 'on kyang mchog tu spel ba ni
168a3(1): rnal 'byor bla med kyi skor rnams so// de la yang bskyed rdzogs gsum la/ bskyed pa ma hA yo ga la rgyud sde dang sgrub sde gnyis kyi dang po tan+t+ra chen po bco brgyad de dag gi spyi 'am rtsa bar gyur pa rdo rje sems dpa' sku
168a4(1): 'phrul dra ba gsang ba snying po'i skor sgyu 'phrul sde brgyad rnams slob dpon bi ma las rma rin chen mchog la bshad cing bsgyur/ rmas gtsug tu rin chen gzhon nu dang kye re mchog skyong gnyis la bshad/ de gnyi gas
168a5(1): zhang rgyal ba'i yon tan dang dar rje dpal gyi grags pa gnyis la bshad/ de gnyis kyi snga mas dbus gtsang du lan mang po bshad cing khams su'ang byon te bshad pa mdzad/ zhang gi brgyud pa rnams la bka' ma
168a6(1): mchims phu ma'am man ngag brgyud par grags so// yang slob dpon pad+mas gnyags dz+nyA na ku mA ra la gsungs shing man ngag lta ba'i phreng bar grags pa'ang bstan/ gnyags kyis sog po dpal kyi ye shes la bshad
168b1(1): cing / de dang zhang gnyi gas gnubs sangs rgyas ye shes rin po che la bshad do// yab slob dpon sangs rgyas gsang bas gangs te ser dpas 'jam dpal dang / bran ka muk+ti sogs la sgyu 'phrul lam rnam bkod
168b2(1): sogs gsang snying gi skor rnams bshad/ de bzhin du dpal gsang ba 'dus pa slob dpon rdo rje bzhad pa'i lugs kyi bshad srol dang / bi shwa mi tra'i 'grel pa rnams la brten pa'i nyan bshad dang sgrub pa'i srol ka/
168b3(1): dang / sangs rgyas mnyam sbyor ku ku rA dza dang hUM ka ra'i bka' srol gyi gzhung 'grel rnams dang oM rgyan gyi rgyal po'i grub thob brgya byin sdong po'i mnyam sbyor 'grel chen sogs la brten pa'i 'chad nyan dang sgrub pa'i
168b4(1): srol dar bar mdzad cing he ru ka dang rta mchog gi dkyil 'khor la brten pa'i yi dam skal ldan gzhan rnams la bstsal pas btsan pos rta mgrin grub pas rta skad 'dzam gling khyab par thos pa sogs byung // gnyis
168b5(1): pa sgrub sde'i skor la/ spyir gshed skor rnams ni slob dpon shan+ti gar+b+has bod du dar bar mdzad/ bdud rtsi'i sgor slob dpon bi ma las gnyigs dz+nyA na ku mA ra sogs la bstan cing dar ba yin la/ gzhan rnams ni
168b6(1): phal cher slob dpon pad+ma kho nas dar zhing rgyas par mdzad do// bye brag tu btsan po khri srong lde'u btsan gyis gsol ba btab pas dpal kyi mchims phu'i bre dgu dge 'ur skal ba mchog dang ldan pa'i rje 'bangs
169a1(1): brgyad la sgrub sde chen po brgyad kyi phyi nang gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur ba'i rim pa rnams rdzogs par mdzad cing so so'i me tog phog pa'i lha'i sgrub thabs dang man ngag gnang ba nyams su
169a2(1): blangs pas lha so so'i zhal gzigs/ mnga' bdag btsan pos che mchog grub pas ting nge 'dzin khyad par can skyes shing sgom byung gi shes rab klong rdol bas bka' yang dag pa'i tshad ma'i bstan bcod mdzad/ nam
169a3(1): mkha'i snying pos yang dag grub cing nyi zer la bcibs/ sangs rgyas ye shes kyi 'jam dpal grub cing brag la phur ba thebs/ rgyal ba mchog dbyangs kyis dbang chen grub cing dbu gtsug nas rta mgo 'byin cing rta/
169a4(1): skad sgrogs/ mkhar chen bzas phur pa grub cing shi ba slong nus/ dpal gyi ye shes kyis ma mo grub pas ma tshogs las la khol/ dpal gyi seng ges mchod bstod grub pas sde brgyad mngag gzhug tu khol bai ro tsA na
169a5(1): drags sngags grub pas ye shes kyi spyan dang ldan cing rdzu 'phrul la mnga' brnyes par gyur/ gzhan yang slob dpon chen pos dbang dang gdams ngag dang rjes su gdams pa las mchog gi dngos grub brnyes pa
169a6(1): gnyags dz+nyA na ku mA ra/ cog ro klu'i rgyal mtshan/ ska ba dpal brtsegs/ 'bre dpal gyi blo gos/ sna nam rdo rje bdud 'joms/ 'bre rgyal ba'i blo gros/ rlung khams pa go cha/ gtsug ru rin chen gzhon nu/ rma rin
169b1(1): chen mchog/ gnyen dpal dbyangs/ lha lung dpal gyi rdo rje la sogs nam mkha' la bya bzhin 'gro ba dang / chu la byi'u zul gyis 'gro ba dang / ri brag la mi thogs par 'dzul ba dang / lus lha'i dkyil 'khor du skye
169b2(1): bo mang po la ston nus pa dang / lus de nyid kyis zung 'jug gi go 'phang brnyes pa sha stag byung zhing / 'tshe rgyal dang 'brog bza' la sogs bud med grub pa thob pa'ang mang du byung ngo // sgrub sde phyi ma gsum la 'jig
169b3(1): rten sde gsum zhes bod du slob dpon chen pos lha 'dre rnams dam la btags nas dkyil 'khor du bzhag pa kho na yin par 'dod kyang / ma mo rbod gtong la dbyings dang ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro shas che zhing bka'
169b4(1): nyan srid pa'i dman mo dang mkha' 'gro'i rigs su gtogs pa'ang du ma yod pa'i mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho'i dkyil 'khor yin cing / 'di la 'jig rten gyi dman mo lnga bcu la sogs srid pa'i ma mo rnams bkod pa ni//
169b5(1): phyi snod 'jig rten dang / nang rtsa thig rlung gsum/ gsang ba sems kyi 'byung 'jug dang rten 'brel las rgyud gsum dregs pa'i ma mo ltar snang ba'i rnam shes kyis bsdus pa rnams don du ma skyes kun tu bzang mo'i
169b6(1): dbyings mkha' klong rnam par dag pa'i dkyil 'khor las mi 'da' bar gdod nas gnas pa'i phyir rdo rje 'chang thabs la mkhas par de ltar bstan pa yin te/ mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho'i rgyud las// stong pa nyid ni
170a1(1): mkhas pa yi// ye shes rnam shes ngo bo'i phyir// dur khrod bcom ldan 'das rang nyid// sprul pa'i 'khor lo 'di la ni// zhes gsungs shing / de dang mthun par sku gsung thugs kyi 'khor lo rnams su
170a2(1): bkod pa'i ma mo'i nges pa yang / de nyid las/ dbang po gshin rje ma chu mo// gnod sbyin 'byung mo drang srong ma// srin mo rlung gi chung ma ste// zhes pa dang / ma dang chung ma srin mo dang // bu mo sring mo'i bu mo dang // pha
170a3(1): yi sring mo de dang ni// zhang po yi ni chung ma dang // chung ma'i spun zla ma dang ni// de nyid kyi ni pha yi ma// chung ma yi ni phyi mo dang // ma yi ma dang gnyen mo dang // ma yin spun zla'i bu mo dang / rang gi phyi mo'i spun zla
170a4(1): dang // spun zla'i bu mo de'i bu mo// pha yi ma dang phyi mo dang / khu bo yi ni chung ma dang // bu mo'i bu yi chung ma dang // slar yang chung ma'i spun zla dang // rang pha'i sring mo'i bu mo dang // de nyid kyi ni rang rig skyes// spun
170a5(1): zla'i chung ma bu mo dang // bu nyid kyi ni chung ma dang // bu mo'i khyo yi ma dang ni// bu nyid kyi ni stug mo dang // bu mo'i bu mor yang dag bshad// pho nya sum cu drug rnams so// zhes dang / yi dwags dmyal mos mnar med
170a6(1): la// thig nag mo dang me mdag mo// tsha ba mo dang rab tsha mo// ngu 'bod ma dang ngu 'bod che// mar nag tu 'tshir ri gnyis 'tshir// zhes pa la sogs thugs kyi 'khor lor bkod pas mtshon/ 'jig rten 'khor ba'i
170b1(1): tshul gyis dkyil 'khor du bzhag pa ni mnyam pa chen po'i don la spyod pa'i sngags kyi tha tshig ste/ dgyes rdor las/ 'di nyid 'khor ba zhes bya la// 'di nyid mya ngan 'das pa zhes// 'khor ba spangs pa'i pha rol
170b2(1): tu// mya ngan 'das pa yod ma yin// zhes gsungs pa'i don la bsam dgos shing / de bzhin du 'jig rten mchod bstod dang dmod pa drag sngags kyang sngon gyi tshe 'og min du dpal chen pos rA tra sogs gdul bya
170b3(1): gdug pa can rnams la sbyor sgrol gyi phrin las rmad du byung ba'i chos bstan cing 'jig rten khams kyi gdug pa can rnams dus gcig tu btul/ rang rang gi srog gi snying po dang / sngags rgyud kyi sbyor ba dang / las
170b4(1): kyi tshogs dang / cho ga'i rtog pa rnams blangs/ dkyil 'khor du bcug/ dbang bskur/ rigs dang mthun pa'i ming btags/ lung bstan phog/ zas kyi pha 'bab byin/ las kyi gnyer gtad nas 'gro ba tha dad pa
170b5(1): dang/ rigs dang / ske gnas dang / kha dog dang / dbyibs dang / spyod pa dang / bsam pa dang / brtul zhugs dang / tshul dang nges pa'i tshig brjod pa dang / tshig gi lam tha dad pa rnams tshul bzhin du mkhyen nas
170b6(1): de dang de'i yul la 'tshams pa'i sngags dang / phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor bstan nas thun mong gi las tshogs dang dngos grub rnams sgrub pa'i phyir 'di tsam du ma zad 'jig rten pa'i sngags rgyud du ma gsungs pa
171a1(1): yod cing / de dag rang ngos nas myang 'das kyi lam mtshan nyid pa ma yin kyang byang chub sems kyis zin pas de la bstan pas sgo du mas sems can rnams rjes su 'dzin pa la ma rmongs par grub pas
171a2(1): rnam mkhyen gyi rgyud grung por 'gyur ba la dgongs nas thams cad mkhyen pas bstan pa yin te gsang sngags thabs lam rmongs pa'ang 'di rigs su dgongs pa ma yin na gang la ngos 'dzin/ de ltar yang phyag na rdo
171a3(1): rje dbang bskur ba'i rgyud las kyang / lag na rdo rje ting nge 'dzin de las langs te nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang /
