171a4(1): mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa la sogs sems can thams cad kyi srog la dbab pa'i tshogs kyis bye ba bsreg pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas sngags kyi sgra smras
171a5(1): pa'i mod la thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de chu shing gi tshal rtsa ba bcad pa lta bu dang / rlung chen pos bskyod pa bzhin du khas bub tu 'khor lo chen po'i rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du bsgyel to// de'i tshe de dag
171a6(1): rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di thams cad dang / stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyang tshig ste thal bar gyur pa mthong ngo // de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis lag na rdo rje la legs so zhes bya ba
171b1(1): brjod de bka' stsal pa/ sngags kyi spyod pa rgya mtsho yi// snying po stobs chen ldan pa 'di// bstan pa 'di ni srung byed cing // theg pa chen po'i gnas 'di la// gdul dka' rtag tu 'dul ba ste// dpa' bo chen po khyod
171b2(1): kyis bshad// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas de dag byin gyis brlabs te lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu 'khor 'di la dam tshig la 'jug pa'i sgo cung zad stsol zhig dang / de bstan
171b3(1): pa 'di la srog gi re ba thob cing dad pa thob nas rang rang gi gsang sngags kyi snying po 'bul bar 'gyur ro// zhes smras pa dang / lag na rdo rjes 'jam dpal la smras pa/ ting nge 'dzin la dbang thob cing // nam
171b4(1): mkha' lta bur chags med la// kun tu sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// smon lam rtag tu rdzogs byed pa// gsang sngags kun gyi spyod pa dang // de bzhin gsang sngags sgrub pa dang // brtul zhugs dang ni rtags dang
171b5(1): gzugs// dus dang yul dang cho ga shod// de nas 'jam dpal gyis de rnams la byin gyis brlabs pas de rnams langs te/ kye ma ye shes kye ma skyid// kye ma sngags shes bsam mi khyab// des ni bdag cag thams
171b6(1): cad kyang // mgon dang bsam gtan dga' dang ldan/ sems zhi tshegs ni ma mchis par// sangs rgyas bstan pa lhur len gyur// sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyan sngar ni// bdag cag thams cad mchis nas su//
172a1(1): ga'i rgyal po tshul chen 'dir// snying po dag ni dag dbul lo// zhes gsol te/ de nas 'khor gyi gnod sbyin dang / sha za dang / ma mo dang / mkha' 'gro ma dang / srin po dang / rig sngags 'chang ba
172a2(1): dang / mi'am ci dang / dri za dang / klu dang / 'byung po dang / sring mo bzhi la sogs pa rnams kyis rang rang gi snying po rnams phul te/ spyi dang bye brag gi sgrub thabs dang / dkyil 'khor dang / sngags dang / phyag rgya
172a3(1): dang / cho ga'i rtog pa rnams gsungs so// de lta bu gdod nas grub pa'i rgyud gzhung du 'byung bzhin 'jig rten pa'i lha dang dkyil 'khor yod pa'i gzhung de bod mar 'gyur ba'i rnam rtog 'di snga phyi kun tu byung bar
172a4(1): mngon la/ slob dpon chen pos bod kyi ljongs su lha 'dre de dag dam la yang sbyor gyis tshul gyis btags shing gtso bo gtso bo rnams sngon spros pa'i cho ga de dag gis dkyil 'khor du bcug pa yod srid kyang de tsam
172a5(1): gyis rgyud gzhung de bod kho na'i dbang du mi 'gyur te/ bya rgyud kyi dkyil 'khor du gnas gtsang gi lha rnams yod pas de kho na'i rgyud du mi 'gyur ba bzhin no// rdzogs pa a nu yo ga'i sgor rnams ni/ mdo mkhan d+harma
172a6(1): bo d+hi dang / ba su d+ha ra dang / bru sha'i slob dpon cha btsan skyes gsum kar gyis gnubs chen sangs rgyas ye shes la bshad de bod du byon pa yin no// rdzogs pa chen po a ti yo ga la sde gsum gyi dang po sems klong
172b1(1): gi sde gnyis ni/ yul snye mo bye mkhar du 'khrungs pa'i dngos grub brnyes pa'i slob dpon chen po bai ro tsa na btsan po khri srong lde'u btsan gyis bskul ba bzhin 'jigs pa chen po brgyad sogs bzod du med du med pa'i
172b2(1): dka' ba lnga phrag bcu las bdun gyis lhag pa khyad du bsad nas rgya gar gyi yul du brtol bar d+ha na ko sha'i tsan+dan bsil byed kyi nags su slob dpon shrI sid+d+has rdzu 'phrul gyis bkod pa'i ke'u tshang chen po dgu
172b3(1): brtsegs dang nye bar sleb/ der chu len gyi rnal 'byor ma la phrin brdzangs kyang lan ma byung bar bai ros lta stangs mdzad pas chu snod sa la 'byar/ rnal 'byor mas rang gi brang phyes nas rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor
172b4(1): bstan cing des grogs byas te slob dpon dpal gyi seng ge dang mjal/ gser gyi man+dal phul te rtsol med kyi theg pa gsung bar zhus pas brtag par bya gsungs/ nang par gsang ba'i rtsis rgya btab nas zab mo'i
172b5(1): gnad rnams bstan par bya mod kyi/ 'on kyang shin tu ma gsang na rgyal po'i chad pas srog gi nyen du 'gyur bas nyin par pan+di ta gzhan rnams las rgyu 'bras kyi chos nyon/ mtshan mo man ngag gi chos bstan par bya'o//
172b6(1): gsungs te gzhan gyis mi rtog pa'i thabs dang rten 'brel rnams mdzad/ slob dpon gyis mtshan mo man ngag sems sde bco brgyad rnams dar dkar po la ra dkar mo'i 'o mas bris shing bstan srung rnams la chad tho
173a1(1): blangs te shin tu gsang ba'i rgyas btab bo// da dung yang bai ro'i thugs ma tshim ste bzhugs pas rgyud sde drug cu'i dbang dang man ngag thams cad dang / 'bras bu rang chas su ston pa klong gi sde dkar
173a2(1): nag khra gsum rnams bstan pas chos thams cad kyi gting mthar phyin/ da dung ma tshim pa ltar mdzad pas slob dpon gyi zhal nas/ chos kyi dbyings la zad med kyang // de bzhin nyid ni gcig shes na// ma lus de
173a3(1): la yongs su rdzogs// de las yod na sid+d+hi kan// ces gsungs nas/ gdams pa btsa' lugs gsum/ sbyin pa'i gnas bzhi/ mi sbyin pa'i gnas bzhi rnams gsungs/ du ba'i gnas kyi dur khrod chen por slob
173a4(1): dpon dga' rab rdo rje dang yang mjal nas rdzogs pa chen po 'bum phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi'i don brgyud thob cing de nyid du rtogs grol dus mnyam gyi dngos grub chen po mngon du brnyes so// 'di slob dpon gyi ye shes
173a5(1): kyi sku yin kyang rung ste skye 'chi med pa'i zung 'jug gi skus mkha' khyab tu bzhugs pa'i phyir dus snga phyi sogs so skye ltar mi bsam ste mchog gzigs rnams kyi spyod yul yin pas so// de nas bai ros rkang mgyogs kyi
173a6(1): grub pa la brten nas bod du byon nas btsan po la nyin mo rgyu 'bras thun mong ba dang / mtshan mo rdzogs pa chen po lkog chos kho nar gsungs/ sems sde snga 'gyur lnga bsgyur/ de tshe rgya gar bas gdams ngag bod du
173b1(1): shor ba la phrag dog gis bod rnams the tshom bskyed pa'i phra ma dang / chos la gnag pa'i btsun mo dang blon po rnams kyi dbang las slob dpon tsha ba rong du byon dgos pa byung / rgyal rong brag la mgon po'i dgon
173b2(1): par g.yu sgra snying po rjes su bzung ba sogs 'gro ba rnams smin grol la bkod/ tsha rong stag rtse mkhar du gsang ston ye shes bla ma la rdzogs pa chen po'i skor rnams gsungs/ stong khung rong gi brag dmar dgon rdzong
173b3(1): du spang rgan sangs rgyas mgon po la gsungs/ dbus su gnyigs dz+nyA na ku mA ra dang li bza' shes rab sgron mar gsungs pa ste rim pa lngar grags shing / phyi ma 'dis be ro li yul du spyan drangs te/ mthar bal po
173b4(1): b+ha sing gi nags su zung 'jug gi skur gyur to// gnyigs kyis sog po dpal gyi ye shes/ gra dpal gyi snying po/ lha lung dpal gyi rdo rje/ 'o bran dpal gyi gzhon nu sogs las rim bzhin brgyud pa gcig dang /
173b5(1): yang sog pos gnubs chen la brgyud pa'i lugs gcig dang / yang rtsangs sha ka rdor gyis spang rak+Shi ta/ ya zi dar ma shes rab/ zer mo dge slong / mar pa shes rab 'od/ de nas zur sgo phug par brgyud de byung ba
173b6(1): yin no// yang bai ro'i slob ma spang sangs rgyas mgon po'i slob rgyun las 'ja' lus grub pa sha stag byung ba ni/ spang rgan po'i slob ma ngan lam byang chub rgyal mtshan yin/ de ni yul dbu ru ngan lam ral gsum pa
174a1(1): dge slong lo drug cu rtsa bdun lon pa zhig gis rgyal mo stag rtse mkhar du byon/ spang mi pham mgon po la gdams pa zhus pas gnang ste da yul du ma 'gro/ wa seng ge brag la sgom gsungs/ slob dpon
174a2(1): gyi bka' bzhin nyan te der byon nas bsgoms pas lo brgya dang bdun cu rtsa gnyis lon pa'i tshe phung po lhag med du gshegs/ de la slob ma zad dam rin chen dbyig bya ba mdo khams stod pa zhig byung / des ngan
174a3(1): lam la gdams pa zhus/ brag de nyid du bla ma dang 'bral ba med par sgom bzhin bzhugs pas/ lo brgya dang bzhi bcu zhe bzhi lon pa'i tshe phung po lhag med du gshegs/ de la yar klung 'phyos nas khu 'gyur gsal
174a4(1): paba'i mchog ces bya ba'i slob ma rten dge slong yin pa/ lo lnga bcu rtsa bdun lon pa gcig byung / za dam rin chen gyis mdags ngag gnang bas yul du log pa'i bsam pa spangs/ wa seng ge brag nyid du bzhugs
174a5(1): nas bsgoms pas khu 'gyur gsal lo brgya dang bcu bdun lon tshe/ phung po lhag med du gshegs/ de ltar slob dpon gsum ka wa seng ge brag ces bya bar sbrul gyi lo gcig par gcig rting la gcig sku na bun
174a6(1): nam 'jam tshon yal ba bzhin du gshegs so// de la slob ma byang chub grags zhes bya ba// yul nyang g.yu 'brug stod pa rten dge slong lo bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis lon pa zhig byung / khu 'gyur gsal ba la gdams pa zhus
174b1(1): nas yar log/ bsam yas mchims phur sgom gyin bzhugs tsa na/ dbu du zhwa'i nyang shes rab 'byung gnas zhes bya ba dge slong bgres po gcig bzhugs 'dug pa dang mjal/ khong na re/ bsnyen par rdzogs nas
174b2(1): lo nga rgan yang gdams pa khyed che bar 'dug/ rjes su gzung bar 'tshal zhus pas/ nyang byang chub grags kyis khong la gdams pa rnams byin/ phug po che dang yang rdzong du bzhugs/ rang gi slob ma dang yang slob dag
174b3(1): la 'byung bzhi zad par gyi sbrul bskur bstan/ mthar rang nyid gtsang rgyam nye du kha'i phung po ri bo che la da lta rang 'dug pa'i 'phro la ri zur na yar sku lus sprin chad pa bzhin du phung po lhag med du gshegs so// der
174b4(1): nyang shes rab 'byung gnas kyis mchims phu dpal gyi nags khrod/ sgrags kyi yang rdzong / phug po che rnams su bzhugs/ der rdzogs pa chen po rang snang ris med kyi dgongs pa mngon du shar nas/ phug po che lha ri'i
174b5(1): rtse mo la yod pa'i shug pa rkang gcig par na bza' dang / phreng ba dang / ka pA li rnams gzar nas/ sku nam mkha' la 'ja' tshon dengs pa bzhin song ngo // de la slob ma yul lo mo ba/ rus sba yin pa gcig byung
174b6(1): bas slob dpon sba sgom du grags/ de rang gi yul na yod pa'i tshe 'khrug pa yod pas/ yum na re/ bu 'di sring mo drug gi ming gcig po yin/ slob dpon shes rab 'byung gnas la 'chol/ ma shi ba rang gis cho ga
175a1(1): zer lo bcu drug pa gcig nyang la bcol nas yod tsa na/ sngar gyi nyang byang chub grags pa de phug po che dang / yang rdzong dang / mchims phu rnams su sha pa gcig khrid nas byon pas/ nyang sha ba can zhes
175a2(1): kyang grags/ phug po cher phyi ma'i res byon tsa na/ ngas khyod gnyis la ltas mo gcig bstan gyi ltos shig gsungs/ der slob dpon shes 'byung dang / skra sgom gnyis kyis g.yas g.yon nas bltas tsa/ slob dpon
175a3(1): dbus na yod pa de mi snang bar song / der ngo mtshar skyes nas yod tsa na/ rlung 'tshub khru gang ba gcig tu gyur nas phar bskyil tshur bskyil byas/ de mer song / de'ang chu gtor gtong ba'i 'khar gzhong gcig tu
175a4(1): 'phos nas chur ldem gyis song / des tshub cig gi ngang la slob dpon rang du krong gis song / de ltar 'byung bzhi zad par gyi skye mched la dbang bsgyur nas 'di skad du/ 'byung ba'i snyigs ma drangs nas dngas ma ma
175a5(1): yal ba'i bar du de ltar 'ong ba yin/ shes rab kyis sgom rgyu med pa'i don mthong yang / brda' la yengs pa med par bskyangs na de ltar du rang dbang thob pa la tshogs med/ ma yengs par sbyong ba gal che ba yin
175a6(1): gsungs/ de nas re zhig na skra sgom gyis bal bu'i nag la shing 'thu bar phyin pas/ khong rang gi 'dzag spyil me dmar bun bun 'dug pa mthong / slob dpon ni me mi 'bud me shor ba yin nam snyam bltar phyin pas//
175b1(1): 'dzag spyil sngar bzhin las me mi snang / slob dpon la de ci tsug yin dris pas/ ngas me'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag pa yin/ nga'i bla ma nyang byang chub grags pa'i de mi dran nam gsungs/ yang skabs shig
175b2(1): slob dpon gyi bzhugs sar chu ltem me 'dug pa mthong / mthar slob dpon gyis/ nga mi 'dug na lha ri'i rtse mo la ltos shig gsungs/ re zhig na slob dpon ma byung nas ri la skyo sangs la bzhud pa yin gyi sang
175b3(1): dgongs 'byon du 'ong snyam tsa na yang ma byon/ bltar phyin tsa na/ dbu zhwa dang / bo d+hi tse'i 'phreng ba la sogs pa shugs pa la gzar/ slob dpon phung po lhag med du gshegs so// 'di ni rang bzhin rdzogs pa chen
175b4(1): po la nam mkha' dang / mkha' 'gro'i 'chi lugs/ me dpung dang rig 'dzin gyi 'chi lugs zhes pa'i ya gul gcig yin no// sgra sgom lo nyi shu rtsa bzhi lon tsan hang shes 'byung gis gdams pa btab pa yin//
175b5(1): sgom 'di rten dge bsnyen du bzhugs/ mtshan ye shes byang chub du grags/ rtogs pa khyad par can mnga'/ rdo la 'dam rdzab ltar mdzad/ brag la sku'i par 'debs/ dgung lo dgu bcu rtsa brgyad lon pa'i tshe sku snyun
175b6(1): pa med par gshegs/ jo mo gang mos phyi rol gyi mi rnams la pur mjal ma btang bar mchod khang du pur me la sbyangs pas/ 'od rdza ma tsam zhig nam mkha' la 'gro ba phyi rol gyi mi kun gyis mthong / shul du gdung
176a1(1): rus gcig kyang ma byung ngo // de'i slob ma ni 'dzeng ste/ yum mtshar dgu skyid de zhes bya ba yar klung zang chung ba'i ma dze yin/ zang chung bcad po'i bu che bas phab nas 'dzeng 'khrungs/ lo bcu drug lon
176a2(1): pa'i dus/ 'grul zla kha shas dang bcas dol gyi gdong snar tshang la phyin tsa na/ dol gyi 'tsher chung na mi mang po spungs 'dug bltar phyin pas dam pa rgya gar dang mjal/ zla ba bcu bzhir dam pa'i phyogs phyir
176a3(1): 'brangs/ gtsang gi gnas gzhi bzangs can du sleb tsa na/ dam pas snam bu gcig gnang nas/ khong dang thung 'dug pas khyod rang yul du log/ dgas po nas kham bu khyer la shog/ dol du 'gro ba'i zla bor 'dug
176a4(1): go gsungs/ der 'dzeng gis lam du zhugs pa na/ dam pa tshur breng gis byon/ 'dzeng gis bden pa gnyis la 'jus te/ ci yang ma yin gnas gyur pa// gnas gyur pa la gnyis 'dzin med// ces gsungs na
176a5(1): mgo zug lan gnyis brgyab pas/ sems cad de ba la shes pa bkra gsal ba zhig byung / kha nang na chu khyil le snang / de ni dam pas byin gyis brlabs/ rdo rje zam pa dang mjal ba'i lung bstan par 'dug ste/ dus
176a6(1): phyis las ma go gsungs/ dam pas brten 'brel 'ga' tsam dang / sngags kyi gnad mang du gnang / rgyang ru tshal mar yi ge drug pa'i gdams ngag gnang nas bsgrub pas byin rlabs chen po byung / yang chu bo chen po
176b1(1): 'di'i shar phyogs na tsan dan gyi nags yod/ de na khyod kyi bla ma yod gsungs nas lung bstan/ de nas dbus su byon/ a khu dpal 'bal la khrag 'thung dang be ha ra/ gnubs shangs po che la kr-i ya dang kha 'bar
176b2(1): ma'i gtor chen zhus/ khong gis gtsang du ba ri ba la 'bul ba skyel du btang bas/ ba ri la'ang 'jam dpal dang khyung sgrub zhus/ dge bshes spo la snga 'gyur rigs zhus/ de nas sum cu rtsa lnga lon pa'i tshe ngam shod
176b3(1): rgyud lcang tshigs su byon/ phug po che'i la kha na dge bshes btsan kha bo che rgya gar nas byon ma thag pa gcig jo mo bas spyan drangs nas/ chos dang bza' ba dang ltas mo yod zer/ nang par snga bar byon tsa na/ bud
176b4(1): med gcig na re/ khrab nas lam zur 'di nas yar phyin na/ slob dpon skra sgom bya ba lto ster ba la yangs pa zhig yod zer/ phyin pas rnal 'byor pa tsho gcig gis kyang sleb nas tsha ba drangs/ phye zangs kyi khyim bu re
176b5(1): yang gtong gi 'dug/ de tshor byin zin nas/ de na gsar bu gcig kyang 'dug gsungs nas chu bum pa gang len du bcug/ chu gtor mdzad nas phug chung zu rar khrid/ tshod ma ge ru pho pa gang byin/ de nub kyang
176b6(1): za' byin nas brag rtsa gcig tu nyal/ nang par 'gro dgos sems tsa na/ yang lto byin nas nga'i nye gnas btsun chung gcig yod pa zo thang du gser len du song ba char ches pas ma byung / shing gcig thus gsungs/
177a1(1): der nags khrod nas shing khur che ba gcig bskul bas/ skra sgom mnyes nas phyag rgya chen po brda'i man ngag dang / rdzogs pa chen po skor bdun rang chas bya ba bshad/ der nyer gnas kyang byung / nged
177a2(1): ma sleb pas slob dpon 'og brgya la sems tsa na khyed kyi go bcad 'dug pa da dung zhag 'ga' tsam bzhugs zer/ yang yar klung lan cig bskor nas byung / der skra sgom gang zag khyad par can du shes nas yul du
177a3(1): ma phyin par 'on dang zangs ri yan chad du bsod snyoms byas/ skye gcig nyos/ nas skye gang dang bcas pa slob dpon sgra sgom la phul bas/ khyod kyis nga'i g.yog byas pa yin pas des rung / 'di la khyod rang gi
177a4(1): rgyags gyis/ nga la man ngag rdo rje zam pa zhes bya ba skad cig ma'i don rtogs nas tshe gcig lus gcig la phung po lhag med du sangs rgyas pa'i brgyud pa breng ma chad pa gcig yod/ da gong phan chad su la'ang ma smras
177a5(1): pa yin/ da khyod la sbyin no gsungs/ nas nan gyis phul nas 'di slob dpon rang la bsngos pa yin/ gdams ngag zugs la gdags par zhu/ rgyags rnyed de 'ong byas pas/ phyag g.yon pas spyi bo nas bzung
177a6(1): g.yas pas ltag khung nas rtab rtab byed cing / 'or che dam tshig can du 'dug/ gdams ngag gis phan thog par gda' gsungs/ der lo chung gi sngags pa gcig la gshin rje dmar po'i sgrub thabs zhig byin pas//
177b1(1): sran nas khal brgyad byung / lo mo dang 'phrun du bsrung skyob zhar re tsam byas pa chos rgyags ldang ba rnyed/ der rdo rje zam pa'i byin rlabs zhu ba la tshogs kyi yo byad ma tshogs pa'i ngang / slob dpon gyis/ byin rlabs da
177b2(1): lta bya/ phyi nas bar chad 'od gsungs/ gangs par du grogs po gcig la pir mo gcig bcol ba'i rin slong du phyin pas/ ma dzo'i sham thabs zhig thob/ de'i snam pa tsho phral nas btsongs/ chang phud dang / gtor ma
177b3(1): dang / nas bre lnga sha gzugs gcig rnams la bsten nas/ mar me'i dod nyin par bya'o gsungs nas grol lam dbang bzhi rdzogs par bskur/ gdams ngag ma lus pa gnang / phyi nas kyang byin brlabs lan bzhi
177b4(1): tsam zhus/ nas dang gser la sogs pa'i 'bul ba lan lnga bskul/ re zhig na/ snang ba 'di kun rdzun pa'i chos can yin gsungs nas/ chu rdo gcig la phyag char gyis brgyab pas grub mo yan chad thim gyis song /
177b5(1): yang sku lus phyir shigs kyi mdzad pas brag la 'dal gyis thal nas rjes wal le byung / phug chung rong nas lta stangs kyis shug pa'i gdung mang po bkug/ jo mo'i mchod khang phrag pa'i shing yin gsungs/ de lta bu'i
177b6(1): slob dpon las rdo rje zam pa'i skor ma lus pa thob cing gzhan yang jo bo rje'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i lam brkyang khug sogs kyang thob/ de bzhin du yu mo la sbyor drug/ khams pa lung pa la thun brgyad ma/ sne'u zur pa'i
178a1(1): slob ma la dmigs pa skor gsum/ shod bu lo tsA ba la 'grel chung / dge bshes dgrol sgom la nA ro'i thabs lam zhus shing / rdo rje zam pa phar la bshad/ so spyan gdangs la sgron sbrul dang rgyab
178a2(1): / rdza bor ba la bdud rtsi thigs gsum/ ri khrod rlung chung la rna brgyad tshig gsum/ rlung ngam chen po la do ha'i man ngag/ lab sgron la gcod yul/ rgyal ba sgo ston la sde skor bdun pa/ gnubs shangs chen la ba
178a3(1): ri pa'i kri la'i chos bco lnga/ ding ri kun dga' la gdams pa sna tshogs sogs thos pa shin tu mang / dwags po lha rje la chos drug dang skyes sbyor zhus/ rtogs pa nyams bsdur bas shin tu mnyes/ spyan snga rnal 'byor
178a4(1): gyi gra sa ru spyod pa byas pas brtul zhugs can du grags/ grogs mched kyang a tsa ra stag sham can dang / bla ma dbu 'dren pa dang / bla ma thud kha 'bar/ bla ma drod 'byor/ zhang 'gro smyon la sogs de tsa na'i rnal
178a5(1): 'byor gyi dbang po sha stag dang 'grogs/ gtsang du gcer bu lo lnga byas/ gzhan yang snang ba la thog rdzis shin tu che bas dgun 'khrugs pa'i rum/ dbyar chu bo'i gzhung / ma nges pa'i g.yang rong zab mor mchod ba
178a6(1): dang / mgo brdeb pa dang / mtshon brdeg pa la sogs te spyod pa tshan po che ma byas bya ba med pas dpa' bo 'dzeng chung du grags/ so mang btsan la phyag rgya chen po btab pas 'khrul snang ye shes su gnas gyur/ ri
178b1(1): khrod rlung chung pa dang / dngul mo rgya le lcam la yi ge bzhi pa dang rdzogs chen btab pas 'khrul zhig chen por gyur te mthar phung po lhag med du dengs/ de bzhin du ma jo dad pa can dang / khams pa snying rus can zhig
178b2(1): la rdo rje zam pa bstan pas ma jo mon kha zer mo'i mtsho dang / khams pa kong po mtsho rdzong du nam mkha' dang mkha' 'gro'i 'chi lugs kyis phung po lhag med du song / ras pa sgom stag sho ras/ rgya ras/ rlung ras
178b3(1): sogs la gdams pa btab pa tsam gyis bde drod 'bar/ de bzhin du chos nyid bstan pa tsam gyis rtogs grol du song ba shin tu mang / 'dzed d+harmA bo d+hi nyid kyis gsungs nas kyang / nga'i gam du lo tsa ba yang bzhi
178b4(1): tsam byung / rab byung dang / ston chen dang / sgom pa sgom ma yus po che rang mthong can mang zhig byung / tshul bzhin nyams su len pa a cang che ste/ dwags por nyams len e na re byed pa'i nya ma bcu gcig tsam dang
178b5(1): por 'chi dus thebs pa/ 'chi khar gnad gcod med pa/ ro la 'ja' zug pa byung ba yin/ nga'i gdams pa 'di la bal ma bal las byed pa dang / pha ma sri'u gso ba 'dra ba'i nyams len lo lnga drug gcig byas na/
178b6(1): phung po lhag med du song nas shul du mi'i lus po mi yong nges gsungs/ rdzu 'phrul gyi bkod pa rgya mtsho lta bu la dbang 'byor bas re sku lus 'ja' ru 'khyil/ res zhabs sa la mi reg par gshegs/ snang sems ro/
179a1(1): gcig tu 'dres pas zag ring po'i sa yang yud tsam la 'khor/ gzhan sems shes pa la sogs pa'i mngon par shes pa thogs med mnga' bas ma 'ongs pa thams cad lung ston/ lha'i mig dag pas rngo
179a2(1): sras ma rdo rje skyid kyi bu nam phyed na gnyid log pa rgya mthongs nas mar rbab tu 'chor la khad pa gzigs/ snang ba la nyin mtshan med pas nub mo sbyar ma'i khrod du rgya khab ltung ba bde blag tu gzigs pa sogs yod/
179a3(1): phyi res gtsang du lo bdun bzhugs nas slar phug po cher byon pas/ slob dpon sgra sgom gyis/ nam mkha' 'di khong du chud par gyis/ de rten med du rtogs nas sgom med kyi gzar chen thebs pa yin gsungs
179a4(1): pas nges shes gting nas 'drongs/ de nas dwags po zhu ru bzhugs shing bla ma zhal gdams la gu ru zhi ba sde skor mdun pa'i gdams pa zhus/ de'i lha zur dgon par brda' bzhi lo gsum bskyangs pas chos thams
179a5(1): cad la byan tshud/ spros bral gyi dgongs pa nam mkha' lta bur song / lar dka' thub la shin tu bzod pas/ phug po cher rdo rje zam pa zhus nas bdud rtsi'i dka' thub mdzad/ rims kyis rdzi bar ma nus/ gnubs
179a6(1): shong po che'i drung du bla ma'i bran gyi dka' thub byas par gar phyin du bla mas thugs la 'dogs/ dam pa rgya gar gyi drung du rtog dpyod kyi dka' thub byas pas chos thams cad la rang byan tshud/ sgyid khung du phur pa'i
179b1(1): bzlas pa la dka' thub byas pas 'jig rten gyi lha 'dres ci smras nyan/ jo bo bka' gdams pa'i sa ru zhi dul gyi dka' thub byas pas gar phyin du gzhan gyis byams/ yi ge bzhi la mi sdod pa gsum gyi dka' thub
179b2(1): byas pa bde drod 'bar nas gcer bu lo lnga byas/ de la nges shes skyes nas phag mo mngon 'byung la sgrub pa'i dka' thub byas pas 'gur mo'i nub phyogs su rje btsun mi'i zhal gzigs/ brda' mang po gnang /
179b3(1): gnubs yul rong du rmi lam sbyangs pas snang ba thams cad rmi lam du shes/ gzho stong ti sgro'i shel phug tu khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i zhal mthong / mi ma yin cig gis bsnyen bkur cher byas/ btsun gzugs
179b4(1): gcig nam mkha' la 'phur nas phar 'gro tshur 'gro byed pa mthong / btsal bas ma rnyed mi yin min ma shes gsungs/ dwags po zhu ru a dzi bsgrubs pas nyi ma dro khar zhal gzigs/ dam bsre byed snyam tsa na jo mo phya
179b5(1): le byon nas/ bud med can zer nas 'od cig tu yal/ lha zur du bcud len gyi sgrub pa byas pa tshe dpag med zhal mthong / chos mang po'i rnam gzhag rgyud la shar/ oM dkar brag tu sgrub pa mdzad pas bde mchog
179b6(1): yab yum zhal gzigs/ lan cig 'gro snying 'dod pa zhig byung nas/ mor 'gar grong mo che'i mdun du byon/ chu'i rdzing mo zhig la thub chod byas mchongs pas/ 'khyags pa chag nas chur bying / skyengs pa'i rnam rtog
180a1(1): cing shar tsa na/ chu la rlangs pa nam mkha' mi mthong ba tsam byung / mi rnams ngo mtshar skyes nas dgun grang bdo ba la de tsam tshugs pa/ lcags bsregs chu la btsud pa 'dra ba byung zer/ rang la
180a2(1): 'khyags pa'i snang ba ni byung gsungs/ yang lan cig jo mo dang gnyis kyis shing 'thur phyin pas shing khur che ba gcig rnyed/ de khur nas mtha' chen po gcig gi khar sleb pa dang / 'di ni rmi lam du 'dug snyam nas
180a3(1): mchongs pas bya babs pa bzhin du song / jo mo na re bla ma khyed mi'ang cig mi 'dug/ dam pa rgya gar dran zer/ de yan du gdams pa mang du ma 'phel/ grong cho ga mdzad cing gsang spyod bskyangs/ de nas thag ring
180a4(1): nas slob ma mang du byung nas 'phel/ re zhig na bal bu dor las spyan drangs/ gdams ngag gsungs pas/ nyi ma snga dro dang po la 'ja'i gdugs dang re mig mang po byung / chos thon nas ri logs la skyo sangs la
180a5(1): byon/ 'ja' de bla ma grongs pa'i rtags mi dga' ba min nam zhus pas/ nga'i bla ma sba sgom gyis 'bar ston shes rab grags spun gnyis la gdams pa 'di gnang ba'i dus kyang / ngams shod lung pa dang / phug po
180a6(1): che'i ri logs khengs pa tsam byung ba yin/ gdams pa 'di la rtags 'di 'od gsungs/ yang bla ma 'di 'dzin na bzhugs pa'i dus su slob ma jo sras 'dzeng gi drung du byon pas/ mchod rten rtsa ba'i gad rtsa gcig na
180b1(1): bzhugs 'dug/ de nas dben khang du phyin tsa na bla ma 'dzed ni ma mthong / 'od phub tsam zhig 'dug/ rtsar nya tsa na 'od de mi 'dug nas de tsug lags zhus pas/ mnyam par bzhag pa'i rtags yin mi la ma smra
180b2(1): gsungs/ yang a dzo dngos grub la mdze byung bas/ ngas bzlas grogs byas mdze ni ma sos/ ngas phyag na rdo rje'i zhal mthong dgod bro gsungs/ de ltar chos tshul gzhan la grags pa'i ro snyoms dang / chos drug dang /
180b3(1): gcod yul dang / rim pa lnga la sogs pa'i gdams pa'i don gyi thob bya gang yin pa nyams 'og tu chud pa'i 'dzeng sgom d+harmA bo d+hi 'di dgung lo brgya dang gnyis lon pa'i dus zhig snun pa ltar bstan pas/ 'khor
180b4(1): rnams kyis bla ma grongs kyi dogs tsa na/ zhal nas mdang rmi lam bzang / nga mi 'chi rgya'i po ra'i steng na 'dug pa la nyi zla gnyis shar byung / rus pa'i spyil po mang po'i steng na bud med mang po 'dug pas/ bla ma
180b5(1): 'dzeng khyod lo bzhin shog zer ba gcig rmis gsungs/ yang re zhig na/ ngas lo mang po lon te nga la'ang tig pa bshad rgyu med gsungs/ de ni rtog dpyod la 'dzin pa dag pas nang du dgongs pa zad sar
180b6(1): 'khyol ba'i rtags yin no// der 'khor rnams kyis dge rtsa gcig mdzad par zhus pas/ 'dus byas kyi dge rtsa la thugs mi gtod/ bcud len cig mdzad par zhus pas kyang / bcud len byas na lo bcu tsam
181a1(1): tshe bsring nus te/ dus ngan gyi tshe ring ba la dgos pa med gsungs/ gzhan la skyo ba yang dag bskul nas sku gshegs so// pur sbyangs pas nam mkha' 'jas gang / mchod rten dang ring bsrel
181a2(1): yang mang du byon don/ 'di ni tshogs pa bskyangs pas snyigs ma 'ja' lus su ma dengs kyang / don gyi ka dag chos zad kyi sa la mya ngan las 'das pa'i rtags mtha' dag tshang zhing snyan brgyud rdo rje zam pa'i dar
181a3(1): rgyas kyang 'di'i ring nas che bar byung ste dngos kyi slob ma yang / slob dpon kun bzang dang / 'dzed jo sras dang / btsan thang pa nyang d+harma sid+ha dang / slob dpon gser lung pa dang / bla ma du rdo rje rgyal mtshan
181a4(1): dang / gzig ye shes dbang po dang / g.yag ston zla ba 'od zer la sogs mang du byon no// dgung lo yang brgya dang bcu bdun lon tshe gshegs pa yin/ 'di jo 'brom dang / phya ba chos kyi seng ge dang / rje btsun
181a5(1): mi la dpon slob dang snga phyir thog mnyam pa tsam yin no// de la 'dzes jo sras ni/ sngags pa'i rigs la btsas pas chung ngu nas yig rtses la sbyangs/ 'ol kha'i lha bris pa la sgyu 'phrul la sogs rnying ma dang /
181a6(1): dgyes rdor dang mtshan brjod zhus/ slob dpon lha ris pa 'da' khar gzhung chen po 'di tsam zhig shes kyang 'chi khar pa a ro thun bdun las ma byung / khyod rang kyang gzhung ma bslabs par gdams ngag la nan
181b1(1): tan gyis/ dwags po na khyed rang gi bla ma 'dzed bya ba gcig yod 'dug pas der song zhes lung bstan/ gang bar du rdzogs chen lhun grub mkhan slob dpon zem gyi sar dbyar dgun thog drug bsdad kyang thugs
181b2(1): la ma btags/ gdams ngag gi spros pa mchod nas slob dpon 'dzeng la dpal lung du rdo rje zam pa tshar gsum zhus/ byin rlabs mdzad nas/ khyed rang re zhig gtsang du song la gzhung slob/ gtsang nas 'khor
181b3(1): tsan a mis dgon pa gcig tu sdod cig gsungs/ der gdams pa mi gnang ba dgongs nas/ gzhan su shes dris pas/ gra phyi'i jo sras zhang la skyabs bya bas shes gsungs/ de la zhu bar sems tsan khong
181b4(1): grongs/ yang dwags po rang du log nas 'dzeng la zhus pas kyang ma gnang / slob ma gcig la zhu bsams nas/ sho snyam du slob dpon du'i spyan sngar phyin tsa na/ re ba tsam bcos nas 'dis mi 'ongs da dung
181b5(1): dwags por song la zhus gsungs/ yang dwags por byon nas zhus pas/ cis kyang 'dod na gdams pa la nan tan byed dgos pa yin gsungs nas rdzogs par gnang / dbyar dgun thog 'ga' slob dpon gyi
181b6(1): drung du bsdad/ lo drug tsam lon nas phran tshegs rnams kyang rdzogs/ gzhan la byin rlab mdzad pa'i las slob kyang byas/ thod pa'i slob ma rog po dga' dang / ma dze bzlo ba la sogs pa lnga bcu tsam gyis rdo rje
182a1(1): zam pa zhus pas jo sras kyis shod/ khyed tshos nyon gsungs nas slob dpon gyi khri kha nas gsungs/ dpon slob gnyis lo ngo bco brgyad tsam du 'grogs/ gdams ngag gi bka' phog nas brgyud
182a2(1): 'dzin bskos so// de ltar 'dzed d+harma bo d+hi dang / jo sras 'dzeng chung smyon pa gnyi ga'i slob ma slob dpon kun bzang yin te/ de ni khu bo pha jo dbus pa phag mo gru pa'i slob ma sgom chen po zhig yin/ ma zi bza'
182a3(1): des cho ga bya ba ma jo sgron ma bsam 'grub bya ba la chos thob pa gnyis ka la rmi lam gyi ltas bzang po dang bcas te 'khrungs/ lo brgyad dgu la slob dpon kor ston rA dza las slob gnyer cung zad byas/ bco lnga
182a4(1): lon pa'i tshe khong grongs nas slob dpon du ba'i gam du lo lnga tsam zhi byed zhu zhing bsdad nas zhabs tog 'grub tshad byas/ gser lung dgon par slob dpon du dang 'jal ba'i tshe/ bco lnga'i zla ba'i rum na skar
182a5(1): ma gnyis thim pa rmis/ 'dzeng chen po la rdo rje zam pa tshar gcig zhus/ de nas 'dzed jo sras sbrang ring du spyan drangs nas rdo rje zam pa tshar bdun zhus/ dwags por dgun thog bzhi phyin/ rdo rje zam pa tshar phyed pa
182a6(1): gcig dang bcu bzhi thob/ jo sras dang lo brgyad 'grogs nas rdo rje zam pa tshar bdun zhus/ phyi nas sho ru tshar gnyis/ gser lung du tshar gcig/ gzhan la gsung 'phror mjal ba dang dril bas 'dzes mes
182b1(1): dpon gnyis la rdo rje zam pa tshar sum cu rtsa lnga thob/ gnyis ka'i gdams pa bka' babs nas gzhung bshad che chung gnyis kyang mdzad do// 'di la sras sbrul sku 'od 'bar seng ge bya ba byung / de ni blo rno ba/
182b2(1): shes rab phun sum tshogs pa zhig ste/ lo bcu bzhi pa la rdo rje zam pa gsungs/ des brgyud 'dzin rdo mgon la gnang / des bya med tshul rin la gnang ngo // yang 'dzeng gis yar klungs btsan thang pa nyang d+harmA
182b3(1): sid+d+ha la rdo rje zam pa bshad pas byin rlab bzhugs/ rtogs pa thod rgal du skyes/ dur khrod dgon par bzhugs te 'gro don rgya chen po mdzad/ mthar dgung lo don bdun pa la gshegs/ 'di nas brgyud pa'i
182b4(1): gzhung bshad kyang yod do// de'i slob ma badz+ra pA ni/ de'i slob ma bla ma lta'o// yang 'dzeng gis gser lung pa la bshad/ des slob dpon rang grol/ des sras po chos rin la bshad do// yang 'dzeng gis du rdo rje
182b5(1): rgyal mtshan la bshad/ des ngu ston dad pa brtson 'grus/ de'i slob ma zhig gis byas pa'i gzhung bshad kyang yod/ yang 'dzeng gis gzig ye shes dbang po// des mkhan po la kha pa/ des slob dpon mgon skya
182b6(1): ba/ des slob dpon go ri ba/ des so ston la bshad de so ston gyi gzhung bshad kyang snang ngo // yang 'dzeng gis spung ring pa g.yag ston zla ba 'od zer/ des klog ston dge 'dun skyabs/ 'di nas brgyud pa'i
183a1(1): gzhung bshad kyang yod/ yang sbrang ring g.yag ston gyis lo brgya la nye ba thub/ des 'on nag stod pa gla ru ba na de la bshad nas kyang dar/ yang 'dzeng gis skye tshe ye shes dbang phyug la bshad/ des
183a2(1): gzigs ye shes dbang po/ des mkhan chen ngur pa/ des du ston badz+re shwa ra/ des mkhan chen bsod nams rgyal mtshan/ des mkhan chen gzhon nu shes rab/ de slob dpon gzhon du grags pa/ des mkhan chen
183a3(1): sangs rgyas bzang po/ des bla ma brtson 'grus dbang phyug/ des mtha' bzhi grags pa rin chen/ des slob dpon shAkya rgyal po/ 'di sku gzhon nu'i tshe khrab la khar rab tu byung / lo dus la bsnyen par rdzogs/
183a4(1): mdzod dang 'dul ba la byang bas sbyor lung du gra skor mdzad/ thugs dam 'phel bar bzhugs pa la/ sku na ha cang mtho bas spyan mi gsal yang / gzhan gyis spyan tshab byas te rjes su brjod nas gsung ba
183a5(1): sogs thugs bskyed shin tu che/ dgung lo brgyar nye bar bzhugs nas gshegs pa'i rjes thugs las ring bsrel zad pa med par 'byon pa byung / 'dis 'gos lo gzhon nu dpal la gsungs pa yin no// rdo rje
183a6(1): zam pa'i lo rgyus bshad zin to// // gsum pa man ngag sde'i mchog tu zab pa snying thig gi skor rnams slob dpon chen po bi ma la mi tra dgung lo nyis brgyar nye ba na bod du rgyal pos bstan pa btsugs pa'i
183b1(1): skabs su gyur cing / der nyang ting 'dzin bzang po bya ba ting nge 'dzin thun gcig gis lo bdun du mi g.yo zhing sha'i spyan gyis gling bzhi cig car du gzigs pa zhig bzhugs pas lung bstan cing bskul bas
183b2(1): btsan pos lo tsa ska cog gnyis gser gyi skyes dang bcas pa spyan 'dren du brdzangs pas gdul bya'i dus la bab par gzigs te byon par rgya gar bas phrag dog gis dbyen bcos pas bod rnams the tshom par ngo
183b3(1): mtshar ba'i cho 'phrul gyis dad par mdzad/ rgyu 'bras kyi chos spyi dang / bye brag g.yu sgras lo tsA byas te sems sde phyi 'gyur bcu gsum bsgyur/ shin tu zab pa'i man ngag snying thig ni btsan po dang nyang ting 'dzin
183b4(1): bzang po gnyis la lkog tu gsungs pa las gzhan snod du rung ba ma gzigs nas dpe rnams bod yig mdzad nas mchims phu'i dge gong du sbas/ slob dpon 'di lo bcu gsum bod du bzhugs nas phyis rgya
183b5(1): nag ri bo rtse lnga gshegs/ thub pa'i bstan pa ji srid gnas kyi bar sku lus de nyid kyis bzhugs shing lo brgya brgya na ljongs 'dir sprul pa re byon nas snying thig gi bstan pa gsal bar mdzad par zhal gyis
183b6(1): bzhes so// bi ma la rgya nag tu gshegs nas lo lnga bcu rtsa lnga nas nyang ting 'dzin bzang po zag pa zad pa'i phung por gyur/ rdo rje legs pas khams su ser ba phab pa'i nas rnga mo'i rgyab brgya phul ba la brten
184a1(1): nas dbu ru zhwa'i lha khang bzhengs/ gdams pa'i dpe rnams de nyid kyi ke'u tshang rim gsum gyi sgo'i ka ba'i khong du sbas/ snyan brgyud rnams 'bro rin chen 'bar ba la bshad/ de lha sa brag lha'i
184a2(1): phug tu 'ja' lus su yal lo// nyang ban chen po 'od du dengs nas lo brgyad lon cing nyang mi dar ma dang dus mtshung par dbu ru gzhol ma dge mchog gi bu gnas brtan ldang ma ba lhun grub rgyal mtshan ces bya
184a3(1): bapa/ ngo bo bi ma la'i sprul par grags kyang rnam par shes pa lkog tu gyur pa rnams la gnas brtan dkyus ma'i ngang tshul du snang ba gcig la rdo rje legs pas lung bstan nas snga sbas pa'i gter rngams phyung /
184a4(1): dpas blo gros la tshig rgyud kyang mnyan nas chos nyid yid dpyod du ma lus par nyams su blangs/ man ngag rnyed nas bco lnga pa la bshad/ rgyud bzhag pa'i snod 'tshol du byon pa na/ nyang stod nas lce btsun seng
184a5(1): gege dbang phyug ces bya ba rnyed/ de la gdams pa rim pa bdun du btab/ de dang nye bar kha rag sgom chung la'ang btab pas khong yang des grol/ lce btsun la dpe rnams dag par bris la khra'i zla ba la skyol cig
184a6(1): gsungs/ phyis zhig lce btsun gyis 'bul ba shin tu mang po dang bcas byon pas ste thang du mal dro'i nyang bka' gdams pa bya ba dang 'phrad/ des ldang ma gshegs pa'i gtam bshad pas/ 'bul ba rnams
184b1(1): gnas gzhi gcig 'dug pa'i dge 'dun rnams la phul/ nyang bka' gdams pa na re/ ldang ma de gnas brtan yin pa tsam las gang zag bzang por sngar sus kyang ma rig/ sku gshegs pa'i dus nam mkha'
184b2(1): 'jas khengs/ sku gdung dang ring bsrel dpag tu med pa byon pas thams cad ngo mtshar zhig 'gyod pa skyes gda'/ khyed kyang 'bul ba 'di tsam 'khyer lugs kyis gdams ngag khyad par can yod mchi bas
184b3(1): bdag la stsol zhig zhus pas gdams pa byin/ des gzho'i ti sgro brag la lo gnyis bsgoms pas phung po lhag med du song ba yin no// de la lce btsun chen po ni/ yul nyang ro gnyan tsho'i lce thub pa'i dbang po
184b4(1): zhes bya ba'i bu gzhon nu nas chos mang po la thos pa'i pha rol tu son pa zhig yin/ gnas brtan ldang ma ba dang ri gzar rgod po lung du mjal/ kha rag tu gdams pa gsung ba'i dus btab ste rdzogs par thob/
184b5(1): slob dpon gshegs nas gter dpe rnying pa rnams lang gro 'chad pa stag 'dra'i chu mig gi rtsa dang / 'u yug dang / dzal gyi phu ste gter kha gsum du sbas/ 'u yug nas shangs man chod kyi ri rgyud rnams la 'pho zhing
184b6(1): bsgoms pa'i tshe/ rmi lam na a tsa ra gcig byung nas/ bdag ni bi ma mi tra mkhas pa ste// skal ldan snying po'i yang bcud don 'dod na// mchims phu brag dmar dge gong yang 'debs la// gsang ba snying tig
185a1(1): snying dang 'dra ba yod// de dag khyer la'u yug phyi gong du// sus kyang mthong ba med pa lo bdun sgoms// zag bcas phung po snang ba ma yin no// zhes gsungs pa thos nas mchims phur byon/ bud
185a2(1): med dung so 'khor ma g.yu'i smin ma can zhig gis dpe rnams byin// slar 'o yug phyi gong rdza'i ra bar bzhugs pas bi ma la dngos su byon/ zla ba phyed du dbang khrid gdams pa rdzogs par gnang nas slob dpon
185a3(1): bi ma la rgya nag tu gshegs/ de nas lce btsun gyis lo bdun bsgoms pas phung po lhag med grub/ sprul pa'i sku zhang ston la gdams ngag rdzogs par byin nas/ lo brgya dang nyi shu rtsa lnga na nam mkha' la 'ja'
185a4(1): 'od kyi phung po gcig tu gshegs so// gter sbas pa'i lo sum cu na rong snar mda' lce sgom nag pos kha shas bton nas rang nyams su longs shig/ gzhan mang po la'ang bshad/ de bzhin du lang gro 'chad pa
185a5(1): ltalhag nas shangs pa ras pa zhes bya bas kyang bton nas dar rgyas byung zhes grags/ de la zhang ston ni/ yul yar 'brog do nang du 'khrungs/ mtshan bkra shis rdo rje zhes bya ste/ lo bcu gcig par bla ma lce sgom la
185a6(1): gdam pa mang du zhus/ de nas nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar mkhas grub kyi bla ma mang du bsten nas/ sde snod gsum dang / rgyud sde gsar rnying gi phyogs thams cad la sbyangs pas mkhyen rab kyi pad+mo rgyas/ nyang stod khu
185b1(1): yul na yod pa'i tshe/ nam mkha' las bla ma dang / thugs rje chen po/ sgrol ma la sogs pa'i zhal mthong zhing lung bstan thob/ rdo rje legs pa mi dkar zhwa dkar can du byas pas dngos grub byin gyi 'dod zer
185b2(1): nas khrid/ nyang smad pa tshab tu lha gsol ba mang pos bza' btung byin pa dngos grub de la zer ram snyam tsa na/ mi dkar des dngos grub gzhan du yod kyi 'dod zer 'od kyi lam sna byas nas byon/ khang stong
185b3(1): gcig tu nyal bas 'dir mi rung zer/ brag phug cig tu byon tsa na khang stong 'gyel/ kho'i sprul pas bza' btung yang byin/ 'o yug mda' na 'khrug pa chen po yod pa yang rdo rje legs pas bsgribs nas dmag
185b4(1): gis ma mthong / der brag seng ge 'dra ba'i rtser sleb tsa na kho stor/ phyir log go snyam na yang ma thar/ cha ma phyed pa'i ngang las bltas tsa na brag phug kha byang bstan gyi sgo rtswas 'gags pa mthong / de brus pas dang
185b5(1): por sbrul dang sbal pa shig shig snang / de nas kha byang rnyed dus mi dkar des sgron me btegs byung bas/ dar cig nag drangs dang skad shin tu mi srun pa zhig byung / khos brda' sbyar bas/ ngas a ce bos kyi zer
185b6(1): ba'i mod/ e ka tsa Ti spyan gcig khrag tu khol ba/ mche ba gtsigs shing bltar mi bzod pa tsam du byung / khos 'di ni lung bstan pa de'o byas pas/ tshogs 'khor brgya rtsa brgyad thong / lo gsum du su la'ang ma
186a1(1): bshad zer/ brag phug gi sgo rtsa nas g.yu gnyis rnyed pa las rgyu byas/ tshogs 'khor brgya rtsa brgyad btang / lo nyi shu rtsa lnga la dbus su byon/ mchims phu nas bi ma la'i chos gter yang zon//
186a2(1): dngos dang zhal mjal nas rjes gnang thob/ slar shang rta nag tu byon pa'i zam khar lce btsun chen po dang mjal/ gsang ba snying thig gi gdams pa rdzogs par thob/ sku na mthon por song nas brgyud 'dzin gyi
186a3(1): slad du sras nyi 'bum bskrun/ ngas tshogs pa ma bskyangs na phung po lhag med 'ong ba yin gsungs/ lus shin tu sbyangs pa byang chub kyi yan lag la dbang thob pas res 'ga' rgyal ba rigs lngar gsal/ sku lus
186a4(1): la grib ma gtan mi mnga'/ rdzogs pa chen po'i chos gsung dus 'ja' gur 'khyil pa sogs ngo mtshar gyi ltas mang po yod / dgung lo bdun cu don gcig pa me pho phag gi lo sa ga zla ba'i nyer gnyis la shar
186a5(1): / phyogs kyi nam mkha' las sgra chen po lan bdun grags shing / sa chen po 'di lan gsum g.yos/ 'ja' dang / 'od dang / sil snyan gyi sgra dang / dri zhim gyi ngad la sogs pa gdod ma'i sa la mngon par byang
186a6(1): chub pa'i rtags ma lus pa bstan te gshegs so// de'i phyi nub pur sbyangs pas gdung chen lnga dang / ring bsrel kha dog lnga pa sku lnga'i rgyal tshab du bzhag me tog gi char dang 'ja'i gur la sogs pas 'gro ba mang
186b1(1): po dad pa'i gnas la sbyar zhing rang bzhin gyis bstan la gnas pa byung ngo // de'i slob ma sras nyi 'bum ste/ yum rgyal mo g.yang de'i lhums su zhugs pa'i dus nyi ma mang po dus gcig la shar ba byung bas yab
186b2(1): kyis sems can gyi ma rig pa'i mun pa bsal bar lung bstan nas nyi ma 'bum du btags/ lo lnga nas rim pa yab las gsang ba snying tig gi dbang khrid gdams pa nyams 'og tu chud par mdzad/ dgung lo
186b3(1): bcu pa la che sar bton dus rgyud bcu bdun la bshad pa mdzad pas bu slob kun ngo mtshar skye ba byung / lo nyi shu'i bar du bsgrub pa kho na la nan tan mdzad/ de nas rjes thob sgyu ma lta bu'i ting 'dzin dang
186b4(1): 'grogs nas rdog rgyal rtse'i sar gsar ma'i rgyud man ngag dang bcas pa la gsan pa mdzad/ nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa la jo mo rgya gar dngos grub gyi rten du bzung / nyi shu rtsa bdun la 'khon grags pa rgyal mtshan dang /
186b5(1): bla ma stag so ba bsten nas rgyud gsum gdams ngag dang bcas pa dang / bde mchog ma la gyo lugs mkhyen par mdzad/ kha rag gi 'brug ston grags pa la bde mchog dang / rje btsun ma ra lugs/ ye shes
186b6(1): mgon po sogs zhus/ zhang g.yu brag pa dang gzhung gi rdog rdo rje seng ge la sogs te mkhas grub gyi bla ma mang po bsten nas mdo rgyud du ma la thos bsam phyogs med mdzad/ tshig don chen mo zhes bya ba'i bstan
187a1(1): bcos kyang mdzad de dgung lo lnga bcu rtsa drug la gshegs/ pur sbyangs pas gdung rigs lnga byon/ 'ja' tshon gyi gur phub/ cho 'phrul zla ba la khug chos me tog skyes pa sogs byung ngo // 'di
187a2(1): sgra thal 'gyur nas phyag rdor gyi sprul pa badz+ra pha lar lung bstan pa la ngos 'dzin par grags so// de'i slob ma gu ru jo 'ber ni gcung po zla ba 'bum gyi sras yin/ lo bdun man chod lkugs pa 'dra bar yod pa
187a3(1): la brgyad nas shes rab me ltar 'bar/ bco brgyad kyi bar du khu bo nyi 'bum dang 'grogs/ gsang ba bla med kyi dbang khrid gdams pa dang bcas rdzogs par mdzad cing / rgyud kyi bshad pa la thos pas sgo
187a4(1): 'dogs gcod pa dang / man ngag gi don la bsgoms pas nyams su blangs pa la brtson/ bcu dgu nas nyi shu'i bar sa skya lo tsa ba la rgyud gsum man ngag dang bcas pa dang / bde mchog mal gyo lugs nyan//
187a5(1): dbu tshad la sogs pa'i rig pa'ang khong du chud par byas/ de bzhin du khro phu lo tsA ba la mi tra dzo ka'i gdams pa dang / chu mig pa la tshad ma bsdus pa/ bal po grags 'bum la do ha dang phyag chen kha 'thor sogs
187a6(1): mkhas grub du ma la sde snod dang rgyud lung mang po lo sum cu rtsa drug tshun mnyan pas rig pa rno zhing thos pa shin tu mang bar grags/ bsgrub pa mdzad res yi dam gyi lha zhal mthong ba yin te thugs skam pas mi
187b1(1): gsung / lha sar jo bo la mchod pa phul dus 'od kyi thig le'i khong nas 'phags pa lag na pad+ma dang / rdo rje 'dzin pa zhal gzigs/ zo reng zhig tshe dpag med kyi zhal mthong bas/ nged cag la tshe ring rgud med
187b2(1): kyang kho bo legs par byung ba de'i byin rlabs yin gsungs/ de ltar tshad med pa'i mkhyen rab dang thugs rje'i mnga' bdag gis 'gro ba 'dren pa'i ded dpon du gyur nas drug bcu pa la gshegs/ zhag bdun
187b3(1): du 'ja'i dra bas 'brel/ sku gdung la oM AHhUM dang ring bsrel mang po byon to// de'i slob ma 'khrul zhig seng ge rgyab pa yin te/ g.yo ru gra'i phu so gad phreng gi grong du nyi ma rtse shar la 'ja'i gur phub cing
187b4(1): 'khrungs/ lo dgu nas rigs sad de dag snang dang mos gus dpag med shar/ bcu pa'i tshe snang ba 'di rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu la sra zhing 'thas 'thas 'dra ba mi bden snyam pa dang / bcu gnyis pa la 'khor ba
187b5(1): la skyo ba tshad med par skyes nas chos 'ba' zhig las gang gis kyang mi phan par nges shes rnyed/ bcu gsum gyi tho rangs nyi zla dus gcig la shar ba'i rmi lam sad dus/ 'phags pa thugs rje chen po'i zhal
187b6(1): mthong / tshe gcig gis grol ba snying tig gi don sgoms shig gsungs/ de nas bzung snying rje phyogs med du rgyas/ 'gro ba kun la bu gcig pa'i 'du shes shar/ rkyen re la brten nas gzhan la mtho 'grogs dang
188a1(1): khyad gsod mi byed pa'i dam bca' byas/ lus kyi srin bu ngag snying rje chen pos mi 'dor zhing / longs sbrang dang dman pa kho na la byams pa sogs theg pa chen po'i rigs sad pa'i rtags khyad par
188a2(1): can mnga'/ bco brgyad la snang ba bden med du rtogs pas smyon pa khrog langs pa lta bu song ste/ pha mas lha gsol ba'i yo byad bsags pa gtor zhing / pho gdon rgyal po mchod/ mo gdon bsen mo mchod//
188a3(1): ces byas pas/ khyod 'dra ba'i bu skye ba zer 'thabs/ nyi shu la mkhan po lde'u sgang pa dang / slob dpon bskus skrang pa las rab tu byung / nyi shu tsa lnga lon tshe sri zhal gyi seng ge rgyab tu byon/ seng ge rgyab pa bar pa
188a4(1): la tshal pa'i chos skor/ bla ma tsa ri ba las seng ge mjing bsnol/ ras pa dri med 'od/ lha ri dpal/ gzhon nu 'bum/ ston 'char byang yon/ jo sras su grags pa rnams la/ gsang sngags gsar rnying zhi byed//
188a5(1): gcod yul/ phyag chen mang du nyan/ khyad par thugs rjes chen pos lung bstan bzhin gu ru jo 'ber las rdzogs pa chen po thos pas rtogs pa thod rgal du skyes/ khro bo ma la sogs pa'i ri khrod dang lung stong
188a6(1): rnams su lo mang po'i bar du sgrub pa kho na la gzhol bas dgongs pa ka dag gi sar gshegs/ skal ldan mang po smin grol la bkod nas/ drug bcu rtsa bzhi pa la theg pa mchog gi 'bras bu thob pa'i rtags khyab
188b1(1): par ba rnams mngon du bstan nas gshegs so// de'i slob ma grub chen me long rdo rje ni/ sgrags kyi phur rnal 'byor pa bsam yas kyi sras su btsas/ lo dgu na grub thob za lung pa dang / mkhan po se lung pa
188b2(1): las rab tu byung / de dus gshin po'i dge rtsar yum rgyas 'bring bsdus gsum kho na sgrogs pas lo bcu drug gi dus sgrags kyi phu'i zhogs steng bya bar brgyad stong brgya rtsa mdzad pas gnas lugs kyi don rtogs//
188b3(1): zangs mtshor bsgoms pas nyams 'bar zhing mngon shes phra mo 'ang shar/ de nas phyogs med 'grims te/ mtshur bu'i ngo bo ras pa sogs bla ma mang po bsten/ sha 'ug lhag sgo dang / mkhar chu la sogs pa'i
188b4(1): gnas chen mang por byon/ nas bre gang gis zla ba gcig dang zhag nyi shu'i 'tsho ba byas pa sogs dka' thub la shin tu bzod pa gcig yin/ dka' ba spyad pa'ang bsam gyis mi khyab/ lo bco brgyad pa'i tshe seng
188b5(1): ge rgyab pa sangs rgyas dpon po mjal nas man ngag snying tig thob/ da man ngag gis 'tshengs bsams pa'i slob pa skyes te bsgoms pas sngon 'gro'i dus rang nas zhag drug tu rdo rje sems dpa'i zhal nyin
188b6(1): mtshan med par mthong / dngos gzhi'i dus brgyud pa'i bla ma rnams rmi lam du mjal nas byin gyis brlabs/ nyi shu rtsa gsum par sangs rgyas ras pa la rdo rje pho mo la sogs pa'i gter chos du ma gsan nas
189a1(1): bsgrubs pas/ rdo rje phag mo mngon sum du mjal/ brag la gsang rdor bsnun pas thim gyis song / rta mgrin/ sgrol ma/ spyan ras gzigs/ slob dpon chen po/ kun tu bzang po/ rdo rje sems
189a2(1): dpa'/ bi ma la/ za lung pa/ sangs rgyas ras pa/ 'gro mgon phag gru rnams zhal gzigs/ dung lung du mkha' 'gro'i skra shin tu snyan pas skye rgyud chod pa'i lung bstan/ ka ba can du phag mo dmar mo/ grub thob
189a3(1): za lung pa nam mkha'i klong du mjal/ ngar chung na bzhugs pa'i tshe rmi lam na phag mo gtso 'khor lnga mthong / der mnal sad tsa nas/ 'od kyi phag mo dngos su gzigs/ skyabs gnas rdzong du rdo rje sems dpas
189a4(1): rmi lam du rdzogs pa chen po'i dbang bskur/ spyir bla ma mang po bsten cing khyad 'phags kyi bla ma bcu gsum bzhugs/ bka' drin 'gran zla bral ba grub thob za lung pa/ mtshur phu'i ngo bo ras pa/ 'khrul zhig
189a5(1): seng ge rgyab pa gsum las snying por don rnyed pa yin/ 'di brtul zhugs shin tu che bas zhig po'i spyod pa blang dor med pas gsang ba sngags kyi dam tshig la sgra ji bzhin par spyon nus/ rgod phrug nam mkha' la
189a6(1): lding ba mthong bas rig pa brtul zhugs kyi ngar thogs nas nam mkha'i lam la 'gro ba dang / brag la 'dam ltar byed pa byung / mkhan pa ljongs dang / mkhan pa gling dang / seng ge rdzong dang / mkhar chu rnams su
189b1(1): sgrub pa'i rgyal mtshan btsugs shing 'gro don mdzad/ tshe tshad sum cu rtsa bdun yin pa la/ slob dpon kun dga' zhes pa'i skal ldan zhig gis gsol ba thebs pas/ dgung lo drug cu rtsa gcig pa la dur khrod la
189b2(1): bar gshegs pa'i tshe 'od chen po sgra dang bcas pa nub phyogs su yal ba kun gyis mthong / pur gyi rnam pa sbrang dus/ nam mkha'i lam nas pur khang la 'od lnga'i snam bu brkyang pa sogs ngo mtshar ba'i ltas
189b3(1): dpag tu med pa byung zhing / sku lnga thob pa'i rtags kyi gdung yang rgyud las ji skad bshad pa bzhin byon to// 'di grub thob o rgyan pa dang dus mtshungs/ u rgyan pa bcu phrag lhag bcas kyis bgres la sku tshe yang
189b4(1): ring ngo // me long pa'i slob ma ni rig 'dzin ku mA rA dza ste/ g.yo ru 'on par gsar rdzi da kha ces bya ba'i grong rdal du 'khrungs/ thar pa rgyan du btags/ chung ngu nas dad pa dang snying rje dang shes rab la sogs te
189b5(1): 'phags pa'i nor gyi khyad chos mang po mnga' bas klog yig ma bslabs par mkhyen/ lo bdun pa la kong po 'or shod mtho stengs dgon pa'i bla ma dgyes rdor ba las/ kye rdo rje dang bde mchog gi dbang zhus/ lo
189b6(1): dgu pa'i tshe mkhan po gtsang ba las yongs rdzogs kyi dge bsnyen blangs/ spyan ras gzigs 'khor ba dong sbugs kyis chos skor la sbyangs/ bcu gnyis pa la phag mo gru'i mkhan po yer ba pa dang slob dpon
190a1(1): mnga' ris pa las rab tu byung / mtshan gzhon nu rgyal por btags/ 'dul ba bslabs/ rin po che grags ye ba la log lnga'i bar du nA ro chos drug la sogs pa dang / mtshar stengs pa la brtag
190a2(1): gnyis nyan/ dpon sangs shel bzo rig pa bslabs/ yi ge drug pa bzlas pas shel gyi khang bu gcig na thugs rje chen po zhal 'dzum pa mthong / khyung nag shag dar la rnying ma'i rgyud lung man ngag mang du zhus//
190a3(1): ngadang phug tu me long rdo rje dang mjal/ phyag rgya chen po'i khrid zhus pas sems car mthong du ngo 'phrod/ de nas grub chen pa mon gyi mkha' 'gro gling la gshegs pa'i phyogs phyir byon/ rdo rje phag mo'i chos skor
190a4(1): sogs zhus nas bsnyen par mdzad pas/ tshes bcu'i nub cig u rgyan pad+ma dang mjal/ e ma rigs kyi bu/ rtag tu chos gyis shig gsungs/ de nas mtshur phur byon nas gnyen ras dang / dar ma mgon po la
190a5(1): karma pa'i chos skor rnams zhus/ de nas la stod ding ri dang / spu trar byon pas/ grub chen u rgyan pa dang / rje karma pa rang byung rdo rje dgung lo bdun pa rab tu byung ma zag pa dang mjal/ u rgyan pa las gdams
190a6(1): pa mang du nod/ de nas lo 'ga' na oM rgyan pas gnyen ras la snying tig zhus pa'i zla la tshang bar thob/ rgya sman pa nam mkha' rdo rje las gsang skor gnad kyi ngo sprod dang / skal ldan pa chos kyi seng ge las
190b1(1): gsang ba gnad kyi me long sogs rdzogs chen gsang ba'i skor zhus/ slar mkhar chur grub chen me long rdo rjer gsang ba snying tig dbang khrid gdams pa dang bcas pa legs pa thob/ 'bul rgyu gzhan med pas
190b2(1): lus ngag gi zhabs tog dang / dbyar ril po gnyis su ri mo mdzad/ nas khal bzhi bzhi gnang ba'i gnyis gnyis kyis shog bu nyos/ mtshan mo dpe rnams bris/ phyed pos mar me dang gsol ba mdzad pas//
190b3(1): dka' thub kyi mthus shig nad drag po zhig byung / thugs dam yang khyad par can 'khrungs/ bla ma mnyes nas 'gro don gyis shig pa'i rjes su gnang ba thob/ dbang gral du bla ma'i dbu'i bar snang la mgon po
190b4(1): phyag bzhi pa dang / sgo'i zad na e ka dza Ti mthing mo zhing dbyug dang sbrang mo bsnams pa bongs nyis thog tsam pa/ phyi ngos na las kyi ma mo khrag ral can lag pas khrag bcus nas 'thung ba rnams mthong / lo
190b5(1): brgyad du bla ma 'du 'bral med par bsten/ u rgyan gyi sgrub gnas skrag tshal skrag tu dgun thog cig bzhugs pas rdo rje phag mo zhal gzigs/ de nas shes rab phyogs med du rgyas/ re zhig yar klungs mtshar
190b6(1): stengs kyi ri khrod btab nas bzhugs/ de nas bla ma 'da' bar mkhyen nas mkhar chur byon tsa na/ bla ma'i sras gnyis sa skyugs su 'dzom/ slar log nyi shu lnga'i dus mchod btsugs/ tsa ri la byon pas krig
191a1(1): mo lha'i ne'u gsing gi rdo sku la 'ja' tshon sna lnga zug pa sogs byung / de nas mtshur phur chos rje rang byung rdo rje gdan drangs te snying tig gi gdams pa rnams phul/ shangs su byon nas lce sgom nag
191a2(1): po'i brgyud pa slob dpon sgom pa la gsang skor snyan brgyud rnams dang / bsam gtan mig gi sgron me zhus/ ding ri sna dmar du dpon po byang sgrub la yang dgon pa'i ri chos rnams nyan/ u rgyan pa rin chen
191a3(1): / dpal dang yang mjal/ mar lam bla ma bkra lung ba las gshin rje dgra nag la sogs pa zhus/ slob dpon ye mgon la sogs pa bshes gnyen mang dag las gsang skor dang / rgod tshang ba'i khrid kyi skor/ a
191a4(1): ro'i khrid mo che don skor la sogs pa bod na grags pa che ba'i rdzogs rim phal mo che khong du chud/ chos phyir dka' spyad bzod pas tsa ri gsar ma bgrod nas rnying ma'i g.yu mtsho 'gram du gcig pur zla ba brgyad
191a5(1): bzhugs/ cho 'phrul chen po byung ba gshis thog tu ro snyoms pas gzhi bdag dbang du 'dus nas khad par gdan drangs bsnyen bkur byas/ dzam b+ha las nor bu byin/ mtsho nang du 'od lnga'i lbu ba sel po tsam
191a6(1): zhig thim 'gro ba gzigs/ thugs nges 'byung dang skyo shas kyis rgyud brlan pas dus rtag tu sham po la sogs gangs khrod dang lung stong 'ba' zhig tu lhags skyob tsam la brten nas bzhugs pas slob ma'i
191b1(1): tshogs mang po 'khor ba mtha' can du mdzad/ sprul pa'i skur gdon mi za ba karma pa rang byung rdo rje dang / rgyal ba klong chen pa gnyis rdzogs pa chen po'i slob ma'i gtso bor gyur pas bstan pa 'di spel ba'i phrin
191b2(1): las la mu dang mthar ma son/ de skad du 'bri gung pa chos rgyal rin chen phun tshogs kyis/ chos 'di'i bstan pa'i bdag po kun mkhyen klong chen pa yin/ rgyal ba rang byung rdo rje'i dus 'phrin las rgya che/ zhes
191b3(1): gsungs pas mtshon no// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la shin tu goms pas snying rje chen po'i dbang gis grong dang yul 'khor mang po dag la'ang thabs la mkhas pas thar pa'i sa bon 'debs pa kho na lhur
191b4(1): mdzad cing / kong po nas e la thug gi bar 'jigs pas nyan pa'i lam phrang la 'gro ba dag gi dbugs 'byin pa dang / ri dwags dang nya la sogs pa'i sems can nyam chung ba de dag thugs shin tu brtse bas
191b5(1): bdog pa la 'phangs sems med pas ri rgya dang / lam rgya dang / chu rgya la sogs pa mdzad nas bde 'jam la bkod/ gang du bzhugs pa'i lung pa dang / yul grong thams cad kyi sad ser yams nad la sogs
191b6(1): pa zhi bar mdzad cing phan pa 'ba' zhig lhur len/ snying tig gi gdams pa rdzogs rim gzhan dang ma 'dres par rang skad kyi grub mtha' bslang ste 'chad nus pa dang / shangs la sme ba a'i ri mo can mnga' ba
192a1(1): sngags bdag gza' dang dam can rnams kyis bka' la nyan cing mi dang mi lab pa bzhin du yod pa dang / mngon par shes pas gdul bya'i bsam pa mkhyen nas 'dul lugs mkhas pa dang /
192a2(1): gzhan rgyud byin gyis rlobs nus pa dang / rjes su bzung ba'i skal ldan kun la 'das dus rtags khyad par can 'byung ba sogs slob dpon bi ma la'i sku'i bkod par grags shing / thal 'gyur las dge slong
192a3(1): dpal ldan zhes lung bstan to// de ltar don gyi 'gro don bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ngang nas bdun cu rtsa brgyad pa chu mo lug gi lo'i ston zla 'bring po'i nyi shu lnga la sgra dang 'od dang / gur khyim la sogs pa'i
192a4(1): rtags ngo mtshar ba dang bcas sku gshegs pas/ nye gnas sgom dar la sogs pa drung na yod pa rnams kyis mo gus chen pos gdung ba bskyed pas slar bzhengs te skyil mo krung bcas/ zhal 'dzum pa'i ngang nas
192a5(1): khyed rnams mya ngan ma byed/ nga shi ba min gsungs nas gdams ngag gzhal ta ci rigs pa byon/ zhag bcu gsum sku tshe slar la bsrings/ der tshes bdun gyi nyin gshegs pa'i phyi na ji ltar bgyi/ bla ma kun
192a6(1): mkhyen pa gdan 'dren nam zhus pas/ khong 'o brgyal du ma 'jug/ da gzod chos kyi zhun thar mchod pa yod na der song / kha ta mang po sngar nas byas zin/ cal col ma sgra gsungs/ drang srong tsog pu'i 'dug
192b1(1): stangs dang / chos sku'i gzigs stangs kyi ngang las 'dzum par mdzad de/ tshe brgyad kyi tho rangs kha na gdod ma'i grong khyer ga na ba der gshegs so// nyi shu lnga la pur bzhu bas dbu thod ril por byon pa'i nang na
192b2(1): rigs lnga'i tshom dkyil dang / snyan gong g.yas na rje btsun ma mthing ga tshon gang pa/ gdung rigs lnga dang / ring bsrel la sogs pa byon cing 'ja'i gur gyis khor khor yug du dkrigs so// de la rgyal ba'i
192b3(1): dbang po karma pa rang byung rdo rje ni/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs 'jig rten du dngos su byon pa ste/ chos kyi dbyings nas ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyi rdo rje'i glus bskul nas sems can rnams la tshad
192b4(1): med pa'i snying rjes gzigs te stod lung du rgan rgon gnyis kyi bu shi ba'i ro la grong 'jug gi rnam pas gshegs tsa na/ shi mi gson la blta ba ltas ngan yin zer nas mig khab kyis gtsags/ dal 'byor gyi
192b5(1): chos bco brgyad tshang ba'i lus las gzhan du gyur pas slar 'phos te/ rnal 'byor pho mo gnyis kyi bur srid pa bzung / sngon gnas rjes su dran pa la sgrib byed skra'i rtse mo tsam yang med pas mngal gyi dri mas
192b6(1): gtan nas ma gos pa rgya gar na shAkya thub pa dang / bod du skyes bu chen po 'di las med par grags/ rgya bod gnyis kar sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa'i srog shing gcig pur bzhugs/ bsam yas mchims phu dang
193a1(1): g.ya' ma lung sogs nas tshe chu'i gter bzhes nas gong ma rgyal po'i tshe bsrings/ bi ma la mi tra rang gi mdzod spur thim pa gzigs pa'i mod la snying thig gi dgongs pa ji lta ba bzhin mngon du
193a2(1): gyur/ 'on kyang gsang sngags bla ma la bsten pa'i mig ltos tsam ston pa'i slad du bcom bsnyungs nas rig 'dzin ku mA rA dza las gsang ba snying tig gi man ngag yongs su rdzogs pa gsan/ 'di ni slob dpon
193a3(1): chen po pad+ma las brgyud pa gcig 'od thang ba la dgongs pa'i tshe slob dpon sangs rgyas gnyis pa zhal gzigs/ man ngag snying tig dngos su thob kyang tshig brgyud la nan tan du bya ba'i phyir sho'i rgyal sras
193a4(1): legs pa spyan drangs nas tsa ri dgon gsar du rdzogs par gsan/ slar slob ma rnams la rtsal du bton nas gsungs/ bka' las/ chos 'di lta bu nub tu 'phangs pas g.yung ston rdo rje dpal gyis gtsang / ye
193a5(1): rgyal bas khams kong / ye shes rgyal mtshan pas hor dang rgya nag/ sbrul sku bas dbus su dar bar gyis zhes sman lung pa shAkya gzhon nu sogs la rjes su gdams/ sa la gnas pa'i byang sems kyis// rgya mtsho'i
193a6(1): bar du spel bar byed// ces pa de yin par grags/ kun tu bzang po thugs kyi klong na rang gsal te dgongs pa'i gter mdzod chen po la dbang bsgyur nas karma snying tig ces grags pa'i gdams pa yang byung /
193b1(1): 'di dag kyang bstan pa'i chu mgo gcig yin no// rgyal ba gnyis pa dpal bsam yas pa kun mkhyen ngag gi dbang po'am/ klong chen rab 'byams ni/ g.yo ru gra'i cha stod grong du ngan lam btsan po 'od kyi
193b2(1): dkyil 'khor can zhes bya ba ma smad pa'i rigs kyi yon tan can no// rus ni rog ste sad mi bdun gyi nang tshan dz+nyA na in+d+ra rak+Shi ta'am/ bod skad du ye shes dbang po bsrung / slob dpon chen po'i dngos slob dge
193b3(1): slong rgyal ba mchog dbyangs dang gdung gcig pa'i rabs nyer lnga pa/ mes po lha srung zhes bdud rtsi'i bcud len grub pas lo brgya dang lngar 'tsho ba de'i sras slob dpon bstan pa srung zhes rig gnas dang sngags
193b4(1): kyi rnal 'byor la rang byan chud pa zhig/ 'brom ston rin po che rgyal ba'i 'byung gnas kyi gdung las byon par 'brom bza' ma bsod rnams rgyan zhes bya ba dang 'dus pa las skye ba'i myu gu bzung ngo // de'i tshe yum
193b5(1): la seng ge chen po gcig gi dpral ba na nyi ma'i 'od zer 'bar bas srid pa gsum lhag ger gsal ba zhig rang nyid la thim par rmis so// de nas rab byung lnga pa'i phur bus spre'u spo zla'i tshes bcu'i nyin mngal
193b6(1): gyi chu 'dzin las rnam par grol/ gzhon nu don grub la lha'i dbang pos bya ba bzhin du nam grub re ma tis ngas bsrung ba yin zhes lag tu blangs/ slar yum la gtad nas mi snang bar song / 'di ltar byang chub
194a1(1): sems dpa' ni 'phags pa'i nor gyis gdod nas phyug pas dad pa dang / snying rje la sogs pa'i yon tan bsgrib med du gsal/ lo lnga nas bri klog legs par mkhyen/ yab las bka' brgyad
194a2(1): bder 'dus/ phur pa/ rta mgrin bla ma'i las gzhung sogs sgrub phrin mang du gsan/ sman rtsis la sogs pa'i rig pa'ang khong du chud/ dgu pa'i steng du nyi khri dang brgyad stong brgya tshar bton pas lhag med
194a3(1): du thugs la 'dzul/ bcu gnyis pa'i tshe bsam yas pa mkhas po bsam 'grub rin chen dang / slob dpon kun dga' 'od zer las rab byung gi dngos po brnyes/ mtshan tshul khrims blo gros su grags/ dam pa'i
194a4(1): chos 'dul ba la legs par sbyangs pas lo bcu bzhi par bshad pa'i ba dan bzung chog pa byung / bcu drug par slob dpon bkra shis rin chen la lam 'bras dang / chos drug gnyis/ phag mo'i chos drug/ bde
194a5(1): mchog dril bu pa/ phyag rdor 'khor chen la sogs pa'i dbang khrid gdams pa mang du nyan/ slob dpon dbang ye/ ston tshul/ khro phu pa la sogs par/ bya spyod/ rnal 'byor/ rdo rje gur/ mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho//
194a6(1): sangs rgyas thod pa/ rdo rje phreng ba/ dus kyi 'khor lo sogs pa'i sngags rgyud mang po dang / rin po che za lung pa sogs la zhang tshal pa'i gdams sgor/ rgod tshang pa'i lam khrid/ gcod yul/ zhi byed snga phyi bar
194b1(1): gsum la sogs pa mang du nyan/ bcu dgu par gangs ri'i khrod na tshad ma smra ba'i rig gra chen po rdog legs pa'i shes rab kyis legs par bskrun pa'i gnas gsang phu ne'u thog gi ma la ya'i nags klung chen
194b2(1): por zhugs nas gling stod gdan rabs bco lnga pa slob dpon btsan dgon pa dang / gdan rabs bcu drug pa bla brang pa chos dpal rgyal mtshan gnyis las/ byams pa'i chos lnga/ tshad ma sde bdun/ phar phyin//
194b3(1): dbu ma la sogs mtshan nyid theg pa'i lung rigs kyi pad+ma'i rtsa ba mngar por gyur pa dag lo drug gi bar du lhag ma ma lus par zos pas blo gros chen po'i lus kyi stobs lhag par rgyas/ dbang lo blo gros brtan
194b4(1): pa la mdo ting nge 'dzin rgyal po la sogs pa'i zab chos mdo lnga/ shes rab snying po'i rgya cher 'grel pas mtshon pa'i lung phran mang po sogs nang pa'i gzhung / sgra dang snyan dngags dang / sdeb sbyor dang / zlos
194b5(1): gar la sogs pa'i phyi rol pa dang thun mong du gyur pa'i gnas thams cad la zos bsam mthar phyin pa'i sna zhags ring por brkyangs/ shes rab kyi lha 'jam pa'i dbyangs/ mtsho ldan ma/ mi g.yo ba/ phag dkar
194b6(1): rnams la sgrub pa mdzad pas kun kyang zhal gzigs/ khyad par sgra dbyangs lha mo phyag mthil du bzhag nas gling bzhi ri rab dang bcas pa zhag bdun du bstan cing lung bstan thob/ lhag pa'i lha de dag gis
195a1(1): kyang thogs pa med pa'i blo gros kyi dngos grub chen po'i gnas gang yin pa'i dra ba dang / dra ba phyed pa'i 'phyang 'phrul dang / rin po che'i tog gis rnam par dpyangs pa/ brgal ba dang /
195a2(1): brtag pa dang / rigs pa'i thal 'gyur gyi sgra chen pos sa 'di g.yo ba tsam du gyur nas/ rgol ba ngan pa'i khyu mchog ra gcig pa'i brtul zhug 'dzin pa rnams sgrub pa dang / sun 'byin pa'i rkang pa mchog
195a3(1): gis rnam par brdzi ba dang / rnam par 'thag pa dang / rnam par nyam nyes par byas nas cang mi smras pa'i gnas la bkod pa bsam yas lung mang pa'am/ klong chen rab 'byams zhes pa'i mtshan gyi rnga bo che
195a4(1): kha' la 'gro ba dang / mi ma yin gyi gnas su'ang grags pa gsal ba nyid do// de ltar lung dang rigs pa'i gnas rgya chen po la mi 'jigs pa'i nyams brtas par gyur na'ang / 'di ltar skyes bu chen po ni
195a5(1): rnam par grol ba'i lam la gang nye ba'i phyogs la 'jug par rtsom ste/ phyogs bral gyi gnas su lhags nas byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu ngu'i rnam par thar pa la yid gzhung pas/ bla ma dang dge ba'i bshes
195a6(1): gnyen du ma la mdo dang / rgyud dang / man ngag mang du zhus nas thos pa dang bsam pa'i blo gros cher bskyed/ gangs ri'i khrod na gzhung lugs dang man ngag mang du gnas pa la phyogs dang ris su bcad pa
195b1(1): spangs te bung ba gzhon nus sbrang rtsi'i snying po la bya ba bzhin du/ dan phag pa/ slob dpon gzhon nu don grub myos mthing ma ba sangs rgyas grags pa sogs bla ma bzhi la mdo sgyu sems gsum/ rnying ma rgyud 'bum gyi
195b2(1): gtsos mang dag gsan pas snga 'gyur rdo rje theg pa'i grub pa'i mtha' chen por gcig tu 'jug pa'i rten 'brel shar/ phyis gsang ba'i snying po la snying tig dang mthun pa'i Ti ka phyogs bcu'i mun pa thams cad rnam
195b3(1): par sel ba nyi zla'i sprin gyi snang ba zhes bya ba dang / spyi'i khog dbub gnyis mdzad/ gsang snying 'grel pa spar khab gyi lugs ltar 'chad pa mi legs kyi/ rong zom kyi lugs ltar legs pa yin zhes gsungs/ lar
195b4(1): g.yung 'grel dang bcas 'di gsum rang bshad sgoms che bar snang / slob dpon gzhon rgyal la sogs par dbu ma tshig 'jug la sogs 'phags skor rnams tshang ba dang / gzhon rdor la spyod 'jug dang bslab
195b5(1): / btus la sogs pa/ jo bo'i yi dam skor sbyor drug/ chos drug/ mkhan po la khro phu pa'i skor/ kha rag chos skor/ sgrub thabs rgya mtsho/ chos chung brgya rtsa/ 'dul ba lung la sogs shin tu mang ba rje rang byung rdo rje la
195b6(1): sbyor drug gegs sel dang bcas pa/ na ro chos drug/ sku gsum ngo sprod/ rgyal ba rgya mtsho/ spyan ras gzigs rgyal po lugs/ gsang 'dus/ sam+bu Ti/ ma hA mA yA/ gshin rje gshed dmar nag sogs chos bka' rgya
196a1(1): chen po/ slob dpon dbang tshul la sbyor drug dang / bsnyen sgrub/ rlung skor la sogs pa mang po/ sa skye ba bla ma dam pa las/ sems bskyed chen mo dang / lam 'bras sogs sa skya ba'i chos zab dgu
196a2(1): gsan cing / 'di la gzhi lam 'bras bu gsum gyi rnam par gzhag pa'i zhu yig rin po che gser gyi mchod sdeng zhes bya ba'ang phul bar snang / zhi byed rgyud pa rma so kaM gsum du grags pa'i slob brgyud shug gseb
196a3(1): ri pa gzhon rdor la do ha skor gsum ri chos skor gsum/ rten 'brel rgya rtsa la sogs mdor na gangs ri'i khrod na grags pa'i grub pa'i mtha' phal mo che thugs su chud cing / 'chad rtsod rtsom gsum la thogs pa
196a4(1): med pa'i thugs rab skyes/ tha snyad kyi rig pa/ mdo sngags kyi gzhung lugs/ man ngag gi skor sogs gang la'ang rang byan chud par mdzad do// 'di ltar skyes bu chen po rnams ni/ thos bsam gyi mtha' sgrub pas
196a5(1): nyams 'og tu btsud nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi 'bab stegs nyid du mdzad de/ de la rnam pa kun tu 'khor ba'i rang bzhin la/ thugs skyo shas dang nges 'byung tshad med pas sngon gyi sangs rgyas
196a6(1): dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis bsngags pa'i gnas nags khrod dang / bas mtha' 'ba' zhig don du gnyer ba'i dgongs pa gtod pa'i tshe/ bcom ldan 'das kyis nges par 'byung ba'i rkyen bzhi
196b1(1): gzigs pa bzhin du/ gra sa der khams pa'i gra pa dag gis gzu bor mi gnas pa'i spyod pa ngan pas thugs nges par 'byung ste bya bral gyi kun tu spyod pas gshegs pa nye ba'i tshe/ mkhan slob rnams skyes bu dam
196b2(1): pa 'di'i rnam dpyod la dkon pa'i 'du shes bzod par dka' bas nan gyis bshol btab na'ang / sems can gyi bsod nams las gzhan don rlab po che'i phrin las kyi 'jug pa dus las ma yol bas bshol
196b3(1): ma thebs par chas tsa na/ rdog lo chen po'i gdung rten rtsar dge slong dpyod ldan pa zhig dang phrad/ khong gis kyang bshol btab cing skyo ba'i rnam par ston pa la gnas tshul rnams bshad pas/ khong yang khams
196b4(1): pa'i tshogs la 'khun par byed cing / da cis kyang gshegs na rang re la rtsom pa ni thog rdug med/ khams pa rnams la ngan smras zhig 'jog par 'tshal zhes bskul bas/ ku re'i tshul du shog bu bre kha gcig la
196b5(1): shong thang bris pa khong gis khyer nas chos ra'i khri la sbyar ba khams pa rnams kyis rig ste mthong du ma ster/ ka ling yul du srin po rgyu ba bzhin// ces pa la sogs pa'i ka kha sum cu pa 'di rgyal khams kun tu
196b6(1): dar ro// de nas nges pa med pa'i gnas su 'khyams shing sgrub pa 'ba' zhig lhur mdzad pa las rgya ma'i cog la brag phug tu zla ba lnga mun pa'i rnal 'byor la bzhugs pa'i tshe/ sil snyan gyi sgra glu dbyangs dang
197a1(1): bcas pa gcig gsan pas/ de la blta ba'i snang ba shar tsa na bud med lo bcu drug pa za 'og gi 'jol ber dang gser g.yu'i rgyan gyis spras shing bse khrab dril bus brgyan pa'i rta la bcibs pa
197a2(1): gdong gser gyi dra bas g.yogs pa gcig dang mjal/ de'i thu ba nas 'jus te 'phags ma rjes su 'dzin pa zhu zhes btud pas/ rin po che'i dbu rgyan cig 'dug pa phud nas kun mkhyen pa'i dbu la bskon/ deng
197a3(1): nas dus rtag tu byin gyis rlobs cing dngos grub sbyin no gsungs/ bde gsal mi rtog pa'i ting 'dzin la yun ring por 'byams/ man ngag rdzogs pa chen po'i chos dang mjal ba'i rten 'brel 'grigs/ de nas nyi
197a4(1): shu rtsa dgu bar bsam yas su phebs pa'i dpyid sos bla ma dam pa ku ma rA dza yar stod sgyum gyi phu na bzhugs pa la gtad de byon pas/ lam du g.yag sde pan chen dang mjal nas rje drung karma pa'i drung na deng zhes
197a5(1): bskul na'ang mnyan par lhags/ yar stod sgyum gyi phu na rig 'dzin pa slob ma'i tshogs cha ther lhags skyob bdun cu tsam dang bcas bzhugs pa dang mjal/ mdang lha'i bya yin zer ba'i bya ya mtshan can cig
197a6(1): la bya bran mang po'i tshogs dang bcas byung nas nga'i dpe cha rnams phyogs mtshams thams cad du khyer song bar rmis pas brgyud pa 'dzin pa zhig 'ong gsungs nas shin tu mnyes/ der chos khral 'degs rgyu med
197b1(1): pas thugs la skyo ba dpag tu med pa 'khrungs/ chos khral la 'thogs nas bla ma'i drung nas 'gro dgos pa nga las med pas nyin par 'gro ba ngo tsha/ sangs nam ldang tsa na lung pa 'di'i mda' la sleb par 'gro
197b2(1): dgongs tsa na/ bla ma'i mngon mkhyen gyis dgongs nas 'di'i chos khral nang nas 'debs pa yin pas ma brtser zhes gra pa gnyis kyis bsgyur byung bas dga' ches/ rig 'dzin pa de slob ma'i tshogs la skyo ba
197b3(1): bskul phyir gzhi mi 'dzin pas lo de'i dpyid sos lung stongs gcig nas gcig tu 'pho skyes lan dgu mdzad pas/ gzhi re zin dus 'pho dgos pa 'dra/ des rang la na bza' dang bza' btung gnyis ka med//
197b4(1): nam zla dang gangs rtsa yul shin tu grang pas lus sems la ngal dub dpag tu med pa byung / phye bre gsum dang dngul chu ril bu ril ma tsam nyi shu rtsa gcig las med pa des zla ba gnyis kyi 'tsho ba byas/ kha ba
197b5(1): ba dus 'bog gi dod skye gcig yod pa de'i nang du zhugs nas gos stan gnyis ka'i go bcad pa sogs chos phyir dka' ba sprad pa bsam gyis mi khyab/ lo der rdzogs pa chen po gsang ba snying tig gi dbang
197b6(1): khrid gdams pa dang bcas pa thob cing bsgoms/ phyi lo de dbang gong ma dang / rdzogs chen sde gsum gyi rgyud lung man ngag bstan bsrung dang bcas pa bum pa gang byo nas gnang bas bstan pa'i rgyal tshab tu
198a1(1): dbugs 'byin mdzad/ lo drug gi bar du sgrub pa'i dam bca' phul/ sum cu rtsa gcig pa la snying phu'i shug gseb tu snying thig gi sgo nas skal ldan du ma la smin grol mdzad/ rnal 'byor pa 'od
198a2(1): zer go chas dka' spyad chen pos mkha' 'gro'i snying tig gi dpe btsal ba gzigs phul ba dang mtshungs par/ gzims lam du shan pa srog sgrub mas glegs bam gtad/ sang phod sum cu rtsa gnyis par
198a3(1): mchims phu'i ri mo can du sgrub pa la bzhugs dus/ skal ldan gyi rnal 'byor pho mo brgyad la snying tig gi gdams pa btab/ spros bcas kyi dbang gi dus byin phab pas/ rnal 'byor ma gcig la sngags srung ma
198a4(1): mngon sum du bab ste 'khrab byung bas/ slob ma rnams kyis zil ma bzod par/ bla ma'i zhal nas 'di mkha' 'gro babs pa yin pa a'u tsi/ nga snang sems ro gcig tu rtogs pa'i rnal 'byor pa yin par chad mi
198a5(1): 'od gsungs/ der rnal 'byor mas bla ma la phyag byas/ dkyil 'khor la bltas nas/ rma bya ma 'dzom pa ga re zer/ yid kyis bsam pa yin gsungs pas/ brda'i chos la yid kyis ga na 'od zer/ yang bum
198a6(1): pa'i stegs kyi many+dzi dor te bum pa gsum sbrel nas bzhag/ cho ga'i rnam gzhag zhib mo mdzad dus/ thal mo sbyar te legs so brjod/ rigs kyi yi ge'i sa mtha' chad nas rig tu bos pa la/ min min rig zer
198b1(1): ba yin ces dang / sngags bzlas dus nga'i lad mo gyis zer nas mkha' 'gro'i skad du 'brel la ma 'brel ba'i gdang snyan po byas/ dngos gzhi'i skabs su/ blo sgom dang bral nas dga' ba la/ blo sgom dang bral
198b2(1): na a re skyid// zhes don gyi lta sgom yid dpyod dang bral ba'i glu blangs/ mchod pa ngan pa la 'dis mi lto zer/ mchod dbyangs snyan po byas/ tshogs kyi dus bla ma la bdud rtsi drangs dus/ 'di mkha' 'gro'i dam
198b3(1): rdzas yin pas cis kyang bsten dgos zer lhag med du drangs/ de'i tshe slob ma'i tshogs kyang nyams 'ur nas glu len bro brdungs/ tha mal gyi gnyid las 'das pa'i 'od gsal rtse gcig tu shar/ dpa' bo dang /
198b4(1): mkha' 'gro dang / chos skyong sna tshogs pa'i gzugs brnyan mngon sum du mthong nas/ bud med nag mo gcig gis phye phud nyams zer ba dang / dam can pa mi dkar por bstan nas nga'i gtor ma la dmar rgyan
198b5(1): chad zer ba dang / jo bo mdangs lha mi dkar rta dkar can du 'ongs nas gtor ma 'dod pa la dmar gtor sbyin pas ma 'dod pa dang / mkha' 'gro'i tshogs kyis bla ma gdugs 'bubs pa dang / bskor ba
198b6(1): byed pa dang / hUM dang phaT la sogs pa'i sgra drag po dang / thug chom chen po sogs cho 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyab pa byung bas/ rnal 'byor pa gcig gis do nub gnam sa ngo logs pa 'dug/ sha dum khrag dum
199a1(1): byed las che zer nas skrag pa sogs byung / de bzhin du 'od de gung rgyal dang / gnyen chen zang lnga dang / sman mo mched bdun la sogs gtor ma len du 'ongs/ rdo rje phag mo sku mdog mthig ga
199a2(1): rin po che dang rus pas brgyan pa mngon sum du byon nas dris pas/ do nub dus gnyen pas las can gyi slob ma nyul du 'ongs/ bla ma dam pa sku khams bzang zer/ da lo sku chag bdo bas ji ltar mchi dris pas/
199a3(1): mkha' 'gro mas/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam 'phrul la bar chad ga na 'ong / gdul bya la dgongs pa yin/ bi ma la bod yul du byon pa mi shes sam zer/ da ci tsam bzhugs dris pas/ lug lo phyi ma'i bar bzhugs/
199a4(1): de nas gdul bya dang bstun pa'i nges pa med zer/ 'o na nga bla ma ku ma rA dzAs gzhan don la bskul lam dris/ 'o 'o de ka zer dus/ ngas gcig por bsgrubs na 'od lus grub bam/ gzhan don byas na sems
199a5(1): can la phan thogs 'ong / ji tsam thub dris pas/ 'od lus 'grub kyang sems can la phan 'dogs dgos/ gzhan don 'ur 'ur/ da lo sum cu thub zer/ nga la bka' srung ji ltar yod dris pas/ mang mang bla
199a6(1): ma'i thams cad khyod la yod/ khyad par rdo rje g.yu sgron ma zer/ de bzhin du 'gro don lho nub phyogs na yod/ tshe phyi ma 'di bas kyang 'gro don che zer/ 'o na mkha' 'gro snying tig nas bshad pa de yin nam/
199b1(1): dbang khrid gdab tu rung nga ma dris pas/ 'o de ka de ka/ ma nor ma nor/ chos kyi bdag po khyed rang yin pa la los los zer/ yang mi rnams kyis zog por 'dzin du mi 'ong ngam dri pas/ mi'i kha la gtad pa ci
199b2(1): yod/ skal ldan rnams kho mos sdud/ skal med sangs rgyas la'ang skur pa 'debs zer/ snying tig gi chos bka' rdo rje g.yu sgron ma'i gnas su 'byed dam dris pas/ 'di na mkha' 'gro rang bzhin gyis 'du bas
199b3(1): 'dir 'byed dgos zer/ bum thang gi gter kha'i lung yang gsal bar bshad/ slob dpon chen po dang mjal lam dris pas/ lung gsum gyi phu/ ri gsum mda'/ brag chung de ba kha nub tu blta ba'i g.yas
199b4(1): zur du mjal zer/ bi ma la dang nam mjal dris pas/ mjal zin 'dug pa la zer ro// ngas rtogs pa'i lta ba 'di snying tig gi dgongs pa'i mthar thug gam dris pas/ mthar thug pa la nor 'khrul med zer/
199b5(1): slob dpon rin rdor gyis spang skang pa rin chen rdo rje ga na bzhugs dris pas/ bla ma la mdzub mo btsugs nas 'di na bzhugs 'dug pa zer/ der bla mas/ khong skye ba de'i 'og tu bum zang du skye ba la nga ga na
199b6(1): / yin gsungs pas/ de ka ltar skye ba min/ bar du longs sku'i zhing nyul dgos pa de slob dpon rin chen rdo rjes gter thon rjes lo 'ga' yar gsang nas bsgrub pa mdzad na rang don 'od gsal longs sku'i
200a1(1): rtsal sbyangs dang / gzhan la phan pa rgya chen po 'ongs pa la/ ma gsang bas sku tshe mthar ma phyin/ da lta khyed du skyes dus 'od gsal gyi snang ba lam du khyer ba 'di ni longs sku'i zhing khams dar cig
200a2(1): nyul ba de yin zer/ ngas phung po lhag med e 'grub dris pas/ gcig pur bsgom na da lta 'grub/ gzhan don mdzad pas bar dor grol/ sprul pas bum thang du skye ba blangs gzhan don byas/ de'ang nub phyogs
200a3(1): oM rgyan gyi yul du gshegs nas sangs rgya ba'i tshul ston gsungs/ yang ngas snying thig gi phan thogs bi ma la dang / mkha' 'gro gnyis gang che dris pas/ gnyis kas phan thogs/ bi ma la rgya che lo brgya/ mkha'
200a4(1): 'gro snying tig lo lnga brgyar gnas/ da nas mgo rtsom pa yin zer/ der bla ma yang thugs nyams 'ur nas sku bzhengs te rdo rje'i glu/ tshe 'di yang bde ste phyi ma skyid// bar do rang ngo shes pas bde// da ni bde ba'i
200a5(1): bde bar 'gro// glu mchod par 'bul lo dkon mchog gsum// thugs dgyes par mdzod cig mkha' 'gro'i tshogs// zhes pa'i mtha' can de gnang / da dung mkha' 'gro'i snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa mthong
200a6(1): zhing de thams cad mthar bla ma la thim/ bla ma yang res longs skur gnas 'gyur ba sogs mthong / der nyer brgyad kyi nyin gcig/ lho nub mtshams nas slob dpon chen po sku mdog dkar gsal za 'og gi
200b1(1): ber dang / she'u'i mnyen zhu can 'khor dpag tu med pas bskor nas byon te bla ma la thim pa mthong / de'i nub mkha' 'gro ma rus pa'i rgyan nam mkha' la bun bun 'gro bas bla ma la mchod pa byed cing / bud
200b2(1): med smug nag gsum bro 'khrab pa dang / nged yong yong bde chen gyi gnas nas yong // las can gyi slob ma nyul du 'ongs// dam tshig gi gtsang sbra blta ru 'ongs/ 'gro don mdzod cig rigs kyi bu// zer ba dang /
200b3(1): yang nang mchod mdzad pa'i dus slob dpon chen po'i g.yas na bi ma la/ g.yon na rdo rje phag mo/ mdun na mkha' 'gro ma mang po mi rkang 'bud/ rgyab na sngags pa mang po 'tshams/ mkha' 'gro ma gser gyi go zhu
200b4(1): ba can mang pos glu gar byed cing bskor ba'i dbus na bla ma bzhengs nas/ dga' 'o skyid do rnal 'byor kun// dus do nub 'og min dag pa'i zhing // rang lus zhi khro'i pho brang na// stong gsal rgyal ba'i dkyil
200b5(1): 'khor rgyas// sangs rgyas phyi na med de nang na yod// ces dang / sems gcig pur gnas pa'i bsam gtan pa// yid gcig la mi 'dzin gang bder zong // sems 'phro yang stong la gnas kyang stong // gang
200b6(1): shar ye shes kyi rol pa yin// ces pa la sogs rdo rje'i glu bzhengs/ de dus rdo rje g.yu sgron ma dkar mo mched bdun dang bcas pa byon nas nga'i gnas su gshegs pa zhu zer/ bla mas nga khyed kyi gnas su rgyun
201a1(1): du sdod dgos gsungs pas/ rgyun du bzhugs na dga' ste dgun stod las mi bzhugs pa 'dra/ khyod pa la ci'i phyir 'gro dris pas/ gu ru'i dam 'og tu chud pas gter gyi phyi la 'brangs zer/ der
201a2(1): chos ni pha gir yod/ 'dod mkhan ni shi/ 'dir ci byed byas pas/ chos pha gi na yod kyang don 'di na yod/ khyed tshe 'phos kyang skal ldan tshe ma 'phos pas yongs pa yin zer/ bka' srung rnams lung bstan cing //
201a3(1): 'di shin tu gnyan pas sku tshe la bar chad 'ong nyan yod/ khrid thebs nyung na dga' zer/ nga yi gter shog rnams e yongs dris pas/ sib sib nged rnams kyi yid skul ba yin mod zer/ yang ngas khyed la dbu ru
201a4(1): dngos grub byin pa mi dran nam zer/ sngar cog la'i brag phug gi de dran nas rdo rje g.yu sgron ma e yin byas pas/ min min/ rdo rje phag mo yin ngo ma shes sam zer/ 'di na 'jig rten pa'i gzugs kyis phrin
201a5(1): las byas pa dang / 'das pa'i gzugs kyis mchog gi dngos grub ster ba'i rnam pa cha phyed dgos pa'o// 'di nas thig le gtso bor bshad nas dbang gsungs pa rten can du bskur ba ji ltar lags dris pas//
201a6(1): de chags chen lam du 'jug pa la dgos pa yin/ chags bral la yid rig tsam gyis chog gsungs/ ngo spyod kyi skabs su rtog pa skye med du 'jog pa dang / blo rtsis med du 'jog pa gang yin dris pas/ rtog pa la
201b1(1): brtan pos ci byed/ ye grol klong yang sa chen por ngo sprod cig zer/ 'o na snying tig 'di bshad mi mang po ni snang na ngas bshad ci dgos/ lung byed pa karma pa dang / rin chen gling pa sogs pa'ang 'dug pas so
201b2(1): byas pas/ bshad tshul de dag la nged mi mgu/ lung dang rdza la'ang yong ste/ des gar chog/ bdag po re yod pa de dgos pa yin mod zer ro// rin chen gling pa'i gter kha dris pas yin pa ma yin/ dag rgyu med
201b3(1): zer/ ngas khyed ma bsgoms par grub pa'i rgyud dris pas/ nga la sgom pa'i lha 'dug gam/ bzlas pa'i sngags 'dug gam/ mchod pa'i yul 'dug gam/ rnal 'byor pa dam tshig dang rtogs par ldan pa kun la'ang
201b4(1): rgyud du yod pa mi shes sam/ khyod dang tshe rabs thams cad du 'du 'bral med zer/ mchims phur lha lcam gyi nor yod pa de ci 'dra zhig 'dug dris pas/ brag lha bshos dra ba rtse mo med pa gcig na
201b5(1): 'dug/ da dung dus la ma bab zer/ bi ma la'i gter ji tsam na 'don dris pas da nas lo bco lnga na sngags pa dkar po gcig gis bton nas dar bar byed/ zab pa pod bzhi khyed rang gi lag na 'ong bar
201b6(1): 'dug zer/ der zla ba tshes pa'i tshes bcu gcig la rnal 'byor pa 'od zer go cha dpe len du btang nas lam du 'ong dus/ 'ja' tshon cig dpe la zug cing 'khor ba dang / khyad par zung mkhar mda'i rdo'i
202a1(1): mchod rten gyi nye logs phyug po brag ces bya bar sleb pa'i mtshan mo ri mo can nas 'di'i bar 'ja' tshon kha dog sna lngas 'brel ba rnal 'byor pa pho mo kun gyis mthong ngo // der tshogs 'khor
202a2(1): bskangs la sogs pa mdzad nas man ngag mkha' 'gro'i snying tig gi chos sgo phye/ mtshan mo 'od gsal gyi snang ba las chos sku'i dgongs pa ka dag gi dbyings su 'khyil tshul/ de'i rtsal snang longs sku'i char
202a3(1): lugs/ phyir gsal las sprul pa'i sku 'gyed cing / rigs drug gi 'char tshul sogs 'od gsal gyi chos skad sgra bo che dang / rtsis po che dag gis kyang phyogs mi mtshon pa'i ngo bo'i bzhugs tshul chen po gang yin
