202a4(1): pa bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro'i tshogs kyis thugs rgyud la mngon du gsal bar byin gyi brlabs shing / mkha' 'gro mas ngo sprod cer mthong du mdzad/ de'i tshe man ngag mkha' 'gro'i yang tig gi yig cha 'jog dus
202a5(1): slob dpon rin po che thugs sgrub kyi cha lugs su byon/ g.yas na 'tsho rgyal dang / g.yon na g.yu sgron mas tshig dpyod pa rnal 'byor ma mkha' 'gro'i mtshan rtags tshang ba gcig gis kyang mthong / khyad par du ye
202a6(1): shes 'tsho rgyal nyin zhag drug gi bar du dngos su byon nas mkha' 'gro'i snying tig gi brda' don dpe gsum ngo sprod gtad rgya dang bcas mdzad pas dmigs pa dang / ngo sprod lugs dang / brjod pa'i tshul ngo/
202b1(1): mtshar can snga na ma grags shing / yi ge na mi gsal ba mang po thugs la rang rdol du byon pas gangs ri'i khrod na gzhan snying tig gi yi ge zab mor grags pa ji snyed la'ang / kun tu bzang po gnyis pas chos
202b2(1): kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i dgongs gter rgya mtsho'i rdo rje'i gnas 'di na gsal ba'i zab gnad kyi cha shas kyis kyang ma gos pa nyid du mthong bas/ yig cha 'di la ma brten pa gang zhig ri mo'i mar me dang
202b3(1): mtshungs pa nyid du rig par byas nas bstan pa 'di la ces spras su bya bar 'os so// 'di ltar gdams pa'i sa bon phal cher gnas 'dir byung yang gtan la 'bebs sa gangs ri zod dkar du mdzad pas
202b4(1): sbyar byang la de ltar thebs pa yin no// lar chos 'di mkha' 'gro'i snying khrag lta bu gyur la gnas 'di'ang byin rlabs che bas rtsa ba gsum dang mkha' 'gro'i 'du ba zad mi shes pa dang / rma bya'i gdugs rin po
202b5(1): che'i tog gis mtshan pa bla ma'i dbu steng na bzung ba mthong ba dang / dkyil 'khor gyi thig mdzad dus thig sna bud mes dmar mor 'dzin pa dang / re khA dgram pa'i tshe bud med gser g.yu'i lan tshar can gyis
202b6(1): 'bri rogs byed pa dang / dbang gong ma'i dus slob ma bdun tsam tshogs pa la/ shangs khrag glo bur du byung nas/ bla ma'i gsung gis dbang 'di la gsum las mi tshud pa la grangs thal bas lan/ khyed bzhi phyir
203a1(1): dengs gsungs pas dbang khang la 'ja' tshon zug pa dang / nam gru re ma tis mngon sum du 'ongs nas nga la gtor ma mi ster ba e yin/ ngas dka' las yun ring rab byas zer nas rang nyid
203a2(1): gtso 'khor rnams kyi mngon rtogs gsal bar bshad cing / gter gyi lung bstan dang cho 'phrul chen po bstan pas/ da nang 'od gsal gyi gter kha phyed pa la// brag ser ka'i gter gyis dgos pa
203a3(1): med// gter yod kyang cho ga la med kyang chog/ skal ldan yin kyang chog la min kyang chog/ chos zad blo zad kyi rnal 'byor la// khyed gter srung gis yus che 'tshong mi dgos// zhes gsungs/ rgyab chos dang rin/
203a4(1): po che gsang ba'i ngo sprod mdzad pa'i tshe/ ye shes 'tsho rgyal gyis bum pa bsnams nas dbang bskur bas mthong bas thams cad 'ur langs phyag tshor zer ba byung / bar do dang 'od gsal sbubs 'jug gi ngo sprod
203a5(1): mdzad dus/ mkha' 'gro ma rnams mnyes/ nga'i chos 'di la mi las mi ma yin rtsis che zhing don gnyer dang 'dun pa che bar 'dug khyed rang tsho sems la zhog gsungs/ 'od gsal ye shes kyi ngo sprod mdzad pa'i
203a6(1): tshe bar snang thams cad mkha' 'gros gang nas thal mo sbyar/ nub mo sngags srung ma babs nas gar byed pa la/ bla mas kho bo snying tig de ltar du ston pa yin/ khyed bka' srung dang mkha' 'gro rnams e dga'
203b1(1): gsungs pas/ gu ru dang ye shes 'tsho rgyal de bzhin gsungs/ gzhan de ltar shes pa ga na yod ngo mtshar che/ spyir mkha' 'gro thams cad dga'/ lhag par u rgyan rdzong na gsol ba 'debs pa gcig mnyes
203b2(1): nas gda' zer/ de nas skyes bu chen po byung nas u rgyan rdzong du 'byon par bskul/ khyed la slob ma 'gro don nus pa sum cu 'ong / de'i nang nas kyang sems can la phan pa che ba bcu gcig yong / khyad par can
203b3(1): dgu yod/ khyed tsho bla ma 'di dang 'phrad pa 'tshengs pa yin zer/ chos skyong gi gtad rgya byed dus/ shan pa srog sgrub mas nga'i sgrub thabs mi klog pa zhu zer ba'ang byung / de ltar mkha' 'gro snying tig gi dbang
203b4(1): khrid thams cad rdzogs pa'i nub/ kha sang nas mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyis dngos grub byin pa yin/ do nub bos kyang e yong blta yi chang la chu rgyob cig gsungs// yod tshad btsags pas rdza chung gang byung / des
203b5(1): cho ga las che zhus pas/ des mi ldang da dung chu rgyob la tshogs gsungs/ de bzhin byas pas btsags tshad chang du byung nas der tshogs pa thams cad bzi ba tsam song bas/ dngos po sbrul bsgyur bya ba de ltar yin
203b6(1): gsungs/ de nas g.yu sgron mas kyang nga'i gnas su gshegs pa zhu zhes bskul nas zhal gyis bzhed tsa na/ shin tu dga' ba'i tshul gyis kho mo sngon la 'gro zer/ der nam gru ma babs nas bla ma mi gshegs par
204a1(1): zhu zer/ khyed mi ma yin rnams la ngas chos de 'dra bshad kyang mgo/ dga' mi dga' blo'i cho 'phrul yin/ nga gang yod sar 'ongs pas cho ga gsungs nas ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang bskur cig mdzad
204a2(1): pas thugs la btags zer/ kha sang gar dengs dris pas/ 'brog tu sdud cig la phyin zer/ de dus phyugs nad mang po byung bar grags/ de nas rnal 'byor pho mo rnams kyis kyang rang rang gi gos dang rin po
204a3(1): che'i man+dal phul/ bsgrub pa'i dam bca' byas pas/ nga'i chos 'di la gtong phod dang sgrub pa'i dam bca' la brtson pa mang po yong gsungs/ yang 'od gsal sbubs 'jug gi gdams pa gsungs nas/ nga'i
204a4(1): man ngag 'di dag 'dzam bu'i gling na dkon pa yin/ snod kyis 'chun na 'od lus myur du 'grub po gsungs/ bsam yas mchims phu nas phyags phebs/ phyug po brag tu tshogs 'khor mdzad/ g.yu sgron mas
204a5(1): bsu ba'i rnam pa yang byas/ de nas shugs gseb tu gdan drangs dus rnal 'byor ma gcig la mkha' 'gro babs nas bla ma u rgyan du gshegs par zhu zer/ de nas gangs ri thod dkar u rgyan rdzong 'od zer
204a6(1): sprin gyi skyed mos tshal du phebs/ rnal 'byor pa 'od zer go chas gsol ba btab nas mkha' 'gro yang tig gtan la phab/ de'i tshe nam mkha' 'jas khengs/ mkha' 'gro'i snang ba dang cho 'phrul zad mi shes pa
204b1(1): kun gyi mthun grub tu byung / de dag gi bar skabs ci rigs par bla ma'i drung du'ang gdams ngag gi zhun zar bcad/ gang du bzhugs sar sgrub pa'i rgyal mtshan btsugs nas bla ma mnyes par byas/ 'di snang la
204b2(1): chags zhen med cing 'khor 'das la re dogs su 'dzin pa dag pas dgon gnas dang gzhi 'dzin pa'i 'di 'god ma mdzad/ bla ma'i drung du 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i 'bul ba lan lnga/ 'bul mo che
204b3(1): gnyis dang / bdun rnam dag gis mchod/ zla ba byung ngo cog gi tshes bcu rnam gnyis dang / brgyad mchod bzung nas dpa' bo dang mkha' 'gro rnams tshogs gtor rgya chen pos mnyes par mdzad/ gnas 'dir
204b4(1): 'od gsal thod rgal gyi gse lam las rig pa tshe phebs kyi grong khyer ga na ba der byon te rgyun rnal 'byor lhums su zhugs/ yi dam gyi lha dpag tu med pa zhal mjal/ khyad par slob dpon bi ma las zhal
204b5(1): gzigs nas/ nga'i snying tig 'di don bsdus go sla'i snying khu zhig sdebs/ ku ma rA dza'i skye ba da lta'i slob ma gzhon nu sangs rgyas la ston/ de nas kyang sna la a yig gis mtshan pa'i gzhon nu'i ming can bdun
204b6(1): 'byung bas chos 'di 'dzin spel byed par lung bstan pas yang tig yid bzhin nor bu chos sde sum cu rtsa lnga par gdams/ de bzhin du bi ma las dbu ru zha'i phyogs su sdigs mdzub gtad nas zhig gsos
205a1(1): dgos par lung bstan pa ltar/ de nyid du byon nas zhig gsos mdzad pa'i tshe/ mnan pa'i thod pa mang po nam mkha' la 'phar ba ting nge 'dzin gyi ngang las sdigs mdzub gtad pa tsam gyis bkug
205a2(1): dbu rtse'i rgyab nas lha khang gso ba'i thebs gser 'gu tse gang bcus/ dam can byis pa g.yu rna can du sprul nas nyin bzhin bzo bo'i grogs byas/ rdo rings chen po gnyis 'gyel ba thabs dang dpung gang gis
205a3(1): kyang slang ma nus par/ chos skyong la gtor ma byin/ bden tshig brjod/ thugs 'ur ba'i tshul gyis sku chos brdabs pas mod la slong nus pa byung / thod pa sna tshogs na dam sri mnan yod pa'i bca' gzhig pa
205a4(1): rnams sor btsud de slar yang de nyid du rgyas 'debs par brtsams pa na/ 'thor rlung drag po g.yos/ sa rdo'i char babs pas mi rnams kyang bros/ thod pa rnams 'phar nas phan tshun brdabs/ che shos shig dam
205a5(1): sri'i 'phrul gyis nam mkha' la yar ba drag shul rab tu 'bar ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / lta stangs kyis bkug nas zhabs kyi 'og du btsud pas/ gsal ba gyad du gyur pa'i rtags gu ru drag po'i skur gzhan gyis
205a6(1): dngos su mthong / slar thod pa rnams phra med mchod rten gyi zhabs su mnan/ rab gnas kyi dus sku'i bkod pa du ma ngo mtshar bar bstan/ thub pa byams pa/ gnas bstan bcu drug rnams zhal 'dzum lhag lhag
205b1(1): ston pa dang / byams pas phyag mdzub gdengs nas/ khyod kyi skye ba'i mthar pad+ma brtsegs pa'i zhing du de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab mar me'i rgyal mtshan du 'tshang rgya'o zhes pa'i lung bstan thob/ dbur stod skyid
205b2(1): chu'i 'gram phan tshun gnyis kar chos nyan mang du 'tshogs pa la gsang ba bla na med pa'i khrid btab/ tshogs pa rnams la tshogs kyi 'khor lo rgya chen po yang yang gnang / gsang bu'i chos gra la'ang snga phyir gnang
205b3(1): byin bzang po mdzad/ gang po ri'i thad nas gdong 'jigs su rung ba zhig gzigs/ 'jig rten la mi dge ba dang / sa phag gi rtsod pa 'ong ba mkhyen nas mon bum thang du phebs/ bstan pa'i snang ba nyung bas
205b4(1): shin tu gdul dka' ba'i gnas der yang gdul zhing rgya che/ tshogs pa mang po 'du ba'i dge 'dun gyi sde btsugs te thar pa gling du btags/ slob dpon sangs rgyas kun dga' bsgo 'ja' gnang / snga 'gyur spyi
205b5(1): dang rdzogs chen gyi phrin las spel/ gsang sngags rang dgar spyod pa dag la mig ltos bstan pa'i ched byar nas gter ston gyi dngos slob sho'i rgyal sras legs pa las/ mkha' 'gro snying tig gi tshe rgyud gsan/
205b6(1): lha sar byon nas jo bo mjal dus mdzod spu nas 'od zer byung ste nyid kyi smin mtshams su thim pas bya rgod phung po dang / li yul rnams su pan+da tar skye ba blangs pa dran/ gnas 'dir dge 'dun mang po'i bsu ba
206a1(1): ser phreng gis bsus/ lha sa dang ra mo che'i bar du chos khri brtsigs pa'i steng nas sems skyed chen mo sogs chos 'khor rgya chen po bskor/ khengs pa'i blo can mang pos dngos dang brgyud nas
206a2(1): nyams sad byed pa mtha' dag lung dang rigs pa'i chom pos rnam par btags nas nges shes skye ba'i dad pa la bkod pas kun mkhyen chos rje zhes pa'i mtshan gyi rna lung dpyangs/ yang lan cig jo bo mjal
206a3(1): dus sku las gser btso ma lta bu 'od 'phro ba dang / dbu'i steng na sangs rgyas rabs bdun/ sman bla/ bde dgyes/ spyan ras gzigs nam mkha' rgyal po// rgyal ba rgya mtsho dang / bstan srung gi tshogs du ma
206a4(1): gzigs/ 'dis mtshon pa'i dus dang dus ma yin par/ slob dpon chen po/ gu ru drag po/ dam pa rigs brgya/ sgrub chen bka' brgyad la sogs pa sangs rgyas byang sems til gyi gong du ltar zhal gzigs
206a5(1): nas bstan bcos rtsom par bskul zhing bka'i gnang ba thob pas/ dgongs pa kun tu bzang po'i klong na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i chos nyid las g.yo ba med pa'i ngang nas rjes la thob pa'i ye shes sangs
206a6(1): rgyas rnams kyi thugs rje dang 'grogs nas rgyal ba bden par smra ba'i bka' dang tha dad du med pas byin gyis brlabs pa'i bka' 'am/ 'chos skyob gnyis kyi yon tan rgya mtshos bsrungs pa'i bstan bcos gang
206b1(1): zhig sems kyi glang po sems byung dang rtogs tshogs mtha' yas pa'i khur gyis dub nas 'khor ba rgya mtsho'i rum na 'jug par rtsom pa dag/ bde ba chen po tsan+dan ljon pa'i grib bsil ngal gso'i dbugs
206b2(1): 'byin chen po ster ba'i chos tshul/ rtsa ba ngal gso skor gsum/ bsdus don phreng ba rnam gsum/ rgyas 'grel shing rta rnam gsum/ don khrid rnam gsum/ spyi don legs bshad rgya mtsho/ dkar chag pad+ma stong ldan
206b3(1): te chos sde bcu bzhi/ log par smra ba'i phyi rol pa dag rang gi gtan tshigs la mchog tu zhen pa'i 'jig tshogs la blta ba sum brgya drug bcu'i ri dwags mi srun pa rnams kyi mtshangs gting nas brus te/ grub
206b4(1): mtha' ngan pa'i spyir bor brgal ba dang / brtag pa dang / sun 'byin pa'i sder mo rnon po bsnun nas cang mi smra ba dang yul yul po'i gnas la 'god pa sngon du 'gro bas/ ston pa 'jig rten gsum gyi mig gcig
206b5(1): bu'i grub pa'i mtha' theg pa gsum gyi khang bzang chen por/ bla na med pa'i theg pa'i khyad par yid bzhin nor bu tog gi blo gros de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sku gsung thugs mi zad pa rgyan gyi 'khor lo'i
206b6(1): mdzod khang dam par zad mi shes pa'i skor la/ yid bzhin mdzod rtsa ba le'u nyer gnyis pa/ 'grel chen pad+ma dkar po/ khrid yig rdo rje snying po stem bu gsum/ gnad las snying por phyung ba man ngag rin po che'i
207a1(1): mdzod/ klong sde shas cher ston pa chos dbyings rin po che'i mdzod rtsa ba le'u bcu gsum pa/ 'grel pa chos dbyings gsal ba ste sde tshan gnyis/ theg pa mtha' dag gi don gsal ba grub mtha'
207a2(1): rin po che'i mdzod le'u brgyad pa/ ku ma rA dza'i dgongs rdzogs su brtsams par grags pa rgyud bcu bdun dang / man ngag brgya bcu dgu'i don 'grel brjod bya shin tu rgya che ba theg mchog mdzod rim khang nyi shu
207a3(1): rtsa lnga pa'i bdag nyid can/ de'i gnad don bsdus pa tshig don rin po che'i mdzod rdo rje'i gnas bcu gcig pa/ sems klong man ngag gsum ka'i snying po'i mthar zug gnas lugs rin po che'i mdzod rtsa ba le'u
207a4(1): lnga pa/ Ti ka dang bcas pa ste mdzod bdun gyi bdag nyid can phal mo che gnas 'di nyid du byung / spyir sngags bdag gza' dang / dam can gsum las la bran bzhin du 'khol zhing bka' nyan pas/ mdzod 'di
207a5(1): dag rtsom pa'i tshe gangs rir khyab 'jug chen por snag tsha nyer bcug pa nye gnas pas mngon sum du mthong / de ltar bshad pa dang don gyi snying po'i bsgrub pa kho na la dben pa 'ba' zhig tu bzhugs pa'i sbubs
207a6(1): gnas kyang / bsam yas mchims phu/ u rgyan rdzong / lha ring brag/ gra phu/ shug gseb/ gangs ri thod dkar/ gzho stod ti sgro/ yer pa/ yar lha sham po/ bum zang / skum phu dpal gyi dge sdings/ gong po ri'i
207b1(1): gla ba lung / kong po tsa gong gi phu rnams las phal cher gangs ri nyid du gtan chags/ lho 'brog/ dbu g.yor/ lho mon gyi yul mtha' dag tu khrid nyan stong phrag tshogs pa lan mang du byung zhing / de dag
207b2(1): la'ang thugs bskyed shin tu che bas/ chos khral mi len/ dad rdzas chud mi gson/ slob ma'i bya ba 'ba' zhig don du gnyer ba la log sgrub dang skyo ngal bzod/ tshogs kyi 'khor lo rgya chen pos bsti stang du bya ba
207b3(1): dang / gzhan rgud kyi bsam pa mkhyen nas thabs la mkhas pa'i gdul tshul dpag tu med pa la sogs mdor na rang don du spangs rtogs phun sum tshogs pa'i go 'phang brnyes/ 'dod pa gtan nas zad pa la
207b4(1): sogs pa'i phrin las bsam gyis mi khyab pas gdul bya smin grol la 'god pa'i rnam par thar pa gang yin pa ni skyes bu chen po 'dis lag len la btab pa ste/ 'bri gung sgom pa kung rin rang srid kyi dregs
207b5(1): pas myos te dmag 'khrug g.yo bar brtsams pa la/ slob dpon chen po'i lung bstan du// 'bri zhes bya ba'i sa phyogs suH/ kun dga'i 'di 'bri gung srid stong pa zhig len gsung / ming can bdud kyi buHlus la mtshon
207b6(1): cha'i ri mo yodaH/ shi nas dmyal bar skye bar 'gyur// lho yi phyogs nas 'jam dbyangs kyi/ \u0f7f/ sprul pa gcig gis 'dul bar byedaHces pa'i lung bstan de sgom pa kun rin gyi dkar po rnam par 'phel ba'i sa
208a1(1): bon gyis mthong nas rang gi lus las bltas par rgyab ngos su sha mtshan ral gri 'dra ba gcig byung / de rang nyid du gdon mi za bar shes nas dbus gtsang 'dir 'khrug pa chen po gcig byed
208a2(1): bsam kyang / dmyal bar 'gro na byed don chung bsams nas brnag par dka' ba'i las la bshol btab/ phyogs kun tu dril sgrags nas 'jam dpal gyi sprul pa btsal bas/ mkhas pa kun zhal 'tsham par da
208a3(1): lta bod ru bzhin bsam yas pa las mkhyen rab che ba mi bzhugs zhes bsgrags pas/ 'jam dpal gyi sprul par nges shes rnyed de spyan drangs nas gtsug gi nor bur byas pas/ 'gro ba gang dang gang dag ga/
208a4(1): gnas skabs dang mthar thug gi las mi srun pa'i rgyu rkyen 'bras bu dang bcas pa drungs nas 'byin par mdzad/ de tsam na dbus gtsang 'dir dregs rlom gyi sgra'i cod pan gzhan la ston par dka' ba ta'i si tu
208a5(1): byang chub rgyal mtshan gyis 'bri gung pa'i bla ma yin zhes mi mthun par blta ba la/ tshad med pa'i thugs rje chen po'i phrin las dang / mkhas pa dang grub pa'i rnam thar bzang po bud+d+ha shris rna lung du dpyangs pas
208a6(1): mtshams sbyar te bod shing sgo can pa'i rgyal po seng ge rkang pa brgyad pa'i spyir bor yang zhabs sen legs par bkod/ de bzhin du dbur stod khri dpon si tu shAkya bzang po/ yar 'brog khri dpon rdo rje rgyal
208b1(1): mtshan la sogs pa'i mi chen du mas kyang sri zhu byas/ de dag la sogs te dad pa can gyis byin pa'i rdzas kyang slob dpon nA gA rdzu na'i rnam thar bzung nas gnas min du cung zad tsam yang chud mi gzon par dkon
208b2(1): mchog gsum la bsti stang bla lhag tu mdzad/ yo byad chos phyogs su bsngos zin pa rnams rang gi rdzas su 'du mi shes pas phyogs gzhan gang du'ang 'byams mi srid/ bsnyen bkur dkon mchog la dgos pa yin gyi
208b3(1): sdig can la mi rung gsungs nas mi chen la stan dang bkur sde mi mdzad/ tshogs bsags yon bdag gi bya ba yin gyi mchod yon go log pa mi bzang gsungs nas/ 'bul ba chen po gang phul yang de bsngo bas rgyas
208b4(1): 'debs pa las gdab lan mi yod/ 'gro ba nyam chung la thugs lhag par brtse bas snyoms chung dang sbrang pos ci drangs kyang zhim zhim ltar gsol nas/ mdo 'don pa dang bsngo ba nan gyis gsungs/ de lta bu'i
208b5(1): mdzad pa dpag par dka' bas mthong ba'i chos la rjes su bzung ba dag lta ci smos rang bzhin gyis mthong ba dang / zos pa dang / reg pa dang / gnod pa byed pa'ang bde ba'i gnas su 'brel zhing / byang grol gyis
208b6(1): bon thebs par mdzad nas lnga bcu rtsa drug bzhes pa chu mo yos kyi lor/ skal ldan mang po la smin grol gyi gong 'phang ster ba'i skabs shig rgyal sras bzod pa la snag shog sngogs shig gsungs nas zhal chems dri
209a1(1): ma med pa'i 'od du/ 'khor ba'i rang bzhin snga nas shes zin te// 'jig rten chos la snying po med pa'i phyir// da ni mi rtag sgyu ma'i lus 'dor bas// gcig tu phan pa'i gdams ngag bshad kyis
209a2(1): nyon// ces pa la sogs pas sna drangs nas// thugs rje mnga' ba'i mgon po pad+ma'i zhal// dbugs 'byin mdzad pa de yi deng bzung bas// 'gro ba'i dus bab 'gron po lam zhugs bzhin// 'chi bas dga' ba'i
209a3(1): rnyed pa legs grub pa// rgya mtshor don yongs grub pa'i tshong pa dang // g.yul las rnam par rgyal ba'i lha dbang dang // bsam gtan grub pa'i bde bas ches lhag go/ da ni mi sdod pad+ma las 'brel rtsal// 'chi med
209a4(1): bde chen btsan sa 'dzin du 'gro// zhes pa la sogs kyi zhal chems bstan pas rgyal sras bzod pa na re// de ltar mi gsung ba zhu zhes mchi ma blags pas/ 'dus byas 'jig pa las brtsams pa'i chos mang po
209a5(1): gsungs/ slar bsam yas su gdan 'dren byung bas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bzhin du rgya ma dang bsam yas brgyud mchims phu dpal gyi nags khrod du phebs/ de yis chos kun sgyu ma lta bu dang / skye ba skye mos tshal
209a6(1): 'gro ltar rtogs nas/ zhes pa de skyes bu chen po 'dis nyams 'og tu btsud pas/ gnas 'di ni rgya gar gyi dur khrod bsil ba'i tshal dang mtshungs pa yin/ gzhan du skye ba las 'dir 'chi ba dga'/ nga'i sgyu lus
209b1(1): gog po 'di 'dir 'jog pa yin gsungs nas bsnyung ba'i tshul bstan kyang da dung chos mtshams rgyun ma chad/ der 'o brgyal du bsam te re zhig chos mtshams 'jog par zhus pas chos 'di rdzogs pa zhig byed
209b2(1): bsam pa yin te gsungs/ de nas rgyal zla ba'i tshe bcu drug gi nyin dpa' bo dang mkha' 'gro rnams mchod gtor rgya chen pos mnyes par mdzad cing / slob ma'i tshogs la spyir yang 'dus byas la snying po med pas
209b3(1): chos 'ba' zhig don du gnyer/ lhag par khregs chod dang thod rgal gyi nyams len gnad du snun/ ma go ba'i skabs byung na yang tig yid bzhin nor bu 'di bsal 'phel nor bu dang 'dra bas lta rtogs zhib mor
209b4(1): gyis la sgoms dang / chos nyid zad sa'i sa la mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro zhes gdams/ de nas tshe bco brgyad kyi nyin mchod pa gcig shoms la khyod rang rnams dge sbyor la dengs gsungs/ sku drung na 'dug
209b5(1): par zhus pas/ 'o na da'i sgra lus gog po 'di 'dor ba yin pas ca com byed par mnyam gzhag gi ngang la sdod gsungs/ sku gdung rin po che chos sku'i bzhugs stangs kyis bzhag nas/ dgongs pa gdod ma'i
209b6(1): dbyings su mnal ba la/ sa chen po 'di yang yid khong du chud pa ltar gyur nas/ ldeg rab tu ldeg pa la sogs pa'i zol gyis lus brdeg cing g.yo bar gyur la/ 'ur rab tu 'ur ba la sogs pa'i zol gyis cho nge
210a1(1): 'don pa la zhugs so// gdung zhag nyer lngar bzhag pas bstan la dga' ba'i lha rnams kyis 'ja' 'od kyi gur phub me tog gi char phab/ dgongs pa chos nyid du grol bas 'byung ba chen po bzhi'ang
210a2(1): dus bzhi'i gtan tshigs 'dzin pa'i brtan pa bral nas/ rgyal dang cho 'phrul gyi zla ba gnyis kar sa dros/ 'khyags pa zhu/ se ba'i lo ma rgyas pa byung / gdung mchod pa'i zhing du byin za'i khang par spyan drangs pa'i
210a3(1): tshe'ang sa g.yos/ sgra chen po lan bdun grags/ zhugs la bzhen pa na sku gsung thugs rdo rje gsum gyi ngo bor byang chub pa'i rtags thugs ljags spyan gsum ka skal ldan gyi slob ma'i phang par byon/ sku lnga dang ye
210a4(1): shes lnga'i thob bya ma lus pa mngon du mdzad pas gdung chen lnga dang / ring bsrel phra mo grangs las 'das par byung / ring bsrel gong bu che ba dag nas brgya stong grangs med du 'phel ba rtsod pa dang bral zhing / sku
210a5(1): gdung ma nyams pa phran bu bzung ba dag la'ang da lha'i bar du steng gdon gyi gnod pas rdzi bar mi nus pa sogs mngon sum tshad ma'o// skyes bu chen po 'di'i gsung rab ni rgyal ba'i bka' dang khyad par med pa yin
210a6(1): pas nges brjod rtogs sla ba'i phyir rnam grangs bkod na/ thun mong phyi'i bstan bcos/ khyad par nang gi bstan bcos/ nges don gsang ba'i bstan bcos te skor tsho gsum/ de dag la'ang nang gses kyi dang po la//
210b1(1): rig gnas kyi skor/ gtam gyi tshogs/ bstod pa'i tshogs dang gsum/ gnyis pa la rgyu dang 'bras bu'i theg pa gnyis/ gsum pa la zab gsang rgyud sde'i dgongs 'grel dang / khyad par bla na med pa 'od gsal rdo
210b2(1): rje snying po'i gdams skor ro// dang po rig gnas kyi skor la/ yig sdebs kyi sbyor ba dpag bsam snye ma che chung gnyis/ don bsdus/ sgra'i mtshams sbyor rab gsal zla ba sdeb sbyor nyi ma'i shing rta/ lci yang gi gnas
210b3(1): rin po che'i lde mig/ mngon brjod me tog 'khri shing / snyan dngags kyi bstan bcos me tog kun tu rgyas pa'i skyed mos tshal/ dper brjod klu shing gi me tog/ gnyis ka spel ba tshangs pa'i gsung dbyangs te sde tshan
210b4(1): bcu/ gnyis pa gtam gyi tshogs la/ mi'am ci kun tu dga' ba'i zlos gar/ po Ta la kun tu dga' ba'i gtam/ gzhon nu zhi ba'i rtogs brjod me tog gi chun po/ blo gsal ri bong gi rtogs brjod/ nags tshal
210b5(1): kun tu dga' ba'i gtam/ nags kyi gtam pad+ma dkar po/ gangs ri'i rgyan kun tu bzang po/ ku mu ta'i 'khri shing kyi gtam lnga/ slob dpon/ rang byung / skye bo/ mkhas blun/ bshes gnyen/ chos dang chos min
210b6(1): brtag pa'i rab byed drug sogs chos sde bzhi bcu rtsa lnga/ gsum pa bstod tshogs la/ rgyal ba sras bcas kyi tshogs dang / 'jig rten pa'i lha chen po rnams dang / ri dang / rgya mtsho/ sgrub gnas/ bsam yas
211a1(1): gsang phu'i chos gra sogs gtsug lag khang dang chos sde rnams la bstod pa'i tshogs bzhi bcu rtsa gsum mo// gnyis pa khyad par nang gi bstan bcos kyi skor la/ dang po rgyu mtshan nyid kyi theg pa'i sgor
211a2(1): la/ byams chos lnga'i spyi don gyi 'grel pa/ sa lam gyi rnam gzhag rin po che'i them skas rtsa 'grel dang bcas pa/ mngon rtogs rgyan gyi lus rnam gzhag gi gsal byed rgyan gyi snang ba/ 'dul ba ka ri ka'i gsal byed
211a3(1): 'od kyi snye ma/ dbu ma thal 'gyur gyi gnas gsal ba rab tu mi gnas pa'i don bsdus/ bslab bya rgyal sras lam bzang sogs legs bshad rgya che ba'i chos sde nyi shu rtsa gsum/ gnyis pa 'bras bu sngags kyi skor la/
211a4(1): chos spyod thams cad kyi mngon par rtogs pa rgyud kyi bshad 'grel byang chub ljon shing / rgyud sde spyi'i don bshad rdo rje 'byung ba/ dam tshig gsum bkod kyi rnam bshad nyi ma'i 'od zer/ sgrub phrin skor la'ang gnas
211a5(1): brtan bcu drug gi cho ga gzhan phan nor bu/ sgrol ma maN+Dal bzhi pa'i cho ga bde legs kun 'byung / sman bla'i cho ga yon tan phreng rdzogs/ spyod rgyud sgrub thabs zla ba'i nor bu/ rnam snang sgrub thabs ngan song kun
211a6(1): sbyong / kun rig rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor du slob ma 'jug cing dbang bskur ba'i cho ga mi 'khrugs pa'i sgrub thabs sdug bsngal kun spyod/ shAka thub sgrub thabs 'od zer kun 'byung / byams pa'i sgrub thabs pad+ma
211b1(1): brtsegs pa/ gzhan yang 'jam dpal/ dbyangs can ma/ phag mo/ mi g.yo ba/ dzam b+ha la/ de dag rnams la dkar ser dmar sngon sogs so so'i sgrub thabs/ dmar po skor gsum/ 'od zer can/ nor rgyun ma/
211b2(1): aM gu li/ dug sel can/ rnam rgyal sogs dang / dbang phyug khyab 'jug sogs 'jigs rten pa'i sde/ gzhan bya spyod rnal 'byor bla med gsar rnying thams cad kyi rtsa gsum chos srung nor lha bcas/ rgyal ba sras
211b3(1): bcas kyi sgrub thabs skor chos sde brgyad cu rtsa lnga/ gsum pa nges don gsang ba'i bstan bcos la/ dang po zab gsang rgyud sde'i dgongs bcud rdzogs rim skor la/ bde mchog rim lnga'i zab don snying po'i yang zhun//
211b4(1): gsang 'dus rim lnga'i zab don 'od gsal 'khor lo/ sbyor drug bsdus don de nyid 'dus pa/ lam 'bras bsdus don rim gnyis 'khor lo/ chos drug snying po 'od gsal rnam sbyang sogs chos sde nyi shu lhag tsam//
211b5(1): gnyis pa 'od gsal rdo rje snying po'i skor la/ ngal gso skor gsum dang / mdzod chen bdun bcas pa'i sde tshan sngar bshad zin la/ bi ma la'i snying tig zab pa bod bzhi dang man ngag brgya bcu dgu brjod bya che bas
211b6(1): 'thor ba bsdus pa lta bu bla ma yang tig gam/ yang zab yid bzhin nor bu/ skye ba snga ma la mkha' 'gro'i snying tig rjod byed tshig gi gter la dbang ba/ da res mchims phur brjod bya'i don la dbang bsgyur nas//
212a1(1): rgyas par bkral pa'i zab cing rgya che ba shog sku/ yang zab rnams shog 'dra/ shin tu yang zab rnams shog ser te skor gsum du phab pa'i mkha' 'gro yang tig/ gnyis ka'i don rgyas pa bkral ba zab
212a2(1): mo yang tig/ snyan brgyud thig le gsang skor dang / snying tig rnam pa gsum du bsdus pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs bcu phrag bzhi lhag bcas te/ kun dril bas sde tshan brgya phrag gnyis dang drug cu rtsa gsum tsam mo// de
212a3(1): dag kyang mdo tsam smos pa ste/ gzhan du chos 'byung rin po che'i gter mdzod ces bya ba dang / chos spyod rab tu gsal ba dang / shi gson gyi bsngo ba rin chen phreng ba dang / rgyu la khams 'dus pa me tog phreng ldan
212a4(1): dang / rkyen la khams 'dus pa ka tha sum cu/ rgyu rkyen gnyis ka la khams 'dus pa dus la mngon par skyo ba'i rabs la sogs pa shin tu mang la/ dus de dag tu bsdu ba'i brtson 'grus nyung ba'am/ mkhas rmongs kyi
212a5(1): bstan bcos la bye brag mi phyed pa'i shugs kyis nub pa'ang shin tu mang ba yod mchi ste gsung rab kyi dkar chag rin po che'i mdzod khang zhes bya ba la shes par bya ba ni phyi mtha' 'di'i gtan tshigs tsam mo// babs
212a6(1): lugs chen mor sgra mkhas dpal 'dzin du lung bstan pa la sngon gyi bla ma rnams kyis ngos 'dzin par 'dug ste/ go rim gyi nges pa ltar na blo gros mchog tu ngos bzung na 'thad la/ ku ma rA dza dang gnyis kyi bar la
212b1(1): lo brgya brgya'i gtan tshigs mi 'grub snyam du'ang dogs par mi bya ste/ lo brgya ni spyir bstan pa 'di yid dpyod dang 'dres pa'i tshe de'i gsal byed re 'byon pa la dgongs kyi/ gzhan du ni gnas skabs de dang de'i
212b2(1): gdul bya'i rten 'brel kho na las ltos nas sprul pa sgyu ma lta bus don mdzad pa'i phyir ro// don la kun tu bzang po 'jig rten du byon nas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba yin pas 'di'i gsung rab tshig bzhi pa yan chad
212b3(1): la'ang ces spras su bya ba yin no// de la gsung gi bdud rtsi myangs pa las byung ba'i slob ma'i gtso bo dag smos pa ni/ zhog thar gling pa mkhas grub bde legs rgya mtsho/ mkhas grub chos kyi grags pa/ mkhas grub
212b4(1): khyab gad la lhun grub ste grags pa thob pa'i mkhas grub gsum/ mdo khams pa 'dan sgom chos kyi grags pa/ rgyal sras bzod pa/ bla ma dpal mchog pa/ gu ru ye shes rab 'byams/ gzhon nu sangs rgyas
212b5(1): te thugs kyi sras lnga/ sbrul sku dpal 'byor rgya mtsho/ slob dpon sangs rgyas kun dga'/ slob dpon blo gros bzang po// stag mgo bya bral chos rje ste/ bstan pa spel ba'i bshes gnyen bzhi/ pha rgod rtogs ldan
212b6(1): rgyal po/ rnal 'byor pa 'od zer go cha/ rig 'dzin 'od gsal rang grol/ bya btang bsod nams 'od zer grub pa thob pa'i rnal 'byor pa bzhi/ gzhan yang ste gdong gong ma dang mtshams sbyor ba'i sangs rgyas
213a1(1): dpal rin dang / grags pa dpal/ glu mkhas bsod nams seng ge la sogs bstan 'dzin gyi bshes gnyen du ma byung / phyis chos rgyal 'bri gung pa rin chen phun tshogs la zhal bstan cing / rang gi
213a2(1): sras sbrul sku zla ba zhes dbu gtsugs rta mgos mtshan par ston pa de'i skye ba yin par lung bstan/ dbu zha bskon te byin gyis brlabs pa las dngos kyi slob mar gyur te gsung rab rnams la 'dzin skyong spel ba'i
213a3(1): gces spras dpag tu med pa mdzad/ de las pad+ma'i rgyal tshab shAn ta pu ri pa'am/ gter chen shes rab 'od zer la brgyud/ dpal ri theg pa mchog gi gling bskrun nas bstan pa'i sprin bdag zhabs drung 'phyong rgyas
213a4(1): pa la sems nyid ngal gso rtsa 'grel par du brko bar bskul/ bstan pa 'di la bshad sgrub byed dgos par gdams pas don gyi brgyud 'dzin yin pa yang zhal gyis bzhes so// dus phyis rig pa 'dzin pa mkhyen
213a5(1): brtse'i 'od zer la sa mo yos kyi lor dpal gyi mchims phur ye shes kyi sku lan gsum bstan cing shing rta chen mo sogs gab pa'i man ngag thams cad 'dis gsal zhes glegs bam zhig kyang gtad/ gdams pa
213a6(1): dang rjes su gdams pa thams cad bstsal nas chos tshul rgya mtsho dang khyad par kun mkhyen bla ma nyid kyi gzhung lugs dang gdams pa mtha' dag la rang byan tshud/ shin tu nye brgyad kyang rung ste 'phags pa lhas ma taM
213b1(1): gi pa rjes su bzung ba bzhin no// man ngag snying gi thig le'i skabs kyi gtam bshad zin to// // da ni mdo sgra sems gsum gyi bstan pa spyi'i babs tshul la/ gangs ri'i khrod 'dir snga 'gyur rdo rje theg pa'i
213b2(1): bstan pa dang por gnyigs la babs/ bar du gnubs la babs/ tha mar zur la babs zhes 'chad pa'i dang po slob dpon gnyigs dz+nyA na ku mA ra ni/ yul yar klungs shel pa'am 'phyos/ rus las ming du chags
213b3(1): pa gnyigs stag sgra lha snang dang / sru bza' sgron skyid gnyis kyi sras su byung / mgrin pa na sme ba rdo rje rgya gram yod/ mtshan rgyal ba'i blo gros su btags/ mkhan po bo d+hi sa twa las rab tu byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs/
213b4(1): mdo sngags kyi chos mang po'i 'gyur byed spobs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa yin/ slob dpon chen po dang / bi ma la dang / bai ro dang / g.yu sgra snying po kun la bsten pas bka'i chu bo bzhin 'dus pa yin/ dkyus
213b5(1): bshad gzhung gi chu bo 'grel Ti ka stong thun dang bcas pa/ snyan brgyad gdams ngag gi chu bo gnad yig dmar khrid dang bcas pa/ byin rlab dbang gi chu bo skur thabs ngo sprod dang bcas pa/ phyag bzhes phrin sgrub kyi
213b6(1): chu bo bstan srung drag sngags dang bcas pa'o// de la slob dpon chen pos bdud rtsi yon tan gyi dkyil 'khor du smin par mdzad pas yar klungs shel gyi brag phug rdo ba skam po'i khong nas grub chu bton/ 'di las
214a1(1): brgyud pa'i sgyu 'phrul kyang yod dgos te/ gtso bor phur pa las mngon rtags brnyes pa yin/ btsan po khri srong gshegs pa'i phyi zhig na btsun mo tshe spong bza' bsam sbyor mi srun pas lo pa Na phal cher
214a2(1): dbu 'phang smad/ gnyags dz+nyA na ku mA ras yar 'brog tu bzhugs pa la/ rang gi pha spun gnyags dge ston dgra langs te 'di mu stegs kyi sngags mkhan yin no zer g.yo can gyi kha smras byas/ bse zhos byugs pa'i
214a3(1): b+han+da nang dmar ba yod pa de brkus nas skye bo blun por gyur pa dag la ston cing / b+han+d+ha'i nang gri rtse drud nas 'di ni zag zog gi las so zhes dbyen bcos/ skye bo rnams the tshom sel ba'i ched du/ gang du bzhugs
214a4(1): sar rin po che'i rnyed pa sprul pas mi rnams kyis rdzu 'phrul du shes nas kho'i ngag la yid mi gtod kyang / da dung bya ba mang po bsogs nas sku la brdo ba'i thabs sna tshogs byed pa mkhyen nas gshegs/ kong po
214a5(1): mchims yul gyi phu na phebs tsa na/ lung stong gcig na ra ma bdun 'gro zhing 'dug/ g.yog po glal mig 'og btsan bya bar 'di ded cig gsungs pas/ kho na re/ ra la bdag po yod mchi 'dis ci 'tshal zhus pas//
214a6(1): lung stong gi ra la bdag po ga na 'ong ded cig gsungs/ der bdag po mchims bya rog gis shes te rkun khag phab/ ra la bdun 'jal dgos zer/ bdun 'jal sprad tsa na/ da dung mtshims par dben pa
214b1(1): bshigs/ lcags kyis tho ba bzung nas 'ded du byung / gnyags kyis bros nas gtsug lag khang gi nang du chud/ sgo bcad pas them pa la tho bas brdeg cing btsun chung gi mgo la de'u thebs zer/ der yang bzhugs
214b2(1): su ma ster bas/ dbus su gtad de byon tsa na/ 'gro sras chung bya ba sha ba gcig ded nas byung ba phrad/ kho'i rta drogs/ sha ba shor bas/ kho yang khros te gsod du byung ba la 'bros pa'i 'dun pa gcig gtad pas khos
214b3(1): ma mthong nas thar/ dus de tsam na lha sras mu ne btsan po yum dmar rgyan gyi dug gis bkrongs pa'i 'dad kyi tshogs dbur slob dpon bi ma la rgya nag nas rdzu 'phrul gyis gshegs pa dang mjal/ gser phye long mo
214b4(1): gang phul bas/ lo tsA ba dpon g.yog skyid dam gsungs// yar 'brog sgad du skyid bgyi ru// dge la ston gyis ma ster ro// mchims yul gting du skyid bgyi ru// bya rog dmyal bas ma ster ro// bod yul dbus su
214b5(1): sgyid bgyi ru// 'gro sras chung gis ma ster ro// zhes zhus pas/ lo tsA bar brnyas na bstan pa la shin tu gnod par dgongs nas/ phur pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / gsham sngon gnyis thugs nas phyung ste bshad/ lho
214b6(1): brag g.yar chu sna'i brag phug tu lo pa Na lhan cig pas seng phur nyi shu rtsa gcig la bsten nas bsgrubs pas phur bu phan tshun 'khrol ba tsam du grub/ der gnyags kyis ting nge 'dzin gyi ngang nas phur bu gdengs te bya
215a1(1): rog la'o byas pa/ stod khams kyi bya rog thams cad tshogs byung / slar mchims bya rogs la'o zhes bsgril bas/ mchims nas bya rog zung zhig byung / gnyigs khros nas bya rogs gcig la gdengs
215a2(1): pas mod la shi'o// der bi ma las mngon spyod kyi mthus gsad pa grub kyis/ da chos nyid kyi mthus gso ba e 'grub gsos shig gsungs pas/ slob dpon dza lan+ta ri pa dang / slob ma nag po spyod pa bzhin
215a3(1): gnyigs kyis slong ma nus/ bi ma las bye ma gcig btab pa'i mod la bya rog sos te dengs par gyur to// rtogs pas bdag ma bsgral bar/ drag shul gyi las brtsam pa grub kyang nyes pa che'o gsungs nas gnas
215a4(1): lung gi cho ga mdzad/ der mchims lha g.yag dkar du brdzus nas byung ba sngun la bsgral/ de nas mchims bya rog/ bla sbrang rab 'bring tha gsum/ bran dang khol po/ 'og rta sgo khyi gnag gi gnyen mtshams dang
215a5(1): bcas pa phur pa gdengs mchog gi mthus bsgral nas rabs bcad/ de nas pha spyan gnyigs dge ston la btab pas 'di ltar drag po mthu'i las ni rnam pa zhe sdang rdo rje'i rten 'brel la lhag par ltos pa zhig la/
215a6(1): / slob dpon bi ma la'i thugs rjes gnyigs la snying rje chen po'ang skyes/ dgongs pa chos nyid du gyur pas ye ma thabs/ der slob dpon bi ma la'i las 'dir grogs mngon spyod kyi mtshan dang ldan pa zhig rnyed
215b1(1): na thebs gsungs pas 'tshol du byon/ dus de tsa na mgar byed pa la sog por 'bod pas/ sog po beg tse zhes bya ba khro bo'i dbyibs su yod pa gcig rnyed/ de'i gzugs mgo bo rgya mdud du 'dril zhing / ro smad
215b2(1): zur gsum pa'i rnam par shar ba la sogs pa'i mtshan rtags thams cad tshang bar gzigs/ gnyigs kyis kho bo'i phyi na mar byon/ kho mgar byed pa'i sprad pa 'bud grogs mdzad kyi rgyu mtshan nyid kyi chos bshad
215b3(1): pas kho'i rna lam du ma byung / kr-i yog sde gsum bshad pas res 'ga' tsam nyan cing gzhan tho ba chems chems brdung skad/ nang rgyud sde gsum bshad kyi na lcags kyi lcug ma snyod pa rnams khyur mid byas pas/ kho ya
215b4(1): mtshan skyes te 'di lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul ci las byung zer/ da lta bshad pa'i chos de nyams su blangs pa las byung smras pas/ kho shin tu dad de lag cha thams cad phul nas slob mar byas/ lha dpal gyi ye shes su ming
215b5(1): spos/ de bzhin du 'o bran dpal gyi gzhon nu yang phur pa sgrub pa'i mtshan ldan du shes nas dpon slob gsum kas bsgrubs pas/ de dge ston gyi tshor te gsod du 'gro ba'i sta gon brtsams pa na/ gzhan dag gis
215b6(1): ban+der brnyas pa mi rung zer nas bshol btab kyang ma nyan/ nang par 'gro rgyu'i nub bud med mang pos mtha' bskor nas mgo bcad pa rmis/ de chung ma la bshad pas nan gyis bshol btab kyang mnyan par rta la
216a1(1): zhon nas song ba na/ bya chen po zhig 'phur byung nas rta 'drogs/ sha khams khrag thig tu gyur te srung mas dngos su bsgral bar grags/ der sog po dpal ye snying bton nas slob dpon la phul bas/
216a2(1): sdig pa ci yang mi bya zhing // dge ba phun sum tshogs par spyad// rang gi sems ni yongs su gdul// sems can thams cad bde gyur cig/ gsungs/ mdor na skyob pa'i lha bya khrar sprul pa dang / bla sbyang bran khol
216a3(1): 'og rta sgo khyi gnyen mtshams tshud chad bsgral zhing rabs bcad/ de bzhin du 'gro sras chung ni thang la rta khyung 'tsho ba'i rnam par shes pa'ang bkug ste gdab las kyis tshar bcad/ 'gro lha spyang ki sngon por byas pa
216a4(1): dang / bla sbyang bran khol thams cad sngar bzhin kha dag par byas/ de'ang gnyigs lo tsA chen po 'di sangs rgyas dngos dang mtshungs pa'i paN grub rnams la bsten pas/ sgra tshad mtshan nyid/ sngags phyi nang kun la
216a5(1): mkhyen pa shin tu che bar grags/ lo tsA ba chen por bstan nas dam pa'i chos mang por bskur/ mdo spu sems gsum ka'i bstan pa'i mnga' bdag tu gyur cing nyan bshad kyi sgo nas slob ma khyad par can mang du
216a6(1): bskrun pas bka' drin bsam gyis mi khyab/ mthar snyan brgyud rdo rje'i zam pa dang / man ngag sde las dngos grub chen por brnyes te stong gsal 'od kyi phung por gshegs so// de la slob ma'i gtso bo ni phur pa
216b1(1): mkhan po dag dpal brgyad du 'dren pa yod de/ 'dir sog po dpal gyi ye shes/ gra dpal gyi snying po/ lha lung dpal gyi rdo rje/ 'o bran dpal gyi gzhon nu/ gnyen dpal dbyangs/ mtshur nag ye shes dpal/ u
216b2(1): pa do gsal/ zang dpal gyi rdo rje/ dgye 'phags pa shes rab/ b+hu su ku mchog rnams te/ dpon brgyad rnams las kyang phrin las rgya cher byung ngo // sog po dpal gyi ye shes ni yul yang 'brog pa yin/ slob dpon
216b3(1): chen po'i dus nas dngos grub brnyes tshar ba gcig thun mong ba'i snang ngor mgar gyi tshul du bzhugs/ gnyigs lo chen po de mkhyen pa shin tu che bas slob dpon rnams las kyang rang nyid mkhas snyam pa lan gsum
216b4(1): skyes pas srog la 'bab pa'i do gal tshar gsum byung bar grags/ de la rgyu 'bras mi bslu ba'i bden pa las bdag gir mdzad pa'i tshul ston pa la bab pa'i skabs shig na/ gnyags la sku dgra lan gsum du
216b5(1): langs pa'i res gcig yul nye 'khor gyi gnyigs dmar pha spun gyis mi sha mkhon tu byas nas slob dpon btson du bzung / sog po dpal ye de don la grub pa'i spyod pa 'ba' zhig yin gyi rnam par gcan zan gyi
216b6(1): gnya' nas 'dzin pa sogs rtul phod par ston pas/ skabs 'dir bla ma'i phyir du lus srog 'dor ba'i rdo rje dam tshig gnyen po la 'tshal bas btson srung gnyis bkums/ slob dpon btson dong nas spyan drangs pa
217a1(1): sogs sku dgra lan gsum btul zhing thugs las gsum bzung bas/ rdo rje phur pa'i dkyil 'khor mngon sum par sprul nas rjes su bzung ba 'di tsam don la gnas so// des gnubs chen la rjes
217a2(1): su gdams pa'o// de la snga 'gyur gyi bstan pa bar tu gnubs la babs te/ gnubs chen sangs rgyas rin po che 'di/ btsan pa'i khri srong lde'u btsan nas/ khri bkra shis brtsegs pa dpal gyi bar ci rigs par byung
217a3(1): bar 'dod pa dang / yang ral pa can gyi dus su byung nas/ khri bkra shis brtsegs pa'i bar bzhugs par 'dod pa dang / yang snga ma btsan po khri srong lde'u btsan dang / phyi ma ral pa can gyi dus na byung ngo zhes gtan
217a4(1): tshigs yod de/ rgya bo cher/ rgya gar mkhas pa bi ma mi tra dang // u rgyan mkhan po pad+ma 'byung gnas dang // bal po'i mkhas pa ba su d+ha ra dang // bod kyi mkhas pa dz+nyA na ku mA ras// bdag la gnang ba'i man ngag 'di
217a5(1): rnams yin// ces pas btsan pos khri srong gi dus su byung bar rtsod pa med la/ sku tshe'i tshad brgya dang bcu gsum la gtan tshigs bsgrigs nas byon pa'i dus phyir bsring ba dang / dus gnubs dang / yul sgrags la
217a6(1): gzugs brnyan gnyis par bcos pas snga phyi gnyis par byung ste snying po med do// 'dir ni gnubs kyi ban chung sangs rgyas ngas// lo ni brgya dang sum cur lon// zhes phyi mtha'i tha tshig min pas skabs kyi 'phros
217b1(1): don la'ang byung bas tshe'i rig pa 'dzin pa brnyes/ mnga' bdag dpal 'khor btsan gyi bar du bzhugs par snang ngo // de la yab gnubs rigs gsal ba'i dbang phyug dang / yum mchims mo bkra shis mtsho zhes
217b2(1): bya ba'i bur btsas/ mtshan rdo rje khri gtsug tu grags/ lo bdun par 'o bran dpal gyi gzhon nu las bri klog sbyangs/ mkhan po bo d+hi sa twa las rab tu byung / slob dpon ba su d+ha ra bsam yas su byon pa dang mjal
217b3(1): nas gser srang gsum gyi 'bul bar byas te man ngag 'ga' zhig thos/ slob dpon 'byon khar slar bal yul du shog ces pa'i rjes su gnang ba thob pas rgya bal la 'gro ba'i blo chung ngu nas skyes/ spyir rgya gar la
217b4(1): lan bdun byon pa'i snga res dang po lo bcu gsum pa yin/ ces zer/ slob dpon chen po pad+ma'i zhabs las sgrub chen bka' brgyad kyi dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur ba thob cing dngos grub brnyes/ re zhig na yul
217b5(1): gzhis btsongs pa'i rin gser zho lnga bcu byung ba bsnams te rgya bal la gtad de byon/ slob dpon pa su d+ha ra las/ rgud dang man ngag mang du thos/ des mdo lung gi mkhan po chos rgyal skyong dang / drag sngags kyi
217b6(1): mnga' bdag ram bu gu h+ya'ang bsten/ rgya gar dang / bal po dang / bru sha'i yul na gnas pa'i mkhas pa mang zhig bsten/ rgya gar du mkhan po chos rgyal skyong las mdo lung 'ga' zhig dang / khyad par bru sha'i mkhan
218a1(1): po che btsan skyes las mdo dgongs pa 'dus pa yongs su rdzogs par mkhyen par mdzad/ bsam yas su lo tsA ba chen po'i grar bzhugs shing dam pa'i chos kyang bsgyur/ dben pa 'ba' zhig brten
218a2(1): dgongs pa la/ spyir dus 'di tsam na rgyal khrims zhig cing / phyogs ris kyi 'khrug pa dar ba'i skabs su gyur pas gnubs chen yab sras la 'o brgyal chen po byung / khyad par sku che snga ma la rgya gar du shan pa ma ru tse
218a3(1): bya bar 'khrungs nas sems can gyi don mdzad pa'i 'dul zhing lhag ma ma lus par rdzogs par mdzad pa dang / bod 'dir dpon sras kyi bstan pa nyams par byed pas mtshon snga phyir bstan pa la gnod byed mang du
218a4(1): 'byung ba de dag drag sngags kyis tshar bcad nas bstan pa srung ba'i phyir rgyal ba'i phrin las kyis bskul ba las rnam pa'i rkyen yul ba'i khengs log snga phyi bar gsum du byung nas rigs kyi sras gnyis bkrongs pas//
218a5(1): ji skad du/ nyon mongs bod yul dbus su langs// 'tsho ba'i zas rnams 'bangs kyis phral// ces dang / bdag 'dra gnubs kyi ban chung yang // snying nas chos bzhin bya sems skyes// zhe sdang dgra bos byed ma
218a6(1): ster// sangs rgyas bstan pa srung ba'i phyir// zhe sdang de ma thag tu bskyed// dkar po'i che ba 'don bsams nas// ngan sngags yig sna sna tshogs bslabs// zhes pa ltar rgya bal gyi yul nas gshed skor rgya mtsho'i
218b1(1): drag sngags rnams spyan drangs pa yin te/ bla ma bcu gcig zhabs nas btegs/ 'on kyang mkhas pa bzhi la gtugs// slob dpon dpal gyi seng ge dang // rgya gar khrag 'thung nag po dang // phung byed shAn+ti gar+b+ha
218b2(1): dang // bal po ba su d+ha ra bzhi// mkhas pa bzhi yi thugs brtol nas// zab pa'i man ngag thugs la btags// zhes dang / de dag kyang gnad du bsdus pa la bal po'i slob dpon nyid las byung ste/ 'di skad/ slob
218b3(1): dpon bal po'i rgyal po yis// yang le shod kyi brag phug tu// gnubs kyi ban chung 'dir shog gsungs// bam chen ro yi dbang bskur nas// lha ru 'jam dpal tshe bdag gtad// ces pas mtshon no// de ltar
218b4(1): slob dpon 'di rgya gar du byon pa'i re zhig rdo rje gdan la tshogs gsog mdzad pas/ nam mkha'i klong nas gser gyi rdo rje rtse dgu pa zhig rang gi thad khru gang gi sar byung ste lan gnyis su ma zin/ gsum pa'i tshe phyag
218b5(1): g.yas pa'i mtheb srin gyi bar du chags pa'i mod la de phyag na rdo rje dngos kyi skur gyur/ dbang bskur/ byin gyis brlabs/ sangs rgyas ye shes su ming gi cod pan dpyangs/ dbang rtags su rdo rje rtse dgu pa 'bral
218b6(1): med du 'chang ba da lta rong byams chen gyi thugs ka na yod par grags/ rgya bal gyi ru mtshams rdo rje rtse lnga'i brag phug tu slob dpon pad+ma las kyang sdom pa nod pa sogs rgyud dang man ngag mang po thugs su chud/ dur
219a1(1): khrod dang / mtsho gling dang / mi ma yin drag po rgyu ba'i gnas su sgrubs pa mdzad pas/ 'jam dpal ya mAn+ta ka la sogs te yi dam gyi lha dpag tu med pa'i zhal gzigs/ klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri
219a2(1): za dang / yi dwags drag po dag dang yang gtam 'dre zhing mchod par byed/ nus pa shin tu che bas lha srin kun gyis stangs phul/ dur khrod phu lung nag por e ka tsa Tis zhal bstan/ bram ze mo'i thod pa dngos grub kyi
219a3(1): rdzas su byin/ pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug gis mon nag kha khra'i thod pa'ang dam tshig gi rdzas su spras/ mngon shes dang rdzu 'phrul thogs pa med par grub/ bod yul dbus kyi gnas sgrags kyi yang rdzong du sgrub gnas kyi
219a4(1): mthil mdzad/ de bzhin du nyug gi rdo rje sgrom bur zla ba dgus sems nyid btsan sa zin/ gtsang gi phung po ri bo che dang / g.yung gi rdza lhun mo sogs zhabs kyis bcags/ drug cu re gcig par sgrags su khengs
219a5(1): 'og byung bas gshin rje'i gshed kyi drag sngags rnon pos grong khyer mang po brlag par mdzad/ de skad du/ bdag 'dra sangs rgyas ye shes kyis/ sgrub khang ya ma'i mkhar la byas// sgrags la nag po'i rtse mo ru/ 1
219a6(1): 'byed rlung gi 'khor lo bskor// sgrags kyi grong khyer sum cu rtsa bdun brlag/ ces 'byung ngo // slar gnubs yul rong du bros/ der yang bzhugs su ma ster bas snye mo bye mkhar bzung / gnas der yang dmag gi
219b1(1): chom pos bskor zhing sku srog la bsngo bar nyen pa na/ mkhar gyi rtse nas lha 'dre gnyen po dbang du gsol/ tshigs su bcad pa'i bden pa bdar/ chos gos brdabs pas dam can chos skyong rnams mngon sum par byung
219b2(1): ste/ bdag cag gi mthu rtsal gyis ri rab thal bar brlag/ nyi zla cha lang rde ba/ gnam sa bla 'og bsgyur nus kyang / tshe rabs snga ma'i lan chags brdol bas sngon chad grogs byed du ma ster/ da ni bka' bzhin
219b3(1): 'tshal lo zer bas chos gos kyi chag nas seng ldeng gi phur bu bton/ dam can rnams kyi srog snying drangs/ dmag mi yod pa'i ri logs la dril zhing bsdigs pas/ ri las me dpung chen po byung ste dmag
219b4(1): rnams thams cad bsregs shing brlag par byas/ slar rab tu 'gyod nas bsam gtan mig gi sgron ma sdig sbyong du mdzad par grags/ sku dgra thul rjes lo gsum gyi bar la dbul zhing phongs/ sog po dpal gyi ye
219b5(1): shes las sems phyogs dang sgyu 'phrul la sogs pa gsan/ sgrags yang rdzong du de kho na nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la gzhol/ mnga' bdag ral ba can gyi bar yan chod du rgya gar dang bod kyi bar du 'byon bzhud kyi ngang
219b6(1): du yod pa la/ dar mas bstan pa bsgrubs pa thugs kyis ma bzod nas slar yang drag sngags spu gri reg chod mang po tshags su btsud nas mngon spyod kyi thugs rjes mtshams sbyar bar dgongs pa la/ sdig spyod rgyal
220a1(1): po lha lung dpal gyi rdo rjes bsgral zin pas drag sngags 'chol gyi dogs nas gter du sbas/ mdo sku sems gsum gyi bstan pa'i rgyun slob ma'i tshogs la mi nub par spel nas mthar rang bzhin
220a2(1): rdzogs pa chen po'i lam nas lhun 'grub 'od kyi phung por mya ngan las 'das so// 'di la rgyud 'dzin gyi slob bu sras kyi dam pa gcig/ thugs zin gyi sras bzhi dang lngar byung ba las/ sras kyi dam pa yon tan rgya
220a3(1): mtsho ni skye ba snga ma yab sras su 'brel/ 'dir gnubs khu lung du btsas/ skye ba snga ma'i phung po rgya gar d+ha na d+ha las gnod sbyin mo'i rkang mgyogs bsgrubs nas grub kyang gshog pa bcag pas ma nus/ slar rkang
220a4(1): mgyogs cig shos bsgrubs pas khos thu ba'i nang du d+ha na d+ha la khur nas mtshan gang gcig la khu lung yon tan rgya mtsho'i rtsar bskyal/ der yon tan rgya mtsho'i skye ba snga ma rang gi gcung por gyur pa la rjes su brtse
220a5(1): pabs dbang bskur/ yon bdag la thun mong dngos grub byin pas mi rabs bdun tshun chad dar bar grags/ yon tan rgya mtsho la sgrub gnas grong du mi rung gsungs nas mkhar gdongs yon mo'i gtsug rum lta bu'i
220a6(1): sa gnad bstan te/ bstan srung gshin rje dmar nag dang / ma gshin gyi skor sogs byin nas rgya gar du gshegs/ der yon tan rgya mtsho lo sum cu lon pa'i tshe khyi ra la 'khyams pa slob dpon sangs rgyas ye shes
220b1(1): sngar gyi shugs la nag por bzhugs pa dang mjal bas/ rus gcig pa dang / skal ba can dgongs nas chos sgor bcug ste rjes su bzung / lta ba sgang dril ba/ gab pa mngon du phyung / gsang ba khong lto ltar phyung /
220b2(1): stasbyar ga gegs sel gyi tshul te bzhi ka bshad pas gdams ngag thams cad rdzogs par grags/ 'di la'ang khengs log byung ste gshed ma brgyas bskor ba'i tshe yang 'bar ba lta stangs kyi rdzu 'phrul mngon sum du grub
220b3(1): pas/ spyan g.yas pa nas me 'bar/ g.yon pa nas chu 'brub pas sprul pas glags blta ba'i skabs ma rnyed par rang rang gi lag cha 'chor ba'i ngang du 'bros dgos pa byung / spyir yi dam mang po'i zhal gzigs//
220b4(1): dam can bran du khol/ chos nyid kyi bden pa mngon du gyur pas dngos grub chen po gnyis ka brnyes pa zhig yin te/ rnam thar rgyas pa yi ge'i lam du 'dren par mi nus pas so lugs kyi yig cha sogs la shes
220b5(1): so// thugs zin gyi sras bzhi ni/ so so ye shes dbang phyug la lta ba skad dril te bshad/ pa gor blo chen 'phags la gzhung 'grel Ti ka dang sbyar nas bshad/ dan yon tan mchog la star ga gegs sel gyi tshul du
220b6(1): bshad/ sru legs pa'i sgron ma la tshig sdeb sbyor legs par bshad/ bzhi ka tshang ba ni yon tan rgya mtsho yin no// 'di la sras ye shes rgya mtsho dang / pad+ma dbang rgyal gnyis byung / ye shes rgya mtsho'i sras lha rje hUM chung //
221a1(1): 'dis rje btsun mi la la drag sngags bstan pas mthu chen gyi grags pa thon pa de byung / yon tan rgya mtsho yab sras kyi slob ma nyang shes rab mchog/ 'di bskyed rdzogs gsum ka la mkhas par grags
221a2(1): shing dog la gshongs kyi gtsug lag khang yang bzhengs/ ha'o sgrol gyi brag la sgrub pa mdzad pa'i tshe/ rdo rje phur pa'i dkyil 'khor zhal gzigs/ brag la rdo rje brgyab pas 'jim pa la byas pa bzhin zim gyi song ba
221a3(1): sogs grub pa brnyes pa'i lo rgyus mang du yod/ de'i slob ma chos lung shes rab 'byung gnas yin/ bla ma'i thugs zin cing / bskyed rdzogs gsum ka la mkhas pa'i grags pa thob// de dag las brgyud pa phal mo
221a4(1): cher rong lugs sam/ rus las btags te nyang lugs kyang zer ro// yang so ye shes dbang phyug gi slob ma ngan thung byang chub rgyal mtshan/ kong btsan shes rab ye shes/ ra zung shes rab tshul khrims te gsum ka/
221a5(1): yin gyi breng chags su mi 'dren zhes 'gos gzhon nu dpal ba bzhed/ yon tan rgya mtsho yab sras dang / so ye dbang gnyis ka'i slob ma nyang shes rab mchog/ de'i slob ma ye shes 'byung gnas/ de'i slob ma lha rje
221a6(1): zur po che ste zur po che ni stong tshab 'phags pa rin po che la'ang thug pas/ gnubs chen dang zur po che'i bar na bla ma gcig yod pa yin no// da ni tha ma zur la babs pa'i rnam gzhag bshad par bya ste/ de la zur
221b1(1): po che shAkya 'byung gnas kyis bstan pa phyi dar la snga 'gyur gyi bstan pa'i rtsa ba btsugs/ zur chung ba shes rab grags kyis yal ga brkyangs/ zur shAkya seng ges lo 'bras rgyas par mdzad pas zur mes dpon rnam
221b2(1): gsum zhes grags la/ spyir zur ces bya ba'i gdung 'di dang po rgya gar nas lhags pa zhig ste/ 'phags pa'i yul du 'od gsal lha dbang gzhon nu gtsug tor can/ de'i sras man+da zangs zhu can/ de'i sras mdo
221b3(1): khams su byung ba zur rgyal ba gsum sgrags/ de'i sras zur bshes gnyen stag sgra can/ de'i sras zur rin chen rgya mtsho/ de'i sras mtsho bzang mig po che/ de ba sngon du lha rje zur po che 'di'i sras su 'chad cing /
221b4(1): gzhan du a tsa ra'i sras su 'dod kyang / 'dir zur pa'i rabs nyi shu rtsa bdun gyi yi ge zhig mthong ba de nyid btsan par bgyis te mig po che la zur a tsa ra/ zur kha can lag can/ zur bzang shes rab 'byung
221b5(1): gnas te sras gsum byung bas tha chung sher 'byung gi sras lha rje zur po che/ zur ston bla ma/ zur sgom rdo rje 'byung gnas/ zur sgom chung dang bzhir byung la/ che ba a tsa ras rgya gar la byon pa'i sras nyi ma'i snying po/
221b6(1): slar bod du byon nas thag lung par bzhugs pa'i sras zur thag pa sgom chen/ de'i sras zur chung shes rab grags pa yin zhes smra'o// de la lha rje zur po che ni dpal chen po 'jig rten du mngon sum byon pa yin te/
222a1(1): yul mdo khams kyi sa'i cha yar rdzong ngam g.yar mo zhes bya bar yum yon bdag mo bde ba lcam zhes bya ba'i sras su 'khrungs/ lhums su zhugs pa'i tshe yab kyi mnal lam du gser gyi 'khor lo rtsibs
222a2(1): stong pa phyag tu byung ba dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs yum la thim pa sogs byung bas sprul pa'i skur shes nas mtshan shAkya 'byung gnas su btags/ yab las bri klog mkhyen par mdzad/ sgyu 'phrul gyi skor dang
222a3(1): man ngag phran tshegs zhus/ bla chen dgongs pa rab gsal las tshig gsum rim nod kyis lo dus la bsnyen par rdzogs/ 'di sprul pa'i skur 'dug pas mtshan spo mi dgos gsungs/ mes po rin chen rgya mtsho'i drung
222a4(1): nas mtshan nyid sde gsum/ kr-i ya/ rnam 'joms/ rnam snang / sU dra/ dpal mchog dang po rnams dang / gsang sngags nang gi man ngag thab lam la sogs pa'ang mkhas par mkhyen/ de yang gsung las/ rtsa rlung rta ru
222a5(1): zhon/ gtum mo gos su gyon/ gdams ngag skyo grogs su khrid/ dad pas sna drangs te mdo khams kyi sa cha brgal nas 'dam gyi phyogs su nye bar sleb ces gsungs pa ltar/ khams nas 'dam du sleb pa'i tshe lam cha
222a6(1): ma 'tshal ba la sprin gseb nas lha'i bu gnyis kyis lam bstan te dbus phyogs su brtol/ yar klung na mo lung du kr-i ya la sgrub pa mdzad pa'i tshe/ theg pa chen po gsang ba bla na med pa'i rigs sad de/ spang len
222b1(1): rtsol byas kyi lam 'di ni 'ching ba'i rgyur 'dug/ tshegs chung la bya sla ba gsang sngags bla med kyi lam zhig dang mjal bar shog dgongs pa'i nub/ nags tshal can gyi ri la sgom zer ba zhig byung / der gtsang po la
222b2(1): lam rgyus bcol nas gtsang la gtad de byon/ gsang sngags kyi chos la mkhas grub brnyes pa su yod dris pas nags tshal gsum sgril bya ba na yod zer/ der sngar gyi rmi lam dran nas byon/ dge gong gi lce shag
222b3(1): mchog la bdud rtsi sman sgrub la sogs pa zhus/ spyir zur chen la bla ma mang du bzhugs te/ khyad par du chos lung gi nyang ye shes 'byung gnas las zur pa'i me tog phog pa'i chos sgyu 'phrul dang sems phyogs rnyed pa
222b4(1): yin/ tho gar nam mkha' sbrel lde la mdo dang par khab/ rdzogs chen man ngag dang bcas pa/ yul gser gyi gnyen nag dbang drag dang / lce shAkya rgyal mtshan las gsang dbang dang thabs lam/ nyang stod kyi 'dre khro
222b5(1): chung la ka dag dang lhun grub/ sgyu 'phrul lam rim/ mchims phu'i rog shAka 'byung dang ldan ma sher tshul las yang dag/ zhu ston bsod nams shakya las mdo yongs rdzogs/ stong tshab byang chub/ rgya ston glo gros//
222b6(1): bka' sdod ye shes snying po rnams la'ang mdo lung / dbang sgrub/ rgyud 'grel phrin las dang bcas pa gsan zhing / bla ma de dag kyang rta la sogs pa'i bdog dgu'i 'bul ba dang / 'khor gsum yang dag gi mchod
223a1(1): pas mnyes par byas pa 'ba' zhig go/ tshul de lta bus mkhas pa mang po'i man ngag blangs/ dgongs pa nyams 'og tu chud/ sde snod dang / rgyud sde'i grub mtha' kun la mkhas shing byang chub par byas
223a2(1): nas/ rtsa rgyud dang bshad rgyud sdebs/ rtsa ba dang 'grel pa sdebs/ rgyud dang sgrub thabs su sdebs/ sgrub thabs cho ga yig la sogs par sdebs nas lag len du thebs par byas/ nags tshal can gyi ri la dpal
223a3(1): yang dag gi sgrub pa kho na la gcig tu gzhol bas bskyed rdzogs bzlas gsum gyi gdeng chen po stobs su gyur/ mgrin pa longs spyod kyi 'khor lo'i rtsa mdud grol nas shes rab phyogs med du rgyas/ slob ma mang du
223a4(1): 'dus pa la mdo dang sgyu 'phrul gyi 'chad nyan kyang mdzad/ rgun du g.yeng ba'i las thams cad rnam par spangs/ che thabs dang 'du 'dzi bshigs/ byang chub phyi dus la mi re ba da lta nyid kho nar mngon du mdzad pa'i
223a5(1): brtson 'grus drag po rgud la brten nas bsgrubs pas re zhig na gtor len tu rnal 'byor pa'i rnam pa can zhig byung / de la cung zad byin pas khos ril po thob/ rtsigs pa'i drang na par 'gro ba dang / zar po che 'di
223a6(1): snyan pa dang yon tan mnga' ba zhig 'dug ste/ rog shA ka 'byung gi rgyun gtor tsam yang mi 'dug zer/ de nye gnas kyis thos nas bla ma la zhus pas bos shog gsungs 'bod du phyin pas phu gcig na ka pA la nas
223b1(1): zan 'brul za zhing snang / 'dod do byas kyang yang ma nyan par rog shAka 'byung mchims phur tshe la dbang thob nas yod pa yin/ zur po che la chos len mi thong gyis shig zer/ rkang pa sa la ma reg par song / der
223b2(1): bzang sgom shes rab rgyal po dre'u'i khal dang bcas chos len du btang bas/ bsam yas su slebs te dris tsan su la'ang bshad rgyu mi gda'/ slar rgan mo zhig gis de dang po tsa na mchims phu'i ri 'di la yod pa
223b3(1): yin zer/ rdzi'u gcig gis/ ri 'di la yod yod 'dra/ skabs re tsan rnga dang / ru lu'i sgrangs kyang zos zer/ der bzang sgom gyis rtswa pang phung yod pa zhig tu kha la phog/ dad gus kyis gsol ba btab pas/
223b4(1): chen po dang bcas brag phug gi sgo de mthong / der mos gus chen po dang bcas phug par thal gyis song bas/ gsang ba'i sgrol ging bco brgyad kyis 'du bar 'ong ba 'di sgrol zhig zer/ der bla ma rog gis 'di
223b5(1): las can yin pas mi rung gsungs/ lo rgyus zhus pas/ nga rog shAka 'byung / slob ma zur shAka 'byung / mtshams sbyor shes rab rgyal po/ rten 'brel bzang gsungs/ der bzang sgom la sangs rgyas mnyam sbyor//
223b6(1): yang dag gi bdag gzhan dkyil 'khor bcu gnyis/ yang phur sgrags ma la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor drug cu rtsa gnyis kyi dbang bskur/ dpe dang bka' lung rjes su gdams pa thams cad thob ste bsam yas rgal
224a1(1): bar sleb pa'i dus su/ khal gyi steng na khye'u dar gyi ber thod can zhig mthong bas slar log ste dris pas/ tshangs pa dung thod can 'gro ba yin gsungs nas gsol ka'ang gnang / slar gdams pa bla ma
224a2(1): zur chen la gsang ba'i ngang nas phul/ slob dpon kun gyis sgom sgrub lo du mar mdzad cing 'chad nyan bskyangs pas 'gro phan che bar byung na'ang / zur chen po dben pa 'ba' zhig la thugs gtod pas/ 'di yang
224a3(1): dge sbyor gyi g.yeng bar 'dug pas bo dong mnga' bdag brag la 'gro gsungs te der gcig pur sgom sgrub la zhugs tsa na/ bu slob rnams kyang rjes su 'brangs byung bas/ khyod rnams nga'i rtsa bar yong don byang
224a4(1): chub thob pa re ba yin na sgom sgrub min pa gzhan gang gis kyang phan mi thogs/ 'jig rten gyi g.yeng ba rgyab tu zhog la sgrub pa la 'bungs/ nga yang sgrub pa kho na byed gsungs te/ dpon slob kun so sor sgrub pa
224a5(1): mdzad/ de nas re zhig na mkha' 'gro'i lung gis sa smad la phebs nas 'gro don che bar bskul bas/ rta nag gi lung par byon/ 'ug pa'i tshang yod pa'i brag phug kha shar bstan gcig tu yang dag lha dgu'i sgrub pa
224a6(1): mdzad pas/ dpal chen po yang dag lha dgu'i zhal mngon sum du mthong / de ltar bzhugs gnas kyi ming las bla ma 'ug pa lung ba zhes kun tu grags/ der bsgrub rgyags kyang dkon shing 'byon pa'i lung bstan
224b1(1): kyang byung nas smad phyogs su ljongs bsgyur bar chas pas gzhi bdag ze re ze btsan bya bas gzugs bstan te bzhugs par zhus pa na/ nga la gnas gzhan du 'gro ba'i lung bstan yang byung / rgyags kyang med pas
224b2(1): 'gro gsungs pas/ dpon slob rnams kyi 'tsho ba bdag gis 'bul/ cis kyang bzhugs par zhu zhus pas/ re zhig bzhugs par zhal gyis bzhes/ rta nag gi phyug po zhig la nad drag po byung nas/ mo lung la tshogs
224b3(1): gtor zong / bla ma 'ug pa lung pa la byin rlab zhus zer bas/ nad pas bla ma'i drung du phyin pas zhal mthong ba tsam gyis bder song / byin rlab zhus/ tshogs 'khor byas ma thag tu nad las grol/ de bzhin du nad
224b4(1): gdon gyis mnar tshad la byin rlab dpag tu med pa byung bas skye bo rnams dad de sku bsod chen po skyes/ bla ma'i dgongs pa la/ thun mong gi bsod nams 'di mchog sgrub pa'i bar chad chen po yin/ ri bo dgu
224b5(1): 'dus la sgom du 'gro dgongs nas gshegs tsa na/ gzhi bdag des bsgrub rgyags ni phul yod/ cis kyang bzhugs par zhu zer bas/ khyod kyi 'tsho ba 'di gzhi dag po zhig kyang dka'/ 'du 'god kyis g.yeng bar
224b6(1): 'gyur bas de lan 'gro gsungs pas/ khong gdong mchi mas gang nas cis kyang mi bzhugs nas bdag la'ang thugs rjes dgongs 'tshal zhus nas srog snying phul/ bla mas dge bsnyen gyi gdams pa phog nas
225a1(1): bstan pa bsrung bar bsgos/ mar lam jo mo sna dmar kyang dam la bzhag/ de nas g.yas su thar du byon/ zur chung pa la nga la ri bo dgu 'dus su sgom zer ba'i lung bstan byung ba de brag rgya bo 'di
225a2(1): yin par 'dug gsungs nas dpon slob thams cad sgrub pa la bzhugs so// de'i tshe lha rje zur po che la slob ma rtse mo bzhi/ rtsa lkog dang lnga/ sgom chen brgya rtsa brgyad yod pa'i rtse mo bzhi ni/ lha dgongs kyi rtse mor
225a3(1): gyur pa zur chung shes rab grags/ sku 'phrul gyi bshad pa'i rtse mo me nyags khyung grags/ mkhyen rgya'i rtse mor gyur pa zhang 'gos chung / sgom sgrub gyi rtse mor gyur pa bzang sgom shes rab rgyal po/ rtse lkog ni chos kyi
225a4(1): steng du pho ze'i rtse mor gyur pa rtsegs bla ma'o// yang rtse lkog brgyad du 'dren pa'ang yod do// de bzhin du gru sgom sba 'gying / yul sgom nag mo/ lce sgom shAka rgyal/ zur sgom rdo 'byung / g.yu sgom rdo 'bar/ skra sgom
225a5(1): bsod nams snying po la sogs te sgom chen brgya rtsa brgyad do// de thams cad kyang nam mkha' la 'gro ba sogs rdzu 'phrul thob pa 'ba' zhig tu grags/ des nas re zhig bla ma'i drung du bud med gsum byung nas//
225a6(1): g.yas ru shangs kyi mda' shangs chu'i shar na lung pa dbyibs zla gam/ phu na brag snying 'dra ba mda' na zang ma traM bsgral ba'i pags pa lta bu/ ri dbyibs glang po che'i sna 'dra ba la brag seng ge'i ya zod lta bu/ rdza
225b1(1): gsum nas chu gsum 'bab pa sku gsum gyi don rnyed pa zhig yod kyi der bsgoms nas skye ba 'di nyid la 'tshang rgya zhing / 'gro don yun ring bar 'gyur ro zhes lung byin pas/ zur chung pa la brag rgya bo sgrub gnas kyi
225b2(1): pha phyogs su mdzad/ bla ma 'khor dang bcas pa mar byon/ sa dmigs mkhyen nas zhang mo yon tan rgyan gyis sbyin bdag byas/ des phul ba'i phug par bla ma bzhugs/ zur chung pa sogs sgom chen brgya lhag tsam
225b3(1): yod pa lung pa'i phu mda' thams cad du spyil po dang / brag skyibs dang / lhags skyobs la brten nas sgrub pa mdzad/ yul mi tsho bdun gyis zhabs tog byas shing / yon bdag gi rtsa ba sram pa bon grong pas byas//
225b4(1): bla ma sangs rgyas dngos su 'dzin to// der lo mang por sgrub pa mdzad/ zhi ba zhe gnyis dang / khrag 'thung lnga bcu'i zhal mthong / khyad par du yang dag gi lha tshogs mi dang mi phrad pa bzhin gzigs nas gsung gleng
225b5(1): mdzad/ go ri brgyad la sogs pa bran du khol/ mi ma yin rnams kyis las gang bcol nyan pa byung / der bla ma'i zhal nas/ ngas 'ug pa lung gi sa rdo ri brag thams cad zhi khro'i lha tshogs su mthong / khyad par dben
225b6(1): ser mo'i lho ri 'di rgyal ba rigs lngar rgyun du mthong bas zhi ba'i lha khang bzhengs gsungs te sta gon mdzad/ sa'i dpyad gzigs nas sa dgra ngan pa dag bcos/ lho ri sdig nag thur du rgyug pa 'dra ba'i
226a1(1): ra dbrag tu zur po che dpal chen po'i skur bzhengs nas zhabs g.yas pa bzhag sar zhabs rjes kyang byung / der he ru ka'i sgra 'bum phrag yod pa'i mchod rten dang / phyogs bzhi dbus dang lnga rtse
226a2(1): mo bzhi dang rtse lkog lngas mchod rten re re yang bzhengs/ klu dung skyong gnas pa'i chu mig la zangs bkab nas kha bcad/ de'i steng du gtsug lag khang gi rmang bting / che chung nyang stod rtsis kyi lha khang dang mnyam pa
226a3(1): byed rgyu la/ rdo bzo bas cung zad bskum zer/ de bzhin du bzo bo phal cher bsod nams ma yin pa 'du byed la spro bas/ shing thams cad khod mi snyoms shing / ring thung du gnas pa la sogs phyag rdzas dron
226a4(1): pa'i thabs 'ba' zhig byas kyang / 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' gtong ba la goms pa'i snying stobs la ser sna dang 'jur bu'i rnam rtog gis rdzi bar nus pa ma yin pas nor rdzas la rmi lam dang sgyu ma lta bur
226a5(1): gzigs/ ka chen ya gcig bregs thal te ma snyogs pa/ zhabs kyis bsgril bas ring zung snyoms pa'i grub rtags bstan/ de la rdo rje'i rtags sbyar nas yod/ de bzhin du ka ba kyog por gyur pa rnams zhabs
226a6(1): kyis bsgril pas mda' ltar 'khrongs pa dang / log sgrub bzod pa sogs tshad med pa'i thugs rje dang nus pa mthong bas/ bzo bo rnams slar 'gyod pa chen po skyes/ lha khang tshar ba'i shing lhag rnams la rtsigs
226b1(1): pa med par ka ba bzhis btegs pa'i sgo khang khyad 'phags zhig byas par 'gyod tshangs rgya phugs zhes grags la de slar mgon khang du mdzad/ de ltar gtsug lag khang dbu rtse ka ba bzhi pa rnam snang kun tu
226b2(1): zhal gyis gtso byas pa'i zhi ba'i lha tshogs/ khyams stod ka ba brgyad kyi sar sgo srung rta bdud gnyis/ glo 'bur lho byang gnyis na yum chen mo dang / mar me mdzad la mchod lha bzhi bzhis bskor ba/ mgon khang na
226b3(1): legs ldan/ dpal ldan lha mo/ tshangs pa dang / brgya byin rnams 'bur sku byas/ khyams stod ka ba brgyad kyi sar bla ma brgyud pa'i gyang ris/ skor khang la pad+ma brgya ldan la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor nyi shu rtsa
226b4(1): gsum/ khyams smad ka ba nyi shu'i sar sangs rgyas stong rtsa/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas tshe dpag med pa nye sras kyis bskor ba/ sangs rgyas rabs bdun/ mdzad pa bcu gnyis/ byang chub sems dpa' chos
226b5(1): 'phags/ sgrol ma 'jigs pa brgyad skyob/ rigs gsum mgon po/ ma la ya'i zhing bkod/ srid pa'i tsakra la sogs pa gyang ris su mdzad/ de ltar skya bzo grub nas/ da ni nga'i lha khang thang ka yan chod gser
226b6(1): gyis 'byug pa yin/ gser 'grong ri tshugs po la 'don gsungs nas dgongs pa mdzad pas/ nam phyed na gzhi bdag btsan de rta pa nag po gcig tu byas nas byung / zur po che la phyag dang bskor ba byas nas
227a1(1): lha khang gi thog kha yan chod gser du byugs nas/ nged kyi gser 'dzad pas/ lha'i sku rnams khyab nges zhig 'bul zer bas de bzhin du mdzad/ rab tu gnas pa'i tshe rgyal ba zur che chung gis kun
227a2(1): rig rnam snang gi dbu gtsug nas zhugs thugs kar thon/ thugs ka nas zhugs dbu gtsug tu thon pa la sogs rdzu 'phrul gyi bkod pa zad mi shes pa bstan pas bzo bo rnams snying thag pa nas dad par gyur te/
227a3(1): bla ma'i lha khang ri rab btsam la/ mchod rten gyi 'degs byed zer/ bsam yas mchod rten sngon mo la dpe byas/ bkra shis sgo mang lha khang gi byang phyogs su dad bzhengs kyis phul/ bla ma'i mtshan gdan sa la
227a4(1): chags pas dpal 'ug bya lung zhes yongs su grags/ lha rje zur po che'i ring la dbu brnyes/ zur chung pas srol btod/ zur shAkya seng ges dar rgyas su mdzad zer ba de gdan rabs 'dis snga 'gyur rdo rje theg
227a5(1): pa'i bstan pa la bya ba brlab po che mdzad pa'i rnam gzhag yin no// de nas 'chad nyan la sogs pa'i 'gro don rgya chen po mdzad/ re zhig na dpon slob kun gyis yang dben ser mo'i yang dag gi lo sgrub mdzad
227a6(1): pas mar zad de mchod me ma byung bas/ chu mig zhag bdun du mar khur byin gyis brlabs nas mar khu 'dzad med blangs chog pa byung / der thog mar 'chad nyan pa rnams bshad pa la gtso bor 'don pas dang po
227b1(1): tsa na phrin las shes pa nyung ste/ khong rnams chos rar 'gro gleng byed pa'i tshe phrin las shes shing 'gro gleng med pa dag mi shes pa'i phyogs su phul bas/ rgyun gtor lhan cig tu gtong ba'i tshe phrin las shes pa chos
227b2(1): gyer du ma nyan/ der bla ma'i zhal nas/ gang la mthar phyin pa gcig gis grol ba yin/ gcig gis gcig la khyad gsod mi rung / theg pa dgu'i grub mtha' rang sa na yod kyi/ theg pa'i kha 'dzin pa ma yin/
227b3(1): gsungs pa thams cad la don gyi go ba khyad par can skyes nas zhi dul du gnas pa byung / de'i dus su bla ma'i zhal nas/ slob ma rtse mo bzhi la/ lam nyams su len pa la gang gal che/ khyed bzhi po go ba re zhog
227b4(1): gsungs pa la/ zur chung pas/ sngar zhen gyi bag chags tshan po che 'di/ ma bsgoms na mi 'dzad pa gcig 'dug pas/ nyams len la blo thags chod pa gal che/ 'phral gyi sgrib pa dri ma 'dra ba 'di/ da lta nas
227b5(1): dag dgos pa 'dug pas/ nang dang nub tu dge sbyor byed pa gal che/ ji srid gnas lugs mngon du ma gyur gyi bar du bsod nams kyi tshogs gsog dgos pa 'dug pas/ dge ba phra ba la brtson pa gal che
227b6(1): zhus/ de bzhin du gzhan gsum pos kyang rang sa'i go ba re zhus pas/ bla ma mnyes pas/ dam pa'i lha chos byed pa la// lam lta sgom spyod pa gsum du gda'// lta ba zhes ming du btags pa de// lha rgyu byung na lta
228a1(1): ba min// lha rgyu med pa'i don la blta// chos nyid brjod med lam du 'khyer// zhes pa la sogs pa lta sgom spyod pa'i lam khyer gyi mgur gsungs pas slob ma kun mos pa mchog tu 'phel/ de nas
228a2(1): bla ma zur po ches 'ug pa lung du tshogs pa bskyangs shing rgyud kyi bshad gra dang sgom gra chen po mdzad/ zur chung bas yang dben sngon mor yang dag gi sgrub pa mdzad cing bzhugs tsa na/ shangs kyi sgrub khang gdong
228a3(1): la rgyu'i he ru ka zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa krong nger 'dug pa gzigs/ sgrub pa thon nas bla mar lo rgyus zhus pas/ bla ma'i zhal nas/ zur chung pa dpal chen po la grub pa thob pa yin/ nga la rig 'dzin nam
228a4(1): mkha'i snying pos kyang he ru ka'i sku bzhengs nas bod 'bangs la gnod pa'i gdon mthu bo che thul zhing 'gro don 'byung ba'i lung bstan kyang yod pas de'i slad du 'gro zhes gsungs/ nye gnas la 'o cag lha khang
228a5(1): bzhengs pa'i yo byad sngogs shig/ nged tshos sa gdul bya yi gsungs/ brag seng ge'i ya thod kyi khar bzhugs/ gtor ma bshams/ bla ma dpal chen po'i ting nge 'dzin la bzhugs nas stangs stabs mdzad pa'i
228a6(1): tshe/ sangs rgyas mthong ba'i skal ba dang ldan pa rnams kyis mngon sum pa'i skur mthong ba byung / de nas 'gram rdo bslang ba'i dus su zur chung ba sku lus sgeg cing zhal rod ngan pa la brnyas nas/ gzhan kun
228b1(1): gyis 'gram rdo chen po re bzhag gi na/ da zur chung bas gyad rdo gcig 'jog zang zhes zur za bar byas pas/ zur chung pa na re/ dpon slob rnams tsha ba la gshegs shig/ nged kyang da lta 'dod de zer ste ma byon//
228b2(1): khong rnams kyis tsha ba zin nas thon pa dang / gyad kyi rdo theg pa lta ci smos/ sprul ba'ang mi nus pa'i pha wang chen po brgyad rmang gi phyogs bzhi mtshams brgyad du bzhag nas/ de la rdo dkar gyis zur chung pa'i gyad
228b3(1): rdo lags bya ba bris pa mthong bas/ gra pa rnams spobs pa smad cing gzu bor gyur pa dag mos par gyur to// der nag phyogs kyi lha 'dre byed pa mi srun pas lha khang brtsigs pa'i 'gal rkyen dang mtho 'tshams
228b4(1): pa'ang zur chung pas gyad rdo bzhag pa phyin chad nas zhi bar grags/ shing sgrigs ran pa'i tshe ka ba bzhi kyog por byung ba bla ma'i zhal nas 'di zur chung pas srongs shig gsungs pas/ rlung khug pa gcig gi ngang
228b5(1): la dgye ba dang gug pa'i rten 'brel cig mdzad nas mda' bzhin du bsrangs/ thog phub zin pa tsam la/ ngas lha bzo ba bkug pas khugs yong gi 'dug gsungs/ zhag gnyis pa la lha bzo shes pa 'ga' zhig
228b6(1): chos zhu ru byung / ma mkhyen pa ltar mdzad nas/ khyed rnams yon tan mkhan gyi rigs sam gsungs/ bdag cag rnams ni lha bzo mkhan te sku drung du chos zhur bcar ba lags zhus pas/ rten 'brel bzang / ci
229a1(1): 'dod pa'i chos kyang 'ong / dus kyi snyigs ma la 'gro don chen po 'ong bas dpal chen pa'i skur bzhengs pa yin/ khyod rnams kyis de bzhin du 'tshal zhes gsungs pas/ khong rnams kyang dang ba
229a2(1): shin tu ston par gyur nas dpal yang dag gi bum dbang sngon la bskur/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdung ring bsrel dang / bram ze skye ba bdun pa'i sha/ dur khrod brgyad kyi sa rdo chu shing / rin po che'i
229a3(1): rigs/ rgya bod rig 'dzin gyis bsgrubs pa'i chos sman rnams bsres pa'i lde gu sta gon byas/ sku tshad ji tsam bgyi zhus pas/ thog dpangs dang bstun par gnang / der 'bras bu'i he ru ka zhal gsum phyag drug
229a4(1): pa mtshar ba dang / rngams pa dang / bzhad pa ci lta bu zhig byung yang / bla mas zhal mthong ba ltar ma byung bas skyor cig gsungs/ lan mar po bskur dgos pa byung / res gcig na/ da nga dang 'dra ba gcig shes
229a5(1): sam gsungs/ shes mchi zhus pas/ do nub gsol ba thob la/ sang pa la blta ru shog gsungs/ sang zur chung pa dang bcas lha bzo rnams kyis drung du phyin pas/ nye gnas don yod rdo rje la gtor tshogs
229a6(1): shoms gsungs/ yang dag gi las gzhung bsrangs/ tshogs 'khor mdzad nas da ltos shig gsungs te lta stangs mdzad pa'i mod la he ru ka dngos su gyur nas/ dbu sprin dang na bun gyi mtshams na lhag ge pa/
229b1(1): zhabs g.yas 'ug pa lung gi he ru ka'i brag gdong dang / g.yon btsad po pur khang gi ri rtser bzhag pa/ zhal gcig phyag gnyis/ mche ba gtsigs shing ljags 'dril ba/ rdo rje'i gshogs pas bar snang gang ba/
229b2(1): 'jigs shing rngams pa gcig mthong ba dang / lha bzo ba rnams zil ma bzod par dran med du brgya la/ brgya la sangs tsa na dgongs pa glod nas bla ma zhal 'dzum lhag ge 'dug/ da shes sam gsungs/ zhal
229b3(1): gcig phyag gnyis pa'i sku zhig gsal bar mthong / de nas gang yang dran pa med par song bas/ da bzhengs rgyu zhal gsum phyag drug pa gcig bstan par zhus pas/ de yang zab ste/ gdul bya'i dbang gis zhal
229b4(1): gcig phyag gnyis 'byon/ zhes gsungs nas de ltar bzhengs pa'i tshe/ lte ba man chad snga ma mthong bas mtshon par nus la/ yan chad da dung sbyor cig gsungs nas lan grags mang por bskur dgos pa byung
229b5(1): bas/ zhal nas khyed tsho sgrib pa ma dag pa yin/ 'jim pa legs par sbyor la 'dir zhog/ chu mig pha gi nga'i bdud rtsi ka pA la gang gtor ba las byung ba'i sgrub chu yin pas khrus gyis/ lha khang gi phyi la skor ba
229b6(1): lan bdun skor la shog/ de bar du nang 'dir su yang ma 'ong / ngas dpal chen po la gsol ba 'debs pa yin gsungs/ khong rnams de ltar byed pa'i ring la nang na 'phros dir dir 'dug khrus dang bskor
230a1(1): ba tshar nas nang du phyin tsa na/ sku drung na su yang med/ bla ma dgongs pa la bzhugs/ 'jim pa rnams zad/ dpal chen po lte ba yan chod rang byon du shar 'dug pas/ bu slob dang lha bzo ba kun
230a2(1): ngo mtshar dpag tu med pa skyes/ phyag 'tshal bzhin du bla ma rang gis 'di ltar mkhyen pa la/ kha sang nas mi mdzad pa/ bdag tshor tshod bgam pa lags mod zhus pas/ nga nyid lta bu'i gang zag la// nga nyid lta
230a3(1): bu'i rten cig 'byung / snyigs ma'i dus su 'gro ba 'dren// nad dang gdon gyi gnyen por 'gyur// sngar yang he ru ka nyid la brten nas he ru ka nyid byung ba yin la/ da yang he ru ka nyid la he ru ka nyid thim par
230a4(1): 'gyur ro// zhes ma 'ongs pa'ang bstan no// sngon dus na byon pa'i grub pa'i slob dpon chen po 'di dag ni gsang ba bsrung ba la thugs shin tu skam pas/ 'di ltar mi'i 'du tshogs mang po 'ong sar gsang sgrub
230a5(1): ltar bzhengs pa shin tu gnyan pas mi btub gsungs/ khro mo brgyad po rgyud lugs ltar bzhengs shig gsungs nas bzhengs/ g.yas phyogs kyi gyang ris la sgyu 'phrul zhi ba/ g.yon phyogs la 'bar ba khro bo'i lha
230a6(1): tshogs/ mdun du mdo yongs rdzogs/ steng du dkyil 'khor gsum dang / sgo khang ngos la dpal mgon ma hA kA la drag po gshin rje ltar sgrub pa/ stag zhon mon pa sde brgyad dang bcas pa bris/ de nas rab tu
230b1(1): gnas pa'i dus la bab ste/ chang ma su la 'chol/ sha gang nas 'tsho la sogs rab ston gyi nye bsdogs bya ba na/ nye gnas na re/ bzo bo dang / las byed/ mgron po'i skyong dar mangs pas dngos po phal cher zad//
230b2(1): da 'bul ba skrag pa dang yon bdag gi sar g.yar spyi'ang byed dgos pas rab gnas dal gyis gnang bar gsol bas/ zur chung pa na re/ rab gnas dus la byed/ chang gi nas btsal bas mi lang / rdza mas
230b3(1): kyang mi khom/ de bas chang ma klu la 'chol/ sha rnyed pa'ang dka'/ rnyed kyang rin mi 'khyongs/ sram pa bon grong pa'i glang la sha ru byed/ rtsam pa mi ma yin la 'degs bskul bas chog/ de ltar byas na mi ldang ba
230b4(1): gang yang med gsungs/ der bla ma zur po ches/ nas khal stong gi chang las mi 'gro/ khyod rang nas bre drug tshos/ mi'i mdun na rab gnas kyi chang tshong mang po yod pa ltar gyis/ zur chung pas klu mo khug gcig/
230b5(1): gsungs/ de nas ya zad brag gdong gi brag la gnas pa'i klu bdud kyi sring mo de zur chung pas dgongs pa mdzad de bkugs pas sbrul phra mo gcig byung / lta stangs mdzad pas/ bud med dkar mo gcig tu
230b6(1): song / der zur po ches/ nga'i lha khang rab gnas kyi chang ma byed dgos gsungs pas/ nged gtsang ma klu'i rigs grib la sngar/ skyur la 'dzem/ bla ma'i gzi byin yang mi bzod pas chang mgo mi thon/ nga'i ming po
231a1(1): la 'chol ba zhu/ rkyen gang dgos 'bul zer/ der bla mas 'o na zur chung pa/ ming po 'gugs sam byin gyis brlab gsungs pas/ bdag gis 'gugs par 'tshal zer nas lta stangs mdzad pas/
231a2(1): sdig pa rA tsa rtsid bu tsam zhig byung / ting nge 'dzin gyis gzir bas gzugs mngon sum du bstan byung / der chang ma byed par bsgos pas/ bdag lha 'dre'i rigs su gtogs pas bya dga' dang sems 'dzin du
231a3(1): ma dgos/ chang ma byed du mi khom yang / bla ma'i bka' gcog par mi nus zer/ der khong gnyis kyi srog snying blangs/ dam la bzhag/ gnang nyin yong bas grabs mdzod/ nged klu'i rigs grib la sngar bas
231a4(1): gtsang zhing sdod sa btsan pa'i thabs zhu zer/ der bla ma zur po ches/ ngas byin gyis brlabs kyis gsungs/ rdza ma them bu gsum pa spos chus bkrus/ bdud dang klu brten pa'i mthun rdzas kyang 'du byas/ nas
231a5(1): bre drug gi glu ma rnams blugs/ kha nas dkar gtsang mas bkang / der klu bdud ming sring gnyis bcug/ kha bla ma'i na bza' phod kas bcad/ phu rung nas chu blug tu rung bar byas/ rdo rje'i mdud rgya byas pas klu
231a6(1): phyogs phyogs kyi chang rnams kyi bcud bsdus te chang la 'dzad pa ma byung / der nye gnas kyis chang gis ldang mchi/ rtsam pa ji ltar byed zhus pas/ phan snod mang po g.yor cig gsungs der bla mas gtor ma
231b1(1): gcig mdzad/ phad bu'i snod rnams su rtsam pa khyor ba re thob la zhog gsungs/ de ltar byas pas sang nyin snod thams cad rtsam pas khengs/ yang bla ma'i zhal nas gra pa gcig sram pa bon grong pa'i sar dengs
231b2(1): la/ nged la rab gnas byed pa'i chang gi spang ma mang po shing nags la pho btab pa 'di 'phangs/ glang rnams spang ma za bar thong gyis gsungs/ de bzhin byas pas glang mang po bskur byung / bla ma'i gsung gi zur
231b3(1): chung pas sgrol lam/ gso gsungs pas/ bdag bla ma'i bka' bzhin sgrub par zhu zhus pas/ zur po ches dgongs pa mdzad de thun re 'phangs pas/ glang thams cad nyal gyis shi lpags pa bshus/ rus pa ma
231b4(1): bcags/ lhu tshigs ma bral bar gyis/ nang gi don snod rnams kyang rang sor zhog/ phyi sha rnams bregs shig gsungs pas/ nye gnas skrag ste/ 'di pa dpon slob sdig rgyal du 'dug/ glang la spang ma ster
231b5(1): gsungs nas thams cad bsad/ da glang 'don mi byung na ji ltar byed snyam/ blo shin tu 'chub pa'i ngang nas rab gnas kyi sha ston byas/ ston mo grub nas glang 'don mi byung / nye gnas rtab rtab por gyur pa dang /
231b6(1): bla ma'i gsung gis khong tsho la'ang bza' ba byin/ zur chung pas glang bdag po la sprod cig gsungs/ der zur chung pas pags pa'i khud du rus pa rnams gril/ nang rol rnams kyang btsud/ na bza' bkab/ se
232a1(1): gol gcig gtogs pa'i mod la glang rnams 'dar phri li li langs byung / rgan mo gcig gis sha 'dral ba'i che rus rtsi phrad pa byung bas/ phyis glang de la rtsib gyol byung skad/ gsad gso'i rdzu
232a2(1): 'phrul de lta bu mdzad pas/ der tshogs tshad thams cad shin tu dad par gyur/ bla ma zur chen yang mnyes pa'i ngang nas dpal chen po la gzigs te/ 'gro ba'i don chen po mdzad 'tshal gsungs pas/ sku gar
232a3(1): dgu'i rnam par rol zhing / he he/ smos ci 'tshal/ gsungs pas dang po rngams zhal du yod pa la/ de nas bzhad zhal ru gyur pa yin no// da nged rang rnams yang dag gi lo sgrub byed pa yin gsungs pas/ nye
232a4(1): gnas na re cha rkyen gyis mi ldang zer/ zur chung pas/ chang mi ldang na klu bdun sgor bas chog/ sha dang rtsam pa yang bag tsam mchis/ rnal 'byor dam tshig ma nyams na/ 'tsho ba snang srid lha 'dres sbyor/ gzhi
232a5(1): bdag gi 'bul ba'ang 'ongs pas lo sgrub mdzad pa dga' zer/ der rnal 'byor pho mo brgya tsam tshogs/ sgrub pa po rnams la'ang chang ka pA la re dang / zan bya dang mo'i sgo nga tsam re/ sha dam tshig gi bza' ba
232a6(1): tsam drongs shig gsungs te lo sgrub mdzad/ der bla ma'i zhal nas khyed rtse mo bzhi dgongs pa 'gran pa yin gsungs pas/ thams cad kyis mnyam par bzhag pa na/ gsum po la g.yo 'gul med pa'i dgongs
232b1(1): pa ri bo lta bu rkyen gyis dbrog mi nus pa byung / zur chung pa ris med mnyam pa chen po'i gnas la byon pas lta ba mtho ba mtshon phyir shing rta gang tsam 'phags nas gda' skad/ yang bla ma'i zhal nas/ da zur chung
232b2(1): ba'i ru lu'i bzlas pa la phyi nas nyon cig gsungs/ rnal 'byor ma gcig gis phyi nas nyan pas/ sngar bas chung ngu ma song / ri zur gcig 'das nas nyan pas kyang chung du ma song bas/ der bla ma'i gsung gis//
232b3(1): khyed rnams mched grogs mnyam por yin kyang / zur chung ba'i grib ma la'ang 'gom du mi rung gsungs nas gzengs bstod do// de nas sgrub pa thon pa dang / dpon slob rnams grogs po'i sum mdor byon/ bla
232b4(1): ma thugs nyams 'ur nas brag rdo rje'i gtan pa bya ba'i steng du ru lu'i bro brdung mdzad pas/ zhabs kyi long bu man chod 'dam la brgyab pa bzhin song / zur chung pas nga'i bla ma sangs rgyas dngos su 'dug pas
232b5(1): zhabs spyi bor len pa yin zer zhabs rjes la dbu gtugs pas thor tshugs snyan cha dang bcas pa'i rjes lham mer byung / der bzang sgom sher rgyal na re/ bla ma khu dpon gnyis kyi grub rtags khyad du 'phags//
232b6(1): 'di la mi phyugs kyi rdog bzhag na bsod nams ma yin par 'gyur nye zer nas/ lag sor lnga gyad stobs po che lngar sprul nas brag rdo rje'i gtan pa gyen du bslangs nas bzhag/ yang zhag 'gos chung ba dang /
233a1(1): mi nyags khyung grags gnyis kyis/ 'di bsten pa nged la bab zer nas/ gyad stobs po che mang pos bskul bar yang mi nus pa'i pha wang re blangs nas g.yas g.yon nas bsten te/ rtsa ba brtan
233a2(1): par byas pa da lta mngon sum na yod do// de nas 'ug pa lung du 'bras bu'i dpal chen po bzhengs par bzhed nas/ slob ma thams cad kyang phar dengs shig gsungs pas/ zur chung pa bla ma'i phyag phyi snyogs
