233a3(1): par 'ong gi zer nam mkha' la 'phur nas brag rgya bor gshegs/ gra pa rnams ko ba brgyud nas song / klu bdud ming sring gnyis na re/ bdag cag ko ba la mi grib can dang 'grogs par mi rung bas/ rab la
233a4(1): khrid par zhu mtshal zhes zhus pas/ bla mas de bzhin rung gsungs/ der nye gnas la rdza ma bskur bas ljid bya sgro las yang pa byung / chu khar phebs pa dang nye gnas la khyod rang nga la 'jus/ the tshom med par
233a5(1): shog gsungs pas/ kho'i sems las su ma rungs nas chu la sbyar ba min nam sems/ de mkhyen nas/ da khyod nga'i phyin mi thar pa 'dug/ ko bskor la shog/ ngas sngon la 'gro yi gsungs bla ma zhabs chu la mi
233a6(1): reg par gshegs so// nye gnas kyis ko bar phyin pas ko ba pha rir thal/ der skrag yun ring ba dang kha skoms nas chang btsags/ yog tshad 'thungs pas rnam rtog la/ chang btsos nas lo gcig dang zla ba bzhi
233b1(1): song / 'di tsam yong ba bla mas rdza ma'i nang du ci bcug pa yin snyam nas rdza ma'i rgya bshigs pas/ sbrul dkar nag gnya' shing tsam pa gnyis mdud pa shig gi grol nas nam mkha' la gdengs/ shul du sdig
233b2(1): sbal lcong mo la sogs pa 'dug pa dag kyang tshag sgra 'ur sgra dang bcas nam mkha' la song ma thag spang ma sngo hrul le sings po skyur sing nge song / der spang ma rnams po/ rdza ma khur phyin pas chu thon pa dang rdza ma'ang
233b3(1): chag/ der bla ma'i bka' las rten 'brel 'chugs/ 'og gdong gi klu bdud ming sring gnyis phyir ma thon na/ 'ug pa lung du dgon pa bod tsam na che ba chags/ sram pa sgrub khang yang dar rgyas che la sa mi gnyen
233b4(1): pa zhig 'ongs te/ da rdza ma chu lhor thon par gnas gzhi dang / sde dgon 'ga' zhig chags par 'gyur zhes gsungs/ klu bdud ming srid sram pa sgrub khang gi bka' bsrung la bskos/ rten 'brel des 'bras bu'i
233b5(1): dpal chen po yang ma grub po// de nas bshad gra dang sgom grwa phyag rgya chen po byung / de'i tshe nya ri na ma ma g.yung drung bkra shis bza' mi gnyis bu tsha med la nor gyis 'byor pa yod pa/ chos 'khor bya bar 'dod
233b6(1): sa yul mi dang nye du kun bsags te slob dpon gang bzang dris pas/ la la sngags pa/ la la btsun pa/ la la bon po zer kha ma 'tshams pas khyed rang gang mos la gyis shig pa'i gros btags/ mo na re/
234a1(1): nga'i yo byad kyis ldang bas gsum ka la byad zer/ der sngags pa 'ug pa lung pa/ bon po la ke rtse pa/ btsun pa chu mig ring mo pa rnams gdan drangs so// mchog gnas gsum po 'dus nas lha
234a2(1): khang sdebs su rtsigs pa'i gros byas pas lha'i gtso bo la ma mthun/ sngags pas rdo rje sems dpa' la byed zer/ btsun pas shAkya thub pa la byed zer/ bon pos gshen rab mi bo la byed zer/ lha khang so sor
234a3(1): rtsigs su chad/ lha rje 'ug pa lung pas sgro phug pas dma' ba gcig tu bon po dang bsdebs nas brtsigs pas/ bon po na re/ da gdod lha bzhengs pa'i tshe yang / khyed kyi lhas gtso bo byas na nga'i lhas 'khor
234a4(1): byed/ nga'i lhas gtso bo byas nas khyed kyi lhas 'khor du byed dgos zer bas de gnyis gang yang legs pa gcig mi 'ong bar 'dug dgongs nas lha khang de bon po la byin/ sgro ston pas sgro phug ces bya ba'i
234a5(1): gnas phul te der lha khang brtsigs so// de'i tshe yon bdag gnyen sde gsum na re/ lha khang la rgya phibs sus khel pa la me tog sdud zer ba la/ sngags pa dang bon pos khel/ btsun pas ma khel lo// der
234a6(1): sngags bon gnyis lo re mos su sdud pas/ btsun pa na re/ bdag cag la'ang slong re zhu zer/ lo gcig byin pas/ de phyin chad lo gsum ka lo res sdud du song / sgro phug gi gtsug lag khang der dus gsum
234b1(1): sangs rgyas kyis gtso byas pa'i lha khang che chung brgyad/ khyams stod ka ba nyi shu dang / khyams smad ka ba drug cu'i sa yod/ gnas 'dir chos gra chen po tshugs/ de yang zag gi rgya por yang dag gi sgrub pa'i skabs
234b2(1): yin par yang grags shing rgyal ba zur po che la sku bsod shin tu rgyas pa'i skabs shig na/ 'brog mi lo tsA ba pan+di ta rdzongs pa'i gser ma ldang nas khyed kyis gser mang po khyer shog/ ngas gdams pa zab mo
234b3(1): sbyin no zer/ 'di ltar skyes bu chen po rnams ni gzhan la phan 'dogs pa'i dam bca'i rtsa ba brtan cing / sdong po bkod pa las/ rigs kyi bu khyed kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba gcig la chags par ma byed cig/ chos kyi
234b4(1): sgo gcig dang spyod pa gcig yongs su rdzogs pas chog par ma 'dzin cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' ni dge ba'i rtsa ba tshad med pa yongs su bsdu bar bya dgos so// zhes pas byang
234b5(1): chub sems dpa'i bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi'i spyod pa ma tshang ba med pa rang gir bya ba'i slad du/ karma pak+Shis mtshur phu'i gtsug lag khang gi rgya phebs 'dams cog rtse la nas mthong ba tsam gyis srid du bgam par
234b6(1): mdzad pa bzhin/ rgyal ba zur po ches dgongs pa can gyi slad du/ sgo phug gi lha ri gdong dang / thag gi yang gdong gnyis sbubs su bcug pa'i gser 'bum re byed/ de gnyis kyi bar lcags thag gi sbrel lo
235a1(1): gsungs pa dang / gra pa rnams na re/ 'o na bdag cag gis kyang mthud du zangs sder re dang / dril bu re dang / lcags zag re 'bul lo zhes dam bcas/ de'i g.yer chen po byung nas gzhi bdag
235a2(1): gnyis kyang blo 'drogs par gyur te/ gser ra'i mchin pa tsam zhig zhu rten du phul nas gser 'bum mi mdzad pa'i zhu ba byas/ gser gyi gter kha phul nas srog chags kyi gzugs ma byung bar longs zhes zer/
235a3(1): khung bu gcig nas gser shin tu mang por byung ba'i mthar gser sbal pa 'dra ba zhig byung ba dang 'phro bcad/ mu gu lung du lo tsa ba la gser srang brgya'i mthud byas/ ston gyi dus su ber thog tu tsher ma khur ba
235a4(1): sogs gus pa'i spyod lam kyang mdzad/ rgyud gsum cha lag dang / gur la shin tu mkhas par byang chub mod kyi/ bla ma chen po'i bka' drin gyis/ a po'i sems phyogs nor du thal/ zhes gsar 'gyur gyi chos la
235a5(1): ro myangs pas/ slar yang rang gi sems phyogs yid bzhin rin chen lta bu'i nor du thal zhes nges shes lhag par skyes pa'i gsung byon to// lar phag mo grub pas lam 'bras gsan pa'i phyir dwags po snying pa
235a6(1): rin po che la thugs pa nad bur byed pa dang / gangs ri'i khrod tsam na dkon pa'i dge slong rdo rje 'dzin pa grub thob rnal 'byor gyi dbang po lha rje zur po che rang srid kyi phyogs la mtho snyam pa'i kun slong gi gdon
235b1(1): chen pos/ bde gshegs rgya bo pa/ 'brom ston rgyal ba'i 'byung gnas/ bla ma zhang rin po che/ ston pa byad 'bar rnams sde snod gsum gyi dgrar blta ba'i cho nge 'don pa ni rang nyid kyi mgo na chab 'tshal ba'i spyi
235b2(1): brtol chen po'o// de ltar sgro phug gi gtsang khang 'byongs tsam pa drug cu re gcig pa'i tshe lam lnga'i yon tan mthar phyin nas lhun grub rig 'dzin gyi sa la gnas pa'i skyes bu chen po sprul pa'i skur rtsod pa med pa
235b3(1): de ni rags lus drangs mar gnas 'gyur ba'i dgongs pa gtad de/ brag rgya bo nas zur chung pa bos shig gsungs/ byon pa dang nga'i gang nas 'di zur chung pa la gtod pa yin// slob ma'i tshogs la chos
235b4(1): kyis phan 'dogs dgos pa blo dang 'tshams par sbyor/ ngas skyong ba bzhin du skyongs/ slob ma rnams kyis kyang zur chung pa 'di dpal chen po'i sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub thob pa yin pas nga bas 'di
235b5(1): lhag/ ci mdzad legs par ltos/ gsung ma bcag/ sku'i grib ma dang zhabs rjes na bza' tsam la'ang ma 'gong / ngas skyong bzhin skyong bar yod pas mos gus phun sum tshogs pa gyis shig gsungs/ de nas
235b6(1): sram pa sgrub khang du gshegs/ lan gcig nye gnas la da nang tsha ba snga se gyis gsungs/ der nyi ma shar ba dang sku mdun du phyin pas/ bla ma gzims mal na sku tshags mdzad cing 'dug/ da lta nas sku tshags
236a1(1): mdzad pa gar gshegs pa yin zhus pas/ nga ni bde chen zhing du 'gro// dpal chen nga dang dbyer med pas// yi dam lha la gsol ba thob// ces gsungs nas rdo rje dril bu 'khrol le'i ngang la sku
236a2(1): 'od kyi rang bzhin du gyur te/ dpal chen po'i thugs kar thim mo/ de'i dus su khams pa'i 'bul skyel yong ba dang 'grigs pas/ lam du bla ma dang mjal/ khams pa'i snang ba byin gyis brlabs nas sprul
236a3(1): pa'i gzhal yas khang du 'bul ba'ang bzhes/ bsngo ba mdzad/ slar khams pa nyid log pa las sad pa bzhin du ci yang mi gda' bas/ the tshom gyi ngang nas phyin tsa na lam du bla ma dpal che po'i thugs kar thim
236a4(1): mo zhes thos so// de lta bu'i dpal chen po 'di byin rlabs shin tu che bas slan chad kyang sku gnyer la rgya ston shA ka ye la bsu ba gyis zhes gsung byon/ bsu ba byas tsa na/ rgya ston de ba dkar mo zhig la
236a5(1): chibs/ sbyang zha zhig gsol nas byung / dpal chen po'i sku mdun du 'od dkar po gcig tu gyur te/ g.yon skor lan gsum byas nas sku la dngos su thim pa dkon gnyer mdze don ldan zhes bya bas mngon sum
236a6(1): par mthong / de bzhin du mtshan ldan zur mo 'od 'bum bya ba'ang sku la thim par grags so// rtse mo bzhi'i nang nas kyang glang po'i nang na khyu mchog lta bu bde gshegs rgyal po pa'am/ zur chung shes rab grags pa
236b1(1): ni/ sngags 'chang 'ug pa lung pa'i gdung gi phyi mo yin te/ de la yab lpag pa sgom chen res dga' ldom bu'i tshul du'ang yod pa'i bur g.yas ru gtsang gi sa'i char ma jo shes rab skyid la ngo mtshar ba'i ltas khyad
236b2(1): par ba dang bcas pas btsas/ lo bdun par 'bri klog dang / dgu la zhi khro'i phrin las gyer shes pa byung / bcu gsum lon pa'i skabs gcig na gzims mal na phyag dpe gzigs shing yod tsa na/ jo mo zhig
236b3(1): yod pa rgyags byung ste zhing la shwa log shor 'dug go/ khyod nyal bas chog gam zer ba la/ smad gos gsar pa zhig yod pa gyon/ rung chu brgal nas khyim gyi chu bkag gyin yod tsa na/ mo na re ngas dka' las
236b4(1): byas pa'i gos brjes kyang mi byed par chud 'dza' zhes rgol du byung / kho bo mi 'phangs par gos 'phangs na de na yod ces bsgyur bas/ mo khros te nga la brnyas pa yin zer nas rang yul du bros/ zur chung pa
236b5(1): 'khor ba la spro ba skye drag nas gdung khungs nas zhus lud pa de khyer rjes la skad btang bas/ mo yar shog ces 'bod du re nas tshom mar bsdad pa la zhud gtad de/ pho nor pho mo nor mo bya ba yin pas zhud khyer
236b6(1): cig smras pas/ mo yi chad nas yul du song / der zur chung pas pha la gros ma dris/ ma la rgyags ma blangs/ grogs kyi ngo la ma bltas par sbyang slog zhig yod pa khyer nas zur po che la gtad de byon pas/ lam
237a1(1): du rta nag gi 'brog pa g.yu dang zangs khyer ba gnyis dang / shangs pa khrag khyer ba rnams sdebs su byung ste byon/ der zur chung par sbyang slog pa las 'bul rgyu med/ gzhan gsum pos phyag rten
237a2(1): / phul bas/ bla ma'i zhal nas/ khong rnams 'khor ba la blo log ma log blta bas spang zan dang / lo thug re drongs gsungs pas/ 'brog pa gnyis po zar ma 'dod/ shangs pas cung zad zos/ zur chung pas lhag
237a3(1): med zos pas/ bla ma'i zhal nas sbrang slog dang khrab gnyis zhog/ g.yu dang zangs bdag po la gtod gsungs pas/ 'brog pa ma dga' ste phyag rten klog pa 'u cag la chos mi slob pa'i rtags yin zer nas
237a4(1): song / rten 'brel de las zur ba'i chos la gshe ba de byung / der zur chung pa la khyod kyi rus pa ci yin gsungs pas/ bla ma dang rus gcig par brjod na 'gran par song dogs nas/ zur chung chung zhig lags
237a5(1): byas pas bla dwags su de ltar thogs/ de las can du mkhyen nas smon gnyer byed du bcug pas blo gros kyi spobs pa mchog tu gyur pa zhig byung / dang po shin tu dbul bas bla mas gtor ma btang ba dag blangs
237a6(1): nas zan chang bya bzhin gsol ba na/ gra pa gzhan tshos/ khong chang gi kha sgyur dri tshil le sdod/ chang bla ma la'ang mi 'dren/ mched grogs la'ang mi ster zhus pas/ bla mas/ de ring zur chung pa shing zus shog/
237b1(1): gsungs/ shul du zur chung ba'i spyil bu g.yeng du bcug pas/ bem po zhig gi 'o na ban chang ka pA la gang las gzhan ci yang med skad/ de bla mas zur chung pa 'tsho ba chad na rang re'i zab la shog gsungs pas//
237b2(1): nga bla ma'i dkor la 'bag ri zer dka' spyad 'ba' zhig khur bzod par mdzad/ nyin gcig bla mas bse phor phul dgu shong ba zhig bsnams nas khyod la skom ster rgyu e yod gsungs/ zan chang zhus pas snod
237b3(1): do gsol/ da dung khyer shog gsungs nas gsol/ da e 'dug gsungs pas bre gang tsam gda' zhus pas/ da mi yog par 'dug/ yog na khyod la gsod nams bod tsam na che ba 'ong ste/ 'on kyang nga la bsnyen
237b4(1): bkur gyi rten 'brel las bsod nams chen po 'od gsungs// der nas khal gsum gnang nas 'di zad pa dang yo byad mi 'thogs pa yod gsungs/ der zur chung pas thos pa dang / bsam pa dang / sgom pa'i
237b5(1): gnas gang yin pa la phrugs gcig tu nyin dang mtshan med par brtson pa bskyed pas/ sprul pa'i sku yin pas mkhyen rab kyi klong rdol/ nyams rtogs bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'khrungs kyang dpe cha tsam 'dri ba'i yo
237b6(1): byad kyang rngom thogs par yod tsa na/ lha rje zur po che la pan gyi khang sngon bya ba na jo mo g.yu mo bya ba'i sgom ma phyug mo ma smad gnyis yod pas/ khyod rang 'di'i steng du sdod gsungs/ nga khyim zab mi byed zhus
238a1(1): pas/ 'du shes ma chung / ston pas gnang ba dang bkag pa'i mtshams ngas shes/ khong gnyis kyi yo byad la spyad nas dbang zhus/ dpe bris/ chos thams cad lhag ma ma lus par nyan pas chog pa
238a2(1): yin/ des khong gnyis kyang tshogs rdzogs/ khyod rang gi don yang grub pa de dga' mod gsungs/ der gsungs bzhin nyan pas 'dod pa thams cad rdzogs pa dang / yang gsung gis/ da khyod der ma sdod/ dpe
238a3(1): cha la sogs pa mchod pa'i yo byad rim gyis skyol la nga'i 'dir shog gsungs/ de ltar byas pas cad mchi 'am/ khong gnyis kyang drin che zhus pas/ blo ma chung / khyod kyis 'gro ba'i don nus pa zhig 'ong bar
238a4(1): 'dug/ snyigs ma'i dus 'dir sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa dar bar byas nas 'gro ba mang po'i don byed dgos pa yin/ khong gnyis kyi drin las du'ang de che/ 'di la gab pas rang don gzhan don gang yang mi
238a5(1): 'grub gsungs/ der ji skad gsungs pa bzhin nyan pas bla ma'i dgongs pa ji bzhin du longs/ skabs shig na lha rje bzhugs pa'i sgo rtsan mchod rten gcig yod pa la zur chung ba skor ba byed kyin 'dug pa
238a6(1): gzigs/ zhabs sa la mi reg par khru gang tsam nas ska ra ra gda'/ bla ma'i thugs la 'di sprul pa'i sku gcig yin nyan 'dug pas ngo mtshar che snyam du dgongs shing dgyes so// de bzhin du zur chung pa phyogs
238b1(1): gshed na 'byon bzhud kyi lung stong bye ma'i gseb tu tshad pas shin tu gdungs pa la zhal skyems 'dren par byung ba dang / ri stong gi rtse mo la sgom du gshegs pas sku bkres pa la zhal zas 'dren pa sogs gang
238b2(1): 'dod pa'i thugs dgongs 'bad med 'grub pa byung bas/ da ni ngas 'gro ba'i don byas kyang 'grub dgongs pa'i tshe/ bla ma'i zhal nas kyang / da khyod kyis bshad pa gyis gsungs/ der mdo dgongs 'dus
238b3(1): gsungs pas dus gcig la dpe 'grems sum brgya byung / de'i tshe zur chung pa la bla mas bsngags pa chen po mdzad pas/ bla mas dpon po'i dbu 'phang bstod ces cung zad mi gus pa'i rnam pa byed pa byung / bla
238b4(1): ma la skur ba byas na bsod nams ma yin pa chen por mkhyen nas/ nam zhig e dmar rdo rje spo zhes bya ba dpon slob thams cad chos 'khor la byon tsa na/ srang kha gcig na khyi mo ma smad ro smad la 'bu zhugs pa
238b5(1): zhig 'dug/ bla ma zur chen gyis reg pa tsam mdzad/ zur chung bas khyi mo ma smad bsad// 'bru zhal du gsol bas/ gzhan rnams na re/ zur chung ba zer ba'i sgro spyod mkhan 'di 'dra'i chad nyan du bskos/ 'o
238b6(1): / skol la sbyin bdag rnams kyang mos pa ldog gda' zer/ bla ma'i zhal nas khyi rnams ngan song du 'gro ba ngas kyang shes te sgrol ma nus pa yin/ khong gis bsgral ba ngo mtshar che gsungs/ der zur chung pas lta
239a1(1): stangs gcig mdzad pas/ khyi ro rnams mchod pa'i lha mor gyur/ 'bru rnams sprugs pas nam mkha' la tse dir dir song / der zur chen pas/ da khyed rnams ngo mtshar skyes sam gsungs pas/ mig
239a2(1): 'phrul du gda' zer/ der shangs chu rgyas pa dang thug pas zur chen gyis chu pha rir ka pA la rdzu 'phrul gyis bsgyur nas/ 'di sus lon la nga'i bshad gra 'bog pa yin gsungs pas/ rtse mo gzhan gsum pos
239a3(1): kyang len ma nus/ zur chung pas zhabs chu la ma reg par byon nas blangs so// yang rlung gi nus pa 'gran par bskul bas/ rtse mo bzhi la sogs pa'i ston sgom gzhan rnams kyis kyang zhabs sa la ma reg par
239a4(1): 'gro nus par byung yang / zur chung pas ta la gang tsam gyi nam mkha' la 'phangs te sram pa sgrub khang du sngon la brtol bas rtse mo gzhan gsum yang nges shes rnyed/ bla mas ci gsung gyi bka' bsgrubs pas
239a5(1): zhabs tog kyang mthar phyin to// re zhig na zur chung pa la gnas kyi lung bstan rim pa gsum du byung ste stong nyid rtogs pa'i rnal 'byor pa de la ched du 'dzin pa ma yin pas 'khrul snang gi sde tshan du dor med//
239a6(1): mthar rus pa'i rgyan gyis spras pa'i bu mo lo bcu drug pa DA ma ru dang gar stabs sgyur ba lnga byung nas ming po khyod ri bo dgu 'dus la bsgoms na don gnyis grub bo zer zhing brag rgya bo la mdzub mo gtad pas/
239b1(1): ri bo dgu 'dus/ chu mig dgu 'dus/ ne sing dgu 'dus pas theg pa rim pa dgu rdzogs pa'i rtags su mkhyen/ brag rgya bo de bcom ldan 'das dpal chen po la go rI ma brgyad kyis bskor ba 'dra ba yin pas
239b2(1): 'di la sgrub pa byas na sgrub thag nye la byin rlab che/ lar 'khor ba sdug bsngal gyi rang bzhin yin pas 'jig rten gyi 'khri ba chod dgos/ phyi ma'i don sgrub pa la 'du 'dzi dang khe drag gis mi phan/ ma'i ngo bsrung
239b3(1): pab 'di 'phral du bya dka' la phugs snying po med pa yin pas nga gcig pur sgom pa yin gsungs nas gra pa rnams go mchod mi gsum la gtad nas/ chos 'chad nyan gyi bstan pa khyed rnams kyis skyongs shig
239b4(1): ces brag rgya bo la gshegs so// de byon nas sgrub pa kho na la bzhugs pas gzhi bdag gi ljongs cho 'phrul shin tu che bar byung ste/ 'di ltar grub pa'i khyu mchog chen po dag ni rmi lam dang mngon sum rdzun pa'i
239b5(1): nga du ro gcig pas nub gcig mnal lam du/ brag rgya bo'i rtser mi nag po gcig byung nas zhabs gnyis nas bsdus te klad la bskor te bsgyur byung bas/ zag gi mdo'i zang chen po gcig tu brdabs pa rmis/
239b6(1): sang tsa na thang dkyil na dngos su 'dug pas yang 'dzeg dgos pa byung ste cho 'phrul chen po la ma 'dzings par bzhugs/ yang sdig pa rtsid bu tsam gyis sgrub khang khengs pas rgyu 'bras la zlo ba'i rtogs pa mngon du
240a1(1): gyur nas/ sdig pa'i rwa gnyis nas 'jus te phyed mar gshag pa dang chabs gcig/ sdig pa mi dge so sor bshags// zhes don la mi rton tshig la rton pa'i ku re mdzad de bsgyur bas thams cad
240a2(1): rnam par snang mdzad du gyur nas nam mkha' la dengs/ yang lan cig grog mo'i dmag drangs byung bas/ nye gnas la tsong ge khyer shog gsungs tsong ges brdungs pas/ nye gnas na re sdig pa la dgongs mdzod
240a3(1): ces zhe khrel brngas pas/ khyod de la mi dad na 'di ltar bya yis gsungs nas grog mo zhal du btab gin phu mdzad pas/ thams cad rdo rje sems dpar krong krong gyur te nam mkha' la song bas nye gnas shin tu
240a4(1): da / gsad gso'i rdzu 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyab pas gzhi bdag ming srid gsum dam la btags te dngos su gzugs bstan nas zhabs spyi bor blangs/ brag la phur pa btab pa'i gru chu da lta'ang yod/ der
240a5(1): gsang ba sgyu 'phrul las byung ba'i phyag rgya bsam gtan gyi sgrub pa mdzad pas/ rdo rje sems dpa'i zhal gzigs/ zag gi lung pa rdo rje sems dpa' khengs pa byung / snang ba zad sar gyi skye mched brnyes pas sku
240a6(1): me dang / chu dang / rlung dang / sa chub tu 'gro ba dang / cir snang thams cad rdo rje sems dpa'i rang bzhin du bkra lam lam gsal ba byung ste bzang rtog gi mthu brtas pa yin/ yang dag par gtad pa med snyam du
240b1(1): dgongs/ der snang sems chos nyid gsum ro gcig tu 'dres nas dgongs pa zad pa'i sa la skyel te sa rdo ri brag thams cad la thogs pa med pa dang / nam mkha' la bya lta bur 'gro ba sogs 'byung ba lnga la
240b2(1): rang dbang thob pa byung / da zla ba gcig na slob ma snod ldan zhig 'ong gsungs/ re zhig na mtshan nyid pa'i dge bshes sba dge mthong bya ba thag tu chos 'khor la byung / khong gis gra pa blo rno ba gcig zur chung la
240b3(1): / rtsod pa byed du btang bas/ khos ka ba la mdzub mo gtad nas ka ba chos can/ khyod 'jig rten rang rgud pa'i 'khrul ngor ka ba rang rgyud du snang yang / nga rdzogs pa chen po rang snang ris med kyi don la ka ba grub
240b4(1): pa mi gda' gsungs nas/ phyag yug yug mdzad pas ka ba la chags thogs med par song / kho ngo mtshar skyes nas smra ma nus/ dad pa lhag par thob nas slob mar byas pa ma thog byad 'bar ro// 'di rdo'i ka ba
240b5(1): yin/ chag dum da lta'ang yod zer ba dngos por zhen pa dag gi 'dod pa min na rung ngo // de la slob ma ka ba bzhi/ gdung ma brgyad/ phyam bcu drug/ dral ma sum cu rtsa gnyis/ sgom chen mi gnyis/ yus po che mi
240b6(1): gcig/ dkyus pa gnyis/ sta gu ra mi gnyis/ go ma chod gsum la sogs pa mang du byon te/ ka ba bzhi po ni/ dang po dge bshes khyung po grags se'i gra ba mtshan nyid pa chen po blo gros shin tu rno ba yin/ bde
241a1(1): gshegs rgya bo pa dang / dge bshes khyung po gnyis nyang rur yon bdag gcig gis gdan drangs te 'dzom pa'i dus/ khyung pos khong bzhi po btang nas/ zur chung pa bya ba'i chos log mkhan 'di
241a2(1): sun dbyung la shog/ ces bsgos pas bzhi pos lha rje'i spyan sngar phyin tsa na/ zur chung pa thul pa phyi nang ldog nas bzhes te 'dug/ der gcig gis/ lpags pa phyi nang klog pa'i gos 'di gang gi chos lugs yin
241a3(1): zer/ lpags pa dang po nas 'di ltar yod pas phyi nang ma ldog/ phyi nang 'dzol ba khyed rang gi chos yin mod gsungs/ gcig gis 'o na chos gtam bya'o smras pas/ chos kyi ngo bo brjod med mtha' bral la chos
241a4(1): gtam ga na yod gsungs/ der skyo ston gyis dris pa/ 'o na khyed rdzogs pa chen po pa'i lugs kyis sgom la gtso bor byed pa lags sam byas pas/ nga dmigs pa gang la gtad 'dug gsungs/ 'o na mi bsgom
241a5(1): pa lags sam byas pas/ nga gang la yengs 'dug gsungs pas spobs pa lan med du song / yang glan ston sha ka bzang gis dris pa/ khyod gsang ba sgyu 'phrul pa'i lugs kyi snang ba thams cad lha dang lha mor
241a6(1): 'dod pa lags sam byas pas/ yul bem po rang rgyud du snang ba'i mngon sum gyi tshad ma sus 'gegs gsungs/ 'o na mi 'dod pa e yin byas pas/ sems can gyi ma dag pa'i 'khrul snang rang rgyud pa skyong
241b1(1): phyir mdo rgyud kyi dgongs pa dang 'gal bar sus nus gsungs pas/ khong bzhi'i brgal brtag gi rig pa rnon po'i tshig gi tshogs/ don gyi mthu che ba'i lan sgra gcan gyi lag pa lta bus rnam par bkab cing /
241b2(1): snying rje chen po'i gzhan dbang gi sngar mos brdzis pas/ 'di ltar las 'phro sad pa'i gang zag ni slob dpon dpa' bo 'phags pa lha'i gdul zhing du gyur pa lta bu ste/ 'di skad du/ kye ma theg pa chen po'i don
241b3(1): phyin ci ma log par rtogs pa/ rigs pa dang grol ba'i spobs pa dang ldan pa 'di lta bu'i bshes gnyen ni rnyed par dka'o// 'on kyang da lta dngos su phyin na slob dpon mi dgyes su 'ongs pas/ sang phod thabs
241b4(1): kyis rtog ge ngan pa'i slob dpon dang dbral bar byas la/ rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug srid pa'i dra ba gcod pa'i mtshon cha rnon po'i dpal dang 'grogs par bgyi ba la gdon mi za ba'i dam bca' lhur len to
241b5(1): zhes mna' thos bcad nas dengs so// de ltar dengs pa'ang me tog zas can pad+ma'i tshal la bya ba bzhin du sang phod las 'phro dang smon lam bzang po'i gshog pa skyang ste bde gshegs rgya bo pa'i chos gra ma la
241b6(1): ya'i nags klu chen por lhag pa las ka ba bzhi byung ba yin no// der khong bzhi pos khyung po'i drung du phyin tsa na/ khyed tshos zur chung pa sun phyung ngam zer/ sun phyin pa mi gda' byas pas/ phrag dog gi 'thor rlung
242a1(1): drag pos yid rnal du mi phebs pa tsam du gyur nas zur chung ba 'dra ba'i lta ba ngan pa can skye bo thams cad log pa'i lam du 'khrid pa 'di bsad na sangs rgya nges zer ro// de zur pa'i gra pa dag
242a2(1): gis thos nas snyan du gsol pas/ rgyud rang bzhin gyis grol ba'i byang chub sems dpa' la khong khro ba'i rnam par rtog pa med pas cang mi gsungs pas lan btab/ nang par chos khri'i kha nas bzhad kyin
242a3(1): 'dug/ bla ma ci la dgyes zhus pas/ chos bya ba nga'i theg pa chen po gsang sngags 'di yin par 'dug/ sgrol pa la brten nas sangs rgyas par 'dod pa 'di gsang sngags kyi lugs yin/ mtshan nyid pa la med
242a4(1): snyam tsa na/ zur chung ba lta bu bsad na sangs rgya gsungs nas khyung po grags se lta bu'i mtshan nyid pa chen po yang blo phugs nga'i chos la gtod pa 'dug pas nga dga' ba gcig byung gsungs skad/ de la sems
242a5(1): phyogs kyi ka ba gung bu'i skyon ston shAka ye/ mdo'i ka ba sbyong lung gi yang kheng bla ma/ sgyu 'phrul gyi ka ba chu bar gyi glan shAkya bzang po/ phrin sgrub kyi ka ba nag mo ri'i mda' tig jo shAka go/ yang ma thog byang
242a6(1): 'bar dang rgyud pa lnga zhes kyang grags/ gdung brgyad ni ma thog pa sgo ston chos seng / glan shAkya byang chub/ rtsag shAka rings/ gnubs ston bag ma/ dbus pa sa 'thor/ shu ston zla grags/ rtse phron byang dpal
242b1(1): dang brgyad do// yang nga la gzi chen/ na la rnga snying po/ ram ston rgyal ba gsum drangs pa'ang yod/ sgom chen mi gnyis ni/ 'ba' sgom dig ma dang / bon sgom do ba'o// yus po che ni la stod kyi zi ston bsod
242b2(1): rgyal lo// sta gu ra mi gnyis ni/ zhang ston sngags se dang / khyung po grags se'o// phyam dral la sogs te dkyus ma'i ming smos ma 'tshal lo// go ma chod mi gsum ni/ mgo phya tsha/ mig chung dbang seng / mgo chung
242b3(1): dbang nge gsum mo// de bla ma zur chung pa brag rgya bor lo nyi shu rtsa bzhi sgrub pa thun gcig la bzhugs nas 'ja' lus su gshegs pa'i dgongs pa gtad yod pa la sku mtshams thon dgos pa'i rkyen gnyis
242b4(1): byung bas/ lo ril po bcu gsum dang ngo gcig ste bcu bzhi bzhugs/ 'di'i skabs shig na nye gnas kyis kyang sku la bcar du med pa'i rgyun ring bar bzhugs/ re zhig na dud pa dang ldab ldib tsam yang ma byung /
242b5(1): sku la snyan pa mi mnga' 'am snyam nas nye gnas kyis bltar phyin tsa na/ zhal dang shangs la sdom thag breng nge 'dug/ bla ma grongs snyam nas du shor bas dgongs pa grol/ bla ma'i zhal nas nga de kha'i ngang la bzhag
242b6(1): na mgo la thod pa mi 'gel ba gcig yod ba yin te/ da skye ba gcig len par 'dug gsungs/ de sa skya lo chen yin zer/ 'di ni chos nyid cig car du zad nas phung po rdul phran du ma dengs tsam pa'i lam
243a1(1): rtags su snang / yang nang gcig/ tsha ba'i sta gon gyis shig/ da res lo ma'i tshod ma bya'o gsungs/ nye gnas kyis chu ma khol ba la bla mas tshod ma bsnams byung / ngas 'ug pa lung 'khor nas khyod
243a2(1): chu mi khol ba ci yin gsungs/ ku re yin nam zhus pas/ zur po ches gnang ba'i gsol ras zhig yod pa nye gnas la gnang bas/ kho yid lhag par ches/ nga'i bla ma rlung sems la rang dbang thob nges yin
243a3(1): snyam pa'i mos gus skyes so// de la dgon pa nas 'byon pa'i rkyen gcig ni/ go mchod mi gsum gyis bstan pa ma 'khyongs te/ 'og bya tshas thabs lam gyi rgyab tu ma rgyud dgos zer 'gos khug pa'i rtsar song /
243a4(1): mig chung dbang seng na re/ dkyil 'khor phyir 'don pa la rgyab tu yo ga dgos zer nas sum pa ye 'bar gyi rtsar song / 'gos chung dbang nges bzhi lam gyi grub mtha'i rgyab tu tshad ma dgos zer spangs ka dar
243a5(1): chung ba'i rtsar song ngo // de dag ni gsang ba snying po la lam thabs grol gnyis ka yod de ma rgyud kyi mtshan nyid ma phyed/ dkyil 'khor rang sa nas thon pa la mig ltag khung du 'chus/ tshad ma tshig gi grub mtha'
243a6(1): yin te gzhi lam thog tu mi phebs pa mgo/ rgyud des go mchod mi gsum gyis bshad gra ma 'khyongs pas sku mtshams las thon dgos pa byung / rkyen gcig ni/ sgro phug lha khang gi mjug skyongs dang / rab gnas
243b1(1): ma grub tsam la rgyal ba zur po che skye ba ma spangs par zung 'jug gi grub mtha' snyogs par bzhed nas/ nga'i lag rjes khyod kyis skyongs shig ces bla ma'i bka' byung nas byon pa yin no// de ltar bde gshegs
243b2(1): zur chung ba phrin las rgyas pa'i dus na/ bod kyi sngags pa tshogs tshad kyis phyag mi byed pa dang / gral gong du 'gro ba med pas/ 'gos lo tsA bas gzhan rnams la phyag mi 'tshal ba dang / gral zhabs su mi sgrig
243b3(1): pa'i khrims bcas mod/ nam zhig shangs su ston mo chen po gcig la thams cad tshogs pa na/ zur chung pa gral mgo na bzhugs pa'i spyan sngar 'gos kyis slebs/ de'i tshe 'di ltar tshig la mkhas shing nyon
243b4(1): mongs la grim pa'i bshes gnyen chen po dag gis dgongs pa sangs rgyas dang mnyam pa'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang po dag gi zil bzod pa ma yin pas/ lnga sde bzang po'i nang khrims bzhin rang dbang brtan pa bral
243b5(1): ba'i 'du byed rtab rtab por gyur nas phyag mi byed pa'i dam bca'i ri mo rjes shul tsam yang med par zubs/ yan lag lnga'i 'khri shing sa la 'byar ba bzhin du gyur pas kun kyang phyag byed pa la mngon du phyogs
243b6(1): so// de ltar ston mo gyis tsa na gzhan dag na re/ zur chung pa la phyag mi byed pa'i dam bca' rang res mdzad pa la sngon la nyid kyis mdzad pa ci yin dris pas/ kho'i drung du phyin tsa na bcom ldan 'das dpal
244a1(1): chen po'am de 'di ka yin pa 'dug snyam pa las/ mi yi 'du shes ma skyes gsung skad/ lar rdzu 'phrul shin tu che bas nyi zer la 'byor bzhud mdzad par grags te/ 'ug pa lung du snga chos/ sgro phug
244a2(1): tu gung chos/ brag rgya bor dgong chos te 'gyangs kha shin tu che sar nyi ma re la chos thun gsum re 'chad/ de bzhin du lha zer mo 'kha' 'gro ma rnams bro brdungs mdzad pa gzigs pas rkyen byas mkha' 'gro las
244a3(1): la bkol nas mchod khang ka ba bdun dang / khyad 'phags gnyis te gus btegs pa zhig bzhengs pas/ mkha' 'gro lha khang du grags/ sangs rgyas bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis dang / bka' srung legs ldan lde gur
244a4(1): bzhengs/ dkyil 'khor rgyas bsdus gnyis logs la bris/ rab tu gnas pa'i tshe legs ldan gyi sku la phu dung gi lcags brab cing sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa e srung gsungs pas dbu gug gug pa byung / dkon
244a5(1): mchog gi dbu 'phang e bstod gsungs pas mchu lteb lteb pa byung / de bzhin du dpal chen po zhal gzigs pa'i zhabs yon bzhag sar yang dag gi lha khang bzhengs/ ma thog byang 'bar gyis lha khang la shing
244a6(1): gnyen khrag tu 'dzag pa gcod du bstsal nas lha khang 'byongs/ shing phud bla ma la phul ba'i tshe/ gzhi bdag phreng bas spen ma'i ka ba gcig lus nas gtsang por drangs pa rnga mo phrang du zhag lnga chu la byings nas
244b1(1): ma thon/ der slob ma gnyis btang nas brag la dkar gtor 'di spungs/ mtsho la dmar gtor 'di rgyob la bla ma zur chung pa'i shing da lta bskyal na skyol cig/ ces sdigs su bcug pas/ chu bdag skrag nas
244b2(1): phral du thon pa sogs lha 'dre'i bka' la nyan/ de lta bu'i che ba'i yon tan gyis brgyan pa'i lha rje zur chung pa de sku mya ngan las 'da' bar nye ba'i tshe/ bu slob rnams kyis rigs sras bskrun par/ gsol ba
244b3(1): btab pas gsang bdag lag na rdo rje yum gyi lhums su mngon byang lnga'i ting nge 'dzin gyis spyan drangs pa zur shAkya seng ge mtshan dpe'i ngo mtshar gsal bar byas/ zhal gyi gdams pa brgyad cu par grags pa/
244b4(1): ri'i bu gyis/ hrul po'i gos gyon mi zhim pa'i zas zo/ dgra gnya' rengs su thong / zhing tha rengs su zhog/ blo thag chos la chod/ ces pa la sogs pa gsungs nas drug cu rtsa gcig bzhes pa'i shing pho stag la
244b5(1): brag rgya bor 'od dang sgra dang sa g.yo ba dang bcas 'og min rdo rje bkod pa'i grong khyer du gshegs so// // de la bod 'dir dpal gsang ba'i snying po'i bshad pa'i chu 'gro lta bur gyur pa gsang bdag sgro
244b6(1): phug pa chen po'am zung shAkya seng ge ni/ jo sras mo mda' mo gtsug gtor lcam zhes bya ba slob mar gyur pa zhig yod pa der mngal du sprul pa'i sku 'dzin nus par dgongs nas/ de nyid kyi ming po ka ba bzhi'i
245a1(1): gras mda' te chos sha ka la/ khyod kyi sring mo 'di bdag gir rung ngam zhes gsungs pas/ mda' tig na re/ bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes de'i lag pa na rdo rje dril bu bzhag ste/ 'di gzhan la ma
245a2(1): brgyud par bla ma'i phyag tu phul zhig par bsgos pas rten 'brel chen po 'grigs/ de khab tu bzhes pa ma yin pas gra pa'i tshogs kyang sdang zhing 'don par brtsams pa na/ skyo ston sha ka ye na re/ 'di'i srin lag
245a3(1): la bstan pa'i gtso bo gcig 'dug par rmis pas/ rigs sras 'dra mthong na bstan pa phan srid kyi zhog gsungs/ de bzhin du ka ba gzhan rnams la'ang sangs rgyas kyi sku dang / gser gyi rdo rje sogs jo mo
245a4(1): la thim pa rmis pas bzhag go/ de la rdog lo chen po'i bcu drug pa shing pho stag la sgro phug pa sku bltams/ der bla ma'i zhal nas nga'i bu 'di lhums su 'jug pa'i tshe phyag na rdo rje thim pa'i mtshan ma yod pa yin
245a5(1): pas 'gro ba la phan pa zhig yod gsungs nas/ na shAkya seng ge btags/ yab kyis spong dag byas na ci yang med pa dang thug pas/ yum na re/ kha sing nas bu skye ba ni thugs la mnga'/ rkan mar tsam yang mi
245a6(1): 'jog pa zer ba la/ kho la bsod nams yod na ngas ma bzhag kyang 'ong / de med na bzhag kyang mi phan gsungs khang thog na bzhugs tsa na/ btsun ma phyug mo zhig gis nas rgyab mang po dang / mar phon cher
245b1(1): phul/ mdo khams nas 'bul skye la lhags pas/ 'di la bsod nams kyang 'ong / 'gro ba la'ang phan gsungs/ zla ba brgyad na yab gshegs pas/ yum dang zhang pos bskyangs nas mda' phur lo bco lda
245b2(1): bzhugs/ de nas chu bar du glan shAkya bzang po'i drung du byon nas gsang ba sgyu 'phrul dang / skeng lung du yang khyed gi sar yang byon nas chos gsan/ dgung lo bcu dgu pa la che 'don mdzad pas phrin las shin
245b3(1): tu rgyas te bslab gnyer g.yel ba byung / der skabs btsal nas gong bur skyo'i rtsar lo gcig byon/ de nas slar phrin las cher rgyas te gzhan du bzhud pa'i skabs ma byung / bla ma mkhas grub kyi tshogs tshul spyan
245b4(1): drangs nas slob gnyer rdzogs par mdzad/ khyad par ka ba bzhi las yab chos mdo sgyu sems gsum rgyud man ngag phrin sgrub phyag bzhes dbang dang bcas pa yongs su rdzogs par gsan cing khyad par du zhang po
245b5(1): mda' tig las mdo'i skor zhib par brnyes/ glan shAkya byang chub la rdzogs chen skor lugs/ lha rje shangs nag la rdzogs chen brgyud pa tha ma sogs mdor na bla ma mang po la thos bsam gyi sgro 'dogs chod par
245b6(1): mdzad/ rang gi grub mtha' gsan pa'i bla ma de dag la'ang yum rgyas 'bring bsdus gsum gyis sna drangs pa'i 'bul ba rgya chen pos thugs zin par mdzad/ nya ri sgro phug tu sgrub pa yun ring du mdzad pas bskyed
246a1(1): rdzogs kyi gnas la man ngag gi rgyud nas gsungs pa'i gzer bzhi zebs/ yi dam lha'i sku gsung thugs dang tha dad med par 'dres pas sku gzhon nu nas gzi byin shin tu che ste thams cad zil
246a2(1): gyis gnon nus/ re zhig na dam pa sangs rgyas ding rin bzhugs pa dpon slob lngas mjal du byon/ phebs rgyu'i nyin dam pa'i zhal nas de ring phyag na rdo rje'i sprul pa 'byon pa yod kyi bsu ba gyis gsungs/
246a3(1): dar gdugs la sogs bshams pas/ nyi ma rgas su chas tsa na sngags pa dpon slob lnga byung / gzhan su yang mi gda' zhus pas/ de ka la bsu ba gyis gsungs/ der lha rjes sgro phug pas dam pa la mngon mkhyen
246a4(1): e 'dug blta yi gsungs nas slob ma zhig nyid du rdzur bcug nas sngon la btang / khong rang phyin zhabs 'bring ba ltar byas pas/ dam pas sgro phug pa'i mgul na lba ba yod pa la gzigs nas/ phyag sna lba ba
246a5(1): can gyis drongs/ dpon slob go ma log pa bzang gsungs pas/ mos gus chen po thob/ chos kyi bdud rtsi'ang nod/ dam pa'i zhal nas sgro phug pa la 'di bstan pa'i spyi dpal chen por 'gyur zhes dbugs
246a6(1): 'byin mdzad/ yang re zhig na phyag rdor gyi bris sku byed pa'i bri bkod kyi tshe/ lha bris pa la khyed rang 'di 'dra ba zhig bris zhes phyag na rdo rje'i skur dngos su bstan pa sogs rgyu mtshan du ma'i sgo nas dpal gsang
246b1(1): ba'i bdag po byang phyogs kyi rgyud 'dir gsang sngags kyi bstan pa rgyas par mdzad pa la byon no zhes grags/ spyir gdul bya'i tshogs dpag tu med la/ khyad par slob ma dge ba'i bshes gnyen chen po gras
246b2(1): 'dzin cing bstan pa skyong ba gdugs thogs pa stong thon pas ring mo'i mtha' yang phrin las bsam gyis mi khyab/ sgro phug tu chos gsungs pa'i dus gcig chos khri rgyab yol med pa gcig la bzhugs te mtha'
246b3(1): skor thams cad gra pas bskor nas yod pa la/ phyogs thams cad du zhal thal le bar byung bas rdo rje sems dpa' sgyu 'phrul 'dra ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po'i zhal sbyin mngon sum par yid ches shing sprul
246b4(1): pa'i skur rtsod pa med par grags/ dbyar chos dgun chos kyi dus phyogs re na mar dpe 'grims lnga brgya tsam re dang / ston chos dang dpyid chos kyi dus sum brgya tsam yod cing / spyir khri phrag thal ba byung bas/
246b5(1): chos ra'i gos bde dog la'ang gser zho re'i 'ja' len byed pa'i dar rgyas byung / mkhyen brtse nus gsum gyi yon tan phun sum tshogs shing dpal gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa'i rgyud don la rang byan
246b6(1): tshuchud pa tsam gyis chos spyan thob pas gsang bdag sgro phug pa'i bshad srol zhes dus da lta'i bar du ldab ldib byed pa 'di byung zhing nyi zla ltar grags pa yin no// de la thugs zin gyi slob ma bcu gnyis byung ste//
247a1(1): nag po bzhi/ ston pa bzhi/ mes bzhi las/ nag po bzhi ni/ lce ston rgya nag/ zur nag 'khor lo/ nyar nag mdo bo/ mda' nag gtsug tor dbang phyug go/ ston pa bzhi ni/ nyi ston chos seng /
247a2(1): gyabyabs ston rdo rje mgon po// zhang ston/ rgya ston bzhi'o// mes bzhi ni/ rtsangs pa byi ston/ g.yu ston hor po/ spangs ston lcags kyu/ dbus pa chos seng ngo // 'dren tshul 'di zur stod lugs su grags la/ smad
247a3(1): lugs su de las tha dad pa'ang yod/ de ltar sprul pa'i sku gsang bdag sgro phug pa chen po de nyid tha ma'i mdzad pa ston par babs pa'i tshe/ ston pa bzhi la khyed chos tshogs 'khor gyi cha rkyen 'dra khyer la
247a4(1): shog/ ngas kyang sdigs kyi gsungs/ ston pa bzhin gsungs bzhin du bsgrubs pa dang / sgro phug gi lhag lha ri gdong gi rtse byon nas tshogs 'khor rgya chen po mdzad/ gsung gi gsang ba mang po rjes su bstan nas/
247a5(1): khyed rnams nga med pa la mya ngan ma byed cig/ ngas da res lus ma spangs par khyer nas rig 'dzin gyi sa la 'gro ba yin/ des khyed rnams la shul du 'ang bkra shis/ mi rgyud dang bstan pa 'phel ba gcig 'ong ngo /
247a6(1): gsungs nas/ dpal gyi mgur las rdo rje'i glu gcig bzhengs/ nam mkha' la je mtho je mthor 'phags kyi na mgur re bzhengs nas mthar mi mngon pa'i sar gshegs pa dang / ston pa bzhi snying phyung ba lta bu'i
247b1(1): sdug bsngal gyis mnar nas cho nges btab/ 'gre ldog byas/ mtshan nas bos pas bya babs pa bzhin du byon/ khyed rnams de ltar mi byed pa yin te/ ngas gong du kha ta ni legs pas bcug/ de la mi nyan par//
247b2(1): da nga'i mi rgud la bkra shis pa bag mi 'ong gsungs/ de nas phyi lo drug cu rtsa gcig pa shing po stag la 'og min tshogs chen 'dus pa'i grong khyer du gshegs so// pur sbyong ba'i tshe sngags pa gzhon mdzes gcig
247b3(1): gis rta dang bzang gcig la dung gi skra rang gug ngo mtshar can bstad pa zhig phul/ de 'di nas byung dang 'dir song sus kyang ngo shes pa ma byung bas lhas 'degs bskul bar grags/ de bzhin du btsan dang / ma
247b4(1): mo dang / klu rnams kyis kyang 'degs bskyal te/ mi la med pa'i nor sna bzhi byung ba yin no// 'di sa skya pa kun dga' snying po las lo bco brgyad kyis bgres pas dwags po lha rje dang / phag mo grub pa/ bla ma
247b5(1): zhang / jo sras 'dzes sogs dang thog rags pa tsam mnyam mo// yang bi ma la'i slob ma rong tshu tshan gyi dge slong ma sgre mo/ de'i slob ma lho brag bya ze'i mar pa shes rab 'od/ de'i slob ma shangs lta bu'i lang ston
247b6(1): dar ma bsod nams/ de'i slob ma lha rje hor po sgro phug pa yin pas bi ma la dang gnyis kyi bar la bla ma gsum las med do// // de la sgro phug pa'i slob ma lce ston rgya nag ni 'khrungs sa nyang stod pa yin//
248a1(1): mtshan nyid kyi gra sa na phu po gnyis slob gnyer la yod pa'i sar rgyag skyel du byon/ zhar nyan byas pas khong gnyis kyis ched du sbyangs pa las lhag pa byung / der rgya nag na re/ khyed gnyis kyis lo
248a2(1): gsum nyan kyang go ba ci yang mi 'dug/ ngas nyan na go ba 'dug byas pas/ phu po gnyis na re/ nged gnyis la de las ma byung / chos sus shes kyang 'dra yi khyod go na khyod rang nyon/ nged kyis rgyags skyel byed
248a3(1): zer bas/ der lha rje rgya nag gis bzhugs nas khyung po grags sel phar phyin/ 'bal na mngon pa/ stag pa kha che la dbu tshad/ 'gar bsod nams ye shes la'ang gtugs te lo dgur nyan pas mkhas pa'i pha
248a4(1): rol tu son/ sum cu pa'i tshe gsang bdag sgo phug pa la sngags gsan du byon nas lo bcu gcig bzhugs te/ lo gsum gyi bar jo sras nyang stod pa gsungs pa tsam las spyan sngar gsung gleng zhib pa tsam ma byung
248a5(1): skabs shig na rgya brtson seng dpon g.yog dang lha rje chos 'khor stabs gcig tu 'dzom pa'i tshe/ rgya btson dpon g.yog gis rtsod pa btsugs pas/ lha rje rgya nag gis khong rnams sun phyung / nga rgyal bcag
248a6(1): pas mnyes te thugs la 'dogs par byung ba'i khar/ sras rdo btsun rdo rje grags glo kha phye bas rab tu dgyes nas/ bskyed rdzogs gsum gyi gzhung gdams ngag dang / khyad par gyi man ngag yig chung dang bcas
248b1(1): pa gnang bas lha rje lha khang pa zur tsho gzhan las chos kha tshang zhing man ngag zab pa yin/ bzhi bcu zam pa la gshegs btsun mdzad/ de'i phyi lo sgro phug pa gshegs/ nyang stod kyi rgya tsang skor la bdud rtsi/ nyang
248b2(1): smad sgro dar seng la rnam 'joms dang / phur pa rtsa ba sor bzhag lugs/ gzhan yang skyi lugs la sogs pa phur pa lugs tha dad pa dang / dam pa sposbor mang la rdzogs chen spor lugs/ jo mo nyang mo la rdzogs
248b3(1): / chen khams lugs a ro'i thugs bcud/ de bzhin du rdzogs chen bram ze'i skor dang ke tshang ma la sogs thos pa shin tu mang bas sngags dang / mtshan nyid/ rgyud dang sgrub thabs thams cad kyi bdag por gyur//
248b4(1): sman sgrub mdzad pa'i tshe sman gyi pho brang las lha mo mngon sum du thon nas dkyil 'khor la bskor ba lan gsum byas te thim par kun gyis mthong / gzhan don rgya chen po mdzad nas lnga bcu rtsa drug pa la gshegs
248b5(1): so// 'di'i dpon po bla ma chen po yon tan gzungs ni/ me pho rta la 'khrungs/ bcu gcig nas slob gnyer mdzad/ lo bcu gsum khu bo dang 'grogs nas bskyed rdzogs gsum gyi rgyud lung man ngag kun la slob
248b6(1): gnyer rdzogs/ nyi shu rtsa bzhi bzhes pa'i tshe khu bo rgya nag pa sku gshegs nas gdan sa mdzad/ dbus pa ston shA ka dang / dbus pa zhig po sogs las the tshom gyi dras thag bcad nas rang gzhan gyi don mdzad pa
249a1(1): yin no// // dbus pa ston shAka gam dam pa se skrag pa ni/ gzad kyi gces pa wa zung rgyud yin/ sgro phrag pa'i gra sar yi ge 'drir byon pa la dad pa thob nas slob gnyer byas/ lha rje rgya nag
249a2(1): gshegs tsun mdzad pa'i phyir 'breng du gshegs nas rgyud dang gdams ngag thams cad rdzogs/ sgom sgrub 'ba' zhig bya bar bsam te byang ril dgon pa 'tshol du byon pas/ yol ba brag la dam pa yol chung
249a3(1): pa brag brko ba dang mjal/ 'dir dgon pa mdzad pa lags sam byas pa yin zer/ 'di min pa byas mi gda' 'am byas pas/ pha ngos na se ba kha brag can gcig na 'dug ste/ de bas 'di btsan pas 'dir
249a4(1): byed zer/ der dam pa ston shAka gis brag se ba kha skrag skyes pa der byon tsa na/ chu mig 'gram nas zan rdog 'ga' zhig rnyed pas bzang ltas su bzung / der bzhugs te sgom sgrub mdzad pas rtogs pa khyad par
249a5(1): can skyes/ lha 'dres bka' la nyan gdul bya mang po'i don nus pa byung ste dam pase skrag pa zhes grags so// // dbus pa zhig po ni/ yar klung byas pa yin/ rje sgo phrag pa'i gdan sar yig mkhan chos la
249a6(1): tshuchud pa zhig ste/ lha rje rgya nag gi phyi la 'brangs/ bskyed rdzogs gsum ka la 'byongs par byas/ yul la che 'don la 'gro snyam tsa na/ de'i cha rkyen gdugs dang / dung dang / mchod cha sogs dgos par sems
249b1(1): nas de dag 'don pa'i phyir bal yul du byon/ lam du bsams pa langs chos de tsam shes kyang nyams su blangs rgyu zhig mi 'dug/ da lta shi na cis kyang mi phan/ gdams ngag kho na blo gtod dgos par 'dug
249b2(1): snyam nas slar log/ bla ma'i spyan sngar phyin nas zhus pas/ snyan brgyud rin po che'i gdams ngag gnang / de la nyams len mdzad cing byon pas/ mang yul gung thang du rtol tsan rdzogs pa chen po'i ye shes
249b3(1): brjod du med pa zhag bdun du shar/ der bal po nas mchod cha blangs/ mang yul gung thang du lhogs tsam na/ tshad pa phyin 'brangs nas bstangs/ da mi dga' ba e yin snyam nas blo zag bcad/ ka tsa rnams
249b4(1): grong du bzhag/ ri la byon nas nyams su blangs pas sa rdo ri brag thams cad la thog pa med pa byung / sngar gyi bsams pa de dag dgos med 'ga' zhig tu shes nas che 'don gyi ka ca thams cad gang dgar
249b5(1): bsgyur/ many+dzi dang ting bdun cha gcig yod pa de mthong ba dang bla ma'i drin dran te/ nga la dgongs pa 'di 'dra 'char ba yang bla ma'i thugs rje yin pas 'di tsam zhig bla ma la 'bul dgos snyam khyer phyin pas//
249b6(1): 'dod pa zad pas de yang lam du sgyur 'dod pa byung ste/ yang bla ma'i drin bsams te byin/ lha khang du slebs tsa na/ bla ma'i drung du bsgyur nas/ ting khyod kyis nga ji tsam zhig bcings gsung skad/ der ri 'ba'
250a1(1): zhig la bzhugs nas nyams len mdzad pas/ chos thams cad blo la 'char ba dang / snang ba bden med du bun long song bas rbab kyis ma tshugs/ g.yas ru'i ba gor phur zhugs pa'i tshe gzims
250a2(1): mal gyi steng du thog byung yang ma gnod/ gzhan gyis thog byung ngam zhus pas/ thog gam de byung gsungs/ ma gnod dam zhus pas/ sgra grag stong dbyer med yin/ thog la rang bzhin ga la yod gsungs te rnal
250a3(1): 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen por bzhugs/ sgom sgrub 'ba' zhig gi ngang nas mtshams 'og tu gra sa lo bco brgyad bskyangs/ dgung lo bdun cu pa la gshegs so// dam pa'i skyes bu 'di la slob ma/ zhig po bdud
250a4(1): rtsi/ ston pa bla skyabs/ dbus pa jo bsod/ snying ston nyi ma rdo rje la sogs pa gzhung lugs la mkhas pa mang du byung / gzhan yang la stod kyi mes ston mgon po dang / dpyal kun dga' rdo rje la sogs pas kyang
250a5(1): zhabs la gtugs so// // thugs kyi sras zhig po bdud rtsi ni/ yab mes kyi ring nas mkhas pa dang / grub pa'i dpa' bo brgyad mar byung ba las 'di'i yab sangs rgyas dwags chung ste/ dwags po rgya ras kyi
250a6(1): phyin 'brangs pas dwags chung bar grags/ des lho brag tu byon nas/ lho stong phur mong skang bya ba'i dgon par 'gro don mdzad cing bzhugs pa la/ gzad pa'i yon bdag rnams kyis gdan drangs/ gzad kyi lha
250b1(1): gdong dgon pa dang / 'ug skad dgon pa la sogs pa phul nas bzhugs/ bu slob mang du 'phel/ de la jo mo wang mo bya ba zhig yod pa dang gnyis kyi bur gzad kyi lha gdong dgon par btsas/ zhib ma'i nang du
250b2(1): bskal pa 'ja' tshon zug/ dgung lo gnyis tsam lon pa'i tshe yab la rmi lam ngo mtshar ba byung nas/ dang 'chi bar 'dug/ shi nas kyang rig 'dzin gyi sa la 'gro bar 'dug/ bu 'dis kyang gzhan la phan thogs
250b3(1): par 'dug gsungs te gshegs/ zhig po rin po che 'di cher skyes pa dang snying rje shin tu che bas gos bcos pa thams cad mas bshol kyang mnyan par lam zan pa nyam thag gcig yod pa la byin/ der mo ma
250b4(1): rnon po gcig na re/ khyod kyi bu 'di ci 'dra zhig 'ong / 'di la 'jig rten gyi lha 'dre thams cad tshogs nas bskor ba byed cing mched par 'dug zer/ ston ka gcig 'ongs nas 'don tsa na/ ma na re/ mi thams
250b5(1): 'ongs 'don pa la gtor ma gtong gi 'dug/ glen pa khyod kyang chu gtor 'dra thong / rang re yang 'ongs 'dod pa yin byas pas/ 'ongs 'don sar byis pa des song nas/ gzad lung pa'i lha 'dre tsho/ nyang
250b6(1): nag 'ol po'i lha 'dre tshe/ sbrang po 'u lu'i rgyal nag/ da nang su'i yang sar ma 'gro bar/ rgan mo wang mo'i 'ongs 'don gyi yod pas 'di'i 'ongs las khyer zer nas/ thor thor byas pas/ a ma khros nas
251a1(1): phyar gyin 'dug/ der zhing re bzhi bya ba lon na ltar legs na'ang bzhi bcu las mi thon pa zhig la/ de'i lo ste ma ha cang med pa la khal lnga bcu thal ba byung bas 'di sprul pa gcig yin nyen 'dug
251a2(1): zer nas/ zhang po dam pa se skrag pa'i rtsar slob gnyer la btang / lo gsum gyi ring la rdzogs chen ring lugs/ sgang dril/ gab phyung sogs legs par thos/ bla ma gshegs khar mig mchi mas 'gags nas
251a3(1): dran pa tsam ma byung gsungs/ bcu drug pa la skyil mkhar lha khang ba yon tan gzungs kyi zhabs la gtugs/ lo mang du bzhugs nas bskyed rdzogs gsum ka la blo gros byang bar mdzad/ nyams len gyi gtso bo
251a4(1): dang 'chad nyan thams cad sems phyogs la mdzad de zhal gyis kyang sems phyogs kho na bsgrubs pa yin gsungs/ kun byed rgyal po dang mdo bcu la sogs pa sems phyogs kyi rgyud sde chen po nyi shu rtsa bzhi
251a5(1): gsan/ rtsa ba sems sde'i skor la/ skor lugs rang lugs/ khams lugs la sogs pa bshad srol mi gcig pa bcu bzhi gsan/ rang lugs kyi sgom yig chen po rnams las/ rnal 'byor rig pa'i nyi ma/
251a6(1): bsam gtan mig gi sgron ma/ bsam gtan snying gi nyi ma/ gdar sha dang gzer bu/ zhu len khu gdab/ rdo rje sems dpa'i zhu lan sogs sgom yig phal mo che thos/ snyan brgyud kyi skor la/ skor rong khams
251b1(1): gsum ka'i gdams pa dang / bram ze'i skor gyi snyan brgyud/ ke tshang dang / rdzogs phrang snyan brgyad klong la sogs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhig gsan te/ rdzogs chen gyi skor la thos bsam gyi sgro 'dogs lhag
251b2(1): par chod pa yin/ dgung lo bcu drug la bshad pa mdzad de skor lugs kyi stong thun gsungs pas mkhas pa'i thog chod/ der lha rje gnubs sman bya ba na re/ dbus pa'i jo sras khyed nga'i rta khyung phrug kha che dang
251b3(1): 'dra ba 'dug zer/ nas khal bcu gcig gi phyogs byas skad/ bla ma lha khang pa'i drung du lo bcu bzhi bzhugs/ bar skabs kun tu zhang po'i gdan sa se skrag tu'ang bzhugs te sgom sgrub dang bshad pa bag re
251b4(1): mdzad/ slob gnyer tshar ba dang yab kyi slob ma bla ma mdos bya ba gcig gis gdan drangs te gzad du byon nas 'ug skad dgon pa bzung / gtsang du se skrag dang / dam pa se skrag pa'i sgom ma rnal 'byor ma shAg
251b5(1): gnyen la sogs pa bzhis nged kyis se skrag la mi thar pa 'dug pas ri skab 'dir ngal gsos gcig byed zer nas brtsigs pa'i chos sdings kyang bzung / zhang tshal pa'i slob ma gtsang sgom hrul leb bya bas
251b6(1): zhig po'i spyan sngar bla ma zhang gi lo rgyus bshad pas dad par gyur nas gdan drangs/ chos 'khor btsugs/ chos 'brel ma zhus kyang rgyud byin gyis brlabs pa'i bla ma yin gsungs nas mos gus dang zhabs
252a1(1): tog che bar mdzad/ bla ma zhang gis khyod kyi dgon pa 'di chu shing 'dzom pa mi 'dug ste/ 'du ba che zhing 'gro ba la phan pa zhig 'ong bas chos sdings su thogs gsungs/ der mi rnams na re/ chos lha
252a2(1): khang pa la nyan/ zhabs rtog tshal pa la byed zer ba la/ bla ma lha khang pa de phrag dog rtsa ba nas zhi bas nas khal nyi shu tsam dang sha mar kha yar bskur te/ khyod bla ma bzang po gdan drangs nas chos 'khor 'jugs
252a3(1): pa las ngas kyang mthud byed dgos pa yin te/ de las ma 'byor gsungs pas/ rmongs pa dag gi kha smras 'phro chad/ nga rang yang bla ma rnying pa la mos gus gsar pa skyes gsungs/ phrin las dus la babs pas
252a4(1): gdul bya dpag tu med pa 'dus/ 'gro ba'i don rgya chen po mdzad/ bla ma la shin tu gus pas mnyes pa gsum gyi gzhung bsrang zhing sku mdun nas 'byon tshad la zhabs spyi bor ma blangs par 'gro ma myongs
252a5(1): gsungs/ gser gyi rgyas 'bring bsdus gsum la sogs te mdo rgyas tshar bcu bdun gyis sna drangs pa'i chos dang zang zing gi zhabs tog bsam gyis mi khyab pa mdzad/ byin rlabs zhugs pas dgongs pa ji lta
252a6(1): ba bzhin du longs/ rtogs grol dus mnyam du song nas sa rdo ri brag thams cad la thogs med du 'gro nus pa dang / mi ma yin gyis skor ba byed pa byung / mngon par shes pa mnga' ba'i lo rgyus mang du yod//
252b1(1): gzad phu'i da lung dgon par bzhugs pa'i tshe skur pha wang la thim pa dang / srin po rir gyang la thogs med du gshegs pa sogs rdzu 'phrul du ma mnga'/ gangs ri'i khrod 'di'i yul dang phyogs thams cad du
252b2(1): / byon nas 'gro ba mang po thar pa'i lam la bkod/ bstan pa'i bya ba la sku gsung thugs kyi rten bzhengs pa dang / zhig pa gso ba dang / gzhan gyis bzhengs pa la yo byad gtong ba la sogs pha rol tu phyin pa drug
252b3(1): ka'i don nyams su len shes/ rgya gar nas byon pa'i lo pa Na mkhas pa thams cad kyi zhabs tog mdzad/ sde snod 'dzin pa'i bshes gnyen chen po rnams kyi zhabs nas 'degs/ rtag par 'jig rten gyi bya ba la
252b4(1): blo mi 'jug par sgom sgrub kho na mdzad/ sems can dbul zhing phongs pa kun gyi sbyin bdag mdzad pas theg pa chen po'i rigs lhag par sad pa yin/ rgyu des rgya gar nag dang bal po la sogs pa'i skye bo skad
252b5(1): rigs mi gcig pa kun kyang 'du/ ma ga d+ha rdo rje gdan la zhabs tog lan gsum/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi rgyan gcig pu dzo shAka rnam gnyis la sri zhu lan bzhi/ rdo rags lan bzhi mdzad/ rjes su phrin las skyong
252b6(1): ba'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen kyang bgrangs kyis mi lang ba byung ste gangs khrod 'dir rtsod med du grags pa'i skyes bu chen po zhig yin no// de lta bu'i mdzad pa phun sum tshogs pas dngos dang brgyud nas gzhan la
253a1(1): sman pa sha stag mdzad de/ lha sa'i rdo rags phyi ma mdzad pa'i gshegs skyems kyi dus las 'phro ngan pa'i 'khor ba kha cig gis chang 'thab byas pas thugs skyo ba'i gsung byon te lnga bcu rtsa drug pa
253a2(1): zhes pas mo lug gi lor gsang phu'i rgyar gad logs kyi dgon par skur gshegs/ pur cha la bkal nas gzad 'ug skad dgon par zla ba bzhi bzhugs/ de nas btsan po dang / dpon skya slob ma'i tshogs kyis
253a3(1): gdan sar bsams nas bzhengs pa'i gzad thang skya'i gtsug lag khang du gdan drangs pa'i tshe/ sa rab tu g.yos shing / yon chab las pad+ma'i sdong bu skye ba sogs ltas ngo mtshar ba byung / nang par pur sbyangs
253a4(1): pas sgra dang / 'od dang / 'ja' tshon dang / mchod rten yig 'bru la sogs pa dpag tu med pa byon to// gtsug lag khang de ni da lta rjes tsam du snang ngo // zhig po la slob ma yang thugs sras su gyur pa ni/ rta ston
253a5(1): dza ye/ ma hA lhun po/ mkhas pa dzo nam/ dbus pa jo bsod/ bzang ston hor grags/ gnyer ston bla ma dang drug las/ gtso bor gyur pa rta ston dzo ye ni/ yab rta ston jo 'bum/ zhes bya ba g.yo ru stod kyi bdag
253a6(1): po 'khor 'bangs dang yul gzhi'i 'dzom pa zhig yod/ de 'khor ba la skyo ba skyes nas g.yog bzhi khrid de bros/ lha rje glan nya tshal pa'i thugs sras gnyis chu bo ri ba'i spyan sngar byon/ dpon g.yog lnga kas
253b1(1): stabs gcig tu chos 'khor du zhugs/ sngags rnying ma spyi dang / khyad par rdzogs chen skor lugs gzhung gdams ngag dang bcas pa la shin tu byang chub/ phag mo grub pa'i spyan sngar lam 'bras dang phyag chen//
253b2(1): dbur ston bla ma mtshar ston las phyag chen skang lugs kyi do ha/ zangs gri 'gro ras las ras chung ba'i chos skor/ nang ston mgon po las rnam 'joms dang phur pa sogs mdor na bla ma mang po las chos ris
253b3(1): med gsan pa yin te/ gnyis chu bo ri pa dang / phag mo gru pa rtsa ba'i bla mar 'dzin/ chu bo ri la sgrub pa mdzad pas gdul bya mang du 'dus/ de la sras rta ston jo ye 'di chu mo lug la bltams/ de nas lo bzhi pa
253b4(1): la gcung po jo bsod btsas/ 'di chung ngu nas zhig po'i drung du byon thugs la btags/ jo yis kyis lo bcu gnyis par bla ma dmar ston las bde mchog dang phyag rdor bdud rtsi thigs pa'i skor zhus/ gzungs
253b5(1): rir la bsnyen pa lo gnyis mdzad/ yab dang lhan du bde mchog gi dbang brgya rtsa brgyad zhus/ kha rag ston snying gi sar sgyu 'phrul lo gnyis nyan/ bla ma rtsegs dang se dur lung pa gnyis las rdzogs chen skor
253b6(1): lugs gzhung gdams pa dang bcas pa zhus/ dgung lo bcu drug par rdo rje sems dpa' nam mkha' che la bshad pa mdzad/ bcu drug gi gsham na ngam shod smad du byon/ yab kyi slob ma rje btsun zhags las
254a1(1): phyag rgya chen po sgang lugs gsan/ zangs ri rgya ras las lo ro ras chung pa'i chos skor/ dgyes rdor mes lugs/ 'jam dpal gsang ldan/ bde mchog lA hi pa dang / mtsho skyes rdo rje'i
254a2(1): sgrub thabs/ lam 'bras zham lugs/ zhi byed lugs gsum ka sogs mdor na gsar rnying ris med la thos pa shin tu che ba yin/ re zhig na nang ston jo 'khyams las phur pa gsan nas chu bo rir bsgrub pa
254a3(1): mdzad/ lo nyer lnga pa'i tshe zhig po'i drung na byon pa yin/ dang po chos zhu ba'i rtog pa med de/ chos kyang nga rang mkhas/ gdams ngag kyang nga rang che/ khong snyan pa dang grags pa che bar 'dug pa dang / gcung po'i
254a4(1): bla ma yin pas mjal 'phrad kyi rnam pa zhig bya snyam nas byon pas/ zhig po bdud rtsi 'ug skad dgon pa na bzhugs pa dang mjal/ zhal mthong ba tsam gyis gus pa dbang med du skyes/ nang par log 'gro tsa na
254a5(1): sku drung du 'ong bas thugs kyis gzung bar zhu zhus pas/ khyed mos sam gsungs/ shin tu mos pa thob zhus pas/ 'o na las 'phro yod pa yin da lta nas sdod/ 'khor ba'i mtshan nyid la rtag pa med na phyis ji ltar
254a6(1): 'od cha med gsung / da res cha rkyen med byas pas/ 'dir 'ong pa la rgyags phye khur ba su yang med/ khyod gcig pu la cha rkyen ci 'tshal gsungs/ der lo bdun gyi bar du zhag gcig kyang ma bral bar bsten//
254b1(1): mnyes pa gsum gyi sri zhu byas/ kun byed rgyal po ma bu sum skor/ bshad rgyud mdo bcu/ 'khor ba rtsad gcod kyi rgyud la bshad rgyud ste bzhi/ rtsa 'grel rgyab chos man ngag dang bcas pa/ rtsa ba bco brgyad kyi
254b2(1): bshad srol la zab pa gzhung dang / gab pa mngon phyung / man ngan sgom sdebs su bshad pa/ de'i sgom 'grel snying gi nyi ma drug/ yang snying rig pa'i nyi ma drug/ snyan brgyud sgo ba nag po'i skor/ sgom yig chen mo//
254b3(1): rig nyi/ mig sgron/ gdar sha gze bu rnams dang / gdams pa snyan rgyud skor dang / skor lugs rong lugs/ khams lugs kyi gdams ngag lag khrid dang bcas pa nan tan che bar mdzad/ gsung gi chu rgyun
254b4(1): legs par 'thungs pas/ byin rlab cig car du zhugs/ rtogs pa thod rgal du skyes pas 'jig rten gyi sgro skur la nyams ming / tshul chos med pa'i spyod pa skyong / bla ma la shin tu gus/ ci gsung dang du len
254b5(1): pas dgongs pa gcig tu 'dres te/ bla ma ci mnyes byed pa ci bsam 'grub par gyur cig gsung ba lan gsum zos/ spyir bla ma thams cad la zhabs tog ma grub pa med/ khyad par zhig po la yul
254b6(1): gzhis thams cad btsongs nas spong dag byas pa'i chos 'khor lan bzhi btsugs/ snga phyi bsdoms pas rta bzang po kho na la'ang bdun cu rtsa bzhi phul zhes grags/ gdams pa'i gsung sgros thams cad yi ger
255a1(1): bkod pas rjes 'brang la drin che/ chos zhu ba'i spros pa chod nas nags khrod dam/ ri sul gnyen po mi skad bya skad mi grag pa zhig tu 'dir song dang 'dir yong med pa gcig bya nyam pa'i snying stobs
255a2(1): bsam gyis mi khyab pas dpe cha rnams kyang yig chung zin bris 'ba' zhig tu byas te/ bla ma slob dpon gyis gdan sa'i bya ba bkal bas gsungs gcog ma phod/ 'on kyang bla ma'i zhabs tog 'ba' zhig byas pas
255a3(1): sgrib pa chen po che dag pa dang / ting nge 'dzin kyang gong 'phel du song bas ri khrod 'grims pa las chod che ba byung gsungs/ de'i rgyu mtshan yang / thang skya'i thugs rje chen po bzhengs pa'i tshe zur mkhar du zangs bzhus
255a4(1): kyi las zla ba bco brgyad byas pas rtogs pa khyad par can skyes/ slob dpon sbrul sku'i chibs pa pho drag btsad pos khyer ba'i tshe/ rdor thebs phu'i snang gsal brag la chos skyong bsgrubs pas mgon po'i zhal
255a5(1): gzigs/ stod lungs su bsod snyoms la byon pa'i tshe rmi lam du bla ma dang mjal nas sdug bsngal rang sangs la song / de nas bzung sdug bsngal rang rgyud pa skye ma myong gsungs/ gdan sa'i bya ba dang / zhig po
255a6(1): phrin las bsgrub pa'i phyir/ rgyal khams kun tu 'gro don rgya chen po dang / lha sa'i jo shA ka gnyis la zhabs tog lo drug mdzad de/ drug cu rtsa brgyad pa lcags pho stag gi lo u rgyan pa'i 'khrungs lo la gshegs shing /
255b1(1): sku gdung dang ring bsrel mang por byon to// // 'di'i gcung po jo bsod ni/ sku na chung ngu nas zhig po drung du byon/ thugs la btags nas sems phyogs rdzogs par gnang / khyod chos la nan tan byed pa zhig
255b2(1): 'dug pas nga'i bla ma'i rtsar song zhes gsungs nas/ lha khang pa chen po la gtad/ mdo sku sems gsum rdzogs par thob mkhas pa'i phul du phyin pa gcig byang ste sum cu rtsa gcig pa la mya ngan las 'das pas phrin
255b3(1): las ha cang ma smin to// // rta ston gzi brjid ni/ sangs rgyas dpon ston gyi slob ma yin/ mkhas pa chen por gyur pas gsang ba'i snying po la Ti ka rgyas par mdzad/ brgyud pa 'di'i lo rgyus phal mo che yang 'di
255b4(1): mdzad snang / 'on kyang g.yung ston pa'i khog dbub dang cung mi gcig par yod/ 'di yan chod du sgyu 'phrul dang sems phyogs mtha' dag la mkhas par grags// // yang g.yung 'grel du 'phros don mang du smos
255b5(1): pa'i 'grel pa spar khab kyi bshad rgyun ma chad par 'dod pa'i khungs 'di nas// gtsang ba byi ston dang / sgong dri nges pa nye ston chos kyi seng ge gnyis kyang gsang bdag sgro phug pa'i slob ma yin/ de gnyis kas
255b6(1): rtsabs nag 'od 'bar la gsungs/ des mes ston mgon po/ des bla ma srong / des pak+Shi shA ka 'od de/ 'di zur pa'i gdung yin/ skye ba snga phyi thal le dran pa'i zur dbang chen 'od po zhes grub pa'i dbang po de las
256a1(1): sras mo lnga yod de// sras med nas gdung ba yod pa'i tshe/ pa Na chen shAkya shrI shing pho byi ba'i lo la khro phur gdan drangs pa'i phyi nas dbang chen 'od pos 'ug pa lung du'ang spyan drangs/ der pa Na chen gyis
256a2(1): 'ug pa lung 'di gsang sngags kyi gnas yon tan du mas brgyan par 'dug/ byang ngos ri rgyal ba rigs lnga'i rang bzhin du snang / bya ri dwags la sogs pa 'di dag kyang 'phags pa'i sprul par 'dug/ rabs re la
256a3(1): gsang sngags kyi chos sgra sgrogs pa re 'byung bas ring po ma yin par khyed la sras gnyis 'byung bas de la nga'i ming las gras pa thogs shig/ bstan pa dang 'gro la phan par 'ong gsungs/ de nas de bzhin du byung
256a4(1): bapas/ sras che ba la shAkya mgon dang / chung ba la shAkya 'od ces btags/ gcen 'di yang ngo mtshar can byung / gcung shAkya 'od ni chung ngu nas mngon shes rdol thabs su smra zhing // chos thams cad brda'i sgo nas ston
256a5(1): shes pa'i brtul zhugs can zhig byung / rgya khab gong pa bla mar bsten nas yab chos mtha' dag gsan/ bar do mngon sum du gzigs pas gzhan gyi gnas lung byed pa byon nas/ khyed kyi gshin po gshed dang ma
256a6(1): phral/ byang chub sems kyis ma zin pa'i cho ga la don med do/ gsungs nas gnas lung bsgyur dgos pa byung / nyin gcig nga la 'gyod pa byung gsungs/ ci lags zhus pas/ nga rigs 'dzin gyi tshogs gral du rtag
256b1(1): par chud pa la/ pho bo shAkya mgon la tshig rtsub shor bas de'i nub mo nas dam nyams yin zer rig 'dzin gyi gral du ma tshud gsungs nas bshags pa mdzad/ mi nyag g+ha ras la nye ba dgra ru langs nas bod na mthu
256b2(1): su che dris pas/ shAkya 'od po che zer ba thos nas cha rkyen mang po bskur te/ zla ba brgyad kyi sa cha nas kyang mthu zhu bar btang byung ba la/ nga la mthu med/ nga'i 'khar ba 'di dgos na khyer gsungs nas yig lan kyang
256b3(1): ma mdzad/ bang chen gyis lo rgyus brjod pas/ g+ha ras khros te nga'i dngos po bzung nas gdams ngag mi ster ba zer/ phyag 'khar brdabs pas/ de'i khong nas rdo rje legs pa lha bzhi'i skor thon/ kho dga' ste
256b4(1): bsgrubs pas/ pha tshan mang por rtsad chad/ de'i sdig sbyong dang dge rtsa la lha khang dang mchod rten bzhengs/ drin len du 'bul ba mang po khyer nas mi nyag g+ha ra nyid kyang byon/ zur shAkya 'od dang mjal/ gsang snying
256b5(1): la sogs pa'i chos mang po nyams su len cing / gnyis ka bsdebs nas lho brag mkhar chur byon/ kho mthing lha khang dang / skra gro la sogs pa'i gnas su sgom zhing bzhugs tsa na/ mnga' bdag nying yab sras dang
256b6(1): mjal/ bka' brgyad bde 'dus la sogs te nyang lugs phal cher zhus/ rang gnas su phebs/ slar g+ha ras na re/ bla ma bka' drin che/ nged hor yul du 'gro bas mi gcig gtong bar zhu/ drin lan zhabs tog
257a1(1): byed zer nas gshegs/ de'i tshe hor yul na nu bo a ri b+ho gas rgyal sa bzung nas rgyal po se chen gan rgyal srid ma thob ste dmag 'khrug g.yo ba'i skabs su yod/ mi nyag g+ha ra sa la se chen gan gyis//
257a2(1): bod la mthu bya ba yod zer bas khyed kyis shes sam dris/ g+ha ras na re/ shes/ gsad pa dang / bskrad pa dang / 'gugs pa gsum gang bya gsungs/ der se chen gyis las kyis shi ba dang 'grigs na gsad pa the
257a3(1): tshom che/ 'gro 'dod pa dang zug na bskrad pa yid gnyis za/ nga'i sgrar 'dir dgra bo khugs na ma gtogs yong 'dod pa kho la med nges yin pas khug gcig zer/ der bla ma 'phags pa rin po che dbang por bzhag
257a4(1): nas/ g+ha ras kyis rlung 'khor gyi sbyor ba brtsams pas/ nu bo a ri b+ho ga brtan pa bral nas byung / da dung yid ma ches/ mtsho 'di dang thang 'di'i dkyil du thog phob cig zer/ g+ha ras kyis de dang der thog phab pas
257a5(1): yid ches/ sngags pa rnams la skrag par gyur nas bya dga' chen po byas/ 'di pa tshal gyi slob ma gshin rje la nus pa thob pa gcig yin zer te/ de yang yin mod/ drag sngags kyi sbyor ba mthar thug pa zur pa las
257a6(1): rnyed pa yin/ der pak+Shi shA ka 'od kyis ston pa rA hu bya ba gcig mngags pas/ g+ha ras dang mjal/ gnang sbyin bzang po byin/ mnga' bdag nyang gi gter yig kha byang na gtsang gi sa'i cha brag rdo rje tshe brtan na tshe chu'i
257b1(1): gter yod par bshad pa de/ ston pa ra hu la bskur nas bla ma shAka 'od la 'bul du bcug de dang stabs gcig par se chen gan gyi lung / shAkya 'od po dang / shAkya mgon po la zlo ba// rim gro gang dgos gyis la/
257b2(1): tshe chu thon la nged la skur/ de'i yon tan 'byung mod/ khyed rnams kyi sgyid sdug ngas shes pa yin/ gtor phye'i bsres la dngul bre gcig yod/ bya ba'i gser yig byung / der rim 'gro chen po byas/ gong ma non ches/
257b3(1): gser yig pa dang thung bas 'o brgyal ba tsam byung / sgyu 'phrul gyi brgyud pa la sgra 'od zer gsum ma'i gsol 'debs mdzad pa'i nub mo gter sgo'i lung bstan gsal po thob/ de nas zur shAkya 'od/ gu ru khyud
257b4(1): grags/ dpon chen shAka bzang / gser yig pa a ga yan rnams 'joms khrom gter du byas pa la/ gter sgo la spu gri reg chod kyi 'khor lo 'khor nas 'dzul ma nus/ der zur shAkya 'od kyis gzud par gsol/
257b5(1): gter bdag mchod pas spu gri rang mal du bsdad nas thams cad ngo mtshar/ gter khung nas sol ba g.yengs pa'i dkyil na sbal pa kha mig deng deng / lag pa gdengs pa mthong ba'i mod la rlung gi 'khrul 'khor
257b6(1): byung nas thams cad ha las/ bla mas rak+Sha'i phreng bas mnan nas/ bden pa bdar bas rlung gi 'khrul 'khor kyang zhi/ chu dar gyi khebs bsal bas zangs kyi ga'u gsum sgrags kyi nang du pho thod mo thod kha sbyar ba'i
258a1(1): nang du thog sbas pas reg ma thag tu rdul du bun long 'gro ba'i dar zab mang pos dril ba'i rta phag zhal sbyor/ rdor sems yab yum/ sgrub thabs kyi shog ril bcu gsum gyi dbus na tshe chu'i snod mu
258a2(1): na gyi bum pa snag bu che shos tsam pa byung bas thams cad ngo mtshar skyes/ phud bla mas bzhes na dgung lo brku thub rgyu la/ ljags thog nas thur mas phri bas rten 'brel 'phyugs/ de tshas mang por gril nas gnyid
258a3(1): mi log pa'i brtson pas rgya nag tu khyer/ rgyal po se chen gan gyis gsol bas lo brgya 'tshos par grags/ de'i bya dgar dbus gtsang na yod pa'i sngags pa thams cad khral dmag las thar du bcug pa'i 'ja' sa
258a4(1): / longs/ gong ma'i bla ma rnams dang byas pa mnyam pa'i phyir pa shir btags/ tshe chu'i yon du spa na hor dud zhe lnga'i sa phul// mes 'gril gyi ri la dgon pa chen po 'debs par bzhed pa la/ klu'i grong khyer chen po
258a5(1): yod pas klus zhu ba phul/ rgya rgan gyi zad mtshor yod pas tshab tu phul klu'i cho 'phrul gyis skabs su bcug nas der sngags sde chen po btab/ mkhar rdo rje brag gi lte ba la sgrub pa rtse gcig tu mdzad nas drug cu rtsa
258a6(1): gsum par gshegs/ phur la reg pas mdze nad sos pa byung ngo // 'di'i slob ma rta nag bdud 'dul/ des mda' shAkya 'phel/ de las zur byams pa seng ges gsan te/ 'di'i yab la zur nyi ma seng ge zhes bya
258b1(1): ste mes po pa shi ba'i sras yin/ khro phur rab tu byung / khro lo byams pa dpal gyis mtshan gsol/ yon tan du ma dang ldan/ khyad par byang chub sems kyi rtsa ba brtan pas hor dmag gi dus mi chen sam b+ha tas gser
258b2(1): mang po phul ba la/ bdag gser mi 'dod/ mi 'jigs pa'i sbyin pa 'tshal bar zhu byas nas 'gro ba mang po'i srog bskyabs/ khro phu'i 'bum chen brtsigs dus su chu shin tu dkon pa la mthu rtsal gyis char rgyun chen
258b3(1): po phab/ stod hor gyis sa sku'i bstan pa la shin tu 'tshe bar brtsams dus/ gong ma mchod yon gyi lung dang / dpon chen kun gzhon gyi bca' hu byung ba ltar/ drag po mngon spyod gi nus pas dmag khri tsho gsum
258b4(1): gangs dbrag tu srog gi rgyu ba bcad pas sa bstan la'ang phyag rjes lhag par che/ bar dga' lha khang sku gsung thugs kyi rten dang brten pa bskrun pas mtshon bstan 'gro'i don la phrin las rlab che ba de'i sras
258b5(1): yin// // de la zur byams pa seng ge 'di/ theg pa chen po'i rigs sad pas byis pa'i dus nas snying rje che ba zhig yod/ gzhan gyis sems can la 'tshe ba byed pa gzigs na thugs la khur chen po 'byung / khro
258b6(1): phur rab tu byung nas mtshan yang de ltar thogs/ mtshan nyid kyi rig pa dang khro phu'i chos lugs mkhas par mkhyen nas dgung lo bcu bzhi la bshad pa mdzad pas mkhas pa'i grags pa thob/ g.yung ston rdo rje dpal
259a1(1): bas kyang kho bo'i bla ma zur thams cad mkhyen pa zhes gsungs/ khro phu'i chos khri la bzhugs nas gra pa rnams la mngon pa gsungs pas thog chod/ dgung lo bco lnga la 'ug bya lung du mda' shAkya 'phel
259a2(1): las gsang snying gsan sbyong mdzad pas mkhas pa'i dbang por gyur/ bcu bdun la rgyud kyi rnam gzhag mdzad nas chos gzhi bzung / bcu dgu la lce ston sgrub pa 'bum la sgyu 'phrul lam rim dang / rdzogs chen
259a3(1): gsan pas rtogs pa thod rgal du skyes/ nyi shu la la stod nas rta ston gzi brjid spyan drangs nas/ sgyu 'phrul zur lugs kyi phan nus zab gsum gyi dbang dang / dgongs 'dus rtsa lung skor zhus/ zur lung pa
259a4(1): grub thob bshes gnyen las mdo dbang dang / se lugs kyi zhi khro rgyas 'bring bsdus gsum gsan/ thar lo nyi ma rgyal mtshan la sgra tshad/ khro phu'i slob dpon dpal mchog las rdo rje phreng bas mtshon pa'i gsar ma rgya
259a5(1): chen po/ bsam sdings grub pa dpal las lam 'bras/ bla ma yon tan mgon las phyag rdor dang rnam 'joms/ dpon dpal chen mgon las bstan srung dang / sman rtsis g.yul rgyal gangs pa shAka 'bum las
259a6(1): gshin rje dmar nag dang / klong sde'i skor la sogs te mdor na bla ma mang po las rigs gnas phyi nang / sde snod/ rgyud sde mtha' yas pa zhig gsan zhing / rtsa ba chod par sbyangs nas gtso bor thugs dam 'ba'
259b1(1): zhig la bzhugs/ yid dam mang pos zhal gzigs/ sku mdun na sus slob pa yin yang snang ba rang sar 'gyur nas/ nges 'byung dang dad pa dang / snying rje rang dbang med par skye ba zhig yod par grags/ lar skyes
259b2(1): bu dam pa 'di la bon po zhig gis zas ngan sbyar bas dgung lo nyi shu rtsa bdun las ma bzhugs te mkhyen brtse nus gsum gyi yon tan dpag par dka' bas sprul pa'i skur yid ches so// de la slob ma'i tshogs
259b3(1): bsam gyis mi khyab cing / sgyu 'phrul lam rim/ gsang ba'i snying po/ 'grel pa sbar khab/ mdo dang bcas pa tshad du rdzogs pa'i bshes gnyen gzhan phan rgya cher spyod cing grags pa thob pa rang yang bcu drug tsam
259b4(1): yod pa las/ gtso bor gyur pa ni snga tshar gyi thu bo g.yung ston rdo rje dpal/ phyi tshar gyi thu bo rta nag sgrol ma ba bsam 'grub rdo rje'o// // de la g.yung ston pa ni/ gdung rus glan/ shing pho spre'u'i lor skye ba'i myu gu
259b5(1): tshong 'dus su bzung / sku gzhon nu nas mkhyen pa phun sum tshogs/ spyir mtshan nyid thams cad mkhyen cing khyad par mngon pa kun las btus la mkhas/ sngags gsar rnying thams cad la blo mthu shin tu che/ khyad
259b6(1): par karma pa rang byung rdo rje'i sras kyi dam par gyur cing / zur byams pa seng ge las mdo sku sems gsum gyi man ngag rdzogs pas phyogs 'di la'ang smra ba'i dbang phyug chen por gyur/ gsang ba'i snying po la Ti ka/
260a1(1): gsal byed me long mdzad de bshad rlabs gzhan las che/ zur byams pa seng ge'i gangs pa sha ka 'bum las gshed skor gsan pa'i phyag phyir 'brangs nas bslab/ 'khrul 'khor las sbyor sogs la
260a2(1): shin tu mkhas shing mthu che bas/ slar zur byams pa seng ge'i sku tshe la bar du gcod pa'i lha khud bon po la gshin rje'i 'khor lo bskor nas mi nor zhing khang dang bcas pa gtsang po la sbyangs te rmeg med du
260a3(1): btang dus/ bla ma'i sku dgra thul ba kho bo tsam/ zhes pa'i tshigs bcad kyang mdzad/ sku gzhon dus gong ma'i lung gis rgya nag tu byon/ sngar 'jig rten gyi khams na ma grags pa tsam gyis mdos gtor mdzad/ yul
260a4(1): gru 'ga' zhig la than pa chen po byung bas/ gong ma'i lung gis bsngags te char 'bebs mdzad pas nus pa mngon sum du thon/ gong ma dgyes te bya dga' chen po byin pa'i nom pa dang bcas bod du phebs/ dngos po
260a5(1): rnams ngo shes dang grogs mched su la'ang ma byin par yum gyi don du bla ma dge 'dun la phul/ bu ston rin po che'i yang slob mar gyur nas dus kyi 'khor lo la shin tu mkhas/ rgod sgros chu'i grod pa dum bur bcad
260a6(1): kyang chu mi 'bo ba dang / lcags bsregs la sha rjen gyis reg kyang mi 'tshig pa/ rtsigs pa la rdo drug sbyor gyi zhal ba byas pa rtsigs pa brag chen la 'gyur ba la sogs pa'i rten 'brel mang po mkhyen/ gtso bor karma pa
260b1(1): rang byung rdo rje'i dbugs 'byin chen pos man ngag spyi dang khyad par rdzogs pa chen po la nyams bzhes mdzad/ rgya cher rol pa las bshad pa'i gter chen po brgyad thob pas/ legs par bshad pas sems
260b2(1): / can thams cad tshim par byed pa spobs pa'i gter chen po yongs su grol nas/ mdo sngags kyi sangs rgyas la khyad par phye ba'i bstan bcos mdzad pa g.yag sde pa Na chen gyis gzigs/ shin tu dad pas dpon slob
260b3(1): bco lngas byon te zhabs la gtugs// sku tshe'i smad la tshogs pa chos lung pa las bsnyen par rdzogs/ mtshan rdo rje 'bum zhes pa rdo rje dpal du bsgyur/ mon spa gro dang / phung po ri bo che/ ra dum brag la sogs
260b4(1): par bzhugs shing bshad pas kyang gzhan la phan pa rgya chen po mdzad/ brgyad cu rtsa gnyis pa shing mo sbrul gyi lor zhi bar gshegs so// // rta nag sgrol ma pa bsam 'grub rdo rje ni/ sngags rnying ma las dngos
260b5(1): grub brnyes pa rim can gyi sras su rta nag gnas gsar du 'khrungs/ zur byams pa seng ge las gsan pa rgya chen po mdzad cing khyad par sgyu 'phrul la mchog tu mkhas/ glan nya tshal pa bsod nams mgon po la spu
260b6(1): 'phrul gyi dbang nod/ mkhyen pa dang phrin las dpag par dka' ba yin te dben pa 'ba' zhig la thugs gtad do// bye ma seng ger rdzogs pa chen po snying thig la thugs dam rtse gcig tu mdzad/ rig pa tshad la
261a1(1): phebs te sangs rgyas kyi zhing khams rgya mtsho dang mnyam pa de nyid du spyod/ yang dben pa'i zur shAkya 'byung gnas dang / 'ug pa lung pa'i bla ma seng ge pa gnyis chung chung nas sku drung du bzhag na legs
261a2(1): pas bskyangs pa'i bla ma'i dam tshig la gcig tu gus shing / zur rgyud la bka' drin che/ shangs pa kun mkhyen zhes grags pa bla na gsal ba de'ang byis pa'i dus na bla ma 'dis dbang mang po bskur zhing byin gyis
261a3(1): brlabs pas mkhas pa chen por gyur pa sogs byin rlab bsam gyis mi khyab/ dgung lo brgyad cu rtsa gnyis pa me pho 'brug gi lo gshegs khar sras la/ nga bde ba can du 'gro/ khyed kyis kyang nga'i lo dang mnyam
261a4(1): pa thub/ de nas bde ba can du shog ces gsungs nas gshegs/ de la zur rgyud dang / sras rgyud gnyis las zur rgyud ni/ zur ha ma shAkya 'byung gnas te/ 'di'i yab zur bzang po dpal zhes bya ba'i ring la gong ma
261a5(1): bu yan zu gan gyi lung dang gnang byin blangs/ slar gong ma'i lung gis rgya nag ru 'byon dgos pa byung / dang po gong ma rgyal po'i rim gro par gyur la mthu rtsal dang nus pa shin tu che bas lo nyes las skyobs pa dang /
261a6(1): mdos zor thog sel la sogs pas ngo log choms nus/ khyad par rgyal po'i pho brang ta'i tu'i steng gi nam mkhar mi mthun pa'i mtshan ma sprin nag po sdig pa'i gzugs can byung ba sus kyang bshig ma nus pa'i tshe/
261b1(1): rgyal po'i lung gis skabs dbye nas ma mo 'khang phab kyi mdos dar khang bco brgyad kyis bcings pa btang / gtor 'tshams mdzad pas sprin nag 'thor ba sogs mtha' 'khob gyi yul du dam pa'i chos kyi che ba
261b2(1): lan mang du bton pas gong ma dad de/ yang dag lha dgu'i dbang dang tshe dbang zhus/ dngul gyi tham ka dang / dngul bre bcu gsum/ phod kha phyed gnyis brgya 'dengs pa'i gos dar gyi 'bul ba phul/ pho brang ta'i tur
261b3(1): sngags sde btsugs/ de'i dus kyi las bzhi'i phur pa pho brang na yod par grags/ de ltar zang zing gi rdzas 'byor pa las rtsa rgyud gsang snying / 'grel pa spar khab/ gsang sngags lam rim/ man ngag dgu pa sogs
261b4(1): pa'i snga 'gyur gyi chos sde nyi shu rtsa brgyad par du bsgrubs/ so so nas stong phrag re btab ste gra pa la bkye/ rgyud 'bum bzhengs pa'i cha rkyen mang po bskur ba sogs bstan pa la phan pa rgya che/ slar rgyal po bu yan thu
261b5(1): rlung gi nad la tshad pa'i bcos byas nas gshegs// 'di dus sa sgra dang zur tsho rnams grub mtha'i snying po gcig pas 'dris shin tu zab pa yin/ rgyu des zur byams pa seng ge gshegs pa'i lo rgyus sa sbyar bskul
261b6(1): bas/ de ma legs/ da zur bzang po dpal rgya nag nas bos shig gsungs/ gzhan rnams kyang bgros nas nye gnas 'jam dbyangs gdan 'dren du btang / des rgya nag tu brtol ba'i tshe tshad pa'i nad kyis bskrun
262a1(1): nas 'grongs la khang yod de/ mkha' 'gro chos skyong gi byin gyis brlabs nas cung drag pa'i mgo bstan/ de'i tshe nyid kyi gzigs snang la rgyal po bu yan thu dang mjal nas/ khyod bod du 'byon nam
262a2(1): gnang sbyin ji ltar byin ces gsungs pa la lan zhib tu zhus pas/ ci yang ma byin par 'dug gsungs nas yal/ de'i lo rgyus dpon mo tha bu las thos te khyod mthong bas gong ma dran zer nas mchi ma phyung / slar
262a3(1): dngul bre bcu byin/ rdo rje sems dpa'i sku rgya nag li ma dang / chos skyong lcam bral gyi 'tshams sku bzhengs pa gdan drangs nas bod la byon pa'i tshe mgon pos bod la zhal gzigs nas gom pa bdun 'phags pas
262a4(1): bse 'bag gom bdun mar grags/ bod du byon nas bstan pa'i bya ba la rgyud 'bum bzhengs/ chos skyong bran du 'khol/ ma 'ongs pa mngon sum du lung ston/ slar yang gong ma'i lung gis rgya nag tu gshegs dgos
262a5(1): pa byung ba'i tshe/ 'byon par mi spro bas/ rgyal po'i pho nya ze mur dar dang / g+ha ra la dngul bre la sogs pa byin te slog kyang rgyal po'i chad pa 'od zer 'gro ma 'dod/ der rang dbang thams cad bde ba yin/ gzhan
262a6(1): dbang thams cad sdug bsngal yin/ zhes pa la sogs pa'i zhal gdams mdzad nas rgya nag tu gshegs/ spyir dgung lo sum cu so brgyad las ma bzhugs pa de'i sras yin/ de la zur ham shAka 'byung 'dis chung ngu
262b1(1): nas yab mes kyi chos la sbyangs shing las sad pas/ rang lo lnga par yab rgya yul du gshegs pa'i bsu ba mi chen dang bcas pa'i dbus su rtsa rgyud la bshad pa tho re long mdzad pa thams cad ha las/ dgung lo
262b2(1): bdun pa nas bshad gra bskyangs/ bla ma kun spangs sar dge tshul dang / chos rje bsod nams grags pa las bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i mtshan shAkya 'byung gnas su grags/ zur pa shi'i sras/ zur shAkya seng ge zhes bya
262b3(1): ba go lug rgyal po'i lung dang / gnang byin gser bre chen srang drug cu ma bzhi/ dngul dgar bre chen nyi shu/ gos phyi nang nyis brgya rnams thob cing / dpon mo za'u sogs pas kyang bdog pa rgya cher byin pas zur pa'i
262b4(1): bstan srid la phan pa rgya cher btags la/ khyad par rgyal ba zur po che'i sku chos kyi dum bu bzhugs pa'i 'jam dbyangs kyi gser sku shin tu mtshar ba bzhengs nas dpal 'ug bya lung gi rten gtsor mnga' gsol/
262b5(1): bshad gra dang sgom gra'i tshugs kha chen po zin par byas/ bdog pa la 'phangs pa med pas bstan pa'i rim gro lhur len/ mthong na mi mthun pa med pa'i gzi byin gyis hor gyi mi chen ze mur dar kyang dad par gyur
262b6(1): nas tshe dbang zhu ba la sogs pa'i dang ba ston nus pa'i sems dpa' chen po'i ngang tshul la gnas pa de dang / sa bzang lo chen rgyal ba g.yung / 'jam dbyangs bsam 'grub rdo rje/ sa skya ba'i gdung brgyud/ zur pa'i
263a1(1): dbu che grags pa che ba rnams kyis mtshon bod dbus gtsang gi mkhas btsun bzang gsum thams cad la gtugs nas mtshan nyid sde gsum/ gsang sngags gsar rnying thams cad kyi gzhung dang man
263a2(1): ngag la legs par sbyangs/ khyad par du mngon rtogs rgyan/ spyod 'jug/ dus kyi 'khor lo/ kun byed rgyal po/ sgyu 'phrul lam rim/ gsang ba snying po/ 'grel pa spar khab rnams nan tan du sbyangs pas mkhas grub
263a3(1): chen por grags/ dus phyis mdo dbang zur lugs kyi bstan pa'i bdag po 'di kho na yin/ sgrol chen bsam rdor las mdo dbang gsan pa'i tshe/ rgya bod kyi na bza'/ thab chas/ nas khal lnga bcu sogs kyis sna
263a4(1): drangs pa'i 'bul ba byas te lung lag len phyag bzhes thams cad mtha' chod par mdzad/ gtad rgya kho na'i don du'ang gos yug chen dang gser gyi 'bul bas mnyes par mdzad/ shAkya thub pa dang / he ru ka rigs
263a5(1): lnga gzigs snang du shin tu gsal ba gzigs/ 'dus pa mdo'i lha thems/ gtad rgya'i 'grel pa sogs mang du mdzad/ mdo sgyu sems gsum gyi bstan pa la bya ba rgya chen po mdzad cing / sgrol ma pa'i sras sangs
263a6(1): rgyas rin chen dang / gnyal pa bde legs pa la sogs te bstan pa'i gsal byed du gyur pa'i slob ma mang dag bskrun nas dgung lo sum cu so brgyad la gshegs/ gnyal pa bde legs kyi cho ga khrigs kyang yod
263b1(1): do// // yang sgrol chen pa'i sras pha rgyud ltar byas na/ sras sangs rgyas rin chen rgyal mtshan dpal bzang po zhes grags pa de nyid yab kyi lnga bcu rtsa drug pa lcags pho stag la gnas gsar du 'khrungs/ mi
263b2(1): rnams kyis khyed kyi sras 'dis phan ni mi thogs/ de tsam gyi gtsigs kyis ci bya zer bas/ 'gro ba la phan thogs pa gcig 'ong gsungs/ dgung lo drug pa la gsang ba snying po'i rgyud thugs su tshud/ zur shAka 'byung
263b3(1): ba'i spyan sngar byon/ nga'i bla ma'i sras zhes gces par bskyangs pas rgyud bzung ba de g.yengs/ yang lo brgyad lon pa na bsgyur te bzung / chos phrin rnams yab kyis bslabs pas lo bcu bzhi par gzhan la dbang
263b4(1): skur ba'i slob dpon pher pa byung / yab las sgyu 'phrul gyi chos skor rnams thugs su chud par mdzad/ da nga rab tu byung nas mtshan nyid kyang sbyang / gsar ma'i rgyud sde'ang slob pa yin zhus pas/ re zhig mi rung /
263b5(1): gzod rab tu byung bas cho ga gsungs/ der ma gcig zhig bdag gir bzung bas sras kha shas 'khrungs/ dge bsnyen gyi rten la bslab sbyangs rdzogs par mdzad/ slar chos 'khor skad du tshig rdzogs mdzad/ sku shin
263b6(1): tu btsun par bzhugs/ sgyu 'phrul la mkhas par gyur pas dgung lo bzhi bcu skor la gsang ba snying po la Ti ka che ba gcig dang / lam rnam bkod la'ang rnam bshad chen po zhig mdzad/ de bzhin du phrin las shar
264a1(1): pa brgyad las/ khro bo la mngon par rtogs pa rgyas pa zhig mdzad pa dang / gnas lung la'ang cho ga rgyas pa zhig mdzad/ yab dang thugs sras thub pa rdo rje sogs la man ngag mang du mnyan cing nyams
264a2(1): su bstar/ dgung lo bcu bdun pa la 'gos lo ye bzang rtse ba rjes su bzung ste/ 'di ltar sgyu 'phrul zhi khro'i dbang dang / sgyu 'phrul gyi tshe dbang / dong sbugs kyi dbang / tshe bdag dang / yang dag me gcig gi dbang /
