264a3(1): sna bo pa'i lugs kyi rta mgrin dang / zla rgyal ma'i lugs kyi rjes gnang / phur pa sa lugs kyi dbang drag po'i rjes gnang dang bcas pa/ sems sde bco brgyad kyi rig pa'i rtsal dbang / gsang snying rgyud 'grel pa
264a4(1): dang bcas pa'i bshad pa/ lam rnam par bkod pa'i Ti ka gnyis kyis mdzad pa'i thog nas bshad pa rgyas pa/ gzhan sku 'phrul gyi khog gzhung bzhi bcu la sogs pa'i gzhung chung bzhi bcu tsam/ mdo dgongs pa
264a5(1): 'dus pa dang / de'i rtsa ba'i rgyud kun 'dus dang / gnubs chen gyi mdo 'grel mun pa'i go cha/ sgyu 'phrul brgyad cu pa dang / bla ma gnyis/ yang dag rtsa ba'i lung rnams kyang gnang / snying zig spros bcas la sogs
264a6(1): pa'i dbang bzhi dang / me long bas mdzad pa'i yi ge'i steng nas khrid yig/ rdzogs chen a ro'i man ngag kyang khrid du mdzad/ de bzhin du byang sems ye rgyal ba nas brgyud pa'i thugs rje chen po'i slar khrid kyang
264b1(1): gnang ste/ rgyu mtshan de la brten nas 'gos lo ye bzang rtse bas/ gsang sngags rnying ma zhes grags pa'i phyogs la lhag par mos pa thob cing / chos spangs pa'i sgribs pas ma sbags tsam mo// zhes thos pa'i pha rol
264b2(1): tu son pa'i mthar thug don dang ldan par song ba yin zhes nges pa brten pa'i tha tshig go/ de ltar chos rje sangs rgyas rin chen pas bdun bcu rtsa gnyis pa lcags mo glang gi lo la dbus su phebs/ gangs po ri'i
264b3(1): bsam gtan gling du dbang grags pa rgyal mtshan gyis zhabs nas btegs/ 'dus pa mdo la sogs pa'i dbang mang po dang / gsang snying la sogs pa'i bshad pa dang lung mang po byin/ brgyad cu rtsa gnyis pa lcags
264b4(1): / mo phag gi lo la gtsang du sku gshegs/ zur chung pa 'khrungs gnas dus 'di yan chad la lo bzhi brgya dang bcu bdun song // // bdag nyid chen po 'gos gzhon nu dpal ni yab 'gos ston 'byung gnas rdo rje
264b5(1): dang / yum srid thar skyid gnyis kyi sras su chu sbrel la 'khrungs/ spyan g.yas mkhan chen las rab tu byung / karma pa de bzhin gshegs pa las byang sdom dang / chos drug gsan/ rdog byang chub dpal las rdog chos
264b6(1): rnams gsan/ khyad par paN chen ba na rat+na las bla med kyi rgyud sde phal mo che'i dbang bskur ba rnams zhus/ mtshan brjod dang dpyid thig/ dbang mdor bstan/ dpe med 'tsho'i sbyor drug rtsa 'grel rnams zhus shing
265a1(1): / bskur/ rje 'di nyid kyis sgrol chen sangs rgyas rin chen dgung lo bdun cu pa la sa mo phag gi lor sgyu 'phrul zhi khro'i dbang dang / sgyu 'phrul gyi tshe dbang / na rag dong sbugs tshe bdag/ yang dag me
265a2(1): gcig rta mgrin/ lha mo dang zla rgyal lugs/ phur pa 'khor lugs/ sems sde bco brgyad kyi rigs pa'i rtsal dbang sogs snga 'gyur rgyud sde'i dbang bka' thams cad ma tshang ba med pa gsan/ bshad pa'i bka'
265a3(1): gsang ba snying po rgyud dang 'grel pa so sor bshad pa dang / lam rnam bkod kyi Ti ka khong nyid kyis mdzad pa dang / gzhan yang khog gzhung gsal sgron sogs rgya bod kyi gzhung chung bzhi bcu skor gyi bshad lung rnams
265a4(1): dang / mdo dgongs 'dus dang de'i rtsa ba'i rgyud kun 'dus rig pa dang / gnubs sangs rgyas ye shes kyis mdzad pa'i mdo'i 'grel pa mun pa'i go cha/ sgyu 'phrul brgyad bcu pa dang / bzhi bcu pa dang / bla ma gnyis/
265a5(1): yang dag rtsa ba'i lung rnams kyang gsan/ snying thig la rtsa ba'i dbang spros bcas spros med bzhi'i dbang bskur ba dang / grub thob me long rdo rjes mdzad pa'i khrid yig gi steng nas khrid dang / a ro'i lugs kyi rdzogs
265a6(1): chen man ngag gi khrid kyang gsan zhing mdor na gsang sngags snga 'gyur gyi bstan pa'i bdag po lta bur gyur zhing rje nyid kyis kyang gsang sngags rnying ma zhes grags pa'i phyogs la lhag par mos pa thob cing / chos
265b1(1): spangs pa'i sgrib pas ma sbags tsam mo// zhes gsungs pa'ang bod kyi mkhas rlom phyogs lhung can 'ga' zhig la dgongs pa yin te/ don du'ang rje 'di ni grub mtha' phyogs su ma lhung ba'i bshes gnyen gzhan las
265b2(1): khyad par du 'phags pa yin cing bstan bcos rnams kyang tshad mar gyur pa'i legs bshad che ba yang mngon sum gyis grub bo// rje 'dis karma pa chos grags rgya mtsho la sems 'grel skor gsum sogs chos bka'
265b3(1): dbang khrid mang po phul/ zhwa dmar cod pan 'dzin pa bzhi pa chos kyi grags pa ye shes dpal bzang po bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i mkhan po dang sgyu 'phrul gtso bor gyur pa'i gsar rnying gi rgyud sde rgya mtsho'i dbang bka'/
265b4(1): bshad dka'/ man ngag gi khrid sogs bsam gyis mi khyab par gnang / rje zhwa dmar nas kyang bka' drin che ba'i bla ma gcig pur mdzad/ gzhan yang bka' gter gyi bstan pa sgo du ma nas spel bzhin par dgung
265b5(1): lo dgu bcu tham pa lcags glang lor skur gshegs so// // zhwa dmar bzhi pa spyan snga rin po che tre shod khang dmar du/ yab ldong dgon pa skyabs dang yum dgra bza' bsod nams sgrol ma'i sras su 'khrungs//
265b6(1): zur mang dgon rje bdun pa chos grags rgya mtsho dang mjal te rab du byung / mtshan chos kyi grags pa ye shes dpal bzang por gsol/ mkhan po go shrI grags dpal pa dang / pan skur pa las kyang chos gsan//
266a1(1): dgung lo nyer bzhi pa la 'gos lo chen po yid bzang rtse bas mkhan po mdzad de bsnyen par rdzogs/ dus kyi 'khor lo/ bde dgyes/ gsang 'jigs sogs gsar ma'i rgyud sde rnams dang / sgyu 'phrul
266a2(1): gsang ba snying po'i dbang bka' dang bshad pa'i bka' thams cad sogs snga phyir gsan pa mtha' yas pa mdzad/ ngan lam rgyal ba mchog dbyangs kyi gdungs rigs lo chen bsod nams rgya mtsho las kyang
266a3(1): gsar rnying gi chos mang du gsan/ rje 'gos las phur pa'i dbang gsan tshe mnal lam du slob dpon pad+ma zhal gzigs shing gdam pa'ang bstsal/ gsar rnying gi chos tshul mtha' dag gdul bya rnams la ston bzhin
266a4(1): pa'i ngang nas dgung lo don gsum pa la gzugs sku brtul/ don dam nges 'byed dbu ma chen po'i lha khrid rgyal tshab chen po'i chos nga la brten cing / chos skad mthar thug pa phyir mi ldog pa'i gtam gtso bor bzhed
266a5(1): pa rje 'di kun mkhyen chen po klong chen pa/ karma pa bdun pa/ kun mkhyen dol bu chen po sogs mthun no// // de nyid kyis 'bri gung zur pa rin chen phran tshogs la bskul ba ste/ 'di ni dbur stod 'bri gung sgra
266a6(1): gnyer sgang zhes bya bar sgyu ra'i rigs su sku bltams/ dgung lo brgyad kyi steng du spyan snga rin po che chos kyi grags pa las rab tu byung / bcu gsum par rtsis thang bsam gtan gling du dkar po bas khrag 'brug gi
266b1(1): zhig gsos mdzad pa'i rab gnas la spyan drangs pa'i tshe ngo mtshar ba'i cho 'phrul ci yang byung / yangs pa can dang / klung shod/ gzho stong til gro sogs gnas chen rnams su sgrub pa la snying por mdzad/ ti grol
266b2(1): bzhugs pa'i skabs shed 'phags yul gyi grub thob rdo rje mgon po byon nas dza bi ra'i b+hu rlung gi man ngag sogs gdams pa dang rjes su gdams pa bstsal/ mkha' 'gro'i lung bstan bzhin sku rten dkar chag tu
266b3(1): bskur zhing yangs pa can du gter gyi kha byang babs pa bzhin gu ru rin po che'i sku gsung thugs bcud dam chos dgongs pa yang zab shog ser rigs lnga til gro'i DA ki'i tshogs khang chen mo nas spyan drangs/ dus
266b4(1): gzhan zhig tu zangs mdog dpal rir byon nas gu ru rin po che he ru ka'i rnam par mjal zhing ga Na tsakra'i 'du bar longs spyad cing / rtsa ba gsum gyi dkyil 'khor la brten nas dbang bskur zhing gdams pa dang
266b5(1): rjes su gdams pa thams cad bstsal te he ru ka'i sku slob dpon pad+mar gnas 'gyur bas zhal gyi man ngag kyang mang du gnang nas slar rang gnas su phebs/ bka' gter gnyis kyi bdag por gyur/ mdo spu
266b6(1): sems gsum la bshad srol thun mong ma yin pa dang / bka' brgyad lugs dgu/ snying thig ya bzhi/ gter kha gong 'og sogs la rtsal du bton cing 'chad nyan gyi phrin las shin tu rgya che zhing mnga' ri pa Na chen rin
267a1(1): po che'i phyag srol ltar bka' mas khog dbub/ gter ma'i man ngag gis brgyan pa zhigs phyag len du 'debs par mdzad do// des rang grol nyi zla sangs rgyas la sgyu 'phrul skor rnams gsungs/ des
267a2(1): 'khon rigs slob dpon tshe dbang nor rgyas la bshad cing des khong nyid kyi sras 'khon ston dpal 'byor lhun grub la bshad de/ rje 'di nyid yab slob dpon de dang / yum rgyal mo 'dzom gyi sras su lcags bya lor
267a3(1): 'khrungs/ chung ngu nas dam pa'i bag chags sad cing nges 'byung gi thugs yang dag pa skyes/ dgung lo bcu lon pa'i tshe thams cad mkhyen pa bsod nams rgya mtsho las rab tu byung / skyabs 'gro dang sems
267a4(1): bskyed/ thugs rje chen po'i sgom lung sogs gsan/ de sogs gsar rnying gi bla ma 'ga' las ci rigs pa'i chos tshul rnams thams cad gas na/ sgra'i ri mo dang snyan dngags/ sum rtags/ gso rigs sogs
267a5(1): la'ang bslabs sbyangs dpyis phyin par mdzad/ khyad par yab rdo rje 'dzin pa las sgyu 'phrul gsang ba snying po dang / de'i 'grel pa g.yung ston gyis mdzad pa dang / kun mkhyen klong chen pa'i phyogs bcu mun sel
267a6(1): sogs sgyu 'phrul skor gyi 'grel Ti ka rnams la sbyangs par mdzad pa na sgro phug pa chen po'i bag chags sad pas lam 'di nyid la brten pa'i mkhas grub 'gran zla med par gyur/ dgung lo bco brgyad par gnubs
267b1(1): nam mkha'i snying po'i rnam 'phrul rig 'dzin chen po nyi zla sangs rgyas kyi drung du rdzogs chen klong gsal snying thig gi dbang khrid man ngag dang bcas pa gsan pas chos thams cad kyi gnas lugs rdzogs pa chen po
267b2(1): rang rig chos kyi skur ngo 'phrod cing gting sleb/ gzhan yang bka' gter gyi chos shin tu mang ba gas na/ khyad par don tig 'gro ba kun grol dang / theg mchog rin po che'i mdzod la bshad lung gas na/ mdo phyogs
267b3(1): kyi gzhung lugs chen po kun la'ang gsan bsam mthar phyin par mdzad cing chos gra chen po rtses dang du gzhung lugs rab 'byams smra ba'i gra skor mdzad/ brag dgon spyan snga gzhon nu chos dpal las rdo rje phreng ba
267b4(1): sogs gsar rnying gi chos rgya che ba gsan/ dgung lo so bzhi par rgyal khang rtse ba dpal 'byor rgya mtsho dang chos kyi rje dge 'dun rgyal pa mkhan slob las bsnyen par rdzogs pa'ang mdzad nas mtshan dpal
267b5(1): 'byor lhun grub tu gsol/ dge lugs phyogs kyi sngags skor rnams kyang gsan/ gsang phra dang ser byes kyi 'chad nyan slob dpon pa'ang mdzad/ rgyud gsang ba snying po la sngar bshad srol ches dar yang phyis nyag
267b6(1): phra bar gyur pas rje 'di nyid mkhyen pa che ba'i grags pas/ brag sna chos rje u rgyan bstan 'dzin ched gnyer gyis byon te g.yung 'grel gyi steng nas zhib par gsan cing le'u lnga pa yan gyi zin bris kyang mdzad/ khyad
268a1(1): par zur 'khor lo'i mgon po chos dbyings rang grol rjes su bzung zhing gsang ba snying po g.yung 'grel las nyin re chos thun gnyis re dang / gzhan yang snying thig gi skor rnams sogs mtha' yas pa
268a2(1): gsan/ rje'i bslab ston ltar zur chen gyis chos gra chen po rtse dang du gra skor gyi bstan pa'i rnam gzhag mdzad pas snga 'gyur la rgyud bshad med de 'ong snyam pa'i phrag dog can rnams kha rog ste 'dug go/ 'di tsam
268a3(1): nas 'du 'dzi'i g.yeng ba spangs te/ yul di wI ko Ti'am pha wang kha'i nags khrod du dben pa brten cing bzhugs/ phyag na pad+ma lnga pa chen pos kyang zhabs la gtugs te/ gsar rnying gi dbang lung khrid man ngag gi
268a4(1): skor mtha' yas pa gsan/ bla chen 'ga' zhig gis ltar grub mtha' gtsang gtsang mo yin rgyu ba'i mtshan nyid pa skam po'i rigs kyi shan ma shor ba dang dge ba'i bshes gnyen mtshan nyid dang ldan pas zin pa'i rjes
268a5(1): de 'dra'i rigs la zer ba yin/ de nas dgung gi grangs don drug pa la rje lnga pa chen pos zhabs brtan gyi gsol 'debs mdzad pas da ste yun ring e sdod mi shes zhes zhal gyis ma bzhes shing rnga yab pad+ma 'od kyi
268a6(1): gzhal yas su 'gro dgos pa zhes gsungs la/ me glang zla ba brgyad pa'i tshes bcu gcig la ngo mtshar ba'i lhas dang bcas gzugs sku chos kyi dbyings su thim par gyur/ rje 'di nyid kyis mdzad pa'i bstan bcos
268b1(1): kyang phyag rdzogs dbu gsum gyi lta ba spyi khyab tu ngo sprod pa'i khrid yig dang / dbu ma'i lha khrid dang / tha snyad rig pa'i sgor yang mang po yod/ rje de'i thugs kyi sras slob ma ni zur chen chos dbyings rang grol yin te
268b2(1): 'di nyid zur gyi rig 'dzin brgyud pa'i gdungs rabs ma chad pa las/ yab rig 'dzin chen po ku mA rA dza'i rnam 'phrul zur chen gzhon nu don 'grub dang yum mkha' 'gro'i rigs las mtshan ldan yid 'dzin
268b3(1): gnyis kyi sras su shing 'brug lor sku bltams/ drung pa dkon mchog rin chen pa'i sku skye bar ngos 'dzin mdzad/ rim gyis yi ge 'bri klog dang 'phags yul gyi yig rigs rnams kyang dka' tshegs la ma ltos
268b4(1): par thugs su chud/ yab las nyer mkho'i sgrub skor rnams kyang bslab/ dgung lo dgu par byang ba rig 'dzin ngag gi dbang po mjal zhing zhal nas sku skye bas snga 'gyur gyi bstan pa la phan thogs chen po zhig yod
268b5(1): zhes lung bstan/ lha ris dang rtsis skor rnams dang drag sngags kyi skor 'ga' zhig kyang mkhyen par mdzad cing dgung lo bcu gnyis tsam nas snang gsal rin po che ngag dbang ye shes grub pa'i zhabs su bcar te
268b6(1): bka' brgyad bder 'dus skor dang / mkha' 'gro snying thig bka' gter gnyis/ bla ma nor bu rgya mtsho/ kar gling zhi khro dgongs pa rang grol sogs kyi dbang lung dang / nyams khrid mthar phyin pa gsan/ gzhan
269a1(1): / yang ci rigs pa'i gter chos rnams gsan/ zhi khro'i dbang bskur ba'i gsang mtshan chos dbyings rang grol du phog/ phyag chen lnga ldan dang gcod khrid sogs sku nyams su bstar/ zir pa stag mgor
269a2(1): lo gsum phyogs gsum mdzad cing gtso bor rdzogs chen mkha' 'gro snying thig gi ka dag dang lhun grub gnad du bsnun pas chos thams cad kyi rdzun phugs rdi ba/ rang rig gdod ma'i mgon po'i rang zhal mngon du
269a3(1): gyur pa'i rtogs pa brnyes shing 'od gsal du longs sku'i zhing khams nyul ba'i rtsal 'byongs par gyur/ dgung lo bcu bdun pa la rdo rje 'chang pha wang kha pa dpal 'byor mtshan can gyi drung du byon te bla ma sku 'das kyi
269a4(1): bar la rim gro ba mdzad cing mnyes pa gsum gyis bsten/ bla mas kyang thugs dgyes pas rjes su bskyangs nas bka' gter kyi chos tshul rgya mtsho lta bu bum pa gang byo'i tshul gyis gnang / gtso bor dpal snying po'i
269a5(1): rtsa rgyud rtsa ba dang / 'grel pa spar khab/ bod 'grel g.yung Ti ka rnams sbyar ba'i gsung bshad mdzad pa nyin re rtsi bzhag thun gnyis re bstsal/ zin dka' se pa la re zeg rgyab i cho ga zhus pas/ rgyang tsam ma song
269a6(1): bar zin bris byas na 'dzag chen po ma yong bas re zhig nas nged kyis tshod byed gsungs// gzim chung thog khar skyong sbrang gnang nas shog bu sum cu tsam song nas rje'i bka' bzhin zin bris kyang mdzad pas le'u lnga
269b1(1): pa yan chad song / de man chad kyi zin bris 'phro can du lus/ chu khyi lor dgung lo nyi shu bzhes par slar yang dge bsnyen nas bzung bsnyen rdzogs kyi bar du bsgrubs par mdzad/ snying 'grel phyogs bcu mun sel
269b2(1): sogs la gzigs rtogs dang / 'dus pa'i 'grel pa sgron gsal la bzhi sgrags kyi bshad pa/ rim lnga gsal sgron/ bde mchog sbas don kun gsal/ nor bzang gi dus 'khor spyi don sogs dang / gsang 'dus
269b3(1): bskyed rdzogs sogs kyi bshad pa zhus shing thugs la nges par mdzad/ shing byi lor chos grwa chen po dpal gyi rtses ngang du dgun chos chen mo'i thog gsang ba snying po'i rgyud kyi bshad pa mdzad pas ston chen tshig la
269b4(1): rton pa rnams kyi spobs pa bcom zhing snying po'i bstan pa la bya ba cher mdzad pas gzu bor gnas pa rnams bsngags par brjod cing byang ba rig 'dzin chen pos kyang legs dar dpyangs/ rje pha wang kha pa las kyang
269b5(1): klong gsal snying thig gi dbang lung man ngag gi khrid rnams zhib par gsan zhing bsgoms pas nyams rtogs bogs sngar las kyang cher 'khrungs/ b+hi ra ba'i 'khrul 'khor sogs gsar ma phyogs kyi drag sngags kyang
269b6(1): mang du gsan/ dge 'bri gnyis 'gras che zhing 'bri gung zur pa rat+na'i zhabs sogs kyis rA hu la'i las sbyor mdzad pas dga' ldan khri pa mang po steng grib kyis gshegs pa la rje dkon mchog chos 'phel khyab
270a1(1): 'jug gi 'jigs pa las grol ba'i srung 'khor kyang mdzad/ ka/ thog pa stag bla pad+ma ma ti lha sar byon nas snying po'i 'grel pa phyogs bcu mun ser sogs gsan cing khong gis lho brag gsung sbrul
270a2(1): la'ang de'i bshad lung phul ba sogs chos rgyun de ka ma chad par byung ba 'di'o// tshur kaHthogs pa las dgongs 'dus po ti'i lung dbang dang rgyud dgu bcangs thabs bcas pa dang / las byang me tog phreng mdzes
270a3(1): sogs kyang gsan// lhag par bka' brgyad bde gshegs 'dus pa'i dkyil 'khor la brten pa'i sa ra ya Na'i sgrub pa mdzad/ 'di skabs tsam nas rgyal mchog lnga pa chen pos bla mar bkur zhing zil gnon sogs
270a4(1): chos bka' rnams gsan zhing drag sngags kyi skor sogs zhi rgyas dbang drag gi phrin las rab 'byams kyi lung phyag khrid thams cad phul zhing thugs nyams su bstar/ kar gtsang mchod yon gyis dge lugs spyi dang
270a5(1): bye brag dge ldan po brang ba la sdang zug che bas tsi kum par sde gzar gyi skabs su las sbyor mtha' yas pa mdzad pas/ rgyal dbang lnga pa'i phrin las dus bab dang rje 'di nyid kyi byin rlabs lhag par myur bas dge
270a6(1): ldan pho brang gi lung las bod khams yongs la khyab pa de byung / snam zan grong pa'i rkang 'thung 'khrig pa'i klung // khe nyin gsher gyis don chen 'grub pa'i zhugs// 'bar min ma babs las kyi rta gdong mes// sgar
270b1(1): gtsang srid sde'i chu bo skem de mtshar// zhes lnga pa chen pos dge phyogs rnams kyis mngon spyod kyi nus pa mngon du ma gyur par 'os med kyi rje 'di pas bstan pa spyi la sman yon chen por gyur pa'i ched du brjod par
270b2(1): mdzad do// gzhan yang phur pa lugs gsum dang bka' brgyad lugs gsum/ rdzogs pa chen po klong gsal snying thig sogs kyi nyams khrid rnams gsan pa sku nyams su bstar bas rdzogs pa chen po'i nyams myong
270b3(1): ma 'khrul pa thugs rgyud la 'khrungs shing 'khor 'das re dogs dang bral ba'i gdeng 'khrungs so// zhes zhal gyis bzhes/ gnas gsar ba mgon po bsod nams mchog ldan dang yang chos kyi dga' ston stob res
270b4(1): mdzad/ byang ba rig 'dzin ngag gi dbang po'i sprul pa'i sku snga 'gyur bstan pa'i nyi ma rig 'dzin pad+ma phrin las ngos 'dzin par mdzad cing thub bstan rdo rje brag gi gdan sar bkod nas/ bka' gter gyi chos
270b5(1): mtha' dag bstsal zhing bstan pa'i bdag por mnga' gsol/ sku tshe'i mthar 'gro dgon skye med zhing gi gdan sa gung thang du bzhugs/ dar sding rig 'dzin chen po 'phrin las lhun grub la snying po'i rgyud kyi bshad
270b6(1): pa gnang / tshur yang bka' brgyad sogs dbang lung mang du gsan pa dang / rgya bod hor gsum gyi bla ma skye sbrul sogs chos don gnyer rnams la bka' gter gsar rnying gis rnam par grol ba'i lam gyi dngos
271a1(1): po ci rigs par sbyor bar mdzad nas sa bya lor rang gung grangs re drag lon pa na ngo mtshar gyi lhas dang bcas pa pad+ma 'od kyi zhing khams su gshegs so// rje 'di nyid la thugs sras slob ma'i
271a2(1): tshogs bgrang gis mi spyod par bzhugs kyang / gtso bor gyur pa ni rgyal mchog lnga pa chen po ste zhing khams gzhan du gshegs pa'i tshe yang ye shes kyi skus rjes su bzung bar gsungs shing rnam thar rgyal ba mchog
271a3(1): gi zhal gsum mar/ legs byas 'di mthun rigs rtsal kun tu bzang // mngon sum rang ngo 'phrod min de srid du// skye bar mgon po khyod kyis dge ba'i bshes// mdzad nas 'bral pa med par rjes 'dzin/
271a4(1): shog// ces gsungs pas kyang mtshon par nus so// 'dis gnubs chen sangs rgyas ye shes kyi rnam 'phrul gnyis ston chen po phrin las lhun 'grub la gsang ba snying po'i bshad rgyun spar khab dang g.yung
271a5(1): TI ka gnyis ka'i steng nas bstsal zhing / de las bai ro dang g.yu sgra'i thugs bskyed dus su smin pa rig 'dzin 'gyur med rdo rje skra mched kyi bka' drin las deng sang gi bar du rgyun ma chad par byung ba yin
271a6(1): no// // yang sgro phug pa chen po'i slob brgyud 'phyong rgyas rgya sman pa sangs rgyas grags zhes bya ba ni/ rus gnya' yul rgya sman stag rtse sar 'khrungs/ gzhon nu'i dus dzam+b+ha la bsgrubs pas zhing chung zhig yod
271b1(1): pa de'ang chus khyer/ bya bral la byon pas sbu gu dor phyug po mdzes khyer ba zhig gi ro khur mi ma 'byung bar 'dug/ snying rje drag po skyes te rtog med mdzad nas ro las byas pas mal 'gram nas gser mang po
271b2(1): byung / des dzam+b+ha las dngos grub byin par 'dug/ slar log te gra phyi khang dmar du khyung po khro bo thug/ khong yang dag bsgrub pa'i phyag phyir bsgrub pa mdzad pas/ yang dag mar me dgu pas zhal gzigs/ de nas
271b3(1): gtsang du byon/ gsang bdag sgro phug pa'i slob ma bya chen po'i dpon po zhig la mdo dang sgyu 'phrul la sogs pa'i gsan pa mdzad/ der phyug po zhig gi nas khal brgya tham pa phul/ cha rkyen gyis mi 'thogs par
271b4(1): byung bas sgro phug pa'i slob ma nyang nag mdo bo/ de'i slob ma lha rjes mda' seng gi las sgyu 'phrul nyan/ mkhas pa chen por gyur nas/ rang yul du rdo thog zel btab/ gnyal pa zhig po'i slob ma rgya 'ching ru
271b5(1): pas kyang rdo thog pa'i zhabs la gtugs te thos pa mang du mdzad/ khyad par du 'di la slob ma mkhas shing grub pa'i dpa' bo spyi chos kyi seng ge bya ba zhig byung / des gong ma se chen gyi spyan sngar byon pas/ rgyal
271b6(1): pos nus pa brtag pa'i phyir thub chod mdzad de mchod rten gyi nang du bcug nas sgo brtsigs te lo gcig bzhag/ lo dus na phye ste bltas pas/ rdo rje phur bu'i skur gyur 'dug pas ngo mtshar chen po skyes/ rdo thog
272a1(1): pa la dar ring chen mo la sogs pa'i dngos po tshan chen gnang / 'ja' sas bcad pa'i dgon gzhis kyang mang du yod de dar rgyas shin tu che ba byung / da lta ni ming du grags pa'i rjes shul tsam ste
272a2(1): bstan pa'i 'phel 'grib 'di yang skyo ba bskul ba'i rang bzhin no// spyi chos kyi seng ge'i slob ma ni/ sman lung pa shAkya 'od de/ 'di ni 'phyong po'i kha ru'i nyang ston chen por sras lnga byung ba yar klung sbrul sku mched
272a3(1): lngar grags pa'i che shos yin/ yul yar klung dgon pa sman lung yin pas de skad du grags/ tshigs gnyis pa chos ldan pa'i gdan sa da lta chos ldan zhes pa'i dgon rol 'di ka yin/ mtshan dngos mgon po rdo
272a4(1): rje zhes bya ba ste grub pa shin tu brnyes pas gyang la sku rgyab gtad pa'i rjes thim gyis song ba da lta'ang yod/ sngar 'dir chos gra chen po chags par snang ste rgyud 'bum gyi ras ma'ang shin tu mang bar mthong / sman
272a5(1): bsgrub mdzad pas yul 'di sdig pa dang grog sbyar kyang dkon pa yin zhes zos/ srung ma shin tu nus pa che bas da lta dgon shul kyang bsrung bar snang ste/ lha 'dre rnams dam tshig la shin tu gnas pa zhig
272a6(1): go/ tshigs 'og ma gsum la skal ldan pa/ dur khrod pa/ dbang rgyal ba zhes grags/ de las 'dir tshigs dang po sman lung pa shAkya 'od kyis skyi chos kyi seng ge la mdo sgyu 'phrul rnams legs par bslab// phyis
272b1(1): glan shAkya 'od po'i sras glan mkhas pa bsod nams rgyal la'ang gsan nas/ gsang ba snying po'i khog dbub dang / Ti ka rgyud don rnam nges la sogs pa yig cha mang du mdzad/ 'di'i slob ma dwags po'i sangs
272b2(1): rgyas gong la ba yin/ de la dwags po nyid du slob ma bla ma gnyen la sogs pa mang du zon zhing / gtso bor go 'jo ba dag po'i bla mar gyur nas khams su shin tu dar bar gyur ro// yang sman lung pa la dpon shAkya
272b3(1): 'bum pas gsang ba snying po'i bshad pa mkhas par bslab/ de la mkhas grub chos dpal yab sras gnyis kyis kyang gsang snying gi bshad pa legs par nod/ sman lung pa'i brgyud pa de dag ni gter kha gong
272b4(1): 'og la'ang gnas dus der chos kyi bdag por gyur pa zhig go// / spyi chos kyi seng ge'i gdan sa brgya ye shes mgon pos kyang skyi dang glan chos rgyal gnyis ka la gtugs nas mdo dang sgyu 'phrul mkhas
272b5(1): par mkhyen/ de'i dpon po rdo rje rgyal mtshan ces bya ba gzhon nu la gsang phur byon nas tshad ma rnam nges mkhas par sbyangs/ de nas phu bo rgya ye shes mgon po las mdo dang sgyu 'phrul legs par bslabs nas/
272b6(1): 'grel pa sbar khab gzhung du byas pa'i Ti ka dang / dbang gi cho ga la sogs pa mdzad/ des rang gi dpon po bla ma tshul rgyal ba la gsungs/ de la ri gdong pa shes rab rgyal mtshan gyis gsan/ 'dis dwags
273a1(1): por sku rabs dpon g.yog dang sngags pa rnams la bshad pas re zhig na dwags po'i phyogs na'ang dar ba yod zer/ shes rgyal gyi slob ma zhang mkhar bsod nams bzang po/ de'i slob ma slob
273a2(1): dpon bkra shis rgya mtsho/ 'di la rdo rje rgyal mtshan pa'i snying Tika gi thog nas bshad lung dang / phur pa lha nag la sogs pa 'gos gzhon nu'i zhabs kyis gsan to// // yang khams lugs su grags pa ni/
273a3(1): gsang ba snying po'i 'grel pa slob dpon nyi 'od seng ges mdzad pa slob dpon bai ra tsa nas khams 'o rngu byams chen gyi gtsug lag khang du bskur nas bshad pa'ang mdzad/ khyad par phyogs der snga 'gyur gyi
273a4(1): bstan pa yongs su grags par byung ba'i thog ma lta bu ni kaHthog pa yin cing / de la kaHthog pa dam pa bde bar gshegs pa zhes kyang bya/ bla mar shar pa spobs pa mtha' yas sam shes rab seng ge zhes
273a5(1): grags pa'i bdag nyid chen po de ni bskal pa thog ma med pa'i dus nas byang chub mchog gi go 'phang mngon du byas pa zhig snying po mchog gi bstan pa dang gdul bya mang po zhig gi don mdzad pa'i phyir thabs la
273a6(1): mkhas pa'i gnad gsang gis lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi sras mo dang / 'od srung gi dus su rgyal po kr-i ka'i sras mo bdun gyi che bar skye ba blangs shing de bzhin gshegs pa bsnyen bkur du mas mnyes par byas
273b1(1): pa'i 'og tu bdag cag gi ston pa'i drung du gnas brtan chen po b+ha ra d+h+wa dza dang / de'i rjes su mu stegs kyi pan+di ta phyis sangs rgyas par gyur pa zhig dang / sing+ga la'i rgyal po rigs su 'khrungs nas na lan+da'i mkhan
273b2(1): po rgyal ba'i lha las rab tu byung zhing dus skabs der mu stegs zhi ba pa zhig gis bstan pa la gnod pa cher byas pas slob dpon gyis thog mar grub mtha' de la bslabs nas nyams 'og tu chud pa dang gzod
273b3(1): rtsod pas btul te nang par chug/ yang mu stegs kyi mkhas pa 'ga' zhig dang rtsod pa'i tshe 'jam dpal dbyangs gi mdun gyi nam mkhar byon pas rtsod pa'i spobs pa bcoms/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la
273b4(1): 'jug pa gsungs nas lho phyogs su byon pa sogs slob dpon chen po zhi ba ltar gyur pa dang / dga' rab rdo rje'i slob ma tog rtse bar gyur nas bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i gzhung mdzad pa dang / bod kyi ljongs su
273b5(1): sad mi bdun gyi nang nas rma rin chen mchog tu gyur nas gsang ba snying po'i rgyud la sogs pa bskur nas nyan bshad byas pa dang / 'phags yul nub phyogs bA ra nA si'i rgyal por gyur pa'i tshe/ bla mchod pan+di ta
273b6(1): dang / bar la phra ma bcug pa'i blon po'i lce bcad pas da lta ljags cung zad mi bde ba yin gsungs pa dang / ri dwags kr-i Sh+Na swa ra dang / drang srong gang+gA ra ri'i drung du ne tso zhig tu gyur pa la drang srong gis rig
274a1(1): sngags bslabs pas shes shing nus pa'ang thob/ dus gzhan zhig tu ri de'i shar phyogs kyi mtsho zhig la gnas pa'i klu sems can la byams pa zhig yod/ de'i lho phyogs su nag po'i phyogs kyi klu
274a2(1): gdug pa can zhig kyang yod de des sems can la gnod pa rtsom pa'i snga rol du klu dkar po'i steng du dmag drangs nas 'jigs pa'i cho 'phrul dang bcas pas 'ongs pa na klu dkar pos ne tsho la skyabs su song
274a3(1): bas/ des gdugs pa'i klu'i phyogs su bltas te rig sngags bzlas shing gshog pa brdabs pas gdug pa'i lag 'gro 'khor dang bcas pa de nyid du brlag par gyur to// de'i 'og tu 'phags yul nub phyogs
274a4(1): su rgyal rigs kyi pan+di ta rten rab byung la sngags kyi nus pa thob pas DA ki rnams la dbang bskur bar rat+na shI la zhes pa dang / lho phyogs kyi rgyud du rje rigs kyi pan+di ta gzhon nu seng ge zhes sngags la mkhyen pa
274a5(1): che ba zhig dang / de'i 'og tu pan+di ta chen po su ma ti kirti 'am mtshan gzhan bal po pan+de par grags pa dpal na ro pa'i dngos kyi slob mar gyur cing / bka' bab dang po phyag rgya chen po'i ye shes la rang dbang
274a6(1): brnyes shing rgyud sde thams cad la mkhyen pa che/ khyad par bde mchog la grub pa thob/ lho brag mar pa lo tsAs kyang na ro pa'i 'og tu bka' drin che ba'i bla mar mdzad/ sku tshe'i mthar mi nyag rgyal pos spyan drangs
274b1(1): te rgyal khams der phebs te rgyal po la dbang bskur ba du ma sogs dang phan pa rgya chen po mdzad/ de nas kyi tan gyi rgyal pos kyang spyan drangs te sngon du chos ma dar bas rgyal khams thams cad chos la bcug
274b2(1): cing / rgyal srid chos bzhin byed du bcug/ rgyal po'i gtsos dra ma rnams la bde mchog gi dbang bskur mdzad cing yi dam du phog pa thams cad kyi bsgoms pas dngos grub sna re ma thob pa med par grags/ de
274b3(1): nas rgya mtsho'i gling zhig tu byon pa na sgra dang 'od la sogs pa'i ltas chen po byung nas gshegs pa'i tshul bstan/ de nas bar do gzhan ma byung bar yab kyi spyi bor bzhugs nas yum gyi lhums su zhugs pa yin
274b4(1): gsungs te/ bdag nyid chen po 'dir sku skye ba bzhes pa yin no// dam pa 'di mdo khams bu 'bor sgad du gtogs pa 'bri chu'i 'gram du rje phag mo grub pa dang yum mched du gyur pa ste rje phag gru rme shod 'bal
274b5(1): mor da lta gser khang du brjod pa der 'khrungs pa yin pas rje 'di yang de dang mi ring ba zhig tu 'khrungs pa yin te 'ong / gang ltar gdung rus sga yab gtsang pa dpal grags/ yum gtsang mo rin chen rgyan gnyis
274b6(1): kyi sras su chu pho stag gi lor 'khrungs/ 'di rje khams pa chen po 'am phag gru lo bcu gsum pa'i chu stag de yin/ bcu bdun la dbus su byon/ 'phan yul du bla ma byang chub seng ge las rab tu byung / mtshan shes
275a1(1): rab seng ger gsol/ nags kyi mkhan chen las smad 'dul gyi rgun las bsnyen par rdzogs shing 'dul phyogs la mkhas par sbyangs/ zur sgro phrag pa chen po'i thugs sras 'jam ston 'gro ba'i
275a2(1): mgon po bya ba las/ sgyu 'phrul gsang snying gi skor dang sems phyogs sogs gsan pas de dang de la mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyin/ rje sgro phug pa dang kaHthog pa'i bar la bla ma gcig bzhugs pa de yin/ lnga pa
275a3(1): chen po'i gsan yig tu kaHthog pa rang gis sgro phug pa la thug par gsungs/ 'dzam ston pa zhes pa ni yul gyi ming nas btags pa ste/ rje karma pa dus mkhyen gyi rnam thar la dpyad na kam po gnas dang nye ba
275a4(1): zhig yin par grub cing / der nyid kyi slob ma rtogs ldan zhig gis skye ba ngos bzung ba la 'dzam skye ba gsum pa zhes grags pa dang / gzhan yang 'dzam ston sangs rgyas bya ba dang / 'dzam gyi spang phug tu
275a5(1): bzhugs pa'i btsun pa zhig gis rje dus mkhyen/ spyan ras gzigs su mthong bas 'dzam yul tsam na sgom bzang bar grags pa sogs kyi lo rgyus byung ba dpa' bo gtsug lag pas kyang de dang mthun par bkod
275a6(1): 'dug cing / da lta 'ga' zhig gi 'dam spang phug ces brjod pa'i yul de yin no// rwa lo'i slob ma kam lo tsA las bde mchog rgud chen bcu sogs dang / cog ro lo tsA las phag mo phyi ma dang sdom 'byung / kam
275b1(1): chos kyi ye shes las dgyes pa rdo rje'i skor/ 'gos lo tsa ba'i slob ma ldong ston rdo rje snying po dang po d+hi zhang ston las 'dus pa/ de gnyis ka'i slob ma la stod dpal gyi dbang phyug las sgron gsal gyi bshad pa
275b2(1): dang gshed skor/ rje dus mkhyen las 'khor lo bde mchog gi dbang bskur gyi rim pa dang / phyag rgya chen po/ na ro chos drug gi man ngag la sogs pa rnams gas na/ rje dbu se'i thugs kyi sras mchog tu mdzad
275b3(1): cing spyir yang bdag nyid chen po 'di'i skye ba du mar 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis dge ba'i bshes gnyen mdzad pas shes bya thams cad la chags thogs spangs pa'i thams cad mkhyen par bzhugs shing mdo
275b4(1): / sngags spyi dang khyad par rdo rje theg pa snga phyir bod kyi ljongs su 'gyur ba tsam la gsan bsam ma mdzad pa med pa lta bu dang / 'dzam ston rin po ches/ khyod kam po'i gnas su song nas sgrub pa la gzhol na phung
275b5(1): po 'od du dengs pa gcig 'ongs/ kaHthogs tu song na bstan pa mthar rgyas pa gcig 'ongs te mchi gsungs pas bstan pa kho na thugs la bcangs te kaHthog ces pa'i sa cha 'tshol nas byon pa zhig la thog
275b6(1): mar ka thil du sleb cing der phyugs 'tsho ba'i byis pa rnams la kaHthog gang du yod dri bar mdzad pas phu ya ki yin zer/ der phyugs rnams gdul bya'i rten 'brel dang / rdzi bu rnams slob ma'i rten 'brel du
276a1(1): dgongs/ de nas sa yul yi ge ka 'dra ba'i thog sa mo yos kyi lor dgon pa 'debs pa'i gtsug lag khang bzhengs pa na bon kyi tha tshig la gnas pa'i rdo gnyen rmad bus gzugs dngos su bstan
276a2(1): nas sgo sna tshogs kyis bar chad brtsams pa la rje dpon slob gsum gyis rjes 'dod du phyin pa na pha wang zhig la thims/ de chos rje gtsang ston gyis chos gos kyis bcings nas khrid/ dam pas phyag lcag gis
276a3(1): brab nas ded/ lung pa'i shod kyi chu khar bskul ba dengs sang mngon sum gyi yul du gyur pa dang / bon po brgyad kyis ngan sngags bsgrubs pa dpal lha mos bsgrub khang gi brag brdibs nas sleb pa de'i steng dam
276a4(1): pa'i phyag gis rgya gram bris pas pha wang brgyad sleb bya ba yin/ de la sogs pa grub pa'i rtags mtshan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang bcas pas chos gzhi btab nas bzhugs/ shar a mdo'i yul tshun chad/ lho tsha
276a5(1): ba rong dang glo mon tshun gyi slob ma rnams 'dus pa la gtso bor rdzogs pa chen po dang / sgyu 'phrul gsang ba snying po'i bshad pa'i bka' dang dbang bka' bsgrub pa sogs rgya bod kyi 'grel pa gzhung che chung thams
276a6(1): cad la dpal ldan zur ba'i bka' srol gyi rgyun dang mdo dgongs pa 'dus pa la sogs rtsal du bton nas gsungs/ gzhan yang 'jam dpal sku dra sogs dang mdo phyogs su'ang rgyal ba byams pa'i gzhung chen
276b1(1): / po rnams dang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug pa sogs shin tu mang bar bshad cing mdor na mdo khams kyi ljongs su gsang sngags kyi bstan pa gzhi bzhengs su btings pa yin/ dgung lo don gcig
276b2(1): par chu pho bya ba'i tha skar can gyi zla bar gzugs sku brtul ba'i tshul bzhengs/ skyes bu chen po 'di nyid la 'phags pa 'jam pa'i dbyangs ni gshegs bzhugs mi mnga' bar dus thams cad du mi dang mi lab pa
276b3(1): bzhin bzhugs shing mdzad pa thams cad lung ston pa zhig yod la/ sangs rgyas mi bskyod pa dang / bde ba can dang / sman gyi bla ma'i zhing khams sogs ni rtag par gzigs/ sgyu 'phrul zhi khro dang / bde mchog
276b4(1): lha drug cu rtsa gnyis dang / dpal he ru ka'i dkyil 'khor rnams kyang nam bzhed la gzigs shing / de bzhin gshegs pa rigs lnga sogs las chos gsan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang chos kyi
276b5(1): gtam mdzad pa dang sku'i skye ba 'di nyid kyi 'og tu bde ba can du byang chub sems dpa' blo gros snying po zhes bya ba'i tshul gyis bzhugs shing sa brgyad pa'i mngon rtogs brnyes pa dang / ma 'ongs pa na bskal pa
276b6(1): skar ma bkram pa lta bu la bde bar gshegs pa tshe dpag tu med par 'gyur ba'i lung bstan brnyes shing mdor na skyes bu 'di nyid kyi spangs rtogs ni thun mong gi snang ngor sprul pa'i sku 'jig rten du bzhugs pa
277a1(1): la dgongs pa dus gsum gyi bde bar gshegs pa rnams dang dbyer med pa ste so skyes bsam par mi nus so// de nyid kyi rgyal tshab gtsang ston pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs rje
277a2(1): rje mi bskyod pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa las 'phags pa'i yul du mnga' bdag mai tri pa'i thugs sras rgya gar phyag na zhes bya bar gyur cing slob dpon de las dbang bzhi rten can zhus nas bsgoms pas phyag rgya chen
277a3(1): po'i bka' bab cing rtogs pa mngon du gyur/ glang chen smyon pa sdigs mdzub bstan pas bzlog pa sogs nus pa thob/ mthar sku lus de nyid kyis phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub thob/ de'i 'og tu kaM lo tsA ba ye
277a4(1): shes mchog ces bya ba sngags rgyud thams cad la mkhas shing khyad par tsakra sam+bar la brten nas grub pa brnyes pa zhig dang / de'i rjes su gtsang kha'i phyogs su sde snod 'dzin pa chen po zhig dang / de'i 'og du
277a5(1): chos kyi rje nyid yin par gsungs shing 'khrungs pa'i yul ni bu 'bor sgang gi bye brag gtsang zhal zhes pa de nyid yin nam sems te/ yul las mtshan du chags pa gtsang ston zhes brjod pa'i phyir dang / rje nyid kyi
277a6(1): gsungs las/ ban sdom rdo rje rgyal mtshan nga // bu 'bor sgang du skyes pa yin// bla ma dam pa bsten pa yin// gdams ngag bdud rtsi 'thungs pa yin// sgrub la brtson 'grus chung ba yin// dkar po'i grogs
277b1(1): kyis btags pa yin// mi ngo bsrung la g.yel ba yin// sbas yul mthil du rgas pa yin// zhes 'byung ba'i phyir ro// dgung lo bcu bdun par bla ma bde bar gshegs pa mjal nas chos gsan/ dpon slob
277b2(1): lhan gcig par mi nyag tu byon/ der man ngag thams cad kyang gnang / nyi shu rtsa gcig par 'bri ti ra mdo'i dgon du byon nas bzhugs/ nyer gsum la kaHthog tu byon nas bsgoms pas dus gzhan zhig tu bla
277b3(1): ma bde bar gshegs pa'i nyams snang du/ lung mdo chen po zhig chus gang ba'i nang du 'od chen po bltar mi bzod pa zhig 'dug pa la ci yin gsung bar skyes bu chen po khyod kyi slong ma bcu gcig kun tu 'od
277b4(1): kyi sa la gnas pa'i gdan yin zer ba byung / de khyod yin gsungs/ de tsam na dpal he ru ka dang bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyi dkyil 'khor rnams gzigs/ dpal lha mo dang nag po chen po yang dus rtag tu gzigs/
277b5(1): / dgung lo nga drug pa la kaHthog gi gdan sar phebs/ mdo sku sems gsum gyi bstan pa bla ma'i bka' srol bzhin bskyangs/ 'di skabs su sems dpa' chen po sbom brag pas kaHthog gi rin po che gtsang ston
277b6(1): pa de snyan pa shin tu che bas ci 'dra zhig yin nam dgongs pa btang bas sprin med pa'i nam mkha' lta bu'i 'od sngon po'i gzhal yas khang chen po zhig gi nang na longs spyod rdzogs pa'i lha tshogs mang po bzhugs
278a1(1): pa gsal ba dang / rin po che gtsang ston pa bzhugs pa'i zad nas 'ja' 'od kha dog sna tshogs pa'i phung po bsam gyis mi khyab pa gzigs pas 'di sangs rgyas yin par 'dug dgongs nas de
278a2(1): nub tshogs mchod cig mdzad par gsang sngags rnying ma'i he ru ka mang po zhal gzigs/ mnal lam du rin po che sna tshogs las grub pa'i ri chen po dpag par dka' ba zhig gi dngos su sman sna tshogs skyes pa
278a3(1): la mi mang po sman zu zhing 'dug/ ri de'i rtse mo na 'od sngon po'i gzhal yas khang chen po zhig gi dbus su bla ma kaHthog pa 'od kyi rang bzhin du bzhugs 'dug/ dung dkar po chen po 'bud mi med par rang grag
278a4(1): tu grags pa las/ dung dpag tu med pa 'phros te thams cad kyang rang grags tu phyogs thams cad khyab par ti ri ri 'gro ba gzigs/ khong gi snyan pa phyogs med du 'gro bar 'dug gsungs/ de'i phyis su
278a5(1): kaHthog tu byon nas rin po che gtsang ston las sgyu 'phrul gyi dbang bskur ba zhus pas mkhyen pa'i ye shes phyogs med du sad par gyur/ kaHthog pa thugs dam rdzogs pa chen po la mnyam par bzhag pa'i tshe
278a6(1): nam mkha' ltar ci yang mi snang ba dang / nub gsum la zhi khro'i lha tshogs dpag tu med pa gzigs pa sogs dag snang bsam gyis mi khyab pa shar gsungs/ de yang rin po che 'di nyid kyi thugs rgyud kyi yon tan
278b1(1): rnams gtsang ston rin po che'i byin rlab kyis sad par mdzad la/ de nyid kyi yon tan rnams kyang sbom brag pas gzigs pas dpon slob de dag gi mngon rtogs ci 'dra yin soms shig/ lan gcig mi bskyod
278b2(1): pa'i zhing khams gzigs pa zhig la 'khor gyi sems dpa' rnams kyis chos rje 'di la byang chub sems dpa' nor bu'i snying po zhes pa'i sgra ti ri ri sgrogs shing sku skye ba de'i 'og tu bde ba can du de ltar 'gyur ba
278b3(1): yin gsungs/ yang zhing khams de nyid lan gcig gzigs par ston pa mi bskyod pas rigs kyi bu nor bu'i snying po khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus su de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer rab tu 'gro ba zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/
278b4(1): zhes lung bstan pa'ang gsan/ dgung lo dgu bcu bzhes pa me pho byi ba'i lor sprul pa bsdus so// de nyid kyi rgyal tshab byams pa 'bum ni/ 'phags pa'i yul du grub chen dza lan+da ri pa'i thugs sras grub pa'i
278b5(1): 'khor lo sbyar ba spyod 'chang dbang po yin te/ rje btsun mi tra dzo kis slob ma so ma dzo ki la/ khyod bod du 'gro na lan gcig kaHthog tu 'gro dgos pa yin gsung / ci'i phyir zhus pas/ slob dpon shan de ba
278b6(1): dang slob dpon badz+ra pA ni bod la skye ba bzhes nas gdul bya dpag tu med pa'i don mdzad la/ de'i gdan sar da lta'ang slob dpon kany+dza pa chen po sku skye ba der bzhes nas gdul bya dpag tu med pa'i don
279a1(1): mdzad nas da lta'ang bzhugs so// zhes gsungs pa dang / gzhan yang / rgya gar gyi rgyal po d+harma pa la'i sras ma hA pa lar 'khrungs shing grub pa'i slob dpon mang po bsnyen bkur gyis mnyes par
279a2(1): mdzad/ bA ra nA sIr bram ze'i rigs kyi dge slong dA na kIrti zhes pa bram ze chen po'i slob ma phag mo zhal gnyis ma la thugs dam mdzad pa zhig dang / ma ga d+har tshogs dpon gyi rigs su 'khrungs pa rten dge
279a3(1): slong A nan+da shrI zhes pa bde mchog lhan skyes la brten nas dngos grub brnyes shing rdo rje gdan gyi mkhan po mdzad nas bstan pa la bya ba mdzad/ de'i 'og tu rje byams pa chen por sku skye ba bzhes pa yin no// dam
279a4(1): pa rin po che dang chos kyi rje gnyis car las mdo sngags kyi chos tshul rgya mtsho tsam gsan bsam bsgom gsum mdzad de mthar phyin pa ni chos kyi rje las mdzad pa ste/ dam pa rin po che/ bu khyod las byung ba'i
279a5(1): byams pa 'bum// zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro// chos kyi rje sbra ma bzhugs pa'i 'og tu dgung lo zhe brgyad pa la gdan sar bzhugs shing sgyu 'phrul dang rdzogs chen gtso bor gyur pa'i mdo sngags kyi chos tshul rgya
279a6(1): mtsho lta bu'i dga' ston spel/ mchog gi sbrul sku karma pa chen po 'bri rgyal dam pa chos phyug tu sku 'khrungs shing byang chub sems dpa' sbom brag pa dang sha 'bam du thog mar mjal ba zhig la khong gi bka' bzhin
279b1(1): kaHthog tu phebs nas byams rin po ches mkhan po dang / spyan snga mang phu ba bsod nams 'bum pas las slob mdzad de karma pa bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po bsgrubs te thub pa'i rgyal tshab tu
279b2(1): mnga' gsol/ mtshan chos kyi bla mar gsol zhing sgyu 'phrul dang rdzogs chen gyi dbang dang gdams pa'ang gsan/ dgung gi grangs don bzhi'i bar bstan pa dang 'gro ba'i don mdzad nas chu byi lor gzugs sku'i
279b3(1): bkod pa bsdus shing de'i 'og tu dpal ldan 'bras spungs su byang chub sems dpa' ka ma la shrI zhes par gyur nas gdul bya'i don mdzad/ de'i rjes su bde ba can du byang chub sems dpa' zla ba'i snying po'am
279b4(1): kun tu bzang po zhes bya ba'i tshul gyis phyi mtha'i bar bzhugs shing sems can mtha' yas pa'i don mdzad do// de nyid kyi rgyal tshab spyan snga ba chen po bsod nams 'bum pa dgung grangs sum cu bzhes par
279b5(1): gdan sar bzhugs/ mdo sgyu 'phrul rdzogs chen gtso bor bton cing bstan pa bskyangs/ re gcig pa la gshegs/ de nyid kyi rgyal tshab dbu 'od ye shes 'bum shing pho stag la sku 'khrungs/ nyer dgu la gdan
279b6(1): sar phebs/ mdo sku sems gsum gtso bor gyur pa'i mdo sngags kyi chos kyi 'khor lo rgya chen po bskor zhing dus skabs der chos kyi rjes skya pan+ti ta dang 'phags pa rin po che khu dpon hor rgyal pos gdan
280a1(1): drangs te phebs/ lam par 'dzin du rnam rgyal lha khang bzhengs/ kaHthog pa'ang der phebs/ sa skya ba bzhugs pa'i phyogs thams cad dngul gyis gzhi dang sa 'dzin gyi rang bzhin du gyur/ cig
280a2(1): shoshes kyi phyogs su de dag gis dben par gyur pa na/ der lha khang la gsar rnying gnyis rab gnas dus gcig mdzad rgyur kaHthog pa'i zhal nas rab gnas kyi thog ma'i bgegs skrod de nged rnying ma bas byed/
280a3(1): ye shes pa gzhugs pa sogs rab gnas dngos gzhi de khyed gsar ma mdzad par zhu gsungs/ der kaHthog pas bgegs skrod pa'i ting nge 'dzin la zhugs pas lha khang phyi nang bsgyur/ sa skya bas ye shes pa
280a4(1): dbab pas slar rnal du gnas par mdzad pa'i ngo mtshar bstan/ kaHthog pas 'phags pa rin po che la sgyu 'phrul zhi khro'i dbang bskur ba mdzad cing hor yul du theg/ slar chos kyi rje hor yul du gzugs sku
280a5(1): bsdus/ 'phags pas bod du phyir byon skabs skyes su mchod rten li ma thog tshad gsum dang ting chen po bdun tshar sogs kaHthog tu dbul bar mdzad pa lta'ang yod/ de dag gi tshul sa skya pan+di'i rtog pa brjod
280a6(1): pa snyan ngag gi bstan bcos chen po dge dbang gnyis pa rin spung sa spyod ngag dbang 'jigs med grags pas mdzad pa skal bzang legs lam du/ 'bri chur sgras bod bdud kyi rtsi// btung ba thams cad
280b1(1): legs byas su// 'gro ba'i rgyud gyis nyer 'tsho rnams// bde dang 'byor pa phyugs gzigs nas// kye ma ma la srid pa yi// rnam 'gyur yid 'ong rtsom pa las// rten 'byung tshogs ni rgya che ba// brtag par bya de
280b2(1): rgyal gyur gsungs// de nas rdzu 'phrul rkang pa bzhi yi 'degs 'jog re la chos 'khor mtshan ma brgya// 'god bzhin spro bas rgyal ba'i gong 'phang la zhon 'dzin du byon la de bzhin du// gsang sngags rnying ma'i
280b3(1): snying po rnal 'byor grub pa yongs mdzad shar gyi kaHthog pa// dbu 'od ye shes 'bum ste gzi byin nyi ma 'bum phrag 'gongs dang lhan cig tu// brten pa lha yi snang brnyan 'ga'// gsar du bsgrubs la
280b4(1): kaHthog pas// bgegs rnams bskrad pa'i drag shul gyis// lha sku rnams kyang ring du song // dam tshig sems dpa' de yar ba// gang du sa s+thA pa Na chen mthus// skad cig la bkug ye shes kyi// sems dpa'
280b5(1): brjid ldan lhag gnas bstsal// thabs shes bdag gi nga yir med// ye shes sgyu ma'i rang mtshan las// mchog chos grub pa'i rol rtsed kyis// phreng ba mnyam nyid bsham mo che// theg pa rim pa dgu yi
280b6(1): mgon// de yis 'phags par sgyu 'phrul dbang // bskur ba'i dril chen sgra bzhin du// rna ba brgyud mar dbyangs su len// dngul gyi sa gzhi sa 'dzin can// yangs shing dar ba'i ku mud dang // 'khrul las zla
281a1(1): ba'i 'jig rten ni// dga' ba 'khyil ba'i zad brgyud do// zhes pa la sogs kyis rjod byed snyan cing mdzes pa'i rgyan dang / brjod bya don gyi lus rdzogs par gyur pas snyan dngags smra ba gzhan
281a2(1): gyis cha tsam yang bskrun du med pa nyid du mthong ngo // rje dbu 'od pa'i rgyal tshab byang chub dpal pa dgung lo zhe bzhi par gdan sar byon/ 'di'i dus su bar khrod dang / spang khrod/ dam phug rnams su phung po 'od
281a3(1): sguskur dengs pa mang du byung / lha khang bzhengs skabs su las byed rnams kyis phyugs lug mang po bsad nas sha lpags pa so sor phral ba la drung nas se gol zhig gtogs par mdzad pas thams cad tso dir gyis
281a4(1): mkha' spyod du song bar grags/ dgung lo re bzhi pa la gzhan don du gshegs/ de'i rgyal tshab bsod nams bzang po dgung lo nga gsum pa la gdan sar phebs/ gzhi sku 'phrul dang rdzogs chen gyis bzung zhing
281a5(1): 'di skabs tsam nas nyung dang chos dbang sogs gter chos sngon ma sngon ma rnams cung zad re dar bar byung / re gsum pa la gzhan don du gshegs/ rgyal tshab kun dga' 'bum pas kyang sngon bzhin du bstan
281a6(1): pa bskyangs/ de nas dbang phyug dpal ba dgung grangs so brgyad par gdan sa mdzad cing 'di skabs bshad pa bag tsam re las sgrub pa kho na gtso bor mdzad cing thugs dam la rtse gcig tu bzhugs pa la/ dus
281b1(1): gzhan zhig tu 'jang rgyal po dmag dpung chen po byung bar nye gnas kyis dmag byung bas ci tsug drag zhus par khong nyid kyi thog tu rtsam pa mang po lugs shig gsungs// de bzhin du byas pas kha ba chen po bab
281b2(1): nas dmag rnams phyir log/ slar zhabs su btud de gser gyi thub pa'i sku dang / ba so las bcos pa'i gan+d+ho la'i bkod pa/ da lta'i gtsug lag khang gi rtse'i gany+tsir che ba 'di rnams phul/ de nyid dgung grangs
281b3(1): nga gsum pa la gzugs sku bsdus// rgyal tshab blo gros 'bum pa zhe gsum pa la gdan sa mdzad/ 'di'i slob ma chu gsor nam mkha' 'bum sogs grub brnyes mang po byung / zur 'ug pa lung dang gsang sngags
281b4(1): gling rnams su bar skabs su bstan pa nyag phra bar gyur pa la mdo sgyu 'phrul sogs dar bar mdzad cing dbus gtsang khams gsum du bstan pa la phyag rjes che/ re lnga par gzhan don du gshegs/ rgyal tshab blo
281b5(1): gros seng ge dgung lo so drug par gdan sa mdzad/ bka' ma snga dar rnams kyis gzhi bzung nas gter ma'i skor yang 'di skabs ka dar rgyas su mdzad pa yin/ drug cu pa la gshegs/ rgyal tshab byang chub blo
281b6(1): gros kyis kyang sngon gyi rgyun de ka dang khyad par sgyu 'phrul sde bzhi dang lam rnams bkod la'ang bshad pa mdzad/ ri rtsibs dang bar khrod sogs su spang ba bsam gtan gyi sde'i nga shin tu rgyas/ de nyid kyi rgyal tshab
282a1(1): byang chub seng ge dang byang chub rgyal mtshan gnyis kyis kyang bka' gter gyi 'chad nyan sgom gsum shin tu rgyas par mdzad/ byang chub rgyal mtshan gyi slob ma bu 'bor mkhas grub dz+nyA na ke tu ni
282a2(1): gnyigs ye shes gzhon nu'i rnam 'phrul du lung gis bstan cing mdo sngags spyi'i lam rim thams cad la mkhas/ khyad par mkhas grub chen po bra'o chos 'bum las 'dus pa mdo dang sgyu 'phrul zhi khro'i dbang
282a3(1): dang bshad pa sgrub thabs sogs ma lus par gsan/ bla ma de las rmog ston rdo rje dpal bzang gis 'dus pa mdo zhus shing / de las sems dpa' chen po dar lung pa rdo rje rnam rgyal gyis zhus/ rgyun de las
282a4(1): 'dus pa mdo khams lugs su grags pa dbus su bab pa yin te slar 'chad do// mkhas grub ye shes rgyal mtshan gyis gsang ba snying po rtsa 'grel rnams dang / mdo dgongs 'dus/ rdzogs chen sems klong man
282a5(1): ngag gi sde gsum so so'i bka' srol gyi rtsa ba rnams slar yang nyi ma ltar gsal bar mdzad cing bshad sgrub kyis bstan pa khyab gdal du spel/ zhi khro dang phur ba bka' ma'i 'grel pa/ gsang ba snying po la
282a6(1): 'grel pa/ sa bcad/ bsdus don/ lam rnam bkod la Ti ka dang mtshan bu/ sbar khab dang thugs thig la mtshan 'grel/ dam tshig gsal kra la 'grel pa gsal ba'i me long / zhi khro'i phyag rgya bcing thabs kyi yi
282b1(1): ge/ dam pa rin po che'i theg pa spyi bcing gi 'grel pa/ tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i rnam bshad sogs bstan bcos shin tu mang bar mdzad/ rje de nyid kyi slob ma kha ba dkar po ba nam mkha' rgya mtsho/ kun dga' zla
282b2(1): pabapa/ phyogs med byang sems/ lab ston nam mkha' rin chen sogs mkhas shing dngos grub brnyes pa kho na'ang mang du byon pa las kha ba dkar po bas gsang snying spyi don dang / sa bcad/ bsdus don/ lam rnam
282b3(1): bkod la Ti ka sogs mdzad/ mkhas grub chen po nyid sku che'i mthar 'phags mtsho ri khrod du sgrub pa kho na la gzhol zhing bzhugs nas bu 'bor dang kha ba dkar po/ 'jang yan chad kyi gdul bya dpag tu med
282b4(1): pa'i don mdzad nas mkha' 'gro ma las kyi dbang mo ches khyod drug cu re bzhi'i dus 'di nas tshe 'phos nas byang gi phyogs su 'gro don rgya cher mdzad/ de nas bde ba can du byang chub sems dpa' bde ba'i myu
282b5(1): gus sangs rgyas kyi zhing sbyangs shing dag pa'i bskal pa yon tan bkod par bde ba'i snying po zhes bya bar 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// zhes lung bstan pa'ang thob/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs
282b6(1): kyis zhal gzigs shing thun mong gi spyod yul du'ang bla gos nyi zer la bkal ba sogs mkhas pa dang grub pa'i rnam thar la bsam gyis mi khyab bo// 'di yan chad kaHthogs bla rabs bcu gsum zhes rigs
283a1(1): gsum mgon po'i rnam 'phrul zam mi 'chad du byon cing / snga 'gyur gyi bstan pa bshad sgrub gnyis ldan gyis bskyangs pa yin no// yang dam pa bder gshegs kyi slob ma rong po zos cho ga rnam
283a2(1): gsum zhes/ shes rab rgyal mtshan dang / shes rab dpal ba/ shes rab rdo rje gsum ste dbang rnon cig car gyi gdul bya ji bzhin par nges shing dam pa rin po che'i chos gsungs pa'i sgra thos pa tsam gyis
283a3(1): sa thams cad kyi gting sleb pa'i grub pa'i dbang phyug chen por gyur/ khong gsum nyid kyis shar rgyal mo rong du bstan pa spel ba las da lha'i bar bstan pa rin po che ma nyams shing dar ba 'di ka byung ba yin
283a4(1): no// yang ka dam pa'i slob ma'i mchog lung bstan bu bzhir grags pa las/ 'bru tsha skang pas bum rong bzhag gsum kha ba dkar po yan chad du dgon gnas brgya rtsa brgyad btab par grags shing bstan pa khyab
283a5(1): gdal du spel ba'i phyag rjes che/ tsa sde spyan snga nam mkha' rdo rjes go 'jo tsa sde dgon pa 'debs par mdzad/ khong gi slob ma drung thugs rje ye shes/ ston pa dbang 'byor sogs las sgyu 'phrul dang rdzogs chen
283a6(1): gyi skor rnams dbus su babs pas khams lugs zhes pa de byung / rmog ston 'jam dpal seng ges 'bri rgyud du dgon pa mdzad cing bstan pa dang sems can gyi don rlab po che bsgrubs/ khong las
283b1(1): grub thob rmog rabs bcu gsum du grags pa'i rgyud rnams byung / grub thob ma Ni rin chen gu ru chos kyi dbang phyug gi thugs rje chen po yang snying 'dus pa'i rtsa ba'i chos kyi bdag por ngos bzung zhing khong nyid kyi
283b2(1): sras mo kun grol 'bum dang lhan cig kaHthog tu sngags kyi lung bstan mdzad kyang ma Ni rin chen rab byung gi brtul zhugs las ma 'das pas rten 'brel cung zad phyugs/ 'on kyang gong ma rnams gsum gyi
283b3(1): gdung 'bum sogs kyi zhabs tog mdzad pa'i las zin ma thag de nyid du bla gos kyis gshog pa ltar mdzad nas nam mkha' la bya bzhin 'phur nas phar ka'i ri rtser bab/ der zhabs rjes kyang yod/ de nas ra
283b4(1): gcog tu bzhugs shing ring por ma thogs par sku 'od phung du yal lo// bla rabs bcu gsum gyi rjes su drung rabs bcu gsum byon nas rim gyis bka' gter gyi bstan pa bskyangs mod/ 'on kyang bka' ma
283b5(1): rnams phyis rim gyis nyag phra ba bzhin gyur/ smos ma zag pa'i bla rabs rnams kyi dus dge 'dun khri phrag bco brgyad du longs pa'i bstan pa dang rgyas byung zhing rgyu mtshan nyid kyi bshad gra dang 'chad nyan kyang
283b6(1): yod par 'dug cing / slob gra dang bsgom gra sogs so sor byung / mdor na shar rgyal mo rong / lho tsha ba rong dang mon/ nub kong po sogs dang dbus gtsang man chad du snga 'gyur gyi bstan pa bshad sgrub gnyis
284a1(1): ka'i phyogs nas khyab che bas dbus gtsang du bar skabs su mdo dang sgyu 'phrul sems phyogs sogs kyi bstan pa nyag phra bar gyur pa'ang 'di ga'i rgyun gyis gsos shing deng sang gi bar du dbang gi
284a2(1): chu bo dang / bshad pa'i srol/ man ngag gi rgyun/ lung gi brgyud pa rnams ma chad par yod pa 'di ka yin no// de'ang 'dus pa mdo dang sgyu 'phrul gnyis kyi dbang lung man ngag brgyud pa'i chu bo bab lugs
284a3(1): phyogs gcig ni/ dam gtsang byams gsum nas/ tsa sde spyan snga ba nam mkha' rdo rje/ drung thugs rje ye shes/ ston pa dbang 'byor/ rje btsun dpal 'bar ba nam mkha' rdo rje/ ston pa mgon rgyal/ yang khrod tshul
284a4(1): khrims rgyal mtshan/ bra'o chos kyi 'bum pa/ bu 'bor ba mkhas grub ye shes rgyal mtshan/ bzhag bla mkhas grub ye shes 'bum pa/ de las mon kaHthog pa bsod nams rgyal mtshan/ kaHthog pa rnam grol
284a5(1): bzang po/ kaHthog pa chos kyi seng ge lha bro ba chos kyi dbang po nas rim par/ rje sman lung pa blo mchog rdo rje nas deng sang gi bar du rgyun ma chad par byung ba yin no// yang mdo dbang khams lus zhes pa ni/
284a6(1): bar skabs der/ sgrol chen bsam 'grub rdo rjes/ zur yang dben pa shAkya 'byung gnas lcam sring gnyis la gnang ba las/ zur mo dge 'dun 'bum las brgyud pa ste/ zur mo 'di don la rang bzhin gyi rnal
284b1(1): 'byor ma yin mod/ rnam pa gzhon dus nas 'khor ba'i skyon dang bral bas sku btsun/ bskyed rdzogs gsum ka la sbyangs pas mthar so na/ gnas lugs rtogs shing ting 'dzin gyi sgo du ma las dbang 'byor pas
284b2(1): mkhas shing grub pa mo chen mo gyur te nyang smad rtse rgyal gyi sgom khang du bzhugs nas 'gro ba'i don mdzad/ des yang dben gsang sngags gling pa zur ston shAkya bshes gnyen la dbang bskur/ des kaHthog gi
284b3(1): mkhas grub bra'o chos 'bum la/ des bshes gnyen dkon mchog bzang po des kaHthog pa rmog ston rdo rje dpal bzang po la dbang bskur/ 'dis glan lugs kyi dbang cho ga du ma du ma khrig nyid gzhir byas pa
284b4(1): la 'gos rtsi lung pa'i phyag bzhes gro ston dpal ldan grags kyi cho ga khrigs kyis kyang brgyan/ sgyu 'phrul zhi khro dang sems sde a don bco brgyad kyi sgos bka' yang sbyar te dbang mchog sbrang rtsi'i chu rgyun mdzad//
284b5(1): mdzad pa po 'chi med kyis brnyes pa'i rig 'dzin grub par grags shing skyes mchog dam pa yin nges su ma zad/ skul ba po'ang bshes gnyen 'gran zla dang bral ba mang pos mdzad pas 'gangs che zhing / sgrub
284b6(1): rdzas thun mong bco lnga'i dbang gnyal ba'i cho ga khrigs su cad pa 'dir 'byung ba dang / sgyu 'phrul zhi ba'i zab dbang gsum gyi bka' dbus gtsang du bar skabs su chad pa kaHthog lugs 'dir bzhugs pas
285a1(1): sos shing / sems sde a don bco brgyad kyi dbang rkun 'dis bzung bas bstan rgyun la phan pa chen po'i sgor gyur pa yin no// rmog ston gyis byang chub sems dpa' chen po dar lung pa rdo rje rnam
285a2(1): rgyal/ des khyung tshang pa 'khrul zhig blo gros dpal ldan la/ des dbang ston karma gu ru la/ des sngags 'chang kun bzang dpal 'byor la/ des gsang bdag phrin las lhun grub la/ des dwags ston chos rgyal
285a3(1): bstan 'dzin la dbang skur zhing / des gter chen chos kyi rgyal po 'gyur med rdo rje la khams lugs brgyud pa'i chu bo bab pa yin no// yang rog shes rab 'od las kyang mdo sgyu'i bshad bka' shin tu dar ba
285a4(1): byung ste/ shes rab 'od 'dis dang por rog ston btsan po la so lugs kyi mdo dang sgyu 'phrul dang sems phyogs gsan/ lhab dris ma gong pa la mdo dang sgyu 'phrul skyo lugs/ lhab kyi zur chos pa slob dpon yam
285a5(1): chos dngos grub la mdo dang / sgyu 'phrul zur lugs/ yang sgro phug pa'i slob ma gnubs ston/ des kha rag snying po/ des yam shud/ yang kha rag snying pos sras pad+ma 'bar/ des rog shes rab/ yang / so dar ma
285a6(1): seng ge la sgyu 'phrul mtshan mang zhes sngar mtshan bus Ti ka 'chad pa'i srol yod pa de gsan/ yang chu bar gyi glan shAkya bzang po las brgyud pa dang / lha rje nya ri ba'i slob ma nyang nag mdo bo las brgyud pa ste/
285b1(1): mdor na bla ma 'dis lugs tha dad pa mang po gsan cing / sgyu 'phrul gzhi lam 'bras gsum gyi stong thun dang / lam rnam bkod kyi Ti ka brtsams/ des ste mdo thams cad gzigs pa zhes grags par bshad
285b2(1): cing / des kyang snying thig dang / lam rnam bkod la mtshan bu zhib par mdzad/ rog gi gdung brgyud rnams la'ang dbang dang rgyud kyi bshad pa shin tu dar bar byung ngo // de bzhin du gtsang stod mang dkar du
285b3(1): yang stod zur pa zhes grags pa rim par byung nas bshad sgrub legs par mdzad/ des la stod lho byang thams cad du'ang me mched pa bzhin gyur pas/ byang du me ston 'byung gnas 'od ces pa dang / snar
285b4(1): ston seng ge 'od ces pa dang / byang tar la mo pa yon tan dbang phyug ces bya ba la sogs pa'i bshad pa yang tho re long yod la// gzhan yang ngan phag tu sgyu 'phrul gyi bshad pa rim par byung bas rgyal ba klong
285b5(1): chen pas der gsan par mdzad do// da ni gangs ri'i khrod 'di tsam na phul du byung ba'i pan+di ta chen por grags pa rong pa chos kyi bzang po'i gtam brjod pa la dran pa nye bar gzhag par bya ste/ de la rong
285b6(1): ban dpal gyi rin po che'i sras/ rong ba na rin chen tshul khrims zhes bya ba des rgyu'i dus kyi mngon byang lnga'i cho ga byas pa las/ phyogs kyi glang po'i shes rab/ dbyigs gnyen zhabs kyi thos pa/ tsan+da go mi'i
286a1(1): brjod pa/ chos kyi grags pa'i brgal brtag/ slob dpon dpa' bo'i rtsom pa ste/ phun sum tshogs pa lnga'i ngo bor byang chub pa'i skye ba'i myu gu gtsang smad ru lag gi sa'i cha snar lung rong du bzung
286a2(1): ngongo// de ni bstan pa snga dar gyi zhabs su slob dpon smr-i ti dz+nyA na kIrti zhes bya ba'i pan+di ta gcig byon nas mdo khams kyi sa'i char rgyud 'ga' zhig gi 'gyur yang bcos/ tha ga na'i mtshan brjod kyi 'grel pa la
286a3(1): sogs pa gsang sngags kyi 'grel pa dang / 'jam dpal gsang ldan la sogs pa'i sgrub thabs mang por bsgyur/ sgra'i bstan bcos 'ga' zhig kyang mdzad nas myang ngan 'das pa gang gi de ma thag pa'i sku skye ba
286a4(1): yin par grags/ bka' 'gyur mdo mangs kyi lung rgyun la smr-i ti dang breng chags su 'dren pa ni dpyad gzhir 'dug/ yang a tsa ra phra la ring mo zhes bya ba'i pan+di ta gcig khams su byon/ gsang ba 'dus pa'i rgya
286a5(1): cher 'grel pa la sogs bskur bshad mdzad nas 'das pa de nyid kyi skye ba yin par yang grags/ sku gzhon nu nas lhun gyis grub pa'i shes rab chen po mnga' bas nyang smad du 'gar ston tshul khrims bzang po
286a6(1): la gsan pa mdzad/ yab kyis rgyags skyel du byon pas/ mched grogs dag na re/ khyed kyi bu 'di blo bred/ tho tso che bas nged cag kyang sun par byed na da res 'khrid par 'thad ces zer/ yab kyis slob dpon
286b1(1): la khong rnams de skad mchid na 'khrid par bya'am zhus pas/ 'gar ston chen pos/ de skad ma zer/ chos thams cad khos go nas yod pa yin gsung skad/ lo bcu gcig pa la mtshan nyid gsan/ chos dpar la
286b2(1): byis pa'i rtse sar yang slob dpon gyi gsung tshad shar re 'ong bas/ chos thams cad tshar re gsan pa kho nas tshigs gcig kyang ma nor bar thugs su chud pas 'jam dpal gyi sprul par grags/ bcu gsum lon
286b3(1): pa'i tshe gsan pa rdzogs pa dang 'dra bar byung zhing / shes bya thams cad la ma rmongs pa byung / nyid kyi zhal nas kyang / bdag zos pa chung ba yang ma yin te/ chos thams cad ma zos pa med do// zos pa che ba yang
286b4(1): ma yin te chos thams cad tshar re las ma dgos so gsung skad/ skyes bu chen po 'di ni shes rab myur la zab pa/ rgya che la dri ma dang bral ba'i spobs pa mchog tu dge bas mdo rgyud dang bstan bcos la sogs
286b5(1): pa'i rgya gzhung ba rling po sngar ma gzigs pa mtha' dag tshar re re'am/ gnyis tshun chad gzigs pas tshig dang don gyi cha ma lus pa thams cad zugs la zin cing mi brjed pa'i gzungs thob par grags
286b6(1): pas/ thog ma nyid nas ha cang ma 'bad par saM skr-i ta dang / skad rigs kyi bye brag gzhan mang po la'ang ma rmongs shing / phyi nang gi rig pa'i gnas dang / gtsug lag thams cad la thogs pa med pa'i blo gros gyi
287a1(1): tsher ma rno bas/ bod kyi skad nyid la'ang 'di ni don 'di tsam la 'jug go zhes ston pa'i khyad par phra mo'ang gzhan las ches lhag/ tshad ma'i bstan bcos dang / rig byed kyi bstan bcos dang /
287a2(1): don du 'gyur ba'i tshigs bcad dang / snyan dngags la sogs pa'ang dbyug pa can gyi gzhung kho na la ma ltos par rig pa de ston pa'i gzhung lugs rgya chen po mang po'i don mkhyen pa yin/ byis pa'i dus a tsa ra
287a3(1): 'dug tshad la dgyes shing de dag dang brda' 'phrod pas bi brta'i pu ta la brtags pa tsam gyis mkhyen pa la tshegs ma byung / za na dud 'gro'i brda' dang skad kyi rim pa'ang mkhyen par grags/ sgra sgo la sogs
287a4(1): pa'i 'grel pa dang bstan bcos kyang mang du mdzad/ blo gros kyi mthu bsam gyis mi khyab pas spyir chos la mos pa'i mi rnams dang / chos kyi gang zag dang / khyad par du rdo rje theg pa la zhugs shing / gsang
287a5(1): sngags kyi las dang dngos grub sgrub par 'dod pa dag la phan gdags pa'i dgongs pa zab mo mnga' bas/ phyin ci ma log pa'i gdams pas nan tan tu 'doms shing phan thogs par mdzad/ mngon par shes
287a6(1): pa'i cha dang ldan zhing sems can 'dul ba'i dus dang gnas skabs mkhyen pas/ 'gro ba phal pa blo bsgyur shing / chos la gnas pa rnams de'i 'gal zlar gyur pa las ldog pa'i phyir/ 'byar zhing 'grig pa'i
287b1(1): bstan bcos zhal sgo'i chu skyes las phyung ste phan 'dogs pa la rtag tu skyo ba mi mnga'/ chos kyis blo ma bsgyur ba'i tha mal ba dag la ser sna spangs nas bdog pa gtong ba dang / log sgrub bzod pas snying rje'i
287b2(1): yul du mdzad nas zhi bde la 'god/ sdom pa'i gnas dang thugs dam la nor bu rin po che dang srog gi dbang po ltar gces spras mdzad cing gzhan yang de la 'god/ dam pa'i chos rtsom pa na glegs bam bsdu
287b3(1): zhing gzigs pa la sogs pa'i rtogs dpyod kyi sgro 'dogs mi dgos par/ chos kyi tshig don la thogs drug med par 'jug pa'i spobs pa'i gter chen po brgyad grol zhing bstan bcos rnams kyang don bzang
287b4(1): po/ tshig 'bru bzang po/ brjod pa ma 'dres pa sha stag 'byung bas/ ston pa drang srong chen po'i gsung gi gsang ba dang rjes su mthun pa'i phyir gzhan mkhas par grags pa gang gis kyang rtsod mi nus shing / des
287b5(1): mdzad pa'i gsang sngags kyi man ngag rnams la slob pa'i rgyud du byung ba'i gang zag/ lung ma thob kyang yi ge las byung ba bzhin sbyar ba las byin rlab ma byung ba med ces grags pas bde bar gshegs pa'i sprul
287b6(1): pa'i sku nyid du'ang gleng / gnas lnga rig pa'i pan+di ta mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa jo bo a ti sha dang bdag nyid chen po 'di mjal ba'i tshe/ jo bo'i zhal nas/ rgya gar gyi A tsar+ya nag po spyod pa de nyid tshe
288a1(1): 'phos pa jo bo 'di kho na yin te/ kho bos 'di dang chos gtam bya ba ga la thub ces rtsod med du grags par gsungs/ spyir gtam du'ang / 'dul ba mtshur ston dbyig gi mkhas// cho ga
288a2(1): sgrigs bzangs kyi ye grags mkhas// sgra dang tshad ma rong pa mkhas// thams cad 'dzom pa a pho rang // chos grags rang zer skad/ spyir bla ma mang po las mdo sngags so so'i brgyud pa'i bring chags mthud pa
288a3(1): tsam yod mod kyi/ khyad par du snga 'gyur rdo rje theg pa'i chos skor las/ slob dpon chen po pad+ma'i gdams pa rnams ni sna nam rdo rje bdud 'joms/ mkhar chen dpal gyi dbang phyug/ dom a tsa ra dpal me
288a4(1): tog/ sgro rdo rje gzhon nu/ zhang zhung yon tan grags/ rong ban yon tan/ rog ban tshul khrims rin po che las nyid kyis gsan to// be ro tsa na'i man ngag rnams/ be ros g.yu sgra/ des bla chen dgongs pa
288a5(1): gsal/ des grum shing glag can/ des gnubs dpal brtan/ des ya zi bon ston/ des kun mkhyen rong zom la bshad de sems sde'i brgyud pa gcig go/ yang klong thang sgrol mar a ro ye shes 'byung gnas
288a6(1): zhes bya ba'i grub pa'i skyes bu zhig byung ste/ de la rgya gar bdun brgyud dang / rgya'i slob dpon bdun brgyud kyi gdams pa mnga' zhing // des cog ro zangs dkar mdzod khur dang / ya zi bon ston/ des nyid
288b1(1): la'o// 'di la rdzogs chen khams lugs shes zer/ yang bi ma las nyang ting 'dzin bzang po la gsungs pa dang / bi ma las rma rin chen mchog dang / gnyags dz+nyA na ku mA ra la gsungs pa'i man ngag
288b2(1): kyang // gnyis kas khu byang chub 'od/ khyung po dbyig 'od la brgyud nas rim gyis rong zom la mnga' bas gsang sngags snga 'gyur gyi bstan pa'i bdag po 'gran zla spangs pa zhig ste 'di nyid la'ang bstan pa'i chu
288b3(1): mgo gcig gnas so// gsang snying 'grel pa rong lugs kyi mgor/ dkon mchog gsum gyi rang bzhin byang chub sems// zhes yod pas dkon cog 'grel zhes ming du thogs la/ kun mkhyen chen po'i 'grel
288b4(1): pa phyogs bcu mun sel theg rgyal gyi lugs su bkral zhing zhal gsal/ kun mkhyen rong pa'i 'grel pa 'di dbyings che bar bkral bas sgrom che zhing kha dam par snang ste/ bod 'grel gyi gtso bo 'di gnyis yin
288b5(1): pas shes na blo gros la nus pa chen po ster ba yin no// deng sku gzhon nu'i tshe mdo ston seng ge bya ba la snga 'gyur gsan pa'i tshe/ re zhig na mnal lam du/ gsang ba snying pos zan byas/ sangs rgyas mnyam sbyor
288b6(1): gyi tshod ma byas nas gsol gyin 'dug pa rmis/ de slob dpon la brjod pas/ shin tu ngo mtshar che/ chos de khong du chud pa'i rtags yin/ khyod kyis 'grel pa re gyis gsung skad/ der bla ma'i dgongs pa rdzogs
289a1(1): par bya ba'i phyir/ bslab pa rin po che gsum la brten pa'i man ngag gsum mdzad de/ lhag pa tshul khrims kyi bslab pa'i don gyi nges brjod dam tshig mdo rgyas/ lhag pa ting nge 'dzin gyi bslab pa
289a2(1): ston pa 'grel pa tshul bzhi yan lag bco lnga pa/ lhag pa shes rab gyi bslab pa ston pa rdzogs pa chen po'i lha sgom man ngag/ mnyam sbyor gyi 'grel pa/ de bzhin du ngan song sbyong rgyud/ 'jigs byed la
289a3(1): sogs pa'i 'grel pa dang man ngag mang po/ de dag gi nang nas kyang theg pa chen po'i tshul la 'jug pa'i bstan bcos la sogs pa gzhung gting zab la go don slongs che ba brjod kyis mi lang ba dang / mdor na
289a4(1): mdo sde dang / rgyud sde dang / bstan bcos kyi bye brag la thugs su mi chud pa bya ba shes bya la srid pa ma gyur pas thams cad mkhyen pa'i gnas la rang gir mdzad de za na 'jig rten pa'i zhing las dang / phyugs
289a5(1): skyong ba dang / dkar she ji ltar bsgrub pa tshun chad kyi bstan bcos kyang mdzad pas/ dus de'i tshe bod ru bzhi'i mkhas pa thams cad kyi dang por brtsad pa'i bya ba lhags pa'ang / slar slob dpon chos kyi grags
289a6(1): pa'i brtul bzhugs kyis gang dang gang gi spobs pa'i 'khri shing nyam nyes par byas nas nga rgyal gyi gdeng ka la brkyang nul bya ba'i skabs byung ba yin te/ 'di ltar shab kyi yang mkhyen bla ma/ mar pa do pa/ 'u
289b1(1): yug pa mda' ston/ mdo'i khyung po hUM snying / se khrom rgya mtsho 'bar/ mtshams ston go cha/ spang ka dar chung / 'gos lhas btsas/ rgya rgyal tshul la sogs pa'i mkhas pa thams cad kyis bod du skyes pa'i gang zag
289b2(1): gis bstan bcos 'di tsam rtsom pa zhes dpyas gdags/ sun 'byin pa'i rig pa bsams te/ khyu mchog rwa brdar ba la phyogs pa bzhin du skyes bu chen po de'i gam du song song ba na/ lung gi 'thad pa dang /
289b3(1): rig pas dpyad bzod pa dang / gtan tshigs dang bla mas nye bar bstan pa dang mi 'gal zhing sgra skyon dang / don skyon la sogs kyi 'gal zla'i phyogs thams cad rnam par spangs pa'i mkhyen rabs kyi spobs
289b4(1): pas tshar bcad/ bstan bcos re mthong zhing / de'i don la ro myangs pas thams cad ngo mtshar skyes nas bsti stang du mdzad/ ri mor mdzad/ bla mar mdzad pa sha stag yin zhes grags/ de skad du go rub lo tsA ba
289b5(1): dge slong chos kyi shes rab ces bya ba thos pa mang po'i gzungs 'dzin pa de nyid kyis kyang dang por dpyas gdags/ bar du bla ma rong pas mdzad pa'i theg pa chen po'i tshul la 'jug pa'i po ti gzigs pas gus
289b6(1): pa chen po skyes/ tha mar zang zing mang pos bsnyen bkur te mi 'chab par byas nas/ rjes su gzung bar gsol ba btab/ 'jam dpal gsang ba'i rgyud la sogs pa'i chos mang du gsan/ gsang rgyud kyi skabs
290a1(1): na mar pan+di ta chen po'i zhal nas/ 'o skol la da lta rgya dpe yod par gyur na 'di ltar 'gro ba yin te/ rgya dpe med pas da lta bcos su med gsungs pa la/ go rub lo tsA bas de blo la bzung ste phyis
290a2(1): jo bo kr-iSh+Na zhes bya ba'i pan+di ta las rgya dpe byung nas de la mnyan pas/ rong pa pan+di ta'i gsung bzhin byung nas shin tu mos pa thob par gyur te/ kr-iSh+Na pa las byung ba'i rgya dpe gcig rong pa nyid la phul nas/ slar
290a3(1): yang gsan skad/ de bzhin du mar pa chos kyi dbang phyug la sogs pa'i lo tsA ba dang / mkhas par grags pa'i blo rtsal can mang pos kyang zhabs la btud/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po many+dzu shrI warma dang / many+dzu shrI dz+nyA na
290a4(1): dang / u pA ya shrI mi tra dang / bud+d+ha A kar b+ha dra dang / de bA ka ra tsan+da dang / pa ra me shwa dang / a mo g+ha badz+ra la sogs pa pan+di ta mang po bsten nas/ de dag gi lo tsA ba mdzad de/ rdo rje 'jigs byed dang / gshin
290a5(1): rje dgra nag gi rgyud dang / 'jam dpal gsang ldan dang / bde mchog rtsa rgyud la sogs pa mang du bsgyur/ 'gyur shin tu bzang bas gsang 'gyur gyi dper 'os/ rgya gar gyi pan+di ta kun na re/ d+harma b+ha dra khyod chos
290a6(1): mang po rtsoms la 'gro ba rnams skyobs shig/ khyod kyi yon tan gzhan lta zhog/ sgra tshad kyi lugs 'di'i gsum cha tsam las mi shes pas kyang rgya gar na chos rtsom pa yin na/ khyod ci'i phyir mi brtsam zhes gsungs
290b1(1): skad/ de lta bu'i yon tan phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan yang / gcom bsnyungs pa dang / khengs pa snyol pa lhur mdzad pas/ rgyal ba klong chen pas rgya 'grel las mngon par 'phags par brjod pa'i rang nyid kyi
290b2(1): 'grel pa bzang po dkon mchog 'grel lta bu'i gsham du'ang / mkhas dang 'phags chen rnams kyis mdzad pa'i gzhung la'ang / sgro skur dpyad par byed na bdag gzhung cis mi smos/ zhes 'phags chen lag na
290b3(1): rdo rjes bsdus pa'i rgyud la'ang mun pas sprul pa'i shes rab kyis gzhung brtag byed pa yod na/ bdag gi 'grel pa smos ci 'tshal zhes slob dpon zhi ba lha'i rnam par thar par bskyangs nas ngang gis dge ba byang
290b4(1): chub sems dpa' spyod pa can du ston/ grub pa'i rnam thar la gzhal na/ brag chen gzar po me long lta bu'i ngos la'ang rdzu 'phrul gyi spyod pas gshegs pa dang / brag la phur pa 'debs pa dang / nam mkha'
290b5(1): la 'phur ba dang / bod kyi lha 'dre phal mo che'i gnas dang spyod pa thugs su chud pa'i mngon par mkhyen pas mnga' ba sogs mang du yod mod kyi/ 'di lta bu'i lta ba mchog tu gyur cing / so so yang dag rig bzhi'i
290b6(1): sa thob pa dag la skye bo phal pa yid brtan par byed pa'i mngon rtags gyi na ba yi ge'i lam du 'dren pa ngo mtshar ba ma yin no// de ltar sprul pa'i skur rtsod pa med pa'i pan+di ta chen po de la gnas skabs de tsam
291a1(1): byon pa'i mkhas pa thams cad kyi mngon par bstod cing spyi bos btud par gyur la/ dgung lo brgya dang bcu dgu bzhugs te sku la snun pa med pa'i ngang nas gshegs par grags/ bod gangs can
291a2(1): gyi rgyud 'dir 'di dang mnyam pa'i mkhas pa ni su yang ma byung zhes 'gos lo chen pos kyang bsngags shing yongs su grags pa'o// rjes su slob pa la sras brgyud dang slob brgyad gnyis las/ dang po ni/ sras
291a3(1): gzi brjid 'bar/ 'bum 'bar gnyis las sras brgyad yun ring po'i bar byung ba kun kyang rdo rje phur pa las dngos grub brnyes pa sha stag yin/ slob brgyad ni/ go rub lo tsA ba dang / mar pa do pa/ 'gos la
291a4(1): sogs pa'i lo tsA ba chen po bcu bdun/ g.yag rdo rje 'dzin pa la sogs te grub thob chen po sum cu rtsa lnga/ ma gcig zha ma'i ming po rje 'khun bu pa la sogs pa sgom chen rnal 'byor gyi dbang po brgya brgyad cu/
291a5(1): yol ba'i lcags dge bsnyen rdo rje dbang phyug dang / yang khyer bla ma la sogs pa gdugs thogs pa lnga brgya la sogs pa'o// // de ltar sngon rabs pa rnams kyi yi dam kyi gtso bor yang phur kho nas bzung ba
291a6(1): yin pas yang dag gi skor des shes la/ rdo rje phur pa ji ltar dar ba'i gtam cung zad brjod de/ de la rigs 'dzin gyi slob dpon u rgyan gyi mkhan po pad+ma sam+b+ha wa'i zhabs la brgyud de/ phur pa rgyal po lugs
291b1(1): su grags pa dang / jo mo lugs dang / lcags lugs dang / yang sna nam mam rong lugs dang / lha nag dang / lha khra ste sku mdog las grags pa sogs rnam grangs tha dad mod/ de dag kyang ngo bo gcig la man
291b2(1): ngag gi ldog cha dang / bka' babs kyi khyad par las de dang der grags pa'o// de la dang po ni bsam yas 'byongs nas slob dpon chen pos btsan po khri srong lde'u btsan dang jo mo mkhar chen bza' dang / spyan
291b3(1): 'dren pa mi gsum la gnang bas de skad du grags// // jo mo lugs ni/ slob dpon gshegs khar nyung la 'dus pa phur pa rtsa ba'i dum bu stod las byang chub sgrub pa dang / smad las dmod pa lam khyer bcud
291b4(1): du dril ba 'di jo mo mkhar chen bza' la gsungs/ des lho phyogs mon kha sna rings seng ge rdzong gi brag phug tu mtshan ma rdzas kyi dkyil 'khor zhal phye nas bsgrubs pas zhag nyer gcig na phur bu thams cad
291b5(1): bzhad cing / 'od 'phro ba dang / 'phar g.yo byed pa dang / der jo mo'i dgongs pa la/ phur pa grub na gdab las bya/ zer ba yin te dngos la gdab pa'i yul du gyur pa ni med 'on kyang pha mes kyi za 'drel
291b6(1): gdab bo snyam du dgongs nas bsnyen phur dril bas/ phur pa nam mkha' la deng de song / pha yul gyi khang ltag na pha mes kyi za 'drer gyur pa zhig gnas pa'i rten skyer ba'i phung po'i steng du babs nas/ skyer phung
292a1(1): / tshigs/ za 'dre mnyam pa nyid kyi glong du bsgral/ slar phur pa de jo mo'i dpon brgyud rnams kyis bcangs/ gdengs pa tsam gyis chog pa byung bas/ mkhar chen bza' 'dre 'dul gyi brgyud par grags/
292a2(1): jo mor rang gi ming po mkhar chen dpal gyi dbang phyug la bshad nas rim par dar ro// // lcam lugs su grags pa ni/ cog ro bzas slob dpon dngos la thugs kyang / dbang bla ma la ma zhus yi dam la
292a3(1): zhus pas yid dam slob dpon gyi thugs kar bsdus te dbang skal chad/ slar jo mo 'tsho rgyal la rjes su gnang nas jo mos cog ro bza' la gdams pa las brgyud pa'o// // yang / sna nam lugs su
292a4(1): grags pa ni rong zom chen po las brgyud pa'i lugs kho na ste brgyud pa sngar bshad ma zag pas shes la/ 'dir kha cig tu/ rong zom chen po'i mes po rong ba na yon tan rin chen nam/ dpal gyi rin chen des
292a5(1): smon dpon chen po dngos la thug/ dgung lo sum brgya 'tsho zhes zer/ de'i sras rong pa pan+ti ta'i yab rin chen tshul khrims kyis kyang lo phyed gnyis brgyar bzhugs pa las brgyud pas rong lugs zhes bshad pa
292a6(1): yin par shes so// // phur pa lha nag tu grags pa ni/ u rgyan yab yum nas 'bre a tsa ra sa le/ lang lab byang chub rdo rje nas rim par/ yar 'brog pa gu rub yang dag ces bya bas phur pa mya ngan las
292b1(1): 'das pa'i rgyud la brten nas lha thams cad nag por mdzad pas de ltar grags la/ 'di la 'bre a tsa ra sa le byas na lam lab kyi bar dang de gnyis phyi thag ring bas brgyud pa ltag mi 'phrod 'bre a tsa ra nu ru
292b2(1): zhes bya bas tshe'i grub pa thob pa yin ces zer ba'ang 'dug ste/ ming gi khyad par du byas kyang 'gal ba ni chung mod/ 'on kyang bla ma 'phags pa rin po che la smad las sgrol dbang gi rgyun ma rnyed nas/ sprang po la
292b3(1): 'dug kyang zhu'o zhes btsal bas/ 'tsho rgyal gyi dngos slob a tsa ra gu ru bya ba tshe'i rig 'dzin thob pa zhig bsil ba tshal la sogs pa'i gnas nges med du rgyu ba la yod zer ba zos/ der glo bo lo tsA ba la
292b4(1): gser mang po bskur nas sgrol dbang gi rgyun thob pa yin ces zer ro// // phur pa sa lugs su grags pa ni/ slob dpon chen po pad+ma'i zhabs kyi slob ma 'khon klu'i dbang po las rim par brgyud de/ chos
292b5(1): dang rigs brgyad gnyis ka zam ma chad pas sa smra ba rnams la grags pas de skad du grags pa'o// // yang phur pa gsang ba'i rgyud la brten pa phur pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / gsang ba'i rgyud drug dang /
292b6(1): lA ya tan+da bcu gnyis nas bsdus pa gsham sngon can gyi skor gnyags las brgyud tshul sngar bshad zin to// de lta bu'i yi dam las mngon rtags brnyes pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhig byung bas thams cad
293a1(1): bsnyad par mi nus la/ khyad par du gyur pa la lang lab byang chub rdo rje zhes bya ba de gzhon nu nas pha ma dang bral/ pha tshan rnams kyis rje btsun mi la la ji ltar byas pa bzhin du shin tu nyam zag
293a2(1): par gyur pas/ 'bre a tsa ras thugs kyis ma bzod nas phur pa'i man ngag las gnad du zab pa'i skor byin te sgrub pa byas nas pa spun rnams rtsad bcad/ de la grags pa chen po 'phel na'ang sngon gyi sbyin
293a3(1): 'bras dbul bas 'khor re'i lug rdzi byed cing yod tsa na/ dge bshes rwa lo tsA ba de mnga' thang dang 'byor pa shin tu rgyas/ bod kyi bla dpon che dgus dbang med du 'dud dgos pa yin/ de ltar ma bgyis na/
293a4(1): khong gis gshin rje'i drag sngags kyis sgrol bar grags/ de la dum pa rgya zhang khrom gyi gshin rje'i skor rdza'i zom gang gter nas phyung ste/ tshe bdag sdig pa snyings 'dzings la sogs pa phyed tsam las ma bshus pa
293a5(1): rnams/ rA lo'i sngun du son pas/ rang nyid kyi gshed skor la lhan thabs su byas/ de la rgya gar gyi khungs dang 'gyur bcos/ de bzhin du bum thang gi gter kha mang po'i khrod nas kyang mthu gtad ser gsum/
293a6(1): rnam sras/ dzam b+ha la/ tshogs bdag la sogs pa man ngag zab dgu byung bas gsar 'gyur gyi gshin rje las mtha' mang la myur bar song / mar pa'i sras dar ma mdo sde la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa'
293b1(1): bcu gsum dang / gnyen lo tsA ba sogs rang mnyam gyi lo tsA ba bcu gsum bsgral ba'i sngags mkhan de/ 'khor re'i sar chos 'khor la byon pas lang lab kyis phyag ma btsal/ mi blun po gcig yin par
293b2(1): 'dug dgongs pa la/ slar lang lab kyi mtshan nyid thos nas/ 'o na kho la do nub gyi tshe las med kyi spur zer/ drag shul gyi las brtsams pas/ dgug 'dren gyi bden bdar dang po'i tshe khong dpon slob la
293b3(1): rtsang phur gyi char babs nas/ thozo phyi'i gra pa rnams smas/ bar pa la phyogs bcu khro bo'i dkyil 'khor za gsod dang bcas pa'i lcags phur gyi char babs/ tha ma'i tshe me dpung dang 'ur sgras gang ste nam mkha' la
293b4(1): bltas pas/ lcags bsregs lta bu'i rdo rje gzhon nu ri do chad tsam pa rA lo'i thog tu rngams rngams 'cha' 'cha' ltar 'dug pas skrag par gyur te/ bzod gsol byas/ phyag dang 'bul bas bsnyen bkur/
293b5(1): gshin rje mkhan po phur pa la rdugs zer ba de nas byung / phur pa'i stod las la dngos grub brnyes pa mang du byung ste/ smad las la rtsal shugs 'di las thon pa ma byung bar grags/ de la slob ma'i gtso bor gyur
293b6(1): pa sna nam shes rab tshul khrims/ mong dgu'i skyi gyang sgyel/ rog gi skra phur bu mgo/ 'u yug rol po'i nyang nag go/ de la skyi gyang skye la/ skyi ba na byang chub rin chen bya ba'i khang zhing dang nor rnams pha spun gyis
294a1(1): 'phrogs/ skyo ba shin tu 'phel te lang lab la phur pa zhus pas zla ba dgur lha bsnyen gyis/ de nas bse lcags shel gsum la zla ba gnyis sgrubs shig/ don 'grub po gsungs/ de ltar byas
294a2(1): pas nus pa tshad du phyin/ byang gi drung na mi mang po nyi ma 'de zhing 'dug pa la bltas pas/ thams cad dgra ru ma gyur pa mi 'dug nas/ phur pa gyang la bsdigs pas gyang 'gyel/ thams cad phyi ma'i lam du
294a3(1): bkod pas skyi gyang skyel du grags pas mtshon nus pa can sha stag byung ste yi ger brir mi lang / lar phur pa 'di nus pa mchog tu che bar grags pas/ slob dpon chen pos tsan+dan gyi nags la me shor ba la
294a4(1): gdengs pas nags sor chud/ bi ma las gang+gA gyen du 'phyar ba la gdengs pas gang+gA yan man du chad/ bal po shrI la many+dzus brag mkhar gong can la gdengs pas brag ri dum bur nyil/ jo mo mkhar chen
294a5(1): bzas sbyang ki'i rjes sa la btab pas sbyang ki rbab la 'dril/ me nu rgyal ba'i snying pos bya rog gis phreng ba khyer ba la bsdigs pas bya rog thang la lhung / lo dpal gyi blo gros kyis dmag gi sgra khyim la thebs
294a6(1): pas mon dmag cham la phebs/ de la sogs te dgra bgegs gnyis la thebs pas chos 'phrul stobs po che gang gis kyang rdzi bar ma nus/ nang du nyon mongs dug lnga la thebs pas mchog gi dngos grub thob pa
294b1(1): dpag tu med pa byung ngo // // yang gter ma'i phyogs rang bzos ma bslad pa'ang shin tu mang mod de/ mngon rtags gsal ba slob dpon chen pos btsan po la dbang rgyud gdams pa dang bcas gnang
294b2(1): nas/ rta mgrin yang gsang gi chos skor dang lhan cig yer pa se ba lung gi brag la gter du gtams pa/ grub pa'i dbang phyug 'dar phya ru bas jo mo nag rgyal gyi phug pa gong mar bsgrub pa mdzad pas slob
294b3(1): dpon chen po dang dngos su mjal/ yer ba zla ba phug tu sgrubs shig gsungs pas de bzhin du mdzad/ der nang re bzhin slob dpon chen po nyi zer la chibs nas phebs te chos gsungs/ nub re bzhin srin po
294b4(1): 'dul du 'gro zhes nyi zer la bcibs te bzhud/ de'i tshe yer ba'i seb lung nas mtshan ma rdzas kyi phur pa gter nas phung / lha sa'i tshong dus su phebs pa na/ rlung 'tshub chen pos khrom 'thor ba byung / de nas
294b5(1): gtsang du byon tsa na/ sa pa Na sgyid grong du 'byon pa dang gnas khar gcig tu 'dzom/ 'dar phyar zhal 'chos pas A~M badz+ra kyi li kyi li ya zhes bgrags pas sa pa Na gyis/ de ma dag/ badz+ra ki li kI la ya zer ba
294b6(1): yin gsungs/ der 'dar phyar thugs yus nas/ sngags ma dag kyang 'di bzhin byed pa yin gsungs nas brag la phur pa zam tha ma brgyab pas 'jim pa la byas pa bzhin song / slar phur pa tshul la gcus
295a1(1): gyin zin pas dpal nas cung zad gas/ der sa paN gyis grub thob tu shes nas/ nga mu stegs pa dang rtsod du 'gro bas de'i rim gror 'byon dgos gsungs/ rung gsungs nas lhan cig tu byon//
295a2(1): sgyid sgong du phebs pa na/ rgya gar gyi lugs bzhin bstan pa gang rgyal ba'i ru mtshon du btsugs/ sa paN dang 'phrog byed dga' bo gnyis nyi ma bcu gsum gyi bar rtsod pa'i g.yul ngo la zhugs pas/ mthar sa
