295a3(1): paN rtsod pa las rgyal yang / grub rtags 'gran zer 'phrog byed dga' bo nang pa'i bstan pa la 'jug tu ma nyan/ des mu stegs des ral pa rgyab tu bsgyur/ lag pa gshog pa ltar byas te nam mkha' la 'phur
295a4(1): bas/ sa paN gyis rigs sngags kyi mthu las gzhan gyis mi thul bar gzigs te badz+ra kyi li kyi la rgyugs shog ces 'dar phyar pos/ der rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos mu stegs kyi grib ma'i snying gar/ oM
295a5(1): badz+ra kyi li kyi lA ya oM phaT/ ces phur pa btab pas/ mu stegs pa bya la rdo btags pa bzhin du sa la lhungs/ de nas sa paN gyis rtsod pa las rgyal ba'i dpa' rtags su 'phrog byed dga' bo rab tu ma byung bar
295a6(1): khrid byon pa na/ slob dpon chen pos bod la mu stegs bsrung bar bka' bsgos pas brtan ma bcu gnyis kyi chad pas bcad de skyid grong dang bod kyi so mtshams su mu stegs de kha nas khrag skyugs nas lnga pa'i
295b1(1): lam du btang / lar phyi rol pa'i grub mtha' 'dzin pa tsam bod la bltar mi mngon par lhags srid kyi/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la dngos kyi rgol ba byed nus pa'i blo stobs can mi 'ongs pa yin/ 'dis mus
295b2(1): srad du byon nas gtsug lag khang gi rten gtsor phur pa 'di bzhag/ slar rim gyis gyur nas da lta se ra phur mjal zhes zer ba'i rgyun can 'di byung ngo // // da ni gter kha gong 'og gi gtam bshad par bya
295b3(1): ste/ rgya cher rol pa las/ brjed pa med pa dran pa'i gter dang / blo gros rab tu 'byed pas blo gros kyi gter dang / mdo sde thams cad kyi rnam pa khong du chud pas rtogs pa'i gter dang / thos pa thams cad
295b4(1): kun tu 'dzin pas gzungs kyi gter dang / legs par bshad pas sems can thams cad tshim par byed pas slobs pa'i gter dang / dam pa'i chos yongs su bsrung bas chos kyi gter dang / dkon mchog
295b5(1): gsum gyi rigs rgyun mi gcod pas byang chub kyi sems dang / mi skye ba'i chos la grub pa thob pas sgrub pa'i gter te/ gter chen po brgyad thob par 'gyur ro// zhes bshad pa'i gnas gang yin pa de gdod
295b6(1): nas sprul pa'i skur byang chub pa'i ye shes dam pa'i spyod yul du gyur la/ rnam pa tsam du yang rang don du mchog gi dngos grub chen po'i go 'phang la 'dzegs te/ gsad gsod dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi yan lag rgya mtsho
296a1(1): lta bu la dbang 'byor pas rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po'i sa la bzhugs shing / gzhan don du bstan pa'i bya ba bla na ma mchis pa dang / sems can gyi khams rgya mtsho lta bu 'dul ba'i thabs la

296a3(1): btags pa rnam pa thams cad pa'i cha la ni kho bo cag gis kyang dgag sgrub gnyis ka bya ba ma yin te/ rgyan las/ mi rigs pa yi gzugs la'ang mi rigs na/ the tshom za ba'i chos la smos ci 'tshal zhes dang /

296a5(1): byung yang des rnying ma'i bstan pa thams cad nyam nyes par mi blta ste/ dper na dge slong lha chen po dang / sde snod 'dzin pa gzhon nu sde bdud kyis khebs nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab chud gsan pa
296a6(1): lta bu'o// des na chos ma yin pa chos su brdzus pa'am/ gter ma yin pa gter mar brdzus pa de ka sde tshan gcig tu 'jog par 'os kyi/ gsang sngags kyi rgyud sde chen po'i brjod bya dang brjod don ma nor shing /
296b1(1): 'bras bu grub pa la bslu ba med pa 'di dag la sa chos dang rdo chos zhes skur ba byed pa ni bdud kyi las su 'gyur te bcom ldan 'das kyis/ bdag bstod gzhan la smod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni// bdud
296b2(1): kyis yongs su bslus shing blo chung rig par bya// zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro// de la lha btsad po khri srong lde btsan slar yang rang gi man ngag spel ba'i slad du byon pa mnga' bdag nyang nyi ma 'od zer ni/ yul lho
296b3(1): brag pa bltam shul ces bya bar/ yab nyang ston chos 'khor dang / yum pad+ma bde rtsal gyi sras su shing 'brug gi lo la bltams/ sku gzhon nu nas ngo mtshar bsam gyis mi khyab cing / mkha' 'gro ma rigs bzhi/
296b4(1): rje btsun sgrol ma/ thugs rje chen po/ slob dpon pad+ma la sogs pa'i zhal gzigs shing chos la bskul/ rang gi yab las gsan pa mang po mdzad/ dgung lo bcu gsum pa la thugs rje chen po dang phur pa grub
296b5(1): ste 'dzod phu'i brag la phyag zhabs kyi rjes dang / zangs kyi phur pas rta skad mngon sum du 'tsher ba byung / ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro mas brag rdo rje rtse lnga 'dra bar song zhig ces smra bo'i ri lung bstan/ 'jal 'dzin
296b6(1): rgyal sras/ kham bu yang le/ gu ru khro bo sogs las gsar rnying gi chos mang po dang / khyad par grub thob dngos grub las spyan ras gzigs dang / bka' brgyad bka' ma'i dbang lung yongs su rdzogs/ smra bo'i
297a1(1): ri la sgrub pa mdzad kyin yod tsa na/ bu ltos shig bya ba'i sgra zhig byung / bltas tsan rnal 'byor rus pa'i rgyan can zhig 'dug/ nang du bos nas tsha ba drangs pas de na re/ nga ni nam mkha'i rnal
297a2(1): 'byor pa// dbang phyug rdo rje bya ba yin// bu khyod las dang skal bar ldan// pad+mas dbang dang lung gi skyob// gsang sngags zab mo'i chos rnams kun// da lta mkha' 'gro'i lag na yod// gsol ba thob la myur du
297a3(1): longs// zhes kha byang yang gnad yig gsum gtad de 'ja' ltar yal gra pa mngon shes dang ra shag gter ston gyis kyang kha byang sprad/ khyad par mkha' 'gro ye shes 'tsho rgyal gyi sprul pas stag sgro chos gter
297a4(1): gyis gang ba gtad pas mkha' 'gro'i sgrub skor sogs man ngag mang po byung / mkho mthing gi gnas yig lha'i phyag mdzub chad pa tshong pas khyer te phul ba las sgrom sku sgrom smug gnyis nas bde gshegs 'dus
297a5(1): pa rgyal po'i bla dpe dang / rta mgrin/ bka' srung skor gyi mtshon te chos gter dang byin rlab kyi rten dpag tu med pa byon/ bde gshegs 'dus pa'i sman bsgrubs mdzad pas sman gyi lha mos a rur rlon pa phul/
297a6(1): ye shes mtsho rgyal dang dngos su mjal nas dngos grub ci 'dod gsungs pa la/ chos 'dod zhus pas mkha' 'gro lung bstan gyi skor dang zhu lan brgya rtsa'i dpe gtad/ dur khrod bsil ba'i tshal du mngon sum
297b1(1): par khrid nas/ der slob dpon chen po dang mjal/ bu tshangs pa lha'i me tog sleb bam gsungs nas keng rus kyi khri la bzhag/ sgrub chen dgu'i bka' spyi dang bye brag gi dbang thams cad rdzogs par gnang / yi
297b2(1): dam gyi lha dang gnyis su med par gyur nas chos skyong bran du 'khol/ phrin las nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam par song nas dus de tsa na gsang sngags 'chang ba'i gzugs su gnas pa gnyis lam du 'dri sbed pa
297b3(1): la'ang khyod cag gter kha gong 'og gang gi lugs yin zhes 'dri ba byung / bstan pa'i bya ba dang rdzu 'phrul gyi nus pa bsam gyis mi khyab ste rnam thar grags che bas 'di tsam gyis mtshon par nus/ slob ma ni//
297b4(1): gnyis grags rgyal/ zhig po bdud rtsi/ sras mi bskyod rdo rje/ sman 'on pa/ se ston khri mchog ste bka' babs kyi bu lnga/ sras chung ba mnga' bdag 'gro mgon nam mkha' dpal ni smin grol yongs rdzogs kyi
297b5(1): bka' babs gtad pa'i bstan pa'i bdag po yin/ dgung lo re dgu pa shing pho byi ba'i lo la rdzu 'phrul gyi bkod pa rgya chen po dang / khyad par thugs ka nas hrIHyig dkar po zhig bde ba can du gshegs par
297b6(1): bstan te sku'i bkod pa bsdus/ slar sku'i sprul pa rgya gar shar phyogs su bkod pa sna tshogs ston pa'i rnal 'byor pa gcig/ gsung gi sprul pa gu ru chos kyi dbang phyug/ thugs kyi sprul pa yul nyer bzhi la spyod
298a1(1): pa'i rnal 'byor pa gcig ste gsum cig car du 'byung bar lung bstan/ lo tsA ba chag gis gdung bzhugs me sbar bar ma nus/ slar ston pa mchog gi sku gdung bzhin me rang byung du 'bar/ de
298a2(1): las 'ja' tshon byung ba nub phyogs su zugs/ gdung khang na khye'u gzhon nu rus pa dang rin po che'i rgyan can ha ri ni sa sgrog pa mkha' 'gro ma mang po'i 'khor dang bcas pa kun gyis mthong / lha sa'i bcu
298a3(1): gcig zhal gyi thugs ka dang gdung khang gnyis 'ja' dkar pos tal mar 'brel ba byung / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs mi zad pa rgyan gyi 'khor lo'i yon tan grub pa'i rtags
298a4(1): su/ thugs ljags dang dbu skra la zhugs kyis za bar ma nus zhing / rten dang ril bsrel mtha' yas pa byon to// de nas sras 'gro mgon yab kyi dgongs pa rdzogs pa'i bya ba la zhugs te// sku'i rten rigs
298a5(1): gsum sems dpa' mi tshad dang mnyam pa ni pa la'i yul du bskrun nas spyan drangs/ gsung gi rten du mdo mangs dang rgud 'bum gser bris ma/ thugs kyi rten du skra 'bum mthong grol chen mo bzhengs/ rab tu
298a6(1): gnas pa la kha che'i bsod snyoms pa chen po ma hA pan+di ta shAkya shrI spyan drangs nas chos 'khor yang btsugs/ sras 'gro ba'i mgon po nyid kyi gtsug phud phul/ 'o na yang phrin las 'di ka che gsungs nas rab tu
298b1(1): 'byung bar ma gnang / gser ka To rang blugs pa'i 'bul ba dang zhabs tog gya nom pas bsti stang du byas/ slar pan+di ta gshegs nas kyang lho brag dang mon yul gyi 'du ba mang pos gser gyi 'bul ba rgya chen
298b2(1): po byung ba rnams khro phur 'bral du byon pas/ pan+di ta na re/ mchod gnas rang gnas su ldog nas kyang 'bral ba slar skyel ba jo sras mi bzang gsungs nas mnyes tshor chen po mdzad skad/ sras 'gro mgon
298b3(1): nyid spyan ras gzigs kyi sprul par lung bstan/ rdzu 'phrul shin tu che bas dgongs rdzogs su dmigs nas sham po'i mdun gyi rdo rnams nam mkha' la lug khru bzhin du ded/ gzhan gyi snang ngor gang nas byung cha
298b4(1): med par skyid chu'i 'gram du rdo skya chag gi chags pa la jo bo'i chur rags mdzad/ sngar rdo rnams rigs ma nor bar yod zer/ bal ris kyi thang ka thog tshad ma brgya dang brgyad kyang bzhengs/ mthu rtsal dang nus
298b5(1): pa shin tu che zhing chos skyong bran du 'khor bas thog ser la sogs pas sku dgrar gyur pa dag zla dus la mi ltos par nyi ma'i snga phyi las btsan thabs su brlags par mdzad pa sogs kyi lo rgyus du ma yod/ thugs
298b6(1): rje bsam gyis mi khyab pas gu ru chos dbang sogs sprul pa'i sku'i slob ma yang mang du byung / 'di'i sras mnga' bdag blo ldan 'jal dpal gyi sprul pa dang / de'i sras mnga' bdag bdud 'dul phyag rdor gyi sprul
299a1(1): pa ste/ nyang rin po che'i gdung rgyud la rigs gsum mgon po'i sprul pa 'byung bar lung bstan pa yin no// chos kyi brgyud pa la'ang sras brgyud dang slob brgyud gnyis ka'i lugs yod
299a2(1): do// // gter kha 'og mar grags pa'i bdag nyid chen po gu ru chos kyi dbang phyug gi gdung ni/ bstan pa snga dar gyi tshe bon gnya' rings bya bas btsan po khri srong la thog phab ste bgrod par khas blangs pa
299a3(1): na/ slob dpon pad+ma dang / bi ma la/ bai ro gsum ka'i slob mar gyur pa spang rje btsan khra bya ba'i sngags pa nus pa can zhig gis/ bon pos thog mda' lnga dus gcig phab pa sdigs mdzub kyis blangs te bon
299a4(1): po'i grong la rang gshed du btang nas brlags par byas/ btsan pos de la bu dga' chen po mdzad/ de la sras spang rig 'dzin snying po zhes bya ba zhig byung ste/ des yang 'dul gyi lha khang bzhi'i mchod gnyer
299a5(1): mdzad/ lo skor re la mchod pa la 'byon pa las kho mthing du byon pa'i tshe la yag rdza bar gyi dpon chen sprad pas nor gzhis mang du phul/ tshe snga ma'i yul yin gsungs nas bdag gir mdzad/ de'i sras kun
299a6(1): mkhyen shes rab rgyal po nas mkhyen ldan nus pa can bar ma chad du byung ba'i spang ston grub pa'i snying po zhes bya ba des bla ma sangs rgyas snying sgom la bdag tshangs par spyod par zhus pas/ dge slong gi sde brgyad
299b1(1): las byang chub sems dpa' gcig 'gro don che bas byang chub sems dpa'i gdung ma bcad gsungs/ de'i khyim na bzhugs pa'i tshe mkha' 'gro gar gyi dbang mo la jo mo gyis shig zer ba'i lung bstan byung //
299b2(1): slar nam mkha' la gya gyur 'gro ba'i grub thob gyi brgyud pa dkar bza' mgon skyid yin par shes nas bdag gir bzung ba las/ lhums su zhugs pa'i tshe nyi zla kha sbyor spyir bor thim pa dang / lhums nas skye
299b3(1): med kyi yi ge'i sgra yang yang sgrog pa dang / mda' dang gtad de tshigs su bcad pa sogs rtags khyad par can byung / spre'u lo dpyid ra'i bco lnga'i nyi shar la bltams/ mtshan brjod gser ma zhig bri zhing yod
299b4(1): pa'i tshig mtshams la rten 'brel brtags pas/ chos kyi dbang phyug chos kyi rgyal/ bya ba dang zug nas mtshan der btags/ mig mthong mkhan dag gis kyang lha 'dres mchod pa 'du ces zer/ yab kyis 'bri
299b5(1): / gung 'jig rten mgon po la phur pa rtsa rgyud nyan pa'i tshe/ khyod kyi bu tha chung gcig la chos slobs shig/ des phrin las 'byung ngo zhes kyang gsungs/ de bzhin du mal ka ba can pa na re/ dge bshes lho pa kho de
299b6(1): mda' lnga dang / gzhu gcig tshags kyis dang / dgra bo'i snying la phog pa'i mda' gcig 'ong zhes gsungs/ zhang rin po ches kyang dge bshes lho chung pa khyod kyi bu ngas bya'am/ ku re yin khyod la nga 'dra ba'i bu
300a1(1): gcig 'od gsungs pa la sogs lung bstan mang po thob/ lo bzhi nas yab las bris klog bslabs/ sgra sgo mtshon cha/ rig klag sde lnga/ bi brta chen mo sogs sgra'i bstan bcos bcu gsum/ skye bo
300a2(1): gso thig sogs lugs kyi bstan bcos bcu/ nag rtsis dang / sman dpyad dka' gter/ rgyal rabs sde bdun/ lde rgyud chen po'i sgrung 'bum sogs glu gar gyi bstan bcos brgya dang bzhi/ bon gyi gzhung chen bdun
300a3(1): cu don lnga/ mdos gzhung chen po brgya phrag/ gsang sngags phyi nang gi thig rtsa mang po/ phur pa'i skor bod chen bzhi la sogs pa thos pa mang po mdzad/ bcu la gsar ma'i phyag rdor lugs drug gsan te bsgrubs pas
300a4(1): bum chu khol/ gshin rje'i gshed dang phur pa la bsnyen pa ched du bskul/ bcu gcig pa la sgyu 'phrul gyi dbang rgyud man ngag thams cad rdzogs/ bcu gnyis la ka ka ni gra lnga/ sgrub thabs brgya rtsa sogs mkhyen par
300a5(1): mdzad cing yig brgya'i bsgrub pa mdzad/ bcu gsum la yang dag dang ma gshin/ thugs rje chen po lugs gnyis dang rta mgrin la sogs gsar rnying mang po gsan zhing bsgrubs/ bcu gsum pa'i dus nyams snang la
300a6(1): jo mo sgrol mas shel mkhar cig gi rtser khrid pas rdo rje sems dpa' dang mjal/ de na mkha' 'gro ma gdong pa bzhi pa gcig 'dug pa'i mdun zhal dkar po nas/ sangs rgyas bstan pa khyod kyi zung / g.yas zhal
300b1(1): ser po nas/ dam chos dar ba khyod kyis gyis/ rgyab zhal dmar po nas/ dge 'dun dbu 'phang khyod kyi stod/ g.yon zhal sngon po nas/ dus ngan gdul dkar khyod kyis thul// zer nas mda' dkar po sgro lnga pa
300b2(1): gcig gtad/ dgung lo bcu bzhi par ti sar gro gyang gsar bar/ tshad ma dang / mngon pa kun las btus/ spyod 'jug/ dgyes rdor la sogs pa'i gzhung chen po dang / phyag rdzogs zhi byed chos drug la sogs pa'i
300b3(1): man ngag nyan/ mtha' skor ba la dbu ma bden chung / mtshur ston yab sras la a ti'i skor sogs mdo sngags gsar rnying gi bshad sgrub/ yab las zhi byed phyag rdzogs gcod yul/ gdams ngag ngo sprod/ bstan
300b4(1): srung drag sngags mtha' dag nyan cing nyams 'og tu chud par mdzad/ bcu bdun pa la mnga' bdag 'gro mgon dang mjal te nyang rin po che nyi ma 'od zer gyi gter chos mtha' yas pa'i bdag por gyur/ bco brgyad
300b5(1): pa'i tshe sa pa Na la gnas gzhi sgang por sems bskyed pa dang / gyar gsar du chos 'brel/ lha lung gi mchod rten rtsar rab gnas thob/ de nub mnal lam du rgya nag ri bo rtse lngar me tog u dum wa ra 'tshol du phyin
300b6(1): pas/ ut+pal sngon po'i steng nas 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyis/ dz+nyA na kA ya d+harma d+hA tu/ chos kyi dbang phyug nga yin no// nga ni khyod kyi sems rtog go/ sems rtog ni chos kyi sgo mo bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o// chos kyi sgo
301a1(1): bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i don ni rang byung gi ye shes thig le nyag gcig go/ chos sgo brgyad khri bzhi stong gi don khyod la bshad zin gyi de'i don la dpyod cig/ ces gsungs pa'i mod la mnal sad
301a2(1): pas chos thams cad thob pa'i nges shes rnyed/ yul gra ru mngon pa la mchog tu mkhas pas gra ba mngon shes su grags pa'i sde snod 'dzin pa chen po gter ston rnal 'byor gyi dbang po des bsam yas nas
301a3(1): bton pa'i kha byang rim par brgyud pa dgung lo bcu gsum pa'i tshe phyag tu byung / bar der kha byang de la brten nas blun po gzu lums can mang pos 'don par brtsams bas la la shi/ la la thog ser gyis byer
301a4(1): dgos pa byung / kha byang de nang du bzhag na cho 'phrul gyis mi tshugs/ lam phrang dang / bzhi mdo dang / chu'i dkyil dang / sa 'og la sogs par bsgyur kyang / 'byung ba'i gnod pas mi shigs/ bzung du'ang ma
301a5(1): btub pas brlag gshog ser po zhes ming thogs/ yab na re/ thams cad brlag pa'i brlag shog ser po des ci zhig bya/ khyod 'chi ba nyo ba e yin gsungs nas phrogs te phyogs gzhan du sbas/ de slar dgung
301a6(1): lo nyer gnyis pa 'dir brkus nas rtogs ldan gcod yul ba zhig dang 'grogs/ de la brten nas gnams skas can nas yang byang blangs/ rim par bla rdzogs thugs gsum gyis mtshon pa'i gter kha chen po
301b1(1): bco brgyad la dbang bskur/ de dag kyang skal ldan gyi skye bo'i spyan ngo mtshar chen po'i snang ba dang 'grogs nas blangs pa dang / phal cher gter bdag la tha tshig bsgrags/ gzhan las dang skal bar ldan pa
301b2(1): mngag gzhug tu byas nas rtsod pa med par phyung ba 'ba' zhig go/ de yab kyis tshor nas khyod kyis gter zon zer ba/ thon pa rang ci zhig thon khyer shog gsungs/ zangs sgrom gtad pa na dkar chag klog dang
301b3(1): gsungs/ bklags pas/ sangs rgyas mnyam sbyor gyi rgyud gcig shes kun grol 'am de klog dang gsungs/ rgyud kyi mgo nas bklags pas/ da go go des chog/ khyod la sngar gros sna ma zung ba btab pa yin//
301b4(1): phyis gyod kha snan kyang tshig ro las mi yod/ da gter des 'phung 'tshengs gang yin kyang zin// dus gsum mkhyen pa u rgyan chen po'i bka' rtsod med du 'dug/ zab kyang gter gyi chos la dang re ma dgos//
301b5(1): nga'i mdun ma lo bzhi bcu'i bar du ru bzhi'i bla ma mkhas grub thams cad kyi dgongs pa blangs/ spros pa chod/ 'khor 'das kyi gzhi rtsa sems nyid gcig pu 'di'i steng du la bzlas zin/ da khyod nga'i kha la nyan
301b6(1): par song na bla rdzogs thugs gsum 'di'i mgo ci thon gyis/ de min pa'i mthu ngan sngags/ sgyogs dang / dpag chen/ than dang cho 'phrul/ bzo sna kyag kyog rnams chos 'di mgo ma thon par kha'i zur la'adas
302a1(1): ma 'don/ shes shes mang la mthar thon med pa 'di mthar sbrang por 'gro ba yin/ spyir gter chos la nga gnag pa ga la yin/ sangs rgyas kyi mdo rgyud kun nas gter lung gsungs/ rig 'dzin
302a2(1): gong ma'i phyag len yin te/ sngar yang gter ston blo chung res chos la dag ma thon par/ gzhogs khyer dang ngo so byas nas 'gro don rlab po che ma grub/ rgya zhang khrom gyis ngan sngags sngon la spel bas 'gro don gyi
302a3(1): rdugs/ sku tsha sman pas sman dpyad byas pas chos kyi 'gro don g.ye la/ ra shag gter ston gyis mdos cho ga byas pas phyis mdos mkhan du song / bon po drag rtsal gyis sngon la be har bsgrubs pas mthu mkhan
302a4(1): las ma byung / de 'dra la zad pa med/ rgyal ba gong mas gzhan don la dmigs kyang gter ston tshos rtsa ba'i chos kyi gzhung ma bsrangs par phrin las kha khyer du btang bas go mchod du song / chos byas na chos
302a5(1): skyong zhor la yod / mthu yang ma bsgrubs par 'ong ba yin/ de chos skyong rang gi dam bca' yin pas so// blo rtsab rtsub ma mang bar bla rdzogs thugs gsum gyi nyams len la 'brangs shig/ mnga' bdag nyid yab
302a6(1): sras mi 'khur ba 'di khos thugs rje chen po bsgrubs par byung ba yin/ gter ston gya ma rdugs tsam de kho yin/ ngas lo drug gong nas 'gro byas pa'i dus tshod de ra zla ba gnyis tsam nas sleb yod/ mi tshos
302b1(1): gter rdzur yin zer yong ste rtog pa de mi dgos/ nga yan chod kyi spang mi rabs bcu gsum song ste nang gi grub rtags ma byung ba med/ nga yang zhan shos min tsam 'ong gsung skad/ der mnga' bdag 'gro mgon
302b2(1): gyis gter gyi nyam nga che gsungs nas gzigs pas mchog tu mnyes/ lung bstan las hor dmar 'byung tshul yod pa slob dpon mtha' skor bas mthong nas/ hor da lta yul na med pa la zer sku pa btab
302b3(1): pas/ thugs chad nas gdams pa slar sba bar sems pa na/ bu mo gnyis kyi rta dkar gshegs pa can la bskyod nas rnga yab dpal rir khrid/ u rgyan chen pos gsang ba yongs rdzogs kyi dbang rdzogs par
302b4(1): bskur nas/ lam gyi lam mchog gzhan don yin// 'di la sgyid lugs su skyes pa// de yis byang chub rgyang zag ring // zhes sogs zhal gdams bslab byas dbugs phyung / gnas 'dir ma zhen cig/ zhen na
302b5(1): skye ba 'pho ba'i nyen yod gsungs pa'i mod la 'od phub lta bus btegs te skad cig la slebs/ shing pho byi ba'i lo hor dor rtog gi dmag gis sleb pas ma 'ongs pa mngon sum du gtan la phebs/ btsan po khri
302b6(1): srong lde'u btsan gyi phyi ma lha'i bu 'od mtha' yas su skyes pas na rim par mnga' bdag nyang gi bar skye ba bcu gsum thal ler dran/ slob ma'i dam pa bal yul ya ma bu ba b+ha ro gtsug 'dzin zhes bya ba zhig yod
303a1(1): de/ de nyid bod du gser 'tshol ba'i phyir 'ongs pa la mkha' 'gros lung bstan te gu ru nyid dang mjal/ zhag bdun gyi bar du u rgyan dngos su mthong / gsung thos pa tsam gyis rtogs pa shar/
303a2(1): nub gcig dbang mdzad pa'i tshe khyod kyis nga cir mthong gsungs/ yi dam dngos su mthong zhus pas/ 'o na tshogs gtor gzhan na 'bul sa med gsungs nas gna' ba'i khubs phyed la sogs pa'i tshogs rdzas
303a3(1): rnams skad cig gis bzhes/ yang nga cir mthong gsungs/ sangs rgyas dngos su gda' lags zhus pas/ 'o na dbang bskur bya'o gsungs nas mchod rdzas bsdus/ dkyil 'khor bshigs/ shul du bro brdungs//
303a4(1): blang dor med pa'i spyod pa dang / rdo rje'i dam tshig chen po'i gnas la skrag par mi 'gyur ba'i las can gyi slob ma'i khams dang bsam pa mkhyen nas rdo rje lus kyi dkyil 'khor chen po nas rnam par snang mdzad dri
303a5(1): chen lha snams kyi sgo nas phyung ste dbang bskur bas/ b+ha ro la lus sbrul shun dor ba lta bu'i nyams shar/ de bzhin du rdo rje gsang ba'i myur lam nas dri chu don yod grub pa lce thog tu blud pas zag med bde ba
303a6(1): / chen po'i ye shes zod rgal du 'bar/ snying gar phyag mdzub btsugs nas/ nga bya ba 'di ngos zung zhig gsungs pas yul gyi 'dzin pa bun long nger zhig/ nga mthong don la ma yengs shig/ de la sgom rgyu sgra tsam
303b1(1): med// gsungs pas rdzogs chen bya bral ris med kyi rtogs pa lhag ger shar/ nges shes khyad par can skyes nas da ni dus gsum sangs rgyas byon kyang dbang zhu snyam pa mi gda'/ rgya gar du 'gro ba'i spros pa
303b2(1): yang chod zhus pas/ 'khor bar mi 'khyam pa'i sangs rgyas byung na mu stegs pa yin/ khyod rgya gar du song la bla ma rnyed na bla ma tshol/ slob ma rnyed na slob ma tshol zhes gsungs/ zhal ta 'di don shin tu bzang por
303b3(1): snang / lar bal po b+ha ro 'di las sad pa'i gang zag dad pa shin tu che bas gu ru'i sta zur la khro bo'i spyan mnga' ba dang / mkha' 'gro dang chos 'gro ba sogs snang ba dag pa 'ba' zhig tu mthong / lan gcig
303b4(1): mngon spyod 'di dag la rtags thon pa mchis sam zhus pas/ lag len don thog tu phebs te ma Ni 'dren nas de sgrub ma khom gsungs/ der bal pos sgrol ba'i nus pa ston par zhus pas/ ri bong zhig nye ba'i
303b5(1): sar 'gro ba la/ sa la ri bong gi gzugs gcig bris/ khab la sngags lan bdun bgrangs te gzugs brnyan la btab pas ri bong thur la ril li li 'dril/ nga sgrib pa sbyang dgos longs shog gsungs nas
303b6(1): btags grol btags te tshogs gtor dang bsngo bas rjes su bzung / de 'dra ba mi la byung na 'jigs zhus pas/ mi dang 'phyi ba 'dra gsungs nas 'phyi ba'i gzugs brnyan la sngar bzhin mdzad pas 'phyi khung
304a1(1): nas ro byung / byas na 'di 'dra ba 'ong ste sems can la gnod pas su la'ang mi ster/ dgra la'ang 'tshang rgya ba'i mthu las gzhan mi byed/ 'di pa dud 'gror song bas gnas sbar ba yin/ gzhan mi
304a2(1): lus thob pa ni shin tu dka'/ srog bcad pa'i sdig pa ni mtha' yas/ gcig shi bas mi chog de'i nye 'khor thams cad sdug bsngal ba yin/ dgra la'ang mthu mi byed kyi steng du slar la snying rje bskyed dgos pa
304a3(1): yin gsungs nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod phyogs lhag par dang du bzhes/ rang don du mthu dang mngon spyod mi mdzad pa'i dam bca' shin tu brtan pa yin te/ thugs rje yul la 'jug pa'i cha nas ngan song
304a4(1): gsum yang thugs rjes bsgral/ zhes pa ste gu ru chen po 'dis mngon du mdzad de/ las kyi lus dug lnga'i phung po can de bsad/ rnam par shes pa chos nyid kyi klong du gsos nas 'khor ba mtha' can du mdzad
304a5(1): pas gsad gso'i nang nas kyang ngo mtshar che ba gcig yin/ bal po b+ha ro ldog khar gser zho drug cu zam pa phul nas rgya bal du ldog pa la bar chad med pa'ang zhu byas pas/ gser phye dang bsres nas sbyin
304a6(1): bsreg mdzad/ ser sna'i mdud pa rtsa ba nas grol/ lar 'di dkon mchog yod par yid ches par ston pa'i mdzad pa ngo mtshar can yin te/ gtong ba la goms pa rnams kyis kyang dkon mchog la dmigs nas
304b1(1): rdzas dngos med du gtong ba la rnam pa'i cha nas yid gnyis yod pa ltar mi ston yang / don dngos por snang ba'i dge ba'i phyogs la dga' bar byed pa 'di ka cung zad blo la 'phrigs chags pa yin no// der b+ha
304b2(1): rol sbyin sreg gi thal ba 'phangs sems ma byed par chu la spyod/ lam du zas ster ba cig 'ongs/ de bdag gir gyis shig gsungs pa ltar byas pas bu mo gcig gis nyung ma zhig byin/ de gu ru la phul bas
304b3(1): ras kho ba la tshog shig gsungs/ slar b+ha ro rgya gar du 'gro ba la skyel zung mdzad pas yang gser zho gsum phul/ der gu ru'i zhal nas/ me la bsregs pas mkha' 'gro mnyes na/ chu la gtor na de bas kyang
304b4(1): dgyes mchi gsungs nas gser de chu la gtor/ sras kyi dam par gyur pa pad+ma dbang chen dang / gnyal du 'khrungs pa'i nyi ma 'od zer sogs sras brgyud dang / snod ldan gyi bu dgu la sogs pa smin grol du
304b5(1): mdzad/ chu zal mgur gsum la sogs pa'i bla chen dang mi chen mang pos zhabs la gtugs/ gtso bo ma Ni 'ba' zhig gis phrin las mdzad de bod yul thams cad la thar pa'i sa bon rgya chen po btab/ khyad
304b6(1): par kaHthog pa grub thob ma Ni rin chen ces bya ba las khams su thugs rje chen po'i phrin las rgya cher 'phel/ brgya byin dang nyi zla'i lha'i bus kyang mchod bstod byas/ bod kyi lha 'dre thams cad kyis bla mar
305a1(1): bkur zhing snyan grags kyis 'jig rten g.yogs/ 'gro ba'i bsod nams bsogs pa'i zhing du/ tshong 'dus 'gur mo'i lha khang dang / bsam 'grub bde ba chen po'i lha khang gnyis kyang mdzad/ la
305a2(1): yag gu ru lha khang du gtso bor gdan sar mdzad/ lha sa'i jo shAka dang mtshungs pa tsam gyi byin rlab can du grags pa'i bstan gtso'i snang brnyan dang por 'phags pa klu sgrub kyis ri btang bzung nas spyan drangs/
305a3(1): bar du slob dpon chen pos snab stod sa zam yang dben nas phyung ste/ ha bo'i gangs la rgyas btab pa'i 'di dgung lo nga bdun pa sa pho 'brug gi lor spyan drangs te 'gro ba'i don du bzhugs su gsol/ ma
305a4(1): 'ongs pa na klu yul du spyan 'dren pa bshad/ de lta bu'i thugs rje phrin las bsam gyis mi khyab pas 'gro ba'i don mdzad nas mdzad pa brtul bar nye ba'i tshe/ kho bo chos kyi dbang phyug la// sems can rnam
305a5(1): rtog tha dad kyis// la la chos dbang bden dga'// la la chos dbang bde yis dogs/ zhes dang / chos dbang sems nyid re dogs bral// chos dbang sems la zug rngu med// bde na dga' tsho dgyes par
305a6(1): mdzod// chos dbang zug rngu spang ba med// sdug na dga' 'tsho dgyes par mdzod// chos dbang sems la skye shi med// shi yis dogs tshod dgyes par mdzod// chos dbang sems nyid chos dbyings shi// ma shi
305b1(1): dogs tsho dgyes par mdzod// chos dbang sems nyid 'pho 'gyur med// rtag tu re tsho dgyes par mdzod// chos dbang sems la rang bzhin med// rtag gis dogs tsho dgyes par mdzod// ces re dogs rtsa ba
305b2(1): nas zad pa'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang po chen por bzhugs/ rang gis bzhengs pa'i lha khang 'bad pa don ldan du 'gyur ba'i phyir/ zhabs tog dgos par gdams shing / gtsug lag nyams skyen bu yis byas
305b3(1): kyang thon// lha khang zhabs tog sprang pos byas kyang khur// zhes dang / kun bzang bde chen chos dbyings gzhal yas su// sgyu ma'i skyes bu chos dbang da ni sdud// ci phyir lus 'di'i gdul bya rdzogs rdzogs
305b4(1): 'dra// las ngan zad pa'i rtags kyang lus la smin// rmi lam mi gzugs chos dbang yal nas 'gro// dpon slob kun 'dus nor bu'i tshogs yon rmis// nga dang 'brel tshad bde chen thob pa'i rtags// zhes dang //
305b5(1): bdag gi sha rus sran cad yungs 'bru re// lhor song thams cad lam 'gro bde chen bgrod// ces pa la sogs pa'i zhal gyi gdams pas dbugs dbyangs nas dgung lo nga dgu pa la 'od kyi pho brang chen por
305b6(1): gshegs so// / da ni bka' gter gyi bstan pa la dngos sam brgyud nas bka' drin bsam gyis mi khyab cing / spangs pa dang rtogs pa'i yon tan zad mi shes pa mnga' ris paN chen rin po che rjes 'brang
306a1(1): dang bcas pa'i gtam brjod par bya ste/ skyes bu dam pa 'di ni yul mnga' ris glo bo ma zang gi sa'i char/ yab mar pa lo tsA'i skye ba lha rigs grub pa'i dbang po 'jam dbyangs rin chen
306a2(1): rgyal mtshan ces grub pa'i dbang phyugs thang stong rgyal po la sogs te mkhas grub gyi bla ma mang po'i zhabs la thug cing / bka' gter gyi bstan pa rgya mtsho'i mnga' bdag tu gyur pa de dang / yum 'gro lcam khrom
306a3(1): pa rgyan gyi sras su me mo lug gi lo la bsku bltams/ mtshan pad+ma dbang rgyal du btags/ dgung lo brgyad pa la rten dge bsnyen du mdzad/ yab las byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i sdom pas rgyud sbyangs nas//
306a4(1): 'jam dpal mtshan brjod/ sgyu 'phrul zhi khro/ yang dag me dgu/ sems phyogs la sogs gsan pa rgya chen po mdzad/ bcu gcig par rtsa rgyud gsang snying / slob dpon sgeg pa'i rdo rje'i 'grel pa/ g.yung Ti ka kha
306a5(1): dmar can/ sum ston gyi Ti ka la sogs pa phal cher zhig zla ba bdun gyis khong du chud/ dgongs 'dus la sogs pa'i mdo'i gnas kyang byang bar byas/ bcu gnyis pa'i tshe mkhas pa mang po'i dbus su gzhung
306a6(1): bskur gyi bshad pa mdzad/ bla ma gsang 'dus dang / sgyu 'phrul zhi khro/ rta mgrin la sogs par bsnyen bsgrub mthar phyin/ lha mo dus sol mas zhal yang yang bstan/ grub mtshan gyi thog mar shwa log chen po zhig
306b1(1): byung ba la phur pa gdengs pa tsam gyis nam mkha' la thog so bdun tsam 'khyil zhing bzlog/ de bzhin du gtor chen 'phangs pa'i tshe sa stengs nas gru gang tsam 'phags pa yang byung / dme brtsegs kyi sgom
306b2(1): bzlas mdzad pas garbaM dzi waM gyi sgra sgrogs bzhin par mthong / dgung lo bcu bzhi nas bka' brgyad dang ma gshin la sogs pa'i sgrub phrin mang du bslabs shing bzlas sgom gyi la zlos/ de nas lo bdun bar du
306b3(1): gcod yul dang ro snyoms mdzad/ bye ma dang / chu rdeb me tog la sogs pa'i bcud len kho nas dka' spyad kyi phreng la bshar/ them spangs kyi dam bca' lo gsum/ ngag bcad kyi dam bcas lo gsum/ sha khrag
306b4(1): gi zas la shin tu sngar zhing / sbrang gnas dang / gso sbyong la sogs mang du mdzad pas spyan ras gzigs lan bdun du gzigs/ lo gcig tu bla ma gsang 'dus kyi gdams ngag la nan tan mdzad/ spyir bla ma
306b5(1): mkhas grub mang po las mdo sngags chos kyi bdud rtsi ngoms pa med par 'thungs shing / khyad par du yab las mdo dbang dang / phur pa/ sgrub chen bka' brgyad la nan chags chen po mdzad/ grub pa brnyes pa'i
306b6(1): rnam thar yang / gsung las/ brag dmar gyi mtsho la ro snyoms byas// smin nags kyi chu la rdog par brdzis/ lha lung gi brag la mkha' ltar ldings// ba gam can brag la byi ltar 'dzul// mgo bo can brag gi
307a1(1): logs la rmugs/ phrogs sher seng dang shes dpal rgyal bzang gsum// byang rgyal dang bla ma rin seng ba// skyes pho mo 'ga' grub thob zer// deng grub thob kyi go bar mi len// chos nyams
307a2(1): blangs kyi nyams snang thob tsam yin// don 'pho 'gyur bral ba ma rtogs na// lus sgyu ma'i cho 'phrul bya byis ston// zhes grub rtags kyi mthar thug rtogs pa la ngos 'dzin/ bcu bdun gyi lo la dam bca' brgyad
307a3(1): mdzad de/ dge 'dun la mthong phyag byed pa dang / pha yul du zhag bdun las mi bzhugs pa dang / dben pa 'ba' zhig la blo gtod pa dang / rgyal ba'i sgo khang lan gsum las mi 'grim pa dang / tshong khe dang
307a4(1): gral 'go mi 'dzin pa dang / ro cho ga dang dbu gtso mi byed pa dang / 'tsho ba bsod snyoms la bsten pa dang / bsgrub pa dang thos bsam 'ba' zhig byed pa rnams so// slob dpon nor bstan bzang po las yang
307a5(1): yang du bsten nas 'dul ba dang mdo sde'i skor dang / jo bo bka' gdams/ na ro mkha' spyod ma snyan brgyad bsam gyis mi khyab dang bcas pa zhus/ sgyid grongs du 'phags pa wa ti mjal bas gsung byon/ sku tshe
307a6(1): snga ma'i sngon gnas mang po rjes su dran/ dgung lo bcu dgu par pha yul du yig drug gis 'gro don mdzad/ nyi shu la byams chos lnga/ phar phyin/ tshad ma/ dbu ma rtsa she bzhi brgya pa dang / bslab btus/ spyod
307b1(1): 'jug dngos brgyad don bdun cu sogs gzhung lugs chen po brgya phrag gcig khong du chud/ nyer gcig pa la 'jam dbyangs chos skyong dang / sdom brtson tshul khrims dpal la sogs par gshed dmar la
307b2(1): sogs pa'i dbang sgrub gdams pa gsan zhing bsgrubs pas zhag bdun na gshed dmar dngos su mthong / nyi shu rtsa gnyis par yab kyi drung du snga 'gyur bka' gter la zhun thar legs par bcad/ bka'
307b3(1): brgyad kyi sgrub pa mdzad pas bdud rtsi khol/ mar me chung ngu zhig gis zhag gsum thub/ de'i tshe yab kyi gzigs snang nyid kyi tshigs su bcad pa/ bu khyod tshe la bar chad ma byung na// 'jig rten 'dir ni chos kyi
307b4(1): 'khor los sgyur// mdang sum dkyil 'khor mtha' la kun bskor nas// bla ma zur chen rdog ston chen po dang // rje btsun grags pa 'phags pa rin po che// nam mkha'i snying po bsod nams bla ma dang // 'gro/
307b5(1): mgon nyang ral ras chung rdor grags dang // rgyal sras dbang chen glo bo yab sras dang // chag lo chos dpal khro phu lo tsa dang // nag tshe lo tsa kun mkhyen mus srad pa/ mkhas grub bsod bzang grub chen dmar
307b6(1): zhabs dang // dam pa sangs rgyas bai ro bi ma la// u rgyan yab yum rgyal po khri srong dang // ma gcig lab sgron zhang la ras chen pa// khams pa sga lo rgya gar pa Na chen rnams// gcig la gcig blta 'dzum zhing
308a1(1): bzhad pa la// kun kyang nga ni pad+ma dbang rgyal yin// smra zhing thams cad khyod la thim nas song // zhes pa ltar yin/ nyer gsum pa la glo bo lo tsA ba lam 'bras tshogs bshad dang / slob bshad
308a2(1): gnyis/ nyer bzhi pa'i tshe yang tshar gcig bsgyur/ nyer lnga pa'i tshe/ bsam grul gling du glo bo mkhan chen bsod nams lhun grub gyis mkhan po/ chos rje dkon mchog skyabs kyis slob dpon/ de bzhin du
308a3(1): gsang ston pa/ grib tshod pa/ grogs dran pa/ dad pa'i dge slong nyi shu rtsa lnga dang bcas pa'i dbus su/ bu lugs kyi las cho ga gzhir bzhag la/ nam bsod dang / 'phags pa rin po che'i las chog gi bshad
308a4(1): sbyar dang bcas tshig gsum gyis bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i dngos por bsgrubs/ mkhan slob de rnams las chos kyang mang du nyan/ nyer drug pa la shel gyi ri bo 'brug sgra la sogs pa'i dben par/ chos gos
308a5(1): gsum dang / glegs bam/ 'khar gsil/ lhung bzed las gzhan pa'i yo byad thams cad spangs te sgo gcig pa'i brtul zhugs bzung / ston pas bcas pa'i gnang bkag dang / sbyangs pa'i yon tan bcu
308a6(1): gnyis la sgra ji bzhin par gnas pa ni skyes bu chen po 'di dang kong po rgod tshang pa sna tshogs rang grol gyi rnam par thar pa mthong ba'i chos la gnas nges par shes/ gzhan du mi la ras pa la sogs te rtags
308b1(1): dang cho ga ma byas pa'ang ji snyed cig yod srid kyi de dag la bstan pa la dga' ba'i lha rnams dang lhan cig rjes su yi rang bar byas so// slar ljongs rgyu ba'i brtul zhugs kyis mnga' ris kyi gnas rten rnams
308b2(1): kyang mjal/ theg pa chen po'i bslab par bya ba'i gnas las 'da' ba ma yin pas chos kyi sbyin pa'ang ci rigs su bstsal/ glo bo mkhan chen las/ dgra gdong / 'jigs byed/ gshed dmar/ gsang ba 'dus
308b3(1): pa la sogs pa mang du gsan/ mkhan po de dang / gu ge pa Na chen rnam rgyal dpal bzang / 'jam dbyangs blo gros dpal mgon rnams la sgra dang / tshad ma/ brtag gnyis kyi bshad pa/ gsang sngags kyi dbang
308b4(1): dang man ngag kyang mang du nyan/ spu drang dang / te se dang / kho char la sogs pa'i gnas rten 'khor nas slar glo bor byon/ drang so gter ston shAkya bzang po las byang gter mang du gsan/ mdor na bde kye
308b5(1): gsang gsum/ ma gshin phur pa/ bka' brgyad gsar rnying / yang phur rta gsum/ rdo rje gur/ gsang 'dus ye shes zhabs lugs/ bde mchog lhan skyes/ lha nag dril gsum/ bong zhal can/ dpal mgon
308b6(1): zhal bram/ dus 'khor 'grel chen/ phyag rdor brgyad bskor/ u tsa ya/ ras chung snyan brgyud/ phyag chen sbyor drug/ u rgyan bsnyen bsgrub/ yang dgon pa'i ri chos/ nyang gter yongs rdzogs/ rdo rje phreng ba la
309a1(1): sogs te gsar rnying bka' gter bstan bcos/ man ngag gi yi ge rnam pa thams cad la dA ri dra'i brtul zhugs kho nas chos skyugs sogs kyi ngal ba dang du blangs te/ skyes rabs las/ me
309a2(1): tshogs spu gri'i so yang brgal nas ni// 'chi mthar zug gi bar du dam chos btsal// zhes pa ni skyes bu dam pa 'dis phyag len la btab pa yin/ gsar rnying gi rgyud sde chen po de dag la'ang bsnyen pa ma song ba
309a3(1): med pas/ deng snga 'gyur ba tshos bka' brgyad dang / gsar ma pa rdo rje phreng ba tsam gyis bsnyen pa rdzogs pa'ang dkon pa'i dngos por gyur na/ 'di lta bu a la la/ dam pa'i chos 'tshol zhing bya btang sgo gcig
309a4(1): pa'i brtul zhugs kyis bal yul shing kun/ bya rung kha shor/ bal po pham mthing / yam bu'i tshal/ yang le shod la sogs pa thams cad du gshegs shing de dag tu bal bod kyi bla ma mang po bsnyen/ gnas
309a5(1): 'brel dang thugs dam 'ba' zhig mdzad/ dag pa'i snang ba mtha' klas par shar/ yi dam dang chos skyong mang po'i zhal gzigs/ mkha' 'gro mas slob dpon a b+hU ka ra'i skye bar lung bstan/ lo chen dkon
309a6(1): mchog skyabs kyis rdo rje phreng ba'i dbang la dogs cha mdzad pas/ mtshan lam na 'khor lo sdom pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bo pa Na chen pad+ma dbang rgyal gyis mdzad cing 'dug pa'i sgo drung nas mkha' 'gro mas
309b1(1): khong bkag nas ma btang bas slar 'gyod de gnang / zhar la lam 'bras gsar ma'ang thob/ so brgyad pa nas gsar rnying ris med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo rgya chen po bskor/ de nas dbus gtsang gi phyogs la
309b2(1): gsar rnying gi chos rgyun nyams pa dag gso ba'i thugs bskyed bla na med pas/ yab dang glo bo'i sde pa dag kun la gnang bzhus/ rim bzhin zang zad brag/ bkra bzang / byang 'am ring rnams brgyud de byon//
309b3(1): bde grol du me ston nam mkha' rgyal mtshan dang / sngags 'chang shAkya bzang po gnyis mjal/ de nas gcung legs ldan kyang lhan cig pas dbus la byon/ chos tshigs sprul pa'i rdo rje gdan lha sa'i gtsug lag
309b4(1): khang dzo shA ka rnams kyis gtsos pa'i rten brten pa rnams mjal/ rdog chos dang zhi byed la thugs 'dun drag po yod pas rje btsun ma dang / dpal lha'i sprul pas bskor lam du 'grogs nas lung bstan/
309b5(1): gung zad du phyag mchod mdzad/ gzhung sgre zhing du rdog bsod nams bstan 'dzin las rdog dkyil rnams legs par nod/ gro zang du zha lu lo chen chos skyong bzang po las gshed dmar skor sogs gsan//
309b6(1): bsam yas su byon pas sngon btsan po khri srong lde'u btsan du gyur pa'i bag chags du ma sad/ bar khang du bde gshegs 'dus pa'i dkyil 'khor bzhengs nas sgrub mchod dang smon lam mdzad/ lho brag gu ru ba
310a1(1): sogs la chos kyi bdud rtsi mang du bkye/ kaHthog pa chos rje bsod nams rgyal mtshan sogs bshes gnyen mang dag dang chos skyes 'bul res mdzad/ phreng po u rgyan chos rdzong du kong chen nam
310a2(1): mkha' dpal ldan las bla ma dgongs 'dus gsan/ yang rdzong dang mchims phur thugs dam mdzad pas rtsa ba gsum gyi lha tshogs mang po'i zhal gzigs/ chos dbang gi gdung rabs brgyad pas lho brag tu spyan
310a3(1): drangs nas/ mkhar chu/ bsam 'grub bde chen/ lha bro dang / smra bo cog/ gro bo lung la sogs par byon/ mnga' bdag nyang la u rgyan chen pos lung bstan pa bzhin/ paN chen 'dis chos brgyud nyams pa gso
310a4(1): bar gsungs pa'i bden pa'i rnga bo che sgrog pa'i dus la babs te/ nyang gi gdung skar zur la rang lugs kyi bshad nyan rgya chen po mdzad/ sdig can 'ga' zhig la gnas spor mdzad pas 'ja' 'od kyis bar snang
310a5(1): bkang / zha stod dang btsan gro sogs su bsgrub chen bde gshegs 'dus pa'i sman bsgrub dang skye bdun gyis 'gro don mdzad/ spyir skyes bu chen po 'di chos la gnas 'jog shin tu che zhing khyad par sngon gyi smon
310a6(1): lam las bde gshegs 'dus pa la don gnyer chen po dang ldan pas rang gi yab rje la sogs par bka' brgyad bde 'dus tshar nyi shu rtsa lnga gsan pa'i phyi ma khungs btsun zhing yid rton par nus pa de lho brag
310b1(1): dgon dkar zhes pa 'dir ri brag la thogs pa med pa'i rje rigs nam mkha'i rnal 'byor las rnyed pas gsan yig tu'ang bsngags pa chen po mdzad cing / dgongs pa mthar thug pa rdzogs pa'i tha tshig kyang
310b2(1): gsal/ slar zhe drug par bsam yas su byon nas bka' 'dus phyi ma rig 'dzin yongs 'dus kyi chos skor rnams rnam snang gsang sgom nas spyan drangs/ ske mor dgongs 'dus kyi sgrub chen btsugs/ phung po ri
310b3(1): bo cher bde 'dus la 'chad nyan mdzad/ ngor dang gser mdog can du dge tshul slong gi las cho ga mang du mdzad/ gzhan yang chos 'chad nyan la sogs pa'i 'gro phan rgya chen po mdzad de chu bo ri brgyad brag rdo rje
310b4(1): zhes pa 'dir zhag gcig gdan chags pas sku tshe'i rten 'brel 'grigs/ brag chen phur pa zhes pa'i dpyad las bskyed rdzogs kyi bstan pa zin pa'i brda' don dgongs pa bzhin/ slar phreng po pa dar zhing rgyas
310b5(1): pa'i tshe kun gzigs phreng po gter chen shes rab 'od zer ti shrIr bkur nas gnas 'dir yun ring por dgon pa bcas nas gtan chags/ gsung rab mang po'i sbyar bya du'ang thub bstan rdo rje brag tu sbyar
310b6(1): ba'o zhes ming gi mnga' gsol/ de nas pa Na chen rin po che nyid phal cher bsam yas bu tshal du gtan chags/ byams pa gling du thu btsun bsod nams rnam rgyal las sangs rgyas mnyam sbyor gsan cing / phar
311a1(1): zab chos mkha' 'gro snying tig gi dbang khrid ma lus pa phul nas thugs yid gcig tu 'dres/ 'o na smon zang du'ang sku mched lhan cig pas yun ring par bzhugs/ gcung rig 'dzin legs ldan
311a2(1): pa bde lugs gnyis ka'i pho sgo yangs pas 'bri gung pa rin chen phun tshogs bsam yas su gdan drangs nas dpon slob gsum ka bsam yas kyi rab gnas bsgyur te bod khams yun du bde ba'i rten 'brel
311a3(1): bsgrigs/ 'di nas bzung chos rgyal rin chen phun tshogs kyang sras kyi dam par gyur pas rgyal dbang pad+ma'i ring lugs la rten 'brel chen por gyur/ spyir skyes bu 'di nyid ni gnas lnga rigs pa'i pan+di ta chen
311a4(1): po/ mdo sngags gsar rnying ris med pa'i bstan pa yongs rdzogs kyi dge ba'i gshes gnyen chen po/ bzhon pa dang 'jol bel la sogs pa'i chos brgyad yongs su spangs pas shAkya thub pa'i rjes zhugs bsod
311a5(1): snyoms pa chen po/ zhen log dang dka' spyad khur du bzod pas bya btang rnal 'byor gyi dbang po chen po/ rig pa dang grol ba'i spobs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pas byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po des
311a6(1): dngos kyi lam nas bstan pa dang sems can gyi don bla na med pa mdzad/ snga 'gyur rgyud 'bum rin po'i skor tsho 'byed pa'ang rnam dpyod 'di kho na che zhing / lung gi rgyun la'ang bka' drin bsam gyis mi khyab//
311b1(1): tshig nyung la don shin tu mang ba sdom pa gsum gyi rnam par nges pa'i bstan bcos la sogs te/ rnam grangs mtha' yas dag gis brgyud nas bstan 'gro'i don bla na mtho ba'i cho ga mdzad de 'o na smon thang nas
311b2(1): zangs mdog dpal gyi ri bor gshegs so// // da ni slob dpon be ro tsa na slar yang rigs grol gyis sprul pa'i sgyu 'phrul la chags pa kun mkhyen shes rab 'od zer gyi gtam bshad par bya ste/ bdag
311b3(1): nyid chen po 'di ni byang ngam chen gyi sa'i char khri bsam gnyis kyi cho 'brang las sa pho stag lo chu stod zla ba'i tshe bcur mngal gyi pad+mo las grol/ lhums su zhugs pa'i tshe skyes bu shel gyi kha dog can rin po che'i
311b4(1): do shal dang ldan pa zhig gis shel bum bdud rtsis gang ba yum gyi spyi bo nas bstims pa rmis/ tshe bcu byung res sgra khyim la 'ja' zug pa dang / dri zhim po'i dad pa rgyun du byung / gzhon nu rol rtsed kyi tshe na'ang /
311b5(1): bcos min gyi nges 'byung dang / dad pa'i snang ba rgya chen po/ myur la zab pa'i shes rab la sogs te byang chub sems dpa'i ngang tshul gyis lhag par phyug pa zhig ste/ 'jam pa'i dbyangs dang / gshed dmar dang /
311b6(1): gnyen mgon rnams kyis zhal bstan pa byung ba 'bri gung pas g.yag sde pa Na chen gyi bag chags su ngos 'dzin mdzad/ khyad par du rin chen phun tshogs chos kyi rgyal po ji lta ba zhig gi zhal nas/ khyod kyi snying ga/
312a1(1): na a zhig yod pa da lta ston mar na zhes phyag mdzub btsugs pas brjod mi shes pa'i nyams shar/ rjes su sku'i bkod pa de kho nar snang zhes gsung / ru skor de la hor gyis brgyab dus bu chung
312a2(1): 'phrog par brtsams te zhags pas btab pa na lhag pa'i lhas sgrib par gzigs te bros pas thar/ de nas grog gi phur bzhugs/ byis pa'i dbus na chos gsung pa dang / mdo rgyud kyi tshig tshon po cal col du
312a3(1): 'don pa dang / lhag par gzhon nu shes ma bye ba des chu ban gang rgya can kha khyer nas bzung ste dza khang du bskyal ba dang / rgan pa dag gis sgo bcad nas phyir thon pa na/ sgo ma phye bar thal byung du phyir thon pa
312a4(1): sogs byung / khyad par theg pa chen po'i rigs sad pas sems can nyam chung ba dag la bzod du med pa'i snying rje dang / zhang pos 'thos pa'i gal la ci mi snyam pas ka ca ster ba sogs phal ba'i kun tu spyod pa
312a5(1): las rgyang ring / dgung lo brgyad pa'i tshe e waM gling smad dang nyin sdings gnyis ka'i slob dpon brtan mkhas kyi yon tan rdzogs pa tshul khrims 'od zer ba las dge bsnyen du mdzad/ mchod gral gyi lha phal cher
312a6(1): ngos 'dzin mdzad pas 'di shes rab thod rgal ba zhig byung zhes mtshan shes rab 'od zer du btags/ gser mdog can pa'i slob ma'i mchog pa Na chen rdor rgyal ba las rab tu byung / de nas klog pa thos
312b1(1): bsam gyi grar zhugs nas/ dga' ldan khri pa zhal snga nas bstan dar la zab mo lta ba dang / rgya chen spyod pa'i sems bskyed lugs srol gnyis bslab btus/ spyod 'jug/ mdo sde kun las btus/ byangs//
312b2(1): ma pa nyi shu pa/ klu sgrub lugs kyi don dam sems bskyed sogs nyan zhing klu sgrub gyi gzhung la nan tan ngos/ mtshan nyid kyi gzhung la lo drug gi bar du nyin mtshan med par spangs/ slob dpon gnyis po las/
312b3(1): / byams chos lnga/ sa sde lnga sdom rnam gnyis/ dbu ma rig tshogs/ gtam tshogs/ bstod tshogs/ byang chub sems 'grel/ rim lnga rnams dang / dge ldan pa'i mdo'i lam rim gnyis/ sngags rim chen po la
312b4(1): sogs te rgya bod kyi gzhung 'grel mang du nyan/ lam gyi 'gros la go don phun sum tshogs pa skyes kyang 'khor ba'i sa bon drungs nas 'byin pa lta ba rnam pa dag pa kho na yin/ de la dgag bzhag gi 'dod pa mang
312b5(1): pos ngo bo ma 'khrul ba gang yin shes dka'/ sangs rgyas kyi lta ba zab mo ston pa la klu sgrub lung bstan/ de'i dgongs 'grel tshad ma zla ba grags pa yin/ des kyang sangs rgyas bskyangs la brten nas rtogs pa
312b6(1): yin pas 'grel pa bud+d+ha pA li ta la bslab gnyer gting thug pa zhig byas pas/ deng sang lta ba'i gnas tshul gleng pa rnams la kho bo mgu po rang mi 'ong zhes gsungs/ sa dge gnyis car la mkhas pa'i slob
313a1(1): dpon gcig yod pa las lugs gnyis ka'i sbyangs pa mthar son/ khyad par gsang ba 'dus pa la tsong kha pa chen po'i yig che'i steng nas dgongs pa ji bzhin du longs/ rdor rgyal ba la dgyes
313a2(1): rdor lha dgu/ lam 'bras lugs lnga/ rnam 'grel bcu gcig dang bcas pa/ gur brtag sam gsum lung Ti ka bshad pa dang bcas pa/ dus 'khor yongs rdzogs/ lam rim pa gnyis kyi khrid/ bla ma dam pa'i Ti
313a3(1): ka'i steng nas gzabs bshad rnams dogs pa'i mtha' dpyad nas nyan pas/ slob dpon des/ dge bshes shes rab 'od zer 'dis chos kyi gnad la bkar nas dri shes par 'dug ces 'chad pa la bsnyengs
313a4(1): pa bral ba dag blo gros la grim cha ster dgos pa byung / rin po che rdor rgyal ba de las spyir mdo sngags kyi gzhung 'grel da lta 'chad nyan yod pa mtha' dag/ de bzhin du gser mdog can pa dang / sa sku bka'
313a5(1): 'bum yongs rdzogs mnyan nas/ zin thun bsgyur ba'ang mdzad/ lhag par gser mdog can pa'i yig cha la mchog tu 'dris shing grub mtha'ang 'dzin/ skyes bu dam pa 'di g.yag sde pa Na chen gyi de ma zag pa'i
313a6(1): skye ba yin pas sku gzhon nu nas gsal snang shin tu che zhing khyad par paN chen de la slob dpon chen pos seng gdong ma'i gdams pa pu tir longs pa zhig bstsal ba rang nyams su bstar/ gzhan blor ma 'chud
313b1(1): dogs nas mya ngan las 'da' khar e waM rdo spyil du rgyas btab pa dus 'dir phyag tu son mod/ 'brug pa rin po che pad+ma dkar po'ang gsal snang zhig la the tshom skyes pas/ phyis chad/ de ni a khu mtshan nyid pa'i
313b2(1): khrod du phyin pas len par 'dug ces gsungs pa bzhin rten 'brel gzhan dbang du song / gras de dang thal 'gyur gyi mgrin rnga ldir ba'i rigs gra gang dang gang du rtsod pa'i g.yul ngo la lhags pas blo gros
313b3(1): bsam gyis mi khyab pa song ste/ bod 'grel rnams kyang rgya yan du bzhag/ rgyan drug mchog gnyis kyi gzhung 'grel kho na la brten nas/ brgal ba dang / brtag pa dang / rigs pa gsum gyi lha'i rnga chen po kun
313b4(1): nas kun tu yongs su brdungs pas/ gling sman slob dpon na re/ khyed slob gsar ba lta bu yin kyang 'di lta bu'i rnam dpyod kham che/ kun mkhyen rong po la bo dong pa'i dge bshes gcig gis/ ci mkhyen zhus
313b5(1): pas/ kho bos par phyin shes gsungs/ 'o na 'dul ba e gnang zhus pas/ de los shes par phyin gyi spyod pa yin gsungs/ yang dbu tshad la dris pas/ de bzhin du dbu ma la lta ba dang / tshad ma la rig lam
313b6(1): yin gsungs pa ltar/ khyed kyis dbu phar la brten nas bstan pa'i sgrom 'tshol lugs/ de las rig lam gyi grub mtha' 'cha' lugs la dpags na/ dge bshes zer na 'di la zer zhes tshogs pa'i khrod rang
314a1(1): du bsngags pa brjod pas de phyin nas dge bshes shes rab 'od zer zhes grags/ rtog ge'i rig pa la tsher ma lta bu'i blo gros mnga' yang / 'di ltar skyes bu mchog tu gyur pa rnams ni de tsam la
314a2(1): brten nas grags pa dang / rnyed pa bsgrub pa'i sta gon rtsom pa ma yin pas/ skyo shas dang nges 'byung drag pos rgyud brlan nas sgrub pa nan tan gyi 'khor lo yid la sems shing / de'i ngang tshul slob dpon zhi ba lha
314a3(1): dang jo bo rje'i rnam thar la snying zag pa nas smon cing dad pa'i skabs shig na/ 'bri gung pa rin chen phun tshogs lho rgyud la thegs pa'i e waM dang ha cang mi ring pa'i sa thad skyar skar phab pa gzigs su byon pas/
314a4(1): sgaskar gra tshang sum brgya tsam la spyi chos su spyod 'jug gsung ba dang thug/ sher le'i/ don dam blo yis spyod yul min// zhes pa nas sha lo ka gsum la jo 'grel gtso bor bton/ 'grel pa grags che ba kha yar na
314a5(1): yams su byas/ rig lam gyi sbyor bas kyang brgyan/ bka' rgyud pa'i nyams len dang yang bstun kyin bshad pa yam pa gcig gsung ba mthong bas/ rje btsun dam pa 'di'i thugs rje'i chom rkun gyis snying la
314a6(1): btab/ zang zing gi nye bar dpyad pa sme mo'i khud na shong ba tsam zhig yod pa khang thog nas bsgyur/ chas par brtsams pa na/ grogs mched sman dpyad shes pa zhig yod pa re zhig bka'// 'di dus dgung lo/
314b1(1): bco brgyad pa yin/ lar skyes bu dam pa'i snying stobs dang smon lam gyi mthu ni gzhan dbang gis rdzi bar nus pa ma yin pas srab med pa'i seng ge nam mkha' la 'phyo ba bzhin du/ gras bsgyur/ grogs mched
314b2(1): spangs/ dkor la brkam chags byed pa btang nas/ nges don ston pa'i bla ma dang / dben pa 'ba' zhig yid la bsams nas ri dwags rgya nang nas shor ba bzhin du bros/ 'phan yul du phebs pa dang 'bri gung
314b3(1): yang ri ba'i rtogs ldan ga la ba sogs dge 'dun bzhi bcu tsam bsod snyoms la byon pa dang 'grogs/ dus de tsam na 'bri gung pa lugs gnyis ka nas rnam dpyod che zhing / zil gyi khri thog tu bzhugs
314b4(1): nas spyan snga chos kyi grags pa'i spyan ltos sgrigs srol legs pa dang / bla dpon gyi 'khor rgya mtsho'i dbus na lha sras 'bri gung pa rin chen phun tshogs mthong na mi mthun pa med pa'i zhal spyan can de'i phyag
314b5(1): 'bul la lhags pas/ mtshan nyid pa'i ham thul yul bud/ mi phyed pa'i dad pa gting nas g.yos/ spyan chab lhug par shor/ mtshan nyid pa'i ri lam dgag sgrub kho na'i a 'thas sbrul gyi shun pa bzhin du dor/
314b6(1): tshe 'di phyi kun gyi blo gtad zhu snyam byung gsungs/ ri zhig na thol bsam gyi dri mo la zhib tu gnang / lar bka' rgyud pa 'di la 'jig rten gyi dpal 'byor yod kyang chos kyi 'jug sgo 'gag dam zhing mi ltos
315a1(1): legs pas/ slob gsang ba rnams cog gra'i sgrigs srol dam por 'jug pa la/ rje'i zhal nas chos khrims par/ e waM pa'i dge bshes 'di yon tan can zhig 'dug/ sgrigs lam 'dur phebs
315a2(1): kyang / rang gis bsag sbrang yin dgongs nas zla ba gsum gyi bar du nan tan mdzad/ 'khor lo sdom pa dril bu lha lnga'i dbang / phyag chen lhan cig skyes sbyor gyi khrid/ bka' rgyud gser phreng / dgongs gcig
315a3(1): lnga ldan gyi khrid rnams gsan// da ma gcig gi gcod yul la 'dris par byas/ tshe blos btang gi bya btang phyogs bral ba zhig byed dgongs nas snyan du gsol ba na/ khyed gang du'ang ma 'byon par 'di khar
315a4(1): bzhugs/ gcod la'ang nged 'dris che ba yin gsungs nas thugs kyi re ba bskang / dpon slob gnyis lan mang por mdo sngags dang khyad par gsang sngags gsar rnying gi lugs so so'i dgongs pa 'grel tshul
315a5(1): don la rton mi rton gyi 'bel gtam dri smad mang po mdzad/ gcig la gcig thugs ches/ dge bshes kyi ming ma nor zhes rnam pa kun tu bsngags shing / bkur mthong chen pos gzengs bstod kyang snyems chung kho
315a6(1): na lhur len/ der 'bri gung pa'i dgongs par/ de 'dra ba'i gang zag mkhyen pa rlabs che shing / bya btang ba/ phral tshugs kha bzang ba sogs gang la dpags kyang ngo mtshar che snyam du dgongs pa'i tshe/ slob dpon
315b1(1): chen po'i lung bstan byung bas/ lan cig khyed mdo sngags gang la brda' bstan pa tsam gyis khong du chud pa dang bcas kho bo'i 'khrul snang la lo chen be ro tsa nas byin gyis brlabs pa'i gang zag gsang sngags snga
315b2(1): 'gyur gyi chos la bag chag che ba zhig tu sems pas/ khyod slob dpon pad+ma la e dad gsungs/ slob dpon pad+ma la sangs rgyas dngos kyi 'du shes byis pa'i dus nas yod/ gang zag phal la rtog pa chung zhing de'i
315b3(1): stobs kyis chos la'ang 'dris chung zhus pas/ 'o na gsol ba thob mdzod/ sku'i snang ba dang lung ston pa zag chod gsungs/ yang ri skar pa'i chos khrims mdzad dus bstan pa la phyag bzhis shin tu che bas/
315b4(1): legs par gsungs pa'i dam pa'i chos 'dul ba'i bca' khrims la sus kyang 'da' bar mi nus/ lan cig rje 'bri gung pa'i gsung gis/ dge bshes kyis sang tshogs khrod du dgongs gcig la bshad pa byed
315b5(1): dgos gsungs/ sngar de 'dra ba'i bshad srol mi 'dug kyang / dgos pa'i slad yin/ bla ma'i bka' ldog tu mi rung ba snyam nas sang tshogs dang dbus su zhabs drung tshogs dbu la byon/ thel gyi mkhan slob chos
315b6(1): sgo ba dang / rdor 'dzin slob chung / yang ri skar pa dang bcas pa'i tshogs pa rgya mtsho'i dbus su/ lnga ldan la rtsa bar byas/ rdo rje'i gsung brgya lnga bcu pa chos tshims su bcad/ dgongs gcig lugs gsum gyi
316a1(1): grub mtha'i rkang bzung / mdo sngags kyi chos 'khor bstan pa yongs rdzogs kyi tshul du bshad/ skabs don tshoras pa Na kyis bkag pa rnams rang stobs kyi sgrub 'byed rnam par dag pa dang bcas
316a2(1): bshad pas thams cad snga na med pa'i ngo mtshar skyes/ sang sku drung nas bcar bas dbu la phyag gis byil zhing / ngas spyan snga chos kyi grags pa dang / mnga' ris pa Na chen gyi legs bshad slob ma kun la bshad pa
316a3(1): yin yang / phal che bas dgongs gcig 'bri gung pa kho na'i chos skad rang mtshan par gleng ba skad byed/ de 'dra byas nas don gyis ston pa'i bka' dang mi mthun par 'gro/ khyod kyi bshad pa des lnga ldan mdo sngags
316a4(1): gnyis ka'i nyams len gyi rtsa ba song / dgongs gcig de'i rgyab chos yin pa la sa lugs pa'i phyogs snga spangs pa'i dgag sgrub gnad thog tu 'gro ba byung bas snying tshim/ de bzhin de nas kyang byas pa yin/ re ba
316a5(1): las lhag gsungs/ 'di la yig cha zhig kyang mdzad snang ste khams pa'i gra pa zhig gis zin bris khyer bas rgyun chad/ de'i bka' brgyad lugs srol chen po dgu/ bdud rtsi sman bsgrub kyi phyag bzhes/ rnying ma bka'
316a6(1): gter gyi gshin rje'i rigs lnga/ dgongs pa yang zab/ mkha' 'gro'i snying tig brgyud pa gzhan las ches 'phags pa/ byang gter mdzod lnga/ pad gling chos skor rnams dang / 'bri gung phyogs kyi bka' brgyud bka'
316b1(1): 'bum la sogs pa'i dbang khrid lung gi bshad sbyar mang po gsan/ khyad par snga 'gyur gyi grub mtha'i gzhung srong tshul/ kho bo'i rdo rje slob dpon mnga' ris pa Na chen rin po che'i de'i mkhyen rab la mtha' med/ de'i
316b2(1): bka' las/ rnying ma lugs mthun zhig byed na gsang sngags snga 'gyur rang gi bstan pa'i bab la/ bka' gter zung gcig yin pas/ bka' ma ni/ mdo sku sems gsum la snga 'gyur bka' babs kyi chu bo bzhi'i
316b3(1): sgo nas bshad rgyun rnam par dag pa bzhin bshad pa lag len dang bcas pa bka' ma ltar byed dgos/ chos kyi zab gnad rnams brgyud pa dang chos la sel med cing 'kha' 'gro'i kha rlangs tshil le ba de gter ma
316b4(1): yin pas gter chos tshad ldan ltar byed dgos/ de ltar byas na rnying ma lugs dang mthun pa gcig yod phebs byung bas/ khyed rang yang nyan 'dod na kho bos de rnams thos pas bshad chog/ brjed gso tsam du'ang
316b5(1): 'gro gsungs nas/ bskyed pa ma hA yo ga tan+t+ra sde bco brgyad kyi rtsa ba sgyu 'phrul gsang ba snying po la 'grel pa phyogs bcu mun sel gyi lugs gtso bor bton/ lung a nu yo ga mdo dgongs pa 'dus pa mdo 'grel
316b6(1): chen mo'i dgongs pa dang / rdzogs pa chen po'i a ti yo ga kun byed rgyal po la sogs pa'i man ngag dngos stobs kyi 'grel pas bkral nas bshad/ de bzhin du gsar rnying gnyis ka'i rgyud 'bum/ rgyal ba klong chen
317a1(1): / pa'i ngal gso skor gsum/ mdzod bdun/ snying tig ya bzhi/ zab mo yang tig/ rgyud bcu bdun bi ma la'i Ti ka dang bcas pa/ man ngag brgya bcu dgu rnams gsan/ khyad par dpe khang du ched kyis
317a2(1): bzhugs nas so so'i yig cha la bsam byung gi shes rab rnam par dag pas dpyad pa na/ chos kyi zab gnad rnams rnying ma kho na la snang zhing / khyad par snying tig la yod par nges shes gting nas 'drongs/ dpon
317a3(1): slob gnyis ka bstan pa yongs rdzogs kyi bshes gnyen chen por gyur pas mdo phyogs dang gsar ma'i mkhas pa rnams kyi yig cha gang legs kyi dpyad pa la zhugs pa na/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa'i snying po rdo
317a4(1): rje'i theg pa dang mthun pa'i chos 'khor ni 'khor lo gsum pa yin/ der rgyu'i rgyud bde bar gshegs pa'i snying por grags pa de gsal por bstan/ dgongs pa de 'grel pa la/ rje rang byung rdo rje/ karma pa chos
317a5(1): grags rgya mtsho/ spyan snga chos kyi grags pa/ kun mkhyen klong chen pa rnams shin tu mkhas shing mthun pas de kho na'i grub mtha' la yid brtan par gyis shig gsungs/ kun mkhyen bla ma 'di nyid pa Na chen gser
317a6(1): mdog can pa'i grub mtha' la mchog tu 'dris shing nges pa'i shes pa brtan pas skabs 'dir dpyad pa zhugs pa na/ kun mkhyen ngag gi dbang po dang shAka mchog pa gnyis grub mtha' ngos 'dzin snying po gcig tu
317b1(1): mthun pa la nges pa gting nas 'drongs pa yin zhes gsungs/ don gyi'ang de ltar yin pa'i 'thad pa ni/ kun mkhyen chen po rdzogs pa chen po'i lta ba'i mthar zug dbu ma thal 'gyur ba dang mtshungs par zhal gyis
317b2(1): 'ches pa yin/ sems phyogs kyi lta ba khas len dang bral ba la sogs pa'i chos bzhi po 'di gser mdog can pas ji bzhin par khas len te/ ji skad du/ deng sang gangs can na lugs de thos na snying 'gas nas
317b3(1): srog 'dor bar byed pa dag mang na/ de dag dang dgag sgrub kyi bgyi ba gzengs bstod nas lhur len par mdzod cig kho bo cag ni chos bzhi po de ltar du khas len pa la sngon nyid nas spobs par gyur to// de yang
317b4(1): lta sgom spyod 'bras gsum po de ni klu sgrub dang thogs med gnyis ka'i shing rta'i srol mthar zug tu mthun/ zhes dang / de bzhin du tshig gi brjod pa tsam du rang gi grub pa'i mtha' la lta ba mchog 'dzin gyi mngon
317b5(1): rlom sgom pa tsam las/ don du de dag gang yang min pa'i 'dod kha'i lta ba ya ma zung gsar byung ba g.yangs su smra ba dag gi 'dod pa'i gting dpyis phyin pa dgongs nas 'di skad du/ deng sang gangs can gyi klog pa
317b6(1): bdag ni/ gsar ma las kyang ches gsar mar gyur pa'i grub pa'i mtha' dag glo pa la zhen cing byang bar byas nas/ tshig gi brjod pa la kho bo cag ni rdzogs pa chen po'am/ phyag rgya pa'am/ bka' gdams pa'am/
318a1(1): sa skya pa yin no zhes smra ba dag mang ba'i phyir ro// zhes gsungs pas so// de nas skyes bu dam pa 'di kha che'i pan+di ta shAkya shrIs/ bod btsun rnams kyis 'dul ba nas bshad pa'i rab tu byung ba de mi
318a2(1): 'ong ba 'dug/ rje btsun mi la des rtags dang cho ga byas na rab tu byung ba mtshan nyid pa zhig 'ong ba 'dug gsungs pa des thugs drangs/ grub pa'i mtshan ma zhig ma brnyes par la/ 'jig rten chos brgyad la dor//
318a3(1): gang dben gyi gnyen khrod du sbyangs pa'i yon tan bcu gnyis la gnas bzhin pas mchog gi dngos grub sgrub par dgongs/ chos gos gsum dang / lhung bzed/ zhal skyogs tsam las yo byad ci yang ma bzung / 'tsho
318a4(1): ba bsod snyoms kyang g.yeng ba'i rgyur dgongs nas/ sran ma khal bzhi la bza' ba dang / de btsos pa'i khu ba las btung bar byas nas grogs ri rin chen spungs pa'i mgul slob dpon chen po'i sgrub phug tu ri mi
318a5(1): 'bab pa'i dam bca' sngon du 'gro bas man ngag mkha' 'gro snying thig gi bskyed rdzogs/ rtsa rlung gi lam 'bras bu dang bcas pa lag khrid du 'debs pa'i gdams pa 'bri gung pas bla ma lnga tsam las gsan pas
318a6(1): man ngag yongs su rdzogs pa'i tshig brgyad dam pa 'di la gdams pa gang gis mnog chos su mdzad nas lo gsum 'di'i ring stan thog gcig tu bsgrubs pas/ mngon rtogs bsam gyis mi khyab pa shar/ ting nge
318b1(1): 'dzin gyi sgo mtha' yas pa brnyes/ de nas dgon gnas kyi bka' bkod ji lta bu phebs kyang / rnam g.yeng gi dbang du gyur dogs nas rang sa rang sar dgongs pa bsangs nas gnas gang dben dang / dben pa
318b2(1): 'ba' zhig tu lo brgyad bzhugs/ de'i tshe 'di lta bu'i gang zag sa mthon po la zhugs pa dag ni chos kyi gter la longs spyod pa mdo sde zab mo'i dgongs pa yin pas dgung lo sum cu pa'i tshe/ mkha' 'gro ma mon
318b3(1): mo'i cha lugs can zhig gis/ khyod kyi bslab pas bcings pa'i bya btang 'di nyams re dga'/ 'di 'thung dang zer nas chang bse phor gang byin/ rten 'brel de las me mo lug gi lo'i cho 'phrul zla ba'i tshes bcu'i
318b4(1): nyin 'od dkar po zhig gi rkyen las thig le chen po'i dbus su slob dpon chen po pad+ma rgyal po'i cha lugs su zhal gzigs/ rjes su gdams pa'i gsung gis dbugs dbyung bas grogs ri rin chen spungs pa nas
318b5(1): pad+ma'i zhal gdams grol tig dgongs pa rang grol gyi gter shog 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i shing shun kha dog ljang skya mtshon gyis mi shigs pa kha shas dang / sku gsung thugs rten gyis mtshon pa'i zab gter rgya mtsho la
318b6(1): mnga' dbang bsgyur/ khyad par lha sa'i gter 'byin pa la dgongs pa zhus pas/ 'bri gung pa'i slob ma bla ma gtsang nas dang bcas grogs su rdzong de gnang / lha sa'i sku gnyer gyis rnying ma bas gter bton yod
319a1(1): zhes zon bag byas kyang thugs dam gsol 'debs tshugs pa'i mod la sku gnyer rnams ra ro tha ma'i gnas su song / nor bu stag sha d+he ba/ bsam yas kyi me'i gnod pa bsrung ba'i dug shog gsum/
319a2(1): de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring bsrel/ mtsho rgyal gyi tshems/ lo rgyus shog ser/ myang grol a rgya can/ snod pad+ma rA ga'i dpyad pa rnams dang / khyad par bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i khug nas chos rgyal gyi sku 'don par
319a3(1): brtsams pa na gter bdag ming po klu rje chu srin gyi mgo can sa 'og nas mngon sum du thon/ gnyen po'i rdo rje yod pa mgo thog tu bzhag nas/ slob dpon gyi dam tshig rjes su dran par gyis shig gsungs pas rang
319a4(1): sar thim/ de'i 'jigs zil gyis gnyid du g.yung ba rnams skad shor/ bla ma gtsang gnas kyi dngos gnas su mthong / bstan skyong ma shin tu 'go bas lam du dre'u'i skad dang thug chom yang yang byung / der 'bri gung
319a5(1): rin po che yang dbu skra bsil te spyan 'dren la phebs/ na bza' phyag bris ma 'dod gsol can de phul/ shog ser rnams dpon slob lhan cig pas phab pa sogs 'di lta bu'i gter gyi rnam grangs dang nges shes
319a6(1): 'drongs pa gzhan du ma gyur pa lta bu yin te gter byung lo rgyus kyis shes so// de nas zing pa ste mgor gter sgrub la bzhugs pa'i tshe/ nub gcig snang ba thams cad skra tal le ba'i ngang / bud med gcig na re/ do
319b1(1): nub slob dpon chen pos tshe bcu gnang gi yod/ khyod rang chang 'di 'thung / sha 'di nal byi'i dur khrod na bram ze skye ba bdun pa'i sha 'dug pas tshogs shar blangs pa yin gsol dang nus pa tshad med/ nam mkha'
319b2(1): la 'phur yang thub zer/ chang de 'thungs/ sha de dmar tsar re 'dug pas yid 'phrigs se ba gcig gis ngang nas zos pas/ de na re/ khyed rnal 'byor pa 'dra po min/ da ste slob dpon mjal du 'dod zer ba'i
319b3(1): mod la sha'i nus pas nam mkha' la gya gyur khrid nas zangs mdog dpal ri'i bkod pa srin po'i yul gling dang bcas pa ngo mtshar can gzigs/ slob dpon yab yum gu ru bde ba chen po'i rnam pas dbang bskur/
319b4(1): rjes su gdams/ zhal gdams dang bslab bya mdzad/ zla ba gcig gi yun du bzhugs pa'i snang ba byung / de ste sngon gyi smon lam gyi dbang las bod yul gyi gdul bya rnams dran par gyis zhes mkha' 'gro ma rnams
319b5(1): kyis bskul bas/ rmi lam sad pa bzhin song / sngar zos bsam gyis dpyad gzhi byas pa'i go myong rtogs pa'i thog tu 'byor pas bstod pa snyan pa'i sgra dbyangs lha yi rol mor grags pa 'di mdzad/ de nas bya ba
319b6(1): las kyi 'khor lo la zhugs te/ rje 'di pa snying po'i sgrub pa 'ba' zhig thugs la gtod na'ang / kun mkhyen chen po'i ring lugs pa zing pa stag mgo'i bla mar dam tshig la bkar nas bsko bzhag gnang bas/ der
320a1(1): chos kyi char phab/ re zhig na skar mangs bsam yas su phyags phebs pa las phreng por dgongs 'dus kyi chos bdag nyi ma rgyal mtshan las dpon slob gnyis kas dgongs 'dus dang / gter phran
320a2(1): pod bcu gnyis tsam gsan/ phreng po bas nan gyis zhus pa'i ngor/ bsam yas dang phreng po gnyis kar rgyal tshab tu mnga' gsol/ bar skabs nas khra 'brug gi jo mo sgrol ma la bud med kyi rgyan gsol bas rab
320a3(1): gnas nyams/ slar bsgyur bar pradz+nyA'i zhabs ched du bskul yang sde srid kyis bkag/ des rten 'brel log ste dpon blon nang bshags pa'i chings la 'bri gung pas gshegs dus 'phyong rgyas zhabs drung hor bsod
320a4(1): pa'ang dad pa shin tu thob/ rje 'bri gung pas dam pa 'di'i bsngags pa brjod de mchod yon gyi lung bstan/ dpag par dka' ba'i yon tan gyis blo 'phrogs nas dkar po pa bstan 'dzin nor bu'ang slob mar gyur//
320a5(1): de nyid ring por ma lon par gshegs skabs/ bsam yas gtsug lag khang sde dang bcas pa rje btsun 'di la gnyer du gtad pas/ lo gsum gyi bar gtsug lag khang gi zhabs tog/ bar skor zhig gsos/ 'bras
320a6(1): pa'i gru shan gso ba dang / dkar me'i 'du 'god la sogs pa'ang bdag gir bzhes/ chos rje mnga' bdag pa sku mched sogs 'dus pas phyed nyis brgya tsam la lhan cig skyes sbyor gyi khrid dang / rgyab chos su mdo
320b1(1): mdzangs blun/ dgongs pa nges 'grel sogs bstsal/ mchog ldan mgon po'i sras rgyal sras bstan pa'i 'byung gnas/ me long rdo rje'i gdung brgyud/ mdo sngags gling pa/ khyad par du gsang bu'i chos rje ston tshag pa
320b2(1): zhes dus de tsa na dge ba'i bshes gnyen rig pa che bar grags pa de rnams la grol thig gi chos 'khor bskor bas/ dam pa 'dis sngon 'gro'i skabs su mdo'i bshad pa/ dngos gzhi'i skabs su rgyud sde'i bshad pa/
320b3(1): khyad par gter chos 'di pa'i rang skad rgyud sde chen po'i grub pa'i mtha' la gnas pa de'i go don slongs nas bshad pas/ ston tshag pa chen po na re/ da lta mdo sngags la kho bo las sbyangs stobs che ba med snyam pa
320b4(1): yin te/ skye ba brgyud nas sbyangs pa dang mi 'dra ba 'dug/ rje btsun dam pa pradz+nyA ra smi rang kham che gsungs/ de phyin nas ting nge 'dzin kho na la dril/ de'i snyan pas sa skya bdag chen pas kyang 'chi med sku gsum 'dus
320b5(1): pa'i skor gsan zhing thugs yid 'dres/ de bzhin du bya rgod gshongs su sde 'khrugs chen po sus kyang mi 'dums pa byung ba'ang blang dor gyi ston pa'i lung bstan gyis zhi bas pa Na chen 'bum phrag gsum pa'i sprul
320b6(1): skur yid ches/ rtse gdong pa sku mched rnams kyis kyang dbang chos mang du gsan/ de nas rje 'bri gung pa zas ngan gyi sbyor bas bsnun pa na/ dam pa 'di la thugs shin tu brtse bas zhal gdams mang du gnang ste sku la
321a1(1): mnyes thabs kyi ngang nas khams 'phos/ phyis 'bri gung phyogs kyi gdung brgyud rin po ches gtsos bu chen thams cad 'dir 'dus/ dgongs pa yang zab mi tsam du 'gro nye'i srog mthud/ thub bstan
321a2(1): rdo rje brag tu lo gsum gyi bcad rgyar bzhugs dus/ slob dpon chen po pad+ma rgyal po'i cha lugs seng ge la bcibs pa zhig zhal gzigs/ deng sang 'di na lta ba ma 'khrul pa'i khyad par 'byed shes pa khyod las med
321a3(1): pas de'i gnas gsal bar ston cig gsungs pas bden gnyis gsal sgron zhes tshig nyung la don che ba de mdzad/ 'bri gung pa'i dgongs rdzogs su mdo sngags kyi smon lam zhes bstan pa thams cad ma 'dres pa
321a4(1): yongs su rdzogs pa'i gsung rab tshig don bzang po de'ang mdzad/ slar zhabs drung hor bsod nams dar rgyas kyis 'phyong rgyas su spyan drangs/ pha dang bu phrad pa lta bu'i dgyes pa chen pos ti shrir bkur/ grol tig
321a5(1): la sogs bzang mo'i gdams pas rjes su bzung / mi 'gyur kun dga' dpal bzang dang / sbrul skra zla ba/ zhig po gar gyi dbang phyug sogs dang yang thugs yid gcig tu 'dres shing chos kyi skyes rgya chen pos phan
321a6(1): tshun ngoms res mdzad/ byang bdag po bkra shis stobs rgyal dang yang mjal bas thugs shin tu ches/ re zhig na phreng por sku skrun pa zhig byung bas rkyen byas/ shAn+ta pu ri'i zhing khams phyi mchod rten la nang gzhal
321b1(1): med khang / mkha' 'gro'i grong khyer 'bum tsho gsum gyis bskor ba/ gzhal yas khang gi khri 'phang mthon po la dpa' bo chen po thod pa'i dum bu rtsal na tshod bco lnga pa/ sku mdog sngo bsangs shangs zhur dkar po/
321b2(1): dar dang rin po ches brgyan pa/ dpa' bo dang / mkha' 'gro dang / rab byung dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dpag tu med pa'i 'khor la theg pa sna tshogs kyi chos 'khor bskor ba gcig gzigs shing / ma
321b3(1): 'ongs pa na dam pa nyid de'i thugs kar sprul pa bsdu bar lung bstan thob/ des skye ba'i mtha' yang chod/ skye ba snga phyi'i gdul bya'i go mthud chog pa byung gsungs/ karma pa dbang phyug rdo rje phreng por phebs pa dang
321b4(1): mdzal/ dag snang mtha' yas pa gzigs/ 'bel gtam mdzad pas thugs lhag par ches/ dge bshes rin po che de mkhyen rab bsam gyis mi khyab zer ba de bden par 'dug ces 'phros don la'ang bsngags pa
321b5(1): mdzad/ sprul pa'i sku dkon mchog yan lag dang mjal du/ drung ram rdza mon pas gsar rnying gi rgyud la dogs slong mang po mdzad pa la/ lan gab la byings cha ba 'ba' zhig gi rgyas btab pas/ dza gral grol nas
321b6(1): zhabs drung sprul pa'i sku'i gsung nas drung ram par/ gang zag khyad par can de la so so skye bos rgol ba byas na ldang mi nus pa de 'dra 'ong zhes gsung skad/ 'brug pa rin po che chos kyi spyan ldan pad+ma dkar po dang
322a1(1): snga phyir mjal/ sa paN gyi dgongs gtad dbu ma rang rgud pa 'dug pa dang / dge ldan pa'i sku lus phyi ldang nang ldang sogs kyi 'bel gtam zhib rgyas su gnang / thugs yid gcig tu 'dres/ lan
322a2(1): gcig sprul pa'i sku khyed lta bu rtog ge'i chos la dgyes pa mi 'gab/ da ste snying po'i chos kyi 'phel rgyas kho na la dgongs pa gtod dgos tshul zhus pas thugs la shin tu zhugs/ grol tig gi chos kyi bdag por gyur
322a3(1): zhing chos skor phal cher gsan pa yin/ 'brug pa rin po che nyid kyi rnam thar du'ang / phreng po nas gter ston dge bshes rin po che dang mdzal/ thugs ka shin tu nye bar byung zhes snang / phyi re ba zhig gang gi slob ma
322a4(1): rin po che lha rtse ba la lnga ldan gyi khrid bstsal/ tshe ring pho brang dang sdig stengs rnams su/ 'phyong rgyas zhabs drung / bde chen gling pa/ sbrul sku mdo sngags rgyal sras rin po rnams la grol thig dang / mkha' 'gro snying
322a5(1): tig/ dgongs pa yang zab rnams kyi bshad sgrub mdzad/ grol dbang la mi stong phrag bdun bdun tshogs pa sha stag dang / me tog gi char 'ja' 'od la sogs pa'ang byung / mdo mkhar du sde pa sku rgyal bas 'dad
322a6(1): kyi grar dbus gdan drangs/ rat+na'i gdung brgyud chos rje nor bu pa zhal ngo / las 'phro gling pa'i sku skye/ lho mon gyi mi khri tsho gsum tsam la chos dang dam rdzas kyi 'brel pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi mtshan sgrog pa sogs kyi
322b1(1): 'gro don mdzad/ gnas der dgon pa 'debs par zhus pa zhal gyis ma bzhes/ 'phyong rgyas su dbus dwags kyi dmag tshan po ches rgol bar lhags pa/ gshin rje nag po sum sgril gyi dmag bzlog dang / bsam
322b2(1): yas dpon blon bran du bkol nas bzlog par mdzad/ sde pa yar rgyab nas sku 'bring pa nyid lo chen bai ro'i dus kyi cha rong rgyal mo'i skye ba yin pas mchod yon du 'brel zhing / dbang khrid gdams pa rjes su bzung /
322b3(1): mi chen gyi sprin bdag gcig la thugs nang gtsang / spang chung dgon gsar ma lag dang bcas pa'ang phul/ 'di dus sgom grub kyis phyogs phul nas dar rgyas chos sdings pa la bka' bkyon phog/ dgon gnas dam
322b4(1): pa 'di la tha tshig tu bkar nas phul na'ang gzhan la gnod pa rmi lam tsam du'ang thugs la mi dgongs shing / rang dbang dpal gyis chog shes la mnyes pas/ sbrul sku gsung sbrul rang la 'jigs pa dgongs zhes
322b5(1): nan zhu mdzad pas de dag kyang drin du gzo zhing dad pas yar byon lha khang du 'bral ba dang bcas mjal du byon/ bka' drin zla med par brtsi/ sde'u gdong gong ma/ mkhar thog/ grub rgyal gling / khro bo mkhar/ bkra
322b6(1): shis rtse/ dpal grong sogs su 'ang gdan drangs shing bsnyen bkur/ chos rje snang gsal skrang pa dang / mdo khams/ go 'jo/ kaHthog/ nyag re/ cong zhi/ rgyal mo rong sogs nas byon pa'i bla ma rnams so sor smin
323a1(1): grol gyi gdams pas tshim par mdzad/ lar skyes bu chen po 'di dben pa 'ba' zhig la mnyes pas gang du yun ring ba tsam gtan chags pa de dang der yang sku mtshams gtso bor 'don/ rnam pa kun
323a2(1): tu snga dgongs kyi thugs dam la che gnyen dang thugs brel ci lta bus kyang g.yeng mi nus/ nyin gung gi cha la'ang bstan 'gror sman pa'i bya ba las kyi 'khor lo de dang de stabs gcig tu mdzad de thugs ngam kho na'i
323a3(1): nga du bzhugs pa las gdul bya'i snang ba dag pa rgyu mtshan du mdzad pa'i bag yangs su lar mi bzhugs/ slob ma'i bya ba la thugs bskyed shin tu che bas 'o brgya la ji lta bu byung yang de dang de'i re ba phral phral du
323a4(1): skoslong ba las/ zhu sna ma 'phrod pa dang chos skyugs kyi ngang la gra tshogs gsog pa rgyal po'i rnam thar mi skyong / che gnyen su 'dra ba'i thad du'ang rten 'brel smrig phyogs dang lung bstan sogs la bsnyad pa'i ngo dga' dang
323a5(1): phye 'thor mdzad pa mi srid/ mkhas pa dang grub pa'i ngo nas dpyod ldan thams cad kyis rjes su yi rang ba mngon par bstod cing / bla dpon che gnyen mang po'i ti shrIr gyur kyang khengs pa dang dregs pa'i gzi byin ngom
323a6(1): par mi mdzad/ phral sku la bcar te yun ring du bsdad kyang thugs kyi gter mi lon zhing gnang spyod log pa'i the tshom tsam yang mi mnga'/ rnam thar gsol 'debs las/ grol byed rlung sems rtsa dang thig le'i
323b1(1): gnad// zhugs gnas thim gsum dbu ma'i lam dag pas// ro rkyang mdud grol sa bcu rim gyis bgrod// tha mas gtsug tor mchog grub gsol ba 'debs// zhes rdo rje'i gnas chen po'i nye rgyu'i lam gnad du
323b2(1): song bas sku na mthon por song nas kyang / sku la gnyer bag dang skra dkar med cing gzhon sha chags/ nang gi rtsa mdud grol bas chos kyi tshig don zab cing gting dpag dka' ba'i gnas 'grel pa la bsnyengs pa
323b3(1): med/ gzhan rgyud kyi bsam pa mkhyen pas ma 'ongs pa mngon sum du lung ston pa dang / 'ga' dang 'gas nyams sad pa'i slad du brtag pa zhus pa'ang mngon sum du gtan la phebs pa dang / tshogs pa 'dzom che/
323b4(1): sar/ khyed rang rnams kyi sku che'i smad la glo bur gyi rgyal po stobs can zhig gis dbus gtsang thams cad la dbang bsgyur ba 'ong / de nas rim pas sems can gyi bde skyid dman pa yin/ zhes sde srid gtsang ba'i
323b5(1): las don rgyug pa dang / de bzhin du sde pa 'phyong rgyas pa nyid kyi srid la thal ba 'byug pa dang / sog po gu shrI'i dmag gis dbus gtsang khams gsum bcu pa la sogs mi rabs mang po'i rjes kyi gter lung thig
323b6(1): / khelegs pa lnga pa chen pos kyang rnam thar la 'dren par mdzad/ de bzhin du drag po mngon spyod kyi las gdeng du gyur pas 'phyong rgyas pa'i gdung la dam sri rgyal bur rdzus pa gdong phyed la sha lpags bral ba zhig byung ba
324a1(1): rang gter gshin rje'i sgrub pa mdzad pas bdun phrag gnyis nas rnam shes dengs su bcug pa sogs brjod kyis ga na ldang / lar 'phyong rgyas zhabs drung hor bsod pa de lha sras dpal gyi 'byung
324a2(1): gnas kyi skye bar lung gis zin cing dad stobs bsam gyis mi khyab pas gsang sngags rnying ma'i dge 'dun gyi sde zhig 'dzugs par nan gyis bskul yang / lnga brgya'i tha mar gyur pas gra sa grwa tshang gi gnas dag kyang
324a3(1): sbyor ba lhod por gyur pa'i nyes dmigs gzigs nas zhal gyis ma bzhes pa'i thog tu gshegs/ de'i sras hor bsod nams stobs rgyas kyis yab kyi dgongs pa rdzogs slad dang / rang gi bzhed pa stabs gcig
324a4(1): pas nan tan gsol ba btab pa la brten nas 'phyong rgyas dpal ri theg pa chen po'i gling 'di gsar du btab/ spyi rdzas dang mchod gzhis gtsug lag khang gi 'du 'god thams cad zhabs drung 'phyong rgyas pa rang gi
324a5(1): bla nas sbyar/ sdig stengs rin po che ngag dbang 'od zer mkhan por bskos nas dam pa'i chos 'dul ba la legs par gnas pa'i bca' khrims dang / gzhi gsum gyi cho ga'i phyag len la gnas pas phyi ru 'dul
324a6(1): ba'i kun tu spyod pa nyams su bstar zhing / nang du gsang sngags rdo rje theg pa'i smin grol rab 'byams las grub mtha'i gzhung rgyal ba klong chen pa'i shing rta chen mo rtsa 'grel gyis slong zhing / nyams len gter kha
324b1(1): gong 'og dang / yab sras gnyis kyi gter chos/ snying tig ya zhi/ bla ma dgongs 'dul la sogs pas gzhung srong bar bstan nas rim gyi snga 'gyur bka' ma'i rgyud sde'i lam srol chen po'ang ston par bzhed kyang /
324b2(1): sde dpon phan tshun mi mdza' ba'i kun slong gis gsel ba'i spyan gzhis lo gcig gi khong du zhi bar mnal bas bstan pa mtha' rgyas kyi rten 'brel la cung zad gzhar/ de lta na'ang don gyis theg pa rim dgu'i grub
324b3(1): mtha'i rnam gzhag dbyis phyin pa rgyal ba klong chen pa'i gzhung gis slong zhing / rnal 'byor du bya ba'i gnas la yo ga gsum ka'i zab cing rgya che ba'i ngo bo ma 'khrul zhing mi bslu ba gter kha gong 'og/ bla ma dgongs
324b4(1): 'dus/ grol ba'i thig le la sogs pa dang / rig pa rang shar gyi rgyud don la bye brag tu 'jug pa dgongs pa yang zab rnams mdo sgyu sems gsum ka'i rgyud sde la don gyis rten pa sangs rgyas pad+ma'i ring lugs ma
324b5(1): nor ba zhes bya'o// zhabs drung 'phyong rgyas pas sems nyid ngal gso rtsa 'grel par gyi sgo 'phar phye ba'i gtam la'ang / 'gro ba lha dang bcas pa'i ston pa dpal kun tu bzang po de nyid kyis rang gis bdud rtsi brnyes
324b6(1): pa'i go 'phang la gdul bya rnams dngos sam brgyud pas bkri bar bzhed nas/ rgyu dang 'bras bu'i theg pa ji snyed cig gsungs pa de thams cad kyi don snying por dril ba ni mdo sngags thams cad gang zag gcig
325a1(1): 'tshang rgya ba'i lam gyi lus yongs su rdzogs par ston pa'i bstan bcos 'di nyid kun mkhyen ngag gi dbang pos ched du spel bar mdzad pas/ spyir rgyal ba'i bstan pa la zhugs so cog dang / khyad par
325a2(1): snga 'gyur par khas 'che ba rnams kyis bskyed rim tshig rkyang tsam dang / rdzogs rim sna re'i nyams myong cung zad kyis yid tshim par byas na/ de dag lam ltar snang dang yang dag pa yin min kyang mi shes shing / brgya
325a3(1): la rang gi rgyud la myong ba rnal ma zhig skyes na'ang lcags pa'i rmi lam ltar gzhan la 'doms pa'i mthu med pa dag gis gsar rnying gi bstan pa mtha' dag nyams dmas pa la/ mkhas shing grub pa rnams kyis 'khu
325a4(1): zhing gshung ba dang / gal te mdo sngags kyi gzhung lugs rgya chen po la slob pa ni snyigs ma lnga bdo ba'i dus 'dir gshis kyis dka' ba la dgongs nas 'di ni mdo rgyud dang rgya gzhung rtsod pa dang bral ba rnams kyi
325a5(1): lung ji lta bar bkral bas/ blo gros dang ldan pa dag gis rkang tshugs pa'i rtog dpyod kyi mig zhib mos go ba'i gting phyin par bltas tshe/ dpyad pa yongs su rdzogs pa na lam gyi rim pa 'di nyid la nges pa gting
325a6(1): nas 'drongs shing / de'i tshul la gnad du bsnun nas nyams su blangs na rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa dgyes pa'i 'phrug med kyi myur lam ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba yin zhes/ rje btsun dam pa pradz+nyA ra smi'i gsung gi
325b1(1): gsang bas lan cig ma yin par bsnyad pa la brten nas/ chos bzhin du sa skyong ba mi'i dbang pos bsod nams stobs kyi rgyal pos/ nyid kyi yab rje'i dgongs pa bskang ba dang / snga 'gyur gyi bstan pa rin po che
325b2(1): 'phel rgyas kyi phyir/ 'khor lo gsum la lhur byed pa'i dge 'dun gyi lde btsugs shing / de dag gi 'tsho ba bla nas sbyor ba dang / smin grol lam gyi cha lag tshes bcu chen mo'i phyag bzhes kyi srol/ de dag gi chas
325b3(1): sogs gzhan gyi blos dpag par dka' ba'i rgyun dang / bstan bcos 'di nyid kyi glegs bam grangs med du 'char ba'i phyir bar du bzhengs te bstan pa'i btsas su bzhag pa yin la/ zhes so// rgyu des sems nyid
325b4(1): ngal gso rtsa 'grel dang / gsang ba'i snying po/ 'grel pa phyogs bcu mun sel sogs blo la 'doms par byed pa'i rgyun da lta'i bar du'ang gnas pa tsam mo// de ltar dgon gnas bskrun nas yun ring ma song ba la/
325b5(1): de bzhin gshegs pa la bdud sdig to can gyis bskul ba bzhin du sgra mya ngan las 'da' bar bzhed nas rjes 'jug rnams la zhal thems su/ nged kyi phung po 'di sa 'bum gcig tu bzhag na mthar nor bu dbyig tu
325b6(1): 'gyur zhing / bod 'bangs la dge ba dang / mtha' dmag bzlog pa'i rten 'brel yod de dus dbang gis cir 'gyur cha med/ de bas dum bur byas te yar rgyab gtsang po'i chu la sbyangs na kong po rgyal yan chod kyi
326a1(1): sems can la phan te mi nus/ dus kyi dbang las bstan pa 'phel rgyas yong ba gshis kyis dka'/ dge 'dun rnams rang rang gi bstan pa sgo drung nas ma nub par gyis la skye bem re gyon/ gtso
326a2(1): bopor thos bsam sgom pa la 'bad 'bungs thon/ phral bya ba gang thongs rang gyis/ dka' thub 'dis de la rten chud 'dza' bas 'tsho ba gyi na tsam re bsten/ sdom pa gsum la nyes ltung gi dri mas ma gos par brtson
326a3(1): 'grus drag pos 'bod/ gnyen pos rkyen thub pa dang / dad pas khams gsos pa dang / 'gro rnams pha mar shes pa'i nyams len la 'bungs/ nga dang phrad par 'dod pa rnams grol tig dgongs pa rang grol dang /
326a4(1): be bum gyi man ngag rnams la nyams len mdzod/ ces gdams/ dag pa'i gsal snang dpag tu med pa gzigs/ khyad par nyin gcig dus kyi 'khor lo'i mngon dkyil rdzogs par gnang nas dbang mdzad pas//
326a5(1): dge slong 'bri gung pa na re/ lo dus gnang ba e yin zhus pas de 'dra byed pa med/ cho ga gzung yang ma myong / de ring byang sham+b+ha la'i snang ba mu mtha' med par shar nas skye bo'i tshogs mang pos gsol ba 'debs pa
326a6(1): la de ltar byas pa yin/ lar zhing khams mang por dbang dang byin rlab bgrang las 'das pa byas pa'i snang ba dang / gsal snang 'ba' zhig las snang ba rang mtshan par 'char gyi mi 'dug/ da res kyi nang 'dis
